Ittina aIeccuo iꞌrekathekin itti, “Onon thomma lon lothokkwie lon kuru ncik elli? Ana onon thantinakat lon lothokkwie lon kuru ncik lꞌrek ilaik tat?
Pul ipee, ook pul ipaik pangkene lon loKapik.
Ul wꞌrek waik ammakka mïl imothithiekotheik ikathar. Amma okin thoccïkothe lon, pul pothopulut panthan accokkot aponekat kin lon ilakin thoccïkothe nnomïkït men.
Opilingon thammakka mïl imapukkothe nokꞌrimi, okin thaccïkot lon akin opirakat noka.
Anaruk akka lon lakannoccokot cik nomïkït, lon len lakinnikkoik puccuk. Ana amma thokkiettat thiak thaat nti ilon len okin thapaꞌrineik accokkot.
Ana opilingon, thammakka mïl imapukkothe ithoꞌrkït tholï, okin thaccïkot lon,
anaruk thirro mïkït nti ikarak nolon lothikkoik enthi ana thammikkarakot thothaꞌrthan ana thongat thaꞌrupu wꞌrek thiꞌriko nomïkït cakuruk athokïttat lon loKapik.
Ana ul wꞌrek wammakka mïl imerat nocik icoporot, okin thaccïkot lon akin angkat, akin okkwoniekat mïl arrial ana alkaire ana aꞌrek arrial wꞌrapuruk ana aꞌrek arrial ukuluk nomïl imokat mettat.”
Ana kwiꞌrekathekin itti, “Onon thaccie thik annappokuꞌrupot cerok nani ana manna onekket thoceken copapꞌreki? Onon thakorronno onekket cik noꞌret athoccieiki?
Akka lon ilamuꞌruttakot ncik linako nan ana ilocukkwakot nan littako ncik.
Okkwi iponu unu itti kwaccïkot cik akwoccïkot.”
Ana kwiꞌrekathekin cakuruk itti, “Nokkwine lon kunu ncik kicce ilanon thaik thaccïkot, akka lon ilanon okkot lakkattanthet non ana manna arttakot nan.
Okkwi ipakkwine thongkene thin kunu ncik, kwina arttot nan, ana okkwi ipakorronno occïkot lon lin, antoka manna itti kwina kwanekittat thina then.”
Ana kwiꞌrekathekin cakuruk itti, “Ngili ngoKapik ngammakka lon elli. Pul peet mïl.
Ngkoꞌra ana icïngkï core cocïl caik cacokka antoka manna itti kwomma itti caik cacokka tat.
Lon len lakkattat pellek, capu cummiet tꞌre cittokït aroingkat ikwonco arokkat tartta, arokkat cïl.
Ana amma mïl moꞌriat ana thuput thaat thothokio, kwaneko kiꞌrittang akwothokiat.”
Kwappiꞌrekat cakuruk itti, “Ngintha akka oron ungkwie ngngili ngoKapik ngngin, ana manna thokkwie lon kuru ncik thiatha itharon eret ngngin?
Ngili ngoKapik ngungkot core icoththe cannan iceera inocapu.
Anaruk amma ceerat cacokka acothakkakat pira pïttïk ipangken, apokkat uꞌri wïttïttïk auꞌrupe ikkat cik irnek ten.”
OIeccuo pokat cik akwerenekin nthokkwienekin lon kuru ncik loppot ammakka elli ilokat aliniekin lon.
Kwakannerenekin lon lꞌrek aththik okorronno okkwienekin lon kuru ncik anaruk amma okin thaik threk okin oul iammakothok akwerenekin lon kicce okorronno okkwienekin lon kuru ncik.
Ana caꞌri cen cipin akwiꞌrekat ul iammakothok itti, “Ntun arrot nocarkan corok cꞌrek.”
Akin oththekat nocungkut coul akin arriekathok ikuppuꞌrung konoiꞌri ana ul wꞌrek womakathok nuppuꞌrung wonoiꞌri wꞌrek cakuruk.
Ana kanang kakkakathe akikkat cik akokkurarot cannan, athopangka thoiꞌri ongkuꞌrot ciki ithiꞌrot aiꞌri ikkat cik angothukkwot ikuppuꞌrung akikkat cik ere kuo thoꞌronthong.
Ana oIeccuo pappokat cik akwïcat thoceken cokuppuꞌrung akweot inthe, ana ul iammakothok wurttathok aiꞌrekathok itti, “Pul ipangkene, ngkwella thiak thïn akka onïn thaik thïkïkko ngꞌri?”
Akurokat kapik akwothirriekat kanang cik akwiꞌrekat thopangka thoiꞌri itti, “Angkik ana itti ocoꞌri.” Ana kanang kangkatheik accokkot ana cik cokkwathe ka appik.
Ana kwiꞌrekathe ul iammakothok itti, “Onon thontha akka annopelle? Onon tharthuk thella thoccokot lon loKapik nomïkïri?”
Ana okin thipathe nꞌre akin okkwe ka akin ikkat cik akin ipittararot itti, “Oththa empi? Akka manna kanang ana thopangka thoiꞌri thaccïkothok.”
Okin tharrathe tok cik akin eo nocik coCcethirin.
Anakka oIeccuo porpotheik nti ikuppuꞌrung konoiꞌri, apul pꞌrek akkakat nonupu ponat uꞌrupa iokithak noka apathocurot iaak.
Pul pen pikikkot cik nonupu ana manna pul pellat ipïꞌrïkïkkok nynyol.
Okin thokat akin ïꞌrïkïkkok appinappin nyaun ana tacok anaruk kwokat cik akwommotho nyol nnonyaun ana nnoracok. Pul pellat iponthomat cannan othakka itti apalkothok.
Kwokat cik akwaalle nonupu ana imuꞌrol icïngkï ana ingkoꞌra ana kwokat cik akwokontotto kuri ana akwokecce ka kung mmothok.
Anakka kwimmat oIeccuo nciththan akwollat taak akwekat ungku ncik tokït kung.
Kwiꞌrekathe mpoꞌre cittan itti, “Ngintha akka ngkwimmathe naun, Ieccuo, ukul woKapik korothiꞌrot, arrma ngkꞌran koKapik itti ngkwakannokkiethin thiak.”
Akka oIeccuo pappiꞌrethe uꞌrupa iokithak itti, “Uꞌrupa iokithak, oppothe thapat nti ipul empi.”
Menik aIeccuo ipittathok itti, “Ngkwoccot kꞌran itti oththa?”
Akwothïanthok tit itti, “Mpoccot kꞌran itti ‘cungkut’ akka onïn thoppot.”
Ana kwipittathe oIeccuo attang ana attang itti kwakannothïot kin thapat nocik enceꞌre.
Ana iccik kocoꞌrong cïnang, cungkut conuththuruk cokat cik acuꞌro.
Ana uꞌrupa iokithak wipittathe oIeccuo itti, “Othïothenïn inuththuruk, akorronno anïn iꞌrikikkorit.”
Kwokorronnathe uꞌrupa iokithak ana woppathe thapat nti ipul ana wiꞌrikikkathe inuththuruk. Ana nuththuruk athar weꞌra (2,000) noccorathe uo nokuthut korok ana napukkathe irok ana nïkïkkathe ngꞌri.
Pꞌrak ipuꞌre nuththuruk pollathe ana paththiꞌrekat ul lon len icarak coman ana iaik nomipit, ana wakkakathe itti wathokatha lon len.
Manakka okin thainet oIeccuo, okin thaththiat pul iponat uꞌrupa iokithak noka apikkoik appakot eret ana pothakkat poporot ca, ana okin thipathe nꞌre.
Pꞌrak ipokat pimmat, piꞌrekathe ul lon ilokkattathe nopul iponat uꞌrupa iokithak. Ana okin therekanthet kin lon lonuththuruk cakuruk.
Ittina ul wiꞌrekathe oIeccuo itti kwaththe nocik cen.
Anakka oIeccuo pokat cik akwarrot ikuppuꞌrung konoiꞌri, pul ipapponat uꞌrupa iokithak pipittathok itti pamakothok.
OIeccuo pꞌrakanthok anaruk kwiꞌrekathe itti, “Ngko tuan thanang athiꞌret kuꞌri kang lon appik ila Ili wokkinthung, ana tat akka wipot thiak thang.”
Ittina pul poingkathe ana pikkatheik aperene ul Naꞌran iattul lon loppot ila oIeccuo pokkinthok. Ana ul appik woprttakathe tit.
Anakka oIeccuo parrothe tok cik irapangka attang akweo nocarkan corok cꞌrek ngkuppuꞌrung konoiꞌri, ul woppot waꞌrntakathe iccik kung iccik korok.
Opilin nti inili nonocuththun caꞌrama poccot kꞌran itti oIairoc akkakat nocik cen. Manakka kwimmat oIeccuo, akwapat iracok tung.
Kwipittathok nthiak akwiꞌrekathok itti, “Ukul win iotteik iopari waik wio, ana ngkwanthan athonekket nyaun nan othakka itti akkoik.”
Ittina oIeccuo poingkathe akin aththeꞌra.
Ana cungkut coul woppot comakathok ana cikkatheik aconentekot cik iccik kung.
Ana pul ipopari pokat nocik cen ponat luput attul ana ikken keꞌra (12), aüccük ollo nti iaak.
Kworttekot thiak cannan akwoincene ul ittiet ul itti akwothakka poporot ana kwokïttathe akucci cik ia kwonat appik itti akwothakka poporot anaruk kwothakkakathe pongo cannan.
Manakka poccïkothe lon loIeccuo, pakkakathe nthoccul koIeccuo ithoꞌrkït thoul apothntat thon thokret koIeccuo,
akka kwerethe nocïkït cung itti, “Amma mpothntot kret kung ana mpittat.”
Ngüccük ngocoꞌrathe nti iaak accokkot ana kwinakathe noka kung itti kwothakkat poporot ngüccük ngocoꞌrot.
OIeccuo pinakathe nan itti puꞌran peot nti iaak ana kwolliakathe ul ana kwipittathekin itti, “Oththa akkothntot kret kin?”
Ul iammakothok wiꞌrekathok itti, “Ngkwimmat itti ul woppot waik wanentethung cik, ana tat akka aipitto itti, ‘Oththa akkothntorin?’”
Anaruk oIeccuo pikkatheik akwolliakot cik othakka itti akwimma pul ipothntot kret.
Pul ipopari pen pinat itti pittathe papathe iracok toIeccuo apokkwe ka nꞌre ana piꞌrekathe oIeccuo lon appik ilaik ïcat.
AIeccuo iꞌrekathok itti, “Ukul win, thoccokot tholon loKapik nocïkït thang thittiethung. Ngko amio opaꞌrik naung.”
Manakka oIeccuo pokat cik akwere, ul wꞌrek wakkakathe ntuan toIairoc, ili wonocuththun caꞌrama ana wiꞌrekathe itti, “Ukul wang wiot. Ana ngkwakinyie pul ipangkene pothen?”
AIeccuo okorronno okkwanthet lon ilakin thiꞌret kunu ncik akwiꞌrekat ili wonocuththun caꞌrama itti, “Kirrnni opelle occokothe lon loKapik nocïkït.”
Ana kwakannokarrnnat itti pul pꞌrek pamakothok, oPoththuruc pulluk ana oIakup ana oIuanna opang poIakup.
Manakka okin theot tuan toili wonocuththun caꞌrama, oIeccuo pimmakathe cungkut coul iokat cik aoo mpoꞌre cittan.
Kwiꞌrikathe noppan ana kwiꞌrekathekin itti, “Nthontha akka annoo ana annothukkwo ka ncik? Ukul wakinnio anaruk waik inthe.”
Anaruk okin thoccirathok ngngin.
Anakka kwothïothekin thapat appik, kwipathe oththan pokkul ana onnan ana ul iammakothok iakin thokat aththut, ana okin thiꞌrikathe na ukul wokat cik.
Kwonthathe ukul ncik ana kwiꞌrekathok ngkarru kung itti, “Thaliththa koum,” ilonu itti, “Ukul ioththeik, mpiꞌrethung itti urokothe kapik.”
Ana ukul wurokathe accokkot ana wikkatheik anyaro. Ukul waronat luput attul ana ikken keꞌra. Okin thikkatheik akin oprttakot tit nnꞌre.
Ana oIeccuo piꞌrekathekin lon lonthoththomat itti okin thakinniꞌret pul pꞌrek lon elli ana kwiꞌrekathekin itti okin thethet ukul aꞌrupu wꞌrek aꞌrko.
OIeccuo poththekathe nocik cen ana kwoingkathe nokaꞌran kung ikokat kaꞌran koNaccir, ana ul iammakothok woingkathe okin aththut.
Anakka caꞌri caCcepith caat, kwikkatheik akwongkenekin nocuththun caꞌrama ana okin ithoccïkothe lon lung thikkatheik akin oprttakot tit.
Ana okin thipittarathe itti, “Pul empi piothe lon elli kartha? Thinaik nti ica thiatha enthi ithettathok akka manna kwaik pakkot lon ilommaththik.

Okorronno oka ook pul ipaccatha oꞌreni? Okorronno oka ukul woMeriomi ana opang oIakup ana oIuccip ana oIouthai ana oCcamaani? Okorronno oka opangon ithari itharon thaik cenei?” Ana okin thꞌrakathe lon lung.
OIeccuo piꞌrekathekin itti, “Pul pothernte lon loKapik pothiakinet cik naꞌran appik anaruk kwakannothiakineik nokaꞌran kung ana nokuꞌri kung ana noul woruan thanung.”
Kwommat okkot lon ilommaththik ceneket, anaruk kwonekkekathe nyaun noul wotteik iongo ana kwothikkiekathekin thoporot.
Ana kwokat cik akwoprttakot tit akka okin thellat thoccokot lon loKapik nomïkït.
Ittina oIeccuo poingkathe akwonyaro naꞌran akwongkene.
Kwakkarathe okin ithattul ana ikken keꞌra (12) akwothïlekat kin theꞌra theꞌra naꞌran kurekkurek ana kwekathekin ngili akin okïcce uꞌrupa iokithak.
Ana kwiꞌrekathekin lon lonthoththomat itti, “Nokorronno oneko alpꞌrek aththik nokurtti kon, noneko kurrong kulluk. Nokorronno oneko thuꞌrit ngkaꞌruk nokurtti ana akucci iaꞌruk.
Nako wok annokorronno oneko eret arttot nan.”
Ana kwiꞌrekathekin cakuruk itti, “Amma onon thiꞌrikot tuan topul, nikkoik noppan ten puccuk annoththekat nokaꞌran ken.
Ana amma ul wonokaꞌran ken wakinnikkienon cik ana okorronno occïkot lon, annokkwe tuꞌrupang noracok ton amma annoththe nokaꞌran ken, aloka lon ilimmat lon ngkït itti okin thꞌrat lon lon.”
Okin thoingkathe akin ongkene ul itti wapaꞌrine lon ilokithak cik.
Ana okin thokïccekathe uꞌrupa iokithak woppot nnoul ana oꞌro ul ngaak iupupure woppot ana okin thothikkiekathekin thoporot.

AIli oIruthuc occïkat lon len, akka kꞌran koIeccuo kokat kinakot ncik appik. Opilingon thokat cik akin ere itti, “OIuanna pomamuthie purokot nti ithio, ana ilen akka puꞌran polon ilommaththik paik parekine iaak.”
Ana opilingon iꞌre itti, “Ook oIlia.”
Ana opilingon iꞌre itti, “Ook pul pothernte lon loKapik ammakka pul pꞌrek nti iul wothernte lon loKapik womaꞌrot wothupuththuput.”
Anaruk akka Ili oIruthuc poccïkothe lon elli, kwiꞌrekathe itti, “OIuanna pomamuthie ipa mpokiothe ca akkurokot nti ithio.”

Akka oIruthuc ngka kung akkiꞌret itti oIuanna paccokittat akwïꞌrïkïkkako, ana oIuanna poccokittakathe ana kwonekkettakathe ikorrkkor. Kwokkothe elli nti ilon loIruthia pari popang oPilippic ipa kwappipothok.
Akka oIuanna pokat akwerene oIruthuc itti, “Lon elli lakannoka locoꞌrotheik itti ngkwipo pari popangkang.”
OIruthia puakathe ka koIuanna itti kwakkwothok anaruk kwommat itti kwakkwothok tat

akka oIruthuc ponat nꞌre noIuanna akwaꞌrettanthok akka kwinarok itti kwokat pul ipoporot pupupure. Anakka oIruthuc poccïkothe akka oIuanna ere, alon ocikittanthok ca anaruk kwokat pongothe itti kwaccïkot lon lung.
OIruthia piathe caꞌri ica kwokat cik akwokwancot. Nokamuthe kocaꞌri cothokwonta thoIruthuc, oIruthuc pakkarathe ul ittïttïk ana nili noul irro ana ul ionu lon ikkun wonoththok poCelïl.
Ana ukul iopari woIruthia wukkwathe ana wopiriekathe oIruthuc noka ana ul wung iakin thokat cik akin oꞌrko thuꞌrit.
AIli oIruthuc iꞌrekat ukul iapari itti, “Ipittothin papu ipa ngkwongothe ana mpethung.”
Ana kwonekkekanthet ukul lon cik akwiꞌrekat itti, “Papu ipa ngkwipittothin mpethung, antoka manna ngili ngin appꞌrut.”
Ukul woppathe thapat ana wiꞌrekathe onnan itti, “Ngintha akka anipitto?”
Annan iꞌrekathok itti, “Ipitti ca coIuanna pomamuthie.”
Ukul woingkanthet Ili oIruthuc ana wipittathok itti, “Mpongothe itti ngkwethin ca coIuanna pomamuthie nocaththak inaina.”
Ili wappakannapira noka cannan, anaruk akka kwapponekkethe lon cik, ana ul wung woccïkothe ana ilen akka kwakannangkot itti kwꞌrane lon lokkul.
Nci cïnang kwothïathe pul pothorro llon lonthoththomat itti kwathokiot ca coIuanna. Pul pothorro poingkathe ana pokiathe oIuanna ca cik ikorrkkor.
Ana ponakathe ca coIuanna nocaththak. Ana kwekathe ukul ana wekathe onnan.
Anakka lon len loccïkakothe, ul woIuanna iammakothok wakkakathe ana wonekathe kumi ana waththocïkkat.
Ana ul wothothïlettat waꞌrntakathe iccik koIeccuo ana okin therekanthok lon appik ilakin thokkothe ana ilakin thongkenet.
Anakka ul wokat cik aeo ana anthan, okin thommakathe itti okin thaꞌrko thuꞌrit tat. Akwiꞌrekat kin itti, “Ntun thellek thomnther annothongoko papotteik.”
Ittina okin tharrathe kuppuꞌrung konoiꞌri ana okin thoingkathe cinokaꞌran thellek na ul wellat.
Anaruk ul woppot wimmakathekin akka akin eo ana wakkakathe nnaꞌran appik allat tokït ken aingkat nokaꞌran tokït koIeccuo ana ul wung iammakothok awarthuk ao.

Manakka oIeccuo porpotheik nocapu nti ikuppuꞌrung konoiꞌri, akwimmakat cungkut coul woppot, akwipat thiak then akka okin thokat ere lungkat ilella opït nan. Ittina kwikkatheik akwongkenekin lon loppot.
Nocaꞌri cen cipin cokat capot ana ul iammakothok wakkakanthok, ana wiꞌrekathok itti, “Kaꞌran engki kella ulrit ana cik ceot.
Omethe ul apettakot cik othakka itti akin eo naꞌran iccik konnon akin othokerine ka ken alpꞌrek akin oꞌrko.”
Anaruk kwothïatherit itti, “Nethet kin alpꞌrek akin oꞌrko.”
Okin thiꞌrekathok itti, “Elli lonu itti pul pareko anok mormor apantokero arrakith iekko noul enni appik.”
AIeccuo ipittat kin itti, “Ngkonon annothokatha, onon thonu arrakith wornoththa?”
Anakka okin thiothe akin iꞌrekat itti, “Arrakith ukuluk ana ape weꞌra.”
AIeccuo omekat kin itti okin thikkie ul cik appik mungkut mungkut noraco iricci.
Okin thikkiekathe ul cik nocapu mungkut, meꞌra culukku arrial ukuluk ana acꞌrek arrial weꞌra ana alkaire.

Ana oIeccuo ponekathe arrakith ukuluk ana ape weꞌra akwokathakat tothiꞌrot ana kwopiriekathe Kapik ana kwomithathe iarrakith ana kwekathe ul iammakothok akin ikket ul. Ana cakuruk kwummathe ape weꞌra ana kwillillanthet kin tit appik.
Ana okin thoꞌrkkathe appik ana okin thoththakakathe.
Ana ul iammakothok wocumathe arrakith ana ape iokwentakot nan nyalünthüng attul ana ikken keꞌra oppappat.
Ana maun moul iomura iokat woꞌrkot cik wokat athar ukuluk (5,000).
AIeccuo iꞌrekat ul wung iammakothok accokkot itti warrot ikuppuꞌrung konoiꞌri akin eo tokït kung eo Peththcceitha akwiꞌrikot opettot ul cik, nci cïnang kwothïathe ul ikathar.
Anakka kwopettothe ul cik akwoingkat iccik kocoꞌrong akwothaꞌra ngaꞌrama.
Anakka cipin capot, kuppuꞌrung konoiꞌri kokat cik ipanan porok irapangka ana kwokat cik nocarkan corok prek.

OIeccuo pimmakathe ul iammakothok akuppuꞌrung konoiꞌri attakin akka kanang kokat akaukkukkot kin. Ana cik cokat thothuput thorrot, oIeccuo pakkakathe nakin akwonyaro noꞌra woiꞌri. Ana kwokat cik ere kwaik parrot kin cik,
anaruk akka okin thimmarok akwonyaro noꞌra woiꞌri, akin iꞌrekat nomïkït men itti, “Ook purrut.” Akin ikkat cik akin oo,
akka okin appik thimmarok okin thipathe nꞌre.
Kwiꞌrekathekin accokkot itti, “Nopoꞌrathan, oun ana thakorronno opelle.”
Ana kwarrathe ikuppuꞌrung konoiꞌri akin aththungon, ana kanang kokapik kocoꞌrathe ana okin thoprttakatherit cannan.
Akka okin thokat thakinnina lon ilommaththik ila oIeccuo pokkothe akka kwoꞌrikiet ul woppot arrakith wotte ana ape akka mïkït men mokat munukkwakothe.
Manakka okin tharrotheik, akin orpat cik nocik coCeniccarth, akin ïꞌrïkat kuppuꞌrung konoiꞌri nan
Manakka okin thorpot nti ikuppuꞌrung konoꞌri ul winakathe oIeccuo.
Ana okin thopellekathe ntan oppo naꞌran ennꞌre appik akin onnekinok ul iongo naꞌrangkal na akin thoccïkothe itti kwaik.
Ana naꞌran appik na kweot nomoꞌrong, akin ipot ul iongo keccuk. Akin ipittothok itti kwakorronno ul iongo athonto manna toꞌron lokret kung. Ana okin appik ithothntot thittakathe.
Ul woPriccin ana ul wꞌrek woul iangkene lon lothonceꞌret lon cik iaat nokaꞌran koUruccelim aꞌrntakat iccik koIeccuo
akin immakat ul iammakothok wꞌrek aꞌrko thuꞌrit akin thakinnilakko nyaun ammakka thathuma thoul woIouth.
(Ul woPriccin ana ul woIouth appik wakannoꞌrkoik amma okin thakinnilakko nyaun ammakka thathuma thoul wen ittïttïk. Okin thimmakathe ul wung wꞌrek aꞌrko thuꞌrit nyaun nyonyï
Amma okin thaat ngkeccuk okin thakannoꞌrkoik amma okin thakinnilakko. Ana okin thangwot thathuma thꞌrek ammakka itti ome maththak mothuꞌrit.)
Aul woPriccin ana ul iangkene lon lothonceꞌret lon cik ipittat oIeccuo itti, “Ul iammakothung wontha akka akannoccot kït nothathuma thothiki akka okin thaik thaꞌrko thuꞌrit akin thakinnilakko?”
Akwothïat tit itti, “Lon loIccaia pul pothernte lon loKapik lokat ïcat akka perethenon ithinnikot lon ammakka lokurrakot iatham wung itti,
‘Ul enni wathianin cik llon nuthuk,
anaruk mïkït men maik ciththan naun.
Okin thaꞌranin ngaꞌrama ella mïkït nan,
okin thangkene thongkene thoul ionyi.’
Onon thopaꞌrinet lon loKapik cik ana onon thoꞌrumot nothathuma thothiki.”
Ana kwiꞌrekathekin itti, “Onon thina akka annopaꞌrine lon loKapik cik othakka itti annoccot kït nothathuma thon.
OMucca piꞌret itti, ‘Othianet oththe cik ana onne’
ana ‘Okkwi ipattatta oththan ana onnan kwonu itti kwakkuttat.’
Anaruk onon thangkene itti amma pul ponu papꞌrek itti kwittarot oththan ngngin ana manna onnan kwiꞌret kin itti, ‘Aꞌrupu enni ampongothe itti mpittarot non ngngin anaruk wothethet Kapik nuthuk,’
Lakene itti onon thakannangkot itti kwittarot oththan ana onnan.
Menik onon thaik thꞌra lon loKapik amma annoccokot thathuma thon. Ana onon thaik thakkot lon loppot ammakka elli.”
AIeccuo akkarat cungkut coul akwiꞌrekat kin itti, “Nantoccïkothin appik, nantoccïkot lon lin anninakat lon len.
Aꞌrupu ia pul othurukkwet icarak wakannothikkiek pokithak anaruk lon ila pul ere, ilen akkathikkiek pokithak.
[Amma okkwi iponu unu itti kwaccïkot, akwoccïkot.”]
Manakka kwoththet nocungkut coul, kwiꞌrikathe noppan, aul iammakothok ipittathok lon lothokkwie lon kuru ncik.
AIeccuo ipittat kin itti, “Onon tharthuk thomma lon ila mpaik pereri? Onon tharthuk ina itti aꞌrupu wella iuo icarak copul wathikkiek pokithaki?
Akka wakanneo nocïkït anaruk waeo icarak ana nti icarak wakinyakot cik.” (Akka oIeccuo piꞌret ittina akkwaik akwiꞌre itti, “Thuꞌrit appik thoporot.”)
Kwikkatheik akwere itti, “Lon ila pul iꞌre ana okkot ilen akkathikkiek pokithak.
Akka lon ilokithak ammakka itti, thokwarttikot cik ithokithak ana thaꞌro nul nuthuk ana thuꞌran ana thokkwot pul ana thaꞌro nul iari ittat
ana thrïk nan ana thonyira ana karra ana thocungkoik ana thona cïkït cokithak ana thipot ka thoura ana thommaik thokorronno pul apoka pokithak. Akka lon elli appik lanthan nocïkït copul.
Lon elli appik ilokithak lanthan nti icarak alothikkiekat pul pokithak.”
OIeccuo poththekathe nocik cen ana kwoingkathe nocik coCcur. Kwiꞌrikathe noppan ana kwokat pakannangkot itti pul pꞌrek pina na kwaik, anaruk ul winakathe na kwokat.
Anakka pul ipopari iponat ukul iotteik iopari ia uꞌrupa iokithak woꞌrot nan poccïkothe lon lung pakkakanthok ana papathe iracok tung.
Pul ipopari iponat thiki noul woKrik ana pokwontathe nocik coPiniccia noththok poCcuria pipittothe oIeccuo itti kwakïccenok uꞌrupa iokithak nnokkul wung.
AIeccuo iꞌrekathok nthokkwie lon kuru ncik itti, “Kirrnni anyukul oꞌrko thuꞌrit appik itha anyongothe tokït akka lakannoka loporot itti thuꞌrit thanekittat nyukul athettat luk.”
Apul ipopari othïat tit itti, “Ïcat Ili win, anaruk luk ilaik thoceken cokuppuꞌrung manna laꞌrko thuꞌrit ithapukkot nyukul.”
Akwiꞌrekathok itti, “Nti ilon lang elli ngko, uꞌrupa iokithak woththet nokkul wang.”
Apul ipopari oingkat tuan ana paththiat ukul aïcat cik naꞌrangkal auꞌrupa iokithak wopaꞌrot cik nti iak.
Ittina aIeccuo oththekat nocik coCcur akwoingkat okko nokaꞌran koCcithon uo nca norok irapangka toCelïl ana okkette Naꞌran iattul.
Ul wꞌrek wonekanthok pul ipauril ana pomma ere ana okin thipittathok itti kwanekket ukun wung nopul.
Akwonekathok thocipit nti ithoꞌrkït thocungkut coul, aIeccuo onekkekat maun thounu akwopathok nguk ana othntok thuꞌre.
Akwonthat kït tothiꞌrot akwothukwat cokwa akwiꞌrek itti, “Apaththa” ilaik itti, “Anyothe.”
Nci cïnang aunu wopul anyat ana thuꞌre erekat ana kwikkatheik akwere nci nokkït.
AIeccuo iꞌrekat kin lon lonthoththomat itti akin okorronno erene opilin aththik. Kwopakkukkenthet kin tit maꞌri moppot itti okin thakorronno ere lon len, anaruk okin theret nci nokkït.
Ul wokat cik aprttakot tit aiꞌrekat itti, “Kwokkothe lon appik loporot ook manna pothikkiet pul ipauril apoccïkot cik ana ipommat nthuꞌre apere.”
Nomaꞌri men acungkut cꞌrek crïk aꞌrntakat. Okin thellat aꞌrupu iakin oꞌrko, aIeccuo akkarat ul iammakothok iccik kung ana kwiꞌrekathekin itti,
“Mpipot thiak thoul enni akka okin thonu maꞌri mꞌrapuruk onïn aththut cene ana aꞌrupu wella iakin oꞌrko.
Amma mpothïothekin nokathar ntï okin thapukkot ikathar, akka opilingon thaat nciththan.”
Aul iammakothok othïat tit itti, “Pul piot thuꞌrit kartha cene thomnther thekko nakin?”
AIeccuo ipittat kin itti, “Onon thonu arrakith wornoththa?”
Akin othïat tit itti, “Weꞌreꞌrapuruk.”
Akwiꞌrekat cungkut coul itti okin thikkoik nocapu. Ana akka kwummot arrakith ieꞌreꞌrapuruk akwopirakanthet Kapik noka akwomithat tit, akwekat ul iammakothok aikket ul.
Okin thonat ape wotte iarran cakuruk kwopirakanthet Kapik noka akwiꞌrekat ul iammakothok itti willilline ulrit.
Ul woꞌrkkathe ana woththakakathe. Ana ul iammakothok wocumathe thuꞌrit ithokwentakot nan nyalünthüng nyeꞌreꞌrapuruk.
Ul wokat cik caꞌri cen athar wocoꞌrin (4,000) maun moul iomura tulluk. Anakka kwothïothekin ikathar,
akwarrat ikuppuꞌrung konoiꞌri akin oul iammakothok ana okin thoingkathe nocik coThalamutha.
Ul woPriccin wakkakathe aikkat cik aipittot oIeccuo lon itti kwakkinthet kin lon ilommaththik, okin thipittot elli othakka itti akin ennekkek.
Akwothukwat cokwa kiththik mono akwiꞌrekat itti, “Ngintha akka ul enni ipittine lon ilommaththik? Mpiꞌret non ilaik ïcat, lon ilommaththik lella ilakkattanthet kin.”
Akwoththekat nakin, akwarrat ikuppuꞌrung konoiꞌri akwoingkat nokuthut korok kꞌrek.
Ul iammakothok wurekathe nan itti waneko arrakith arttot nan, okin thonat wulukku tulluk ikuppuꞌrung konoiꞌri.
AIeccuo iꞌrekat kin lon nthokkwie lon kuru ncik itti, “Noꞌrumoik nolon ilao noul woPriccin ana woIruthuc ilokkoik ere müꞌrükül.”
Okin therettaranthet akin iꞌrekat itti, “Kwiꞌret ittina akka oron thella arrakith.”
AIeccuo inakat nolon len akka okin therethe akwipittat kin itti, “Onon thontha akka annere itti onon thella arrakith? Onon tharthuk immaik ana inaiki? Ma mon marthuk monthomari?
Onon thonu kït ana komma immaiki ana unu ana womma occïkot ciki? Onon thakannokwarikori?
Akka mpomithinet ul iarrakith iokat athar ukuluk, nyalünthüng nyornoththa inyaꞌrntakothe nyothuꞌrit ithokwentuttakot nan?”
Akin othïat tit itti, “Attul ana ikken keꞌra.”
AIeccuo iꞌrekat itti, “Anakka mpomithinet ul iarrakith ieꞌreꞌrapuruk iokat athar wocoꞌrin, nyalünthüng nyornoththa inyanon thaꞌrntothe nyothuꞌrit ithokwentuttakot nan?”
Akin othïat tit itti, “Nyeꞌreꞌrapuruk.”
Akwiꞌrekat kin itti, “Onon tharthuk inaiki?”
Akin akkakat ciki Peththcceitha, aul wꞌrek onakat pul piꞌrimathe akin ipittat oIeccuo itti kwathntok.
OIeccuo ponekathe pul ipiꞌrimathe nnukun akwoingkathok ngngin nocipit coricarak coman. Anakka kwothukkwothok nguk ikït ana onekket nyaun nyung naak, akwipittathok itti, “Ngkwimmat papꞌreki?”
Akwokathakat ithiꞌrot akwomekat itti, “Mpimmat ul, wungkot ere kira kaik kanyaro.”
AIeccuo apponekkekat nyaun nyung ikït kopul. Caꞌri cen kït kanyathe apimmakat cik, akwimmakat aꞌrupu ncik appik papenang.
OIeccuo pothïathok tuan akwiꞌrekathok itti, “Kirrnni eo icarak coman.”
OIeccuo ana ul iammakothok thoingkathe naꞌran iaik iccik kokaꞌran koKaiccaria Pilippi. Anakka okin thokat cik akin eo, aIeccuo ipittat kin itti, “Ul were itti oun oththa?”
Akin othïat tit itti, “Opilingon there itti, oung oIuanna pomamuthie ana opilingon itti, oIlia ana opilingon itti, oung pul pꞌrek noul wothernte lon loKapik.”
Ana kwipittathekin itti, “Ana onon thiꞌre itti oun oththa?”
APoththuruc othïat tit itti, “Oung oMiccie.”
AIeccuo iꞌrekat kin itti, “Okin thakannerene pul pꞌrek lon lung.”

Kwikkatheik akwongkenekin itti ukul wopul iponyi wonu itti wareko thiak maꞌri moppot ana ul ittïttïk woul ana ul ittïttïk woul wonoppan toKapik ana ul iangkene lon lothonceꞌret lon cik wꞌrak ana kwonu itti kwakkuttat ana nomaꞌri mꞌrapuruk kuroko nti ithio.
Kwerethe elli nci nokkït ana oPoththuruc onekat oIeccuo thocipit pellek akwikkat cik akwere naak.
Anaruk akka oIeccuo poprttakot cik akwokathakat ul iammakothok, akwaꞌrettat naPoththuruc itti, “Ollu ntokït kin, pul pothopulut. Ngkwella lon loKapik ica cang anaruk ngkwonu lon loul ionyi.”
Akwakkarat cungkut coul ana ul iammakothok akwiꞌrekat kin itti, “Amma opilin pongothe itti kwamakothin kwonu itti kure noka kung akwoneko thapak thung akwomakothin.
Okkwi ipongothe itti kwaꞌret thikkoik thung, kuret cik anaruk okkwi ipurethe thikkoik thung cik nti ilon lin ana nti ilon iloporot loKapik, kwaꞌret.
Ngintha akkoporot amma pul pothikkiet capu ncik appik cung ana kurethe calak cung cik?
Ngintha akka apul okucitto ncalak cung?

Okkwi ipothianin cik ana othiane lon lin cik nti iul enni iaꞌro nul nuthuk ana tholon ilokithak, ukul wopul iponyi waꞌruminthok kït nothokkaprttako thung nthrïk thoththan ana nuꞌrupa wothothïlettat woKapik iupupure.”
Akwiꞌrekat kin itti, “Mpiꞌret non ilaik ïcat itti opilingon thꞌrek ithaik thacoꞌro cene thakannille aththik, akin tharthuk imma ngili ngoKapik aanthan mpuꞌran.”
Anakka kwikkot cik maꞌri mꞌrakkuruk akwipat oPoththuruc ana oIakup ana oIuanna akwoingkat kin ngngin thellek ci noꞌra wocoꞌrong. Ana kwoprttakatheik tokït ken nan.
Ana eret wung wikkatheik allio thollio thapul pella pimet kret akolliat ittina nocapu ncik appik.
Ana ncïnang oIlia ana oMucca ummat ncik tokït ken akin ikkat cik akin erene oIeccuo.
APoththuruc omekat oIeccuo itti, “Pul ipangkene loporot itti oron thikkoik cene. Tun uno müꞌrük mꞌrapuruk, culukku cang ana culukku coMucca ana culukku coIlia.”
Kwommat ila akwiꞌre akka okin thaththonat nꞌre cannan.
Nci cïnang anuththe oꞌrumat kin apoꞌre akkakat nti inuththe apiꞌre itti, “Ukul win enni ia mpongothe, noccïkothok.”
Anakka okin tholliakotheik akin okinnimmakat pul pꞌrek, oIeccuo pulluk.
Anakka okin thokat cik akin uo ntan nnocoꞌrong, aIeccuo iꞌrekat kin itti okin thakanniꞌret pul pꞌrek ilakin thimmat puccuk aukul wopul iponyi urokat nti ithio.
Okin thangwathe lon len nomïkït men akin ere itti, “Ngintha akkonu itti, thuroko nti ithio?”
Ana okin thipittathe itti, “Ngintha akka ul iangkene lon lothonceꞌret lon cik iꞌrene itti oIlia ponu itti kwanthan tokït naMiccie?”
AIeccuo othïat tit itti, “Ii itti, oIlia panthan cittokït akwopakket lon cik appik. Ngintha akka lokurrakinet iatham itti ukul wopul iponyi wonu itti waccokot thiak cannan ana ul wꞌrak?
Anaruk mpiꞌret non, oIlia paat ana okin thokkwothok lon ilakin thaththongothe, ammakka lokurrakot alerethok.”
Anakka okin thainet ul iammakothok wꞌrek akin immakat cungkut coul iccik ken akin opllarot lon okin oul iangkene lon lothonceꞌret lon cik.
Ana accokkot akka ul appik wimmat oIeccuo aprttakat tit cannan akin ollat taak othomiccok.
Akwipittat kin itti, “Ngintha akka onon opllarot nan anaththungon?”
Apul pꞌrek nti icungkut coul othïat tit itti, “Pul ipangkene, mponanung ukul win wauꞌrupa iokithak woꞌrot nan ana wakannokorronno itti were.

Amma uꞌrupa iokithak wen woꞌrot naak worrethok nocapu, kuꞌre pok nti ithon ana okꞌrellot kïnyït thocipit akwollat ikapa. Mpipittothe ul iammakothung itti okin thakïcce uꞌrupa iokithak wen ana okin thommakathe okïcce.”
AIeccuo othïat tit itti, “Nantokatha ul enni iakorronno occokot lon loKapik nomïkït. Oron thikkoik uraththut manna kartha? Mparukot ilon lon manna kartha? Onanin ukul cene.”
Akin onakanthok ukul. Akka uꞌrupa iokithak wimmat oIeccuo alliekat ukul ikapa accokkot apat nocapu aththaththarakat, auꞌre pok nti ithon.
AIeccuo ipittat oththan pokkul, itti, “Wonu maꞌri mornoththa akkot ittina?”
Akwothïat tit itti, “Nci ammakka wotteik.
Uꞌrupa iokithak waarrethok ithik ana iꞌri appinappin itti wakkwothok. Anaruk amma oung akkakkot lon, ipi thiak thïn aittarot nïn.”
AIeccuo iꞌrekat itti, “Amma oung akkakkot lon? Lon appik lathakkane pul lippappat amma poccokothe lon loKapik nocïkït.”
Aththan pokkul iꞌrekat accokkot mpoꞌre cittan itti, “Mpoccokothe lon loKapik nocïkït. Ittarothin anokïtto lon ila annokorronnon anoccokot lon loKapik nocïkït.”

Anakka oIeccuo pimmat cungkut acollo othokatha ilokkattathe, akwothirriekat uꞌrupa iokithak cik itti, “Uꞌrupa iammie ul nthon ana othikkiekin nuril, mpiꞌrenon itti, noppot thapat nti iaak, nokorronno appopakkot iaak caꞌri cꞌrek.”
Auꞌrupa iokithak ekat ngeme nti ikkul alliekat ikapa arrekat ukul nocapu appat thapat nti ikkul. Akul ikkat cik ere wiot. Aul woppot iꞌrekat itti, “Kwiot.”
Anaruk oIeccuo poccokathe ukun wung akurokwiekathok kapik acoꞌrat.
Anakka oIeccuo piꞌrikot noppan aul iammakothok ipittathok pellek itti, “Onïn thannokïcce uꞌrupa iokithak nti ikkul akaintha?”
Akwothïat tit itti, “Uꞌrupa iokithak ionu pangken empi wakïccetta ngaꞌrama tulluk.”
Akin oththekat nokaꞌran ken akin oingkat okko nocik coCelïl. OIeccuo pappakannangkot itti pul pꞌrek pina nakin thaik,
akka kwokat cik akwongkene ul iammakothok. Akwiꞌrekat kin itti, “Ukul wopul iponyi waik wathokettat ul ionyi. Okin thakkwothok ana nomaꞌri mꞌrapuruk wuroko nti ithio.”
Anaruk okin thommat ila kwiꞌrethekin ana okin thonakathe nꞌre ipittothok.
Okin thakkakathe ciki nokaꞌran koKapprnaum. Akka kwokat noppan, akwipittat kin itti, “Ngintha akka onon thokat cik annopllarot ngngin ikathar?”
Anaruk okin thangkatheik akka okin thokat cik akin opllarot nokathar mai itti oththa akkrïk.
Akwikkat cik akwakkarat ul iammakothok iattul ana ikken keꞌra akwiꞌrekat kin itti, “Okkwi ipongothe itti kwathakka prïk, cittokït kwonu itti kwaka potteik ana orekine ul appik.”
Akwonekat ukul iotteik akwoceꞌrekat ithoꞌrkït then. Akwonekat nokapen akwiꞌrekat kin itti,
“Okkwi ipikkiet opilin cik nti iakkwion enthi itharran ngkꞌran kin kwikkierin cik ana okkwi ipikkierin cik, kwaik pakinnikkien cik anaruk kwaik pikkie okkwi ipothïothin cik.”
AIuanna iꞌrekathok itti, “Pul ipangkene, onïn thimmat pul pꞌrek apokïcce uꞌrupa iokithak ngkꞌran kang ana onïn thoceꞌrerok akka kwannoka ponnon.”
AIeccuo iꞌrekat kin itti, “Nokorronno oceꞌrek. Pul pella ipakkot lon ilommaththik ngkꞌran kin ana nomaꞌri motte apapperethin llon ilokithak.
Akka pul ipakannꞌraron ook ponnon.
Mpappiꞌret non lon ilaik ïcat itti okkwi ipethet non keththeꞌret koiꞌri ngkꞌran kin akka onon ul woMiccie, kwakannuret thocco lon iloporot lung cik.”
“Ana amma opilin pokorronnot okkwion itharran ithoccokothe lon lin ammakka enthi akin okkot lon ilokithak laka loporot itti kwarrettat irok irapangka ncna caꞌrettanok icalak.
Amma ukun wang wakorronnong akkot lon ilokithak, okiotheik akka loporot itti ngkwikkoik nukun wulukku nothona nyaun nyeꞌra ana ngkwaeo ngngnin ithik thothothïrïn ithomma io.
[Na nangak inaꞌrko kin okorronno ille ana thik thakinnio.]
Ana amma wek wang wakorronnong itti ngkwakkot lon ilokithak, okiotheik akka loporot itti ngkwikkoik ponu wek wulukku nothona tacok teꞌra ana ngkwarrettat ngngin ithik thothothïrïn.
[Na nangak inaꞌrko kin okorronno ille ana thik thakannio.]
Ana amma cït cang cakorronnong itti ngkwakkot lon ilokithak, onthotheik nti ica akka loporot itti ngkwaeo ingili ngoKapik ncït culukku, nothona kït keꞌra ana ngkwarrettat ngngin ithik thothothïrïn.
‘Na nangak inaꞌrko kin okorronno ille
ana thik thakannio.’
Onon appik thathikkietta thoꞌrillir nthik.
Nguculoththu ngoporot anaruk amma ngothakkat ngocalang, ngappothikkietta ngira taththa? Nikkoik thoꞌrillir tokït koKapik ana oka ilon iloporot noulon ithun.”
OIeccuo poththekathe nokaꞌran ken ana kwoingkathe nocik coIouthia ana arrot cik Iürüthün. Acungkut coul appakkakat naak attang ana kwongkenekathekin ammakka appinappin.
Ul wꞌrek woul woPriccin akkakat appennekkekathok nthipitto itti, “Locoꞌrotheik itti pul pathïo pari pungi?”
Akwothïanthet kin tit itti, “OMucca piꞌrethenon taththa?”
Akin iꞌrekat, itti, “OMucca pokorronnot itti pul ipocura pakurrine pul ipopari kaꞌrmacak kothothïako akwantothïok.”
AIeccuo iꞌrekat kin itti, “Lokat akka mïkït mon mokat monthomat ana ittina oMucca pokurrinet non lon lothonceꞌret lon cik elli.
Anaruk nci nothokuꞌre capu ncik, ‘Kapik kokkothe pul ipocura ana ipopari.’
‘Ilen akka pul ipocura oththene naththan ana onnan
ana okin aththuththeꞌra thathakka ka kulukku.’
Ittina okin thakannoka theꞌrarit anaruk okin thulukku pꞌrïn.
Ittina ila Kapik kokottothe apul ella ipillorit.”
Anakka okin thappropakkot tuan, aul iammakothok ipittathok lon len.
Akwothïat tit itti, “Okkwi ipothïot pari pung ana akwappipo apꞌrek kwaik paꞌro nnul iari ittat.
Ana amma pul ipopari pothïot olle ana akwothitta napꞌrek kwaik paꞌro ul iomura ngngin ionu ari.”
Ul wokat cik annane oIeccuo nyukul inyarran itti akwathonekket nyaun nakin anaruk ul iammakothok wikkatheik aꞌretto nakin.
Anakka oIeccuo pimmat elli akuakat ka. Akwiꞌrekat kin itti, “Nokorronno nyukul inyarran anyainin, nokorronno oceꞌrekin akka ngili ngoKapik ngoul iammakka enni.
Mpiꞌret non ilaik ïcat itti okkwi ipannocco ngili ngoKapik ammakka nyukul inyarran, kwanniꞌrikorit.”
Ana kwonakathe nyukul thocarak cung akwonekkekat nyaun nakin akwethïekat kin.
Akka oIeccuo purokot akweo, apul pꞌrek ollat taak apekat ungku ncik tokït kung apipittat itti, “Pul ipangkene ipoporot, ngintha akka anokkot aniot thikkoik thothupuththuput?”
AIeccuo othïat tit itti, “Ngintha akka akkarinin itti pul ipoporot? Pul pella ipoporot, Kapik kulluk akkoporot pellek.
Ngkwina lon ila Kapik kiꞌret itti, ‘Kirrnni okkwot pul, kirrnni aꞌro mpul ipittat, kirrnni omunye, kirrnni ere lon ngkarra, kirrnni okwïet, othianet onne ana oththe cik.’”
Apul pen iꞌrekat itti, “Pul ipangkene, mpokkothe elli appik nciki akka mpokat ampotte.”

AIeccuo okathakathok akwongakathok akwiꞌrekat itti, “Laik lulukku langkwarthuk okkot, ngko athokette aꞌrupu wang iangkwonu appik aikket ul iella aꞌrupu cik ana ngkwipo thaꞌrthan tothiꞌrot, anthan antathomakothin.”
Nolon elli aroca topul oprttakat cik. Akwoingkat akua ka cannan akka kwokat papaꞌrthan.
AIeccuo okathakat ul iammakothok ammrththakot cik akwiꞌrekat kin itti, “Lonthomat itti pul ipapaꞌrthan piꞌriko ingili ngoKapik.”
Aul iammakothok oprttakanthet lon lung anaruk oIeccuo pappiꞌrekat kin itti, “Nyukul nyin, thiꞌriko ingili ngoKapik thommaththik.
Lippappat itti thamla thakko icürük coipra nopul ipapaꞌrthan itti piꞌriko ingili ngoKapik.”
Ul iammakothok woprttakatherit cannan akin erettarne itti, “Oththa akkaꞌrettat?”
AIeccuo okathakat kin akwiꞌrekat itti, “Elli lonthomat nopul iponyi anaruk noKapik, lon appik lakannoka lonthomat.”
APoththuruc iꞌrekathok itti, “Onïn thoththet naꞌrupu appik othakka itti anïn omakothung.”

AIeccuo othïat tit itti, “Mpiꞌret non lon ilaik ïcat, okkwi ipoththet nokaman kung ana opangon ithomura ana ithari ana oththan ana onnan ana nyukul nyung ana opon, nti iaun ana nti ilon iloporot loIeccuo
kwacco kaman koppot ana opangon ithomura ana ithari ana onnan ana nyukul ana opon ana thokkiettat thiak ana noluput ilanthan thikkoik thothupuththuput.
Anaruk ul woppot iaik tokït inenni wathoka thoceken ana ul woppot iaik thoceken inenni wathoka tokït.”

Okin thokat ikathar akin okuꞌrot nokaꞌran koUruccelim aIeccuo pokat tokït ken ana ul iammakothok oprttakat tit ana ul wꞌrek iokat ammakot kin wonat nꞌre, akwappakkarat ul iammakothok iattul ana ikken keꞌra thocipit akwappiꞌrekat kin ilaik lathainok.

Akwiꞌrekat itti, “Noccïkot, oron thaik thakuꞌrot nokaꞌran koUruccelim ana ukul wopul iponyi wakettat ul ittïttïk woul wonoppan toKapik ana ul iangkene lon lothonceꞌret lon cik. Okin thakkmak itti kwakkuttat akin ekathok ul iakonnoka woIouth,
okin ithakkothok ngure ngngin ana othukkothok nguk, okkwekok ana okkwothok. Ana nomaꞌri mꞌrapuruk kwuroko nti ithio.”
OIakup ana oIuanna nyukul nyoCepethi nyakkakanthok akin iꞌrekat itti, “Pul ipangkene, onïn thongothe itti ngkwittarot nïn.”
Akwipittat kin itti, “Ngintha akka onon thongothe itti mpakkinthet non?”
Akin othïat tit itti, “Kirrnni okkulukku nti ianïn akwikkoik thokkun wothothari wang ana opilin thokkun wothokure nothrïk thang.”
AIeccuo iꞌrekat kin itti, “Onon thomma ilanon thaik thipitto, onon thïkko nti ikeththeꞌret ika anïkko ntiri thaccokot thiak itha mpaik pathoccokot nani ana manna occo mamuthie ima ampoccori?”
Akin othïat tit itti, “Ïï onïn thaccokot thiak.”
AIeccuo iꞌrekat kin itti, “Onon thïkko nti ikeththeꞌret ika anïkko ntiri ana occo mamuthie ima mpoccori,
anaruk thikkoik thokkun win wothothari ana manna wothokure oun akkakorronno iꞌre. Aꞌran enni woul wonekkettanthet kin cik.”
Manakka okin ithattul thoccïkothe elli akin uakat ka koIakup ana koIuanna.
OIeccuo pakkarathekin tothun akwiꞌrekat kin itti, “Onon thina ul inako itti wanili noul iakonnoka woIouth nonu lon loul wen ikkun ana nili nen inïttïnïttïk narekiekin llon len.
Lakannoka ittina ianon. Okkwi ipongothe itti kwathakka prïk ianon kwonu itti kwarekine opangon thꞌrek,
ana okkwi ipongothe itti kwathakka cittokït kwonu itti kwathakka piak poul appik.
Akka manna oun ukul wopul iponyi wakannao itti wathorekakine anaruk itti wathoreko ana manna io othakka itti aelikko ul woppot nti ilon ilokithak.”

Ittina akin akkakat nokaꞌran kAria. Anakka oIeccuo ana ul iammakothok ana cungkut coul thokat cik akin oththe nocik apul pꞌrek piꞌrimathe poccot kꞌran oPerththemaoc ukul woThthimaoc wokat cik aikkoik nocipit cokathar akwipittot ul aꞌrupu.
Akka kwoccïkothe itti oIeccuo poNaccir, akwikkat cik akwakkaro mpoꞌre cittan itti, “OIeccuo ukul woThauth ipi thiak thin.”
Akin erekat naak thoppot itti kwangkoik anaruk kwikkathik akwakkakkaro cannan itti, “Ukul woThauth ipi thiak thin.”
AIeccuo ocoꞌrat akwiꞌrekat itti, “Nakkarok.”
Akin akkarat pul ipiꞌrimathe, “Opoꞌrathan aurokot kapik, occiri, kwaik pakkarong.”
Akworrekat kret kung ika akwokuꞌrupakot nocipit akwirrat ntacok oine oIeccuo.
AIeccuo ipittathok itti, “Ngintha akka ongkwongothe itti mpakkinthung?”
Apul ipiꞌrimathe iꞌrekat itti, “Pul ipangkene, mpongothe itti mpimmaik.”
AIeccuo iꞌrekathok itti, “Ngko, thoccokot lon loKapik nocïkït cang thothikkierung poporot.” Nci cïnang akwimmakat cik akwomakat oIeccuo nokathar ken.
Anakka okin okko ciki iccik koUruccelim okin thakkakathe nokaꞌran koPeththppaci ana koPeththania nocoꞌrong coCeththun, aIeccuo othïat ul weꞌra nti iul iammakothok,
akwiꞌrekat kin itti, “Ngkonon nokaꞌran engkrïk tokït kon ana amma anniꞌrikorit, onon thiot ngeꞌringka iotte ngïꞌrïkakot ana ngarthuk arrakot tan annokꞌro annonanin cene.
Ana amma pul pꞌrek pipittothenon itti, ‘Onon thaik thakꞌro ngeꞌringka iotte akaintha?’ anniꞌrethok itti, ‘Ili akkiꞌret itti onïn thathokꞌro ana kwathïot ntan accokkot.’”
Akin oingkat akin othiat ngeꞌringka iotte ngïꞌrïkakothe nocürük thapat ikathar. Akka okin thokꞌrot
aul wꞌrek wokat cik acoꞌro cïnang ipittat kin itti, “Ngintha akka annokꞌrine ngeꞌringka iotte?”
Akin othïat tit ammakka oIeccuo piꞌrethekin ana ul wokorronnathekin akin eo.
Akka okin thonanet oIeccuo ngeꞌringka iotte akin ongkuꞌrupat eret nan wen neꞌringka iotte akwarrat tan akwikkat cik noret.
Ul woppot wongkuꞌrupathe eret wen cik ikathar ana opilingon ongatho uꞌri wokira nti ipon akin ipot cik ikathar.
Ana okkwion itheot tokït ana okkwion ithomakothekin thiꞌrekathe mpoꞌre cittan itti,
“Athopira noka oka noKapik tothiꞌrot.”
“Athethïetta oka nakkwi ipanthan ngkꞌran koIli!”
“Athethïetta oka nongili iaik nganthan ngongappa ponnon oThauth.”
“Athopira noka oka noKapik tothiꞌrot.”
AIeccuo iꞌrikat nokaꞌran koUruccelim ana kwoingkathe noppan toKapik. Akwokathaccekat aꞌrupu appik anaruk akka cik cokat ceot kwopakkathe nokaꞌran koPeththania okin oul wung iattul ana ikken keꞌra.
Ngorrot ngen akka okin thokat cik akin oththe nokaꞌran koPeththania oIeccuo pokakathe piamat.
Akwimmakat pïcït natha nan akwoingkat akwothokathakat amma ponat nyukul nyen, akka kweot iccik ken akwokinniat papꞌrek nan anaruk natha nulluk akka okorronno oka thuput thopira itti partha.
Ncïnang akwiꞌrekat pira itti, “Apul pella ipaꞌrko nyukul nyang nocaꞌri cꞌrek.” Aul iammakothok occïkat akka kwiꞌret.

Anakka okin thiꞌrikot nokaꞌran koUruccelim oIeccuo piꞌrikathe noppan toKapik ana kwokïccekathe okkwion ithokat cik akin okette aꞌrupu ana ithonat aꞌrupu icekerek ceneket. Kwongkuꞌrupathe uppuꞌrung cik woul iokat akucitto akucci ana orrok wokkwion ithokat akin okette mülükkür.
Ana kwakanno okorronnat okkwion ithonat aꞌrupu iaketta akin okko noppan toKapik.
Anakka kwongkenet kin akwiꞌrekat itti, “Lokurrakot itti,
‘Man min makkarako
itti man maꞌrama moul appik.’
Ana onon thothikkiet man moul wothuꞌran.”

Ul ittïttïk woul wonoppan toKapik ana ul iangkene lon lothonceꞌret lon cik occïkat elli akin ikkat cik akin okwancot kathar ikakin okkwothok ngngin akka okin thapellenok, akka ul appik woprttakinthet thongkene thung tit.
Anakka cipin capot akin oingkat thapat nti icarak coman conokaꞌran koUruccelim.
Ana ngïꞌrïmak akka okin thokat cik akin omakot kathar akin immakat pïcït apponthomat ncik ilaka len.
APoththuruc okwarikat pira akwiꞌrekat oIeccuo itti, “Pul ipangkene, antokatha pira popïcït ipangkwattat ponthomat.”
AIeccuo opakkekat tit itti, “Noccokot lon loKapik nomïkït.

Mpiꞌret non ilaik ïcat, amma opilin piꞌrethe coꞌrong enci itti, ‘Ngko arret ka kang irok irapangka,’ ana ella lon tit leꞌra nocïkït, anaruk ngkwoccokothe lon nocïkït itti ila ngkwiꞌret itti lathakka ana lakkattanthung.
Ittina mpiꞌret non itti, ilanon thipittot ngngaꞌrama nonekket nomïkït itti nthiot ana lakanenon.
Ana amma annocoꞌro annaꞌra ngaꞌrama anthonu lon lꞌrek nomïkït mon napilingon noccïkot kin othakka itti aththe pon porothiꞌrot occïkïnthet non lon lon ilokithak cakuruk.”
[Ana amma onon thakannoccïkïnthet kin lon ilokithak ilakin thokkinthet non, oththe pon pakannoccïkïnthet non lon lon ilokithak cakuruk.]
Akin okkaprttakat nokaꞌran koUruccelim anakka oIeccuo pokat cik akwonyaro noppan toKapik, ul ittïttïk woul wonoppan toKapik ana ul iangkene lon lothonceꞌret lon cik ana ul ittïttïk woul akkakanthok.
Akin ipittathok itti, “Ngngili ngiatha ingakkot llon elli? Ana oththa akkethung ngili itti ngkwakkot elli?”
AIeccuo opakkekanthet kin tit itti, “Mpipittot non lon lulukku. Nothïnthin tit ana mpakenenon itti ngngili ngiatha akka anokkot nelli.
Mamuthie moIuanna mokat nnoKapiki ana amma okorronno oka nnoKapik ana noul ionyi? Niꞌrethin.”
Akin erekat thellek akin iꞌrekat itti, “Amma oron thiꞌret itti, ‘NoKapik’ kwipittot ton itti, ‘Ana onon thonin akka nthꞌrat occokot lon lung nomïkït mon?’
Anaruk oron thakinniꞌre itti, ‘Noul ionyi.’” Okin theret elli akka okin thonat nꞌre noul akka ul winat itti oIuanna pokat pul pothernte lon loKapik ïcarïcat.
Menik akin othïanthet oIeccuo tit itti, “Onïn thomma.”
AIeccuo iꞌrekat itti, “Oun cakuruk pakanniꞌret non itti ngngili ngiatha akka anokkot nelli.”

Nci cïnang kwikkatheik akwerenekin okkwienekin lon kuru cik itti, “Pul pꞌrek pokat cik pocïkkarot kira komaa ikkwon kung apuꞌrakat nan ana kwokkanthet kaꞌran na akwathuꞌrukot ngꞌri ngen ana kwapprunat kaꞌran na pul ikkoik apangwot maa. Akwekat ul wꞌrek ara tit aikkethok maa nnan imakin thorat amma okin thokiot. Ana kwoingkathe nokurtti.
Ana nocaꞌri cothokio akwothïanthet ul iara wen pul pung iparekinok itti pathaꞌrntot aꞌrupu nakin ioꞌriat.
Anaruk okin thoccokathok akin okkwekathok akin opakkekathok nyaun ncürük.
Akwothïanthet kin pul ipareko pꞌrek akin okkwat ci ca ana okkiet thiak lon lokithak.
Akwappothïat apꞌrek icci, akin okkwat opaththi pen. Akwappothïat opilingon thoppot, akin okkwekat opilingon ana ongwo opilingon.
Akwokwentakanthet pul pulukku ipa akwothïot, ukul wung ia kwongothe. Ana kwothïathe ukul wung pꞌrïn ocothot akwopri okin thathiane cik akka ukul wung.
Anaruk ul woropon werekathe ithun itti, ‘Ook empi ipapakkot naꞌrupu woththan ton okkwothok ana aꞌrupu wung wathakka wonnon.’
Ittina okin thonekathok akin okkwathok akin orrekathok thapat nti ikkwon.
Ngintha akka pul pokkwon okkot? Kwanthan akwongwo ul worikkwon akwethet ul wꞌrek kopon.
Onon thakorronno akkakkaro lon ilaik iatham woKapiki? Liꞌre itti,
‘Pothok ipa ul iuno wꞌrat nti ipangken
pothakkakathe cillang icaceꞌret kunthong tan.
Ili wokkothe elli ana loprttakietheron tit.’

Okin thokat thongothe itti okin thaccokothok akka okin thinat itti thokkwie lon kuru ncik, thokat cik atheret kin. Anaruk okin thonat nꞌre nocungkut coul ana okin thoththekathe naak ana okin thoingkathe.
Ana nomaꞌri motte, akin othïat ul wꞌrek woPriccin ana ul iongothe lon loIruthuc itti wathïꞌrak llon.

Okin thakkakanthok akin iꞌrekat itti, “Pul ipangkene, onïn thina itti oung pul ipiꞌre lon ilaik ïcat ngkwella nꞌre nopul iponyi, ngkwakannokkwine lon loul kunu ncik itti okin okkwengon, anaruk ngkwangkene lon ilaik ïcat ammakka Kapik kongothe. Locoꞌrotheik itti oKkaiccer paꞌrntakinthet akucci?
Onïn thaꞌrintinthoki, onïn thakannaꞌrintinthoki?”
Anaruk aIeccuo inakat itti okin thongothe itti okin thaccokothok llon len, akwiꞌrekat itti, “Ngintha akka annenekkene itti onon thaccokinthin? Nantokenen thinar anokatha.”
Akin onakat kakucci akwipittat kin itti, “Purrut poththa empi? Ana kꞌran koththa engki?”
Akin othïat tit itti, “poKkaiccer.”
Nci cïnang aIeccuo iꞌrekat kin itti, “Nethet oKkaiccer aꞌrupu woKkaiccer ana woKapik annethet Kapik.”
Ana okin thoprttakatherit naak.
Ittina aul woCcathukkin iame itti thuroko nti ithio thellaik akkakanthet oIeccuo nthipitto.
Akin ipittat itti, “Pul ipangkene, oMucca pokurrinet nïn itti amma opang popul piot nopari ana pella nyukul, opang ponu itti kwapakkot nan akwokwonine opang ipiot nyukul.
Caꞌri cen ul wꞌrek wokat cik weꞌreꞌrapuruk woththan pulukku. Okkwi iprïk pipot pari akwiat, akkwella nyukul.
Ana akkwi ipomakothok opakkat nopari ana kwiathe cakuruk akkwella ukul lokakathe menik napang ipomakothe.
Nti iul ieꞌreꞌrapuruk ionu oththan pulukku, opilin pellat ipokwonot ukul nti ipul ipopari. Ana pul ipopari piathe acakuruk.
Nocaꞌri cothuroko nti ithio pari paka poththa nti iakin? Akka pokat pittat nnul weꞌreꞌrapuruk.”
AIeccuo othïat tit itti, “Onon thommaik akka onon thomma lon latham wopuꞌran poKapiki?
Amma okin ithillet thurokot nti ithio okin thakannipo ana okin thakinnitta, okin thaka ere uꞌrupa wothothïlettat woKapik tothiꞌrot.
Ana nolon lothuroko nti ithio onon thakannakkakkaro lon lokerung kopira ipokat apokꞌro iatham woMuccai akka Kapik kiꞌrethok itti, ‘Oun Kapik kApreim ana Kapik koIccaak ana Kapik koIakupi’
Kwakannoka Kapik koul illet, anaruk Kapik koul iaik ngkït thapat. Onon thamoloko cannan.”

Apilin nti iul iangkene lon lothonceꞌret lon cik loKapik akkakat akwoccïkat kin akin eret lon len. Akwinakat itti oIeccuo pothïnthet ul woCcathukkin tit papenang akwipittathok itti, “Nti ilon appik ilonekkettatheik ilonthomat loKapik, liatha akkoporot cannan?”
AIeccuo othïat tit itti, “Elli akkoporot cannan, ‘Ul woIccereil, noccïkot Ili Kapik konnon, Ili wulukku.
Ongathe Ili Kapik kang ncïkït cang appik ana ngka kang appik ana ngatheꞌre ngang appik ana mpuꞌran pang appik.’
Ana ilamakot liꞌre itti, ‘Ongathe ul wꞌrek ammakka ngkwongothe ka kang.’
Lella iloporot cannan nelli aluleꞌra.”
Apul ipangkene lon lothonceꞌret lon ncik othïat tit itti, “Loporot pul ipangkene, lon lang laik ïcat itti Kapik kulukku ana akꞌrek kella, anaruk ook pulluk.

Ongathok ncïkït cang appik ana ngatheꞌre ngang appik ana mpuꞌran pang appik, ana ongat ul wꞌrek ammakka ngkwongothe ka kang ilen akkoporot cannan naꞌrupu appik iokꞌrettanet Kapik ana aꞌrupu wothokinthet Kapik ngüccük cik.”
Anakka oIeccuo pimmat itti kwothïotherit nthinaik nti ica, akwiꞌrekathok itti, “Ngkwakannoka ciththan nongili ngoKapik.” Ana nci cïnang ul wꞌrek wellakathe itti wappipittothok lon lꞌrek.
Anakka oIeccuo pokat cik akwongkene noppan toKapik, kwipittathe itti, “Taththa akka ul iangkene lon lothonceꞌret lon cik iꞌrene itti oMiccie ukkul woThauth?
OThauth ngka kung peret ngKanang ikupupure itti,
‘Ili Kapik wiꞌrethe Ili win,
Ikkik thokkun wothothari win
puccuk anonekkekat thoꞌrak thang
thoceken coracok tang.’
OThauth ngka kung pakkarot oMiccie itti, ‘Ili win’ ana tat akka akwoka ukul wung?”
Cungkut coul coccïkathok okkwinok kunu ncik akin thopirat noka.
Akka kwongkenet kin akwiꞌrekat itti, “Noꞌrumoik noul iangkene lon lothonceꞌret lon cik okin thongothe itti okin thanyaro neret iukwirukwit ana omiccako keccuk
ana ikkoik naꞌran wothothiakine cik nomuththun maꞌrama ana nokamuthe.
Okin thammikkot muruma ana onnekot kin kaman ken ana aꞌra ngaꞌrama aul imma kin appik, ul ammakka enni wakkiettat thiak cannan.”
AIeccuo pokat cik akwikkoik akwokathacce ul iannekket akucci nokaꞌran kothaꞌrntot akucci iaꞌrntakinthet ngre ngonoppan toKapik, ul iaꞌrthan woppot wonekkekathe akucci woppot.
Anaruk pul pꞌrek ipa curuma pakannoka papaꞌrthan pakkakathe aponekkekat akucci weꞌra wokït.
AIeccuo akkarat ul iammakothok akwiꞌrekat kin itti, “Mpiꞌret non ilaik ïcat, pul empi ipa curuma ponekkethe akucci woppot cannan noul appik.
Okin thonekkethe nothaꞌrthan then, anaruk curuma enci icopari icella aꞌrupu cik conekkethe nnaꞌrupu ia kwonat appik, iarokat cik itti kwikkoik ngngin.”
Anakka kwokat cik akwoththe nokaꞌran konoppan toKapik, apilin nti iul iammakothok iꞌrekathok itti, “Pul ipangkene, antokatha, akka mothok imïttïmïttïk ana kaman kopeththere.”
AIeccuo othïat tit itti, “Onon thimmat kaman engki ikïttïttïk appiki? Pothok pella pulukku pakwentako nopangken, müntat nocapu mulumuluk appik.”
Anakka oIeccuo pokat cik akwikkoik nocoꞌrong coCeththun icakatha noppan toKapik, oPoththuruc ana oIakup ana oIuanna ana Anthrauc ipittathok therek itti,
“Iiꞌrethenïn itti lon elli lakaik acintha? Ana lon liatha ilakene itti lon elli lathokaik?”
AIeccuo iꞌrekat kin itti, “Noꞌrumoik akka apilin ammikkot non.
Okin thoppot thanthan ngkꞌran kin akin iꞌre itti, ‘Oun oMiccie’ ana okin ammikkot ul woppot.
Nokorronno ona nꞌre amma onon thoccïkothe itti thoꞌrak thaik ana karra kothoꞌrak, lon ila ammakka elli lakaik anaruk caꞌri carthuk anthan.

Ul nomoꞌrong mꞌrek aprttakot iul wonomoꞌrong mꞌrek ana ngili ngaprttakarot tit. Thaꞌrïntïttako thocapu ncik appik thakaik naꞌran woppot ana tï takaik. Elli laka ere thokꞌrellako thokkul iakwonta thonomun. Lon elli lakene itti lon ilaik lanthan lantruko ncik.

Onon thonu itti onon thaꞌrumoik. Onon thikkettat nili ana akin okkwet non nomuththun maꞌrama. Onon thanekittat tokït konili inarran ana inïttïnïttïk nti ilon lin. Anaruk loporot othakka itti annokenekin lon lin.
Ana lon iloporot loIeccuo lonu itti langkenetta ul nomothok appik cittokït.

Amma onon thocciccokittathe ana onekittat imakkma, nokorronno ipo nꞌre itti onon thathiꞌre itti tat. Niꞌre lon ilettathenon nocaꞌri cen itti onon thiꞌre, akka onon akkakannoka thaik there, anaruk Kanang ikupupure.
Ukul wakero opang akwokkuttat ana oththan pokkul okero ukul wung akkuttat. Nyukul nyaprttakot iaththangon akin okorronno kin akin ongutta.
Ul appik wꞌranon nti ilon lin, anaruk okkwi ipoccokothe cïkït ilon puccuk mono alocothakat ana kwaꞌrettat.”
“Amma onon thimmat lon lothokïttakoik
lurokot nokaꞌran ika lon akkira akkakannoka nan (aul iakkakkaro iatham ina lon len) nokorronno okin ithaik noththok poIouthia akin ollot toꞌra womoꞌrong.
Nokorronno okorronno opilin ipaik toꞌra woman mung itti kuo ntan akwiꞌriko noppan itti kwummo papꞌrek.
Ana okkwi ipaik topon akwokorronno opakkot tuan itti kwathummo kret kothongkuꞌrupakot.
Laka laraththa noul ioppeppethe ana iokwonot.
Naꞌra ngaꞌrama othakka itti alon elli okonnoka nothuput thoricpo,
akka ul waccokot thiak cannan nomaꞌri men. Okin thaccokot thiak cannan nothiak ithakin thoccokothe ammakka Kapik kokuꞌret capu ncik, ana thoccokot thiak ammakka enthi thella pꞌrïn.
Ana amma Kapik kakorronno orpet maꞌri men cik mothoccokot thiak, pul pella pakwentako. Anaruk nti ithocumorit thoul ia kwocumot tit, kwathikkienet kin muththumuththut.
Ana nocaꞌri cen amma opilin piꞌrethung itti, ‘Okatha oMiccie pei’ ana itti ‘Okatha okkweꞌre ceneket,’ nokorronno occïkot lon len.

Akka ul wanthan iiꞌre itti okin oMiccie ngkarra ana ul wothernte lon loKapik ngkarra akkot lon ilommaththik akin ammikkot ul ngngin ana akin ammikkot manna ul ia Kapik kakkarot amma okin akkiothe kathar ikakin ammikkot kin ngngin.
Ittina noꞌrumoik mperenet non lon appik acaꞌri cen carthuk anthan.”
“Anaruk nomaꞌri imomakothe maꞌri mothiak
‘ngïꞌrïmak ngaꞌroik,
ana kwanok kakannupuka
ana mothot mapukkwo ntothiꞌrot
ana aꞌrupu worothiꞌrot waꞌrïntïttako ncik appik.’
Caꞌri cen ul ionyi wimma ukul wopul iponyi anthan nti inuththe mpuꞌran ana nthïrïk.
Ana kwathïot uꞌrupa wothothïlettat wung aꞌrntot okkwion ithakkarakot nnocapu ncik appik.”
“Inenni nina lon lopira popïcït amma natha nopira popïcït iat ana anocokka, onon thina itti karran kakko napuththut.
Ittina amma onon thimmat lon len alokkattat onon thina itti lon len laik napuththupuththut.
Mpiꞌret non ïcarïcat itti lon elli lakkattat appik aul enni inenni warthuk ille.
Tothiꞌrot ana capu thintat cik anaruk lon lin lakorronno intat cik aththik.”
“Pul pella manna pina caꞌri cen ana cïngkï cen manna uꞌrupa wothothïlettat woKapik ci tothiꞌrot womma ana manna ukul ngka kung ukul acakuruk womma, oththan pulluk akkina.
Noꞌrumoik ana ikkoik ngkït thapat akka onon thomma itti caꞌri canthan acin.
Likkoik ere pul paik paeo imakkren, kwaththe nokaman kung, kwakwentot ul iarekinok iere ngen kurekkurek ana kwiꞌret pul ipangwot cik nocürük itti kwangwot cik.
Ittina noꞌrumoik akka onon thomma itti pul poruan pakkaprttako ntan acin, cipini ana amma okorronno oka cipin ana thampang thongkꞌrai, ana manna athakꞌruk ooi ana manna ngïꞌrïmak nthuput thorrori?
Amma ook akkat omolittorit korronno okorronnok itti kwathiot non inthe.
Ila aniꞌret non, mpaik mperene ul appik, ‘Noccot kït cik.’”

Anakka maꞌri mellat ncik meꞌra mokamuthe koThaurrot kaman kꞌrek cik ana kamuthe karrakith iella müꞌrükül tit, ul ittïttïk woul wonoppan toKapik ana ul iangkene lon lothonceꞌret lon cik wokat cik akwantot kathar nthuꞌran ikakin occokot oIeccuo ngngin akin okkwothok.
Akin iꞌrekat itti, “Anaruk okorronno oka nomaꞌri mokamuthe akka ul urokie camutta.”

Anakka oIeccuo pokat cik nokaꞌran koPeththania tuan topul ipoccot kꞌran itti oCcamaan iponat ïnyï noka, akwothïngkakot kriki kothokkun wothokure iccik kokuppuꞌrung akwoꞌrkoik, apul ipopari akkakat ncuꞌru caak iokkattathe noꞌren wamutha ionat cekerek coppot ana panyathe cuꞌru camutha ana punanthet oIeccuo ica.
Ul wꞌrek iokat cik cinang wikkatheik aerettarne itti, “Ngintha akka ngaak ngamutha okïttakinthet cik?
Ngaakettat nakucci woppot iekko akucci wothuput thulukku thopul iporekot aettat ul iaiak iella aꞌrupu cik.” Okin thothirriekathe pul ipopari cik kiththik.
AIeccuo iꞌrekat kin itti, “Nokorronnok, thontha akka annattak? Kwokkinthin lon lopereththere.
Ul iaiak iella aꞌrupu wꞌrek wanon thaik annaththungon appinappin ana nthittarot kin nomaꞌri ima nthongothe itti nthittarot kin. Anaruk mpakannoka unaththungon appinappin.
Kwokkothe ila kwekkot nan kwakkot. Kwunothe ngaak ngamutha noka kin acik carthuk othakka itti akwokuccenthet thocïkkako thin cik.
Mpiꞌret non lon ilaik ïcarïcat na lon iloporot loIeccuo ongkenettat nocapu ncik appik lon ila pul ipopari empi pokkothe lerettat cakuruk ana ul wakwarttikothok ngngin.”
Ittina aIoutha Icikkariuththi opilin nti ipꞌrak ipattul ana ikken keꞌra oingkanthet ul ittïttïk woul wonoppan toKapik akwothokerot kin oIeccuo.
Nili nopirakathe noka akka okin thoccïkothe lon elli ana okin thonekkekanthet oIoutha lon cik itti okin thethok akucci. Ittina oIoutha pikkatheik akwokwancot kathar ika akwoccokiethok nili ngngin.

Nocaꞌri cocittokït cokamuthe karrakith iella müꞌrükül tit, ammakka thathuma thokat itti okin thakkwot thungkat thothokinthe Kapik papu poüccük cik, aul iammakothok ipittathok itti, “Ngkwongothe itti nthathokkinthung cik kartha nathoꞌrkot thuꞌrit thokamuthe koThaurrot kaman kꞌrek cik?”
Ittina kwothïathe ul iammakothok weꞌra akwiꞌrekat kin itti, “Ngkonon nokaꞌran koUruccelim ana onon thacurot ipul ipocura aponneko thongkuꞌrong ngngꞌri tit annomakothok.
Ana na akwiꞌriko, niꞌret pul poruan itti, ‘Pul ipangkene paik pipitto itti, Man min miatha imanïn athoꞌrkot thuꞌrit tit thokamuthe koThaurrot kaman kꞌrek cik nul iammakothin?’
Kwakenenon man mïttïk maik toꞌra mokuccettanthet cik kicce. Nokkinthet ka konnon cik nan.”
Aul iammakothok oingkat aeo nokaꞌran koUruccelim akin othiat lon ammakka oIeccuo piꞌrethekin, akin okuccekat thuꞌrit thokamuthe koThaurrot kaman kꞌrek cik.
Anakka cipin capot aIeccuo akkakat nul wung iattul ana ikken keꞌra.

Manakka okin thokat cik akin othïngkakot iriki kothokkun wothokure iccik kokuppuꞌrung kothuꞌrit akin oꞌrkoik, kwiꞌrekathe kin itti, “Mpiꞌret non lon ilaik ïcat opilin nti ianon pakeron, okkwi ipanïn thaik thaꞌrkoik ïnaththeꞌra.”
Okin thakorronno okakat thoporot noka akin ikkat cik akin iꞌrekathok thuluk thuluk itti, “Atti okorronno oka oun?”
Akwiꞌrekat kin itti, “Opilin nti ianon ithattul ana ikken keꞌra. Okkwi ipanïn thaik thathapettot ngngucul nocaththak culukku ïnaththeꞌra.
Ukul wopul iponyi wio ammakka lokurrakot iatham. Anaruk angkre nopul ipathoccokiet ul ukul wopul iponyi. Laakat loporot amma pul pen pokat pakannokwonta.”
Anakka okin thokat cik akin oꞌrkoik aIeccuo onekat arrakith akwopirakanthet Kapik noka akwomithat tit akwekat ul iammakothok akwiꞌrekat kin itti, “Nocco ka kin engki annoꞌrko.”
Akwonekat keththeꞌret akwopirakanthet Kapik noka akwekat kin ana okin thïkkathe nan appik.
Akwiꞌrekat kin itti, “Ngüccük ngin engi ngothonekket lon cik nguntanthet ul cik woppot.
Mpiꞌret non lon ilaik ïcat itti mpakannappïkko ngapak attang puccuk acaꞌri cen akkakat amma anïkko ingie ingili ngoKapik.”
Manakka okin thongwot kinye akin oppat thapat akin oingkat ci nocoꞌrong coCeththun.
AIeccuo iꞌrekat, kin itti, “Onon appik thaththe naun, akka lokurrakot itti,
‘Mpakkwot pul ipuꞌre lungkat
ana lungkat lapettakot cik.’
Anaruk amma mpurokot nti ithio mpaeo tokït kon noththok poCelïl ana oron thincettot ceneket.”
APoththuruc iꞌrekathok itti, “Okin thantoththe naung appik ana mpakorronno oththe naung.”
AIeccuo iꞌrekathok itti, “Mpiꞌrethung lon ilaik ïcat itti athakꞌruk tharthuk oo ngkoꞌra engi maꞌri meꞌra ngkwacukkwo nolon itti ngkwoman maꞌri mꞌrapuruk.”
Anaruk oPoththuruc popakkekatherit itti, “Oun manna pantio iraththeꞌra mpakannocukko nolon itti mpomang.” Akin opakkekat tit menik appik.
Akin oingkat nokaꞌran koCaccimani, aIeccuo iꞌrekat ul iammakothok itti, “Nikkoik cene, anaꞌra ngaꞌrama.”
Akwipat oPoththuruc ana oIakup ana oIuanna thellek, ana kwakorronno okakat poporot noka cannan ana oka pïrrïn.
Ana kwiꞌrekathekin itti, “Thiak thoꞌrothin cik cannan ere mpio. Nikkoik cene annoccot kït cik.”
Akwoingkat papotteik akwapat nocapu akwaꞌrakat ngaꞌrama itti, amma kathar akkokat cik acaꞌri enci cothoccokot thiak opaꞌroik naak.
Akwiꞌrekat itti, “Appa, ngappa pin, lon appik lippappat naung. Onekothin thoccokot thiak enthi, annoka ammakka mpongothe, anaruk ammakka ngkwongothe.”
Anakka kwokkaprttakinet ul iammakothok akwothiat kin akin thakko inthe. Akwiꞌrekat oPoththuruc itti, “Camaan, ngkwaik inthei? Ngkwakinnikkoik manna ngkït thapat cïngkï culukkui?
Noccot kït cik ana aꞌra ngaꞌrama othakka itti annokorronno apot ithennekketta. Cïkït congothe anaruk ka kokinyat.”
Akwappopakkat than akwaꞌrakat ngaꞌrama ammakka mai.
Anakka kwokkaprttakot, kwaththiat kin inthe attang, akka kït ken konat methe nan ana okin thommakathe lon ilakin iꞌrethok.
Akwokkaprttakat nocaꞌri icꞌrapuruk akwiꞌrekat kin itti, “Ntharthuk thaik inthei ana ongokoi? Mekkot pꞌrin, caꞌri caat. Nokatha, ukul wopul iponyi waik wathokettat ul wolon ilokithak.
Nuroko ureo, okkwi ipaik pathokeron peei paat.”

Anakka oIeccuo pokat cik akwere, aIoutha okkwi ipokat nti iul iattul ana ikken keꞌra akkakat. Kwokat ponat cungkut coul wonu iꞌrittang iukwit wukwit ana muꞌrang. Okin thothïlathe nul ittïttïk woul wonoppan toKapik ana ul iangkene lon lothonceꞌret lon cik ana ul ittïttïk woul.
Inenni okkwi ipathokeron pokenet kin itti, “Okkwi ipa anomicco ïꞌrïkothok topere, ook pen, annoccokothok annipothok ciththan annoꞌrumo naak.”
Anakka oIoutha paat akwoingkat iccik koIeccuo akwiꞌrekathok itti, “Pul ipangkene,” akwomiccathok ïꞌrïkothok topere.
Ittina aul othakkarat iccik kung aꞌrumathok accokathok.
Anaruk opilin pokat akwocoꞌro pothathe kiꞌrittang ikukwit nti ikaꞌruk akwokiat pul iparekine pul iprïk ponoppan toKapik kunu cik.
AIeccuo iꞌrekat kin itti, “Onon thaat niꞌrittang ana urrong itti nthathoccokothin ere pul pothuꞌrani?
Mpokat cik ianon appinappin anongkene ul noppan toKapik, ana onon thakorronno occokothin. Anaruk lon latham woKapik lonu itti lakkattat.”
Aul wung iammakothok ollat appik oththe naak.
Ana pul pꞌrek pokuꞌrit pokat cunthut ana pokuꞌrupakothe kret noka tulluk appokat cik apommakot oIeccuo. Akka okin thoccokothe pul pen,
akret apat apoththekat nan apollat cunthut.
Okin thonekanthet oIeccuo pul iprïk ponoppan toKapik ana ul ittïttïk woul wonoppan toKapik appik ana ul ittïttïk woul ana ul iangkene lon lothonceꞌret lon cik waꞌrntakathe appik tothun.
OPoththuruc pommakathok nciththan mono oingkat ciki ithaꞌrapak thokaman kopul iprïk ponoppan toKapik. Kwikkatheik ceneket akwïkot thik akin oul iangwot cik.
Ul ittïttïk woul wonoppan toKapik ana cuththun coul woIouth ittïttïk appik wokat cik akwancot lon ilakin oruket oIeccuo ngngin othakka itti akin okkwothok anaruk okin thakanniat lon lꞌrek aththik.
Okin thoppot ithorukwethok ngkarra anaruk lon len lokat kurekkurek.
Apilingon urokat kapik, akin ikkat cik akin orukwethok ngkarra. Akin ere itti,
“Onïn thoccïkothe akwere itti, ‘Mpakïtto man moKapik emmi imuntat nyaun nyoul ionyi ana nomaꞌri mꞌrapuruk mpuno amꞌrek imakannunta inyaun nyoul ionyi.’”
Lon lothorukwet ngkarra then manna thokat kurekkurek.
Apul iprïk ponoppan toKapik urokat kapik tokït ken, akwipittat oIeccuo lon itti, “Ngkwaik pakannothïnthet thorukwet tit itha ul enni waik warukwethung ngngini?”
Anaruk oIeccuo pangkatheik kwakanniꞌrekat lon lꞌrek.
Apul iprïk ponoppan toKapik, appipittathok itti, “Oung oMiccie ukul woKapik ikanïn thaik thapirane noka pelleki?”
AIeccuo iꞌrekat itti, “Ïï oun.
Ana ngkwimma ukul wopul iponyi
aikkoik thokkun wothothari wokkwi ipakorronno alkakot
ana anthan nonuththe norothiꞌrot.”
Apul iprïk ponoppan toKapik illat kret kung akwokene thuaka thung, aiꞌrekat itti, “Oron thongothe ul immat lon ngkït arttot nan wothentha?
Onon thoccïkothe ila kwocungkot Kapik ngngin. Onon thiꞌre taththa?”
Akin iꞌrekat appik itti kwonu itti kwakkuttat.

Ittina apilingon ikkat cik akin othukkwothok nguk ana ïꞌrïkïkkothok kret toca akin okkwekok akin iꞌre itti, “Iꞌrethenïn mpuꞌran poKapik, oththa akkokkworung?” Ana ul iangwot cik wonekathok ana wokkwekathok.
Anakka oPoththuruc pokat cik parthuk ithaꞌrapak apilin nti iul iari iarekine pul iprïk ponoppan toKapik akkakat akwoppo cïnang.
Manakka kwimmat oPoththuruc akwïkot thik akwokathakathok papenang.
Akwiꞌrekathok itti, “Oung cakuruk pokat annoIeccuo poNaccir.”
Anaruk akwocukkwat nan, akwiꞌrekat itti, “Mpomma lon ila ngkwaik peret.” Akwoingkat icürük thapat.
Anakka ukul iopari iareko wapprimmathok cïnang, appiꞌrekat ul iokat cik cïnang acoꞌro itti, “Opaththi empi ook opilin ntiakin.”
Akwappocukkat nan.
Ana papotteik, akin ithokat cik akin ocoꞌro napuththut iꞌrekat oPoththuruc itti, “Ïcat oung opilin pen akka oung poCelïl.”
Ittina kwikkatheik akwonane ka kung thattatta ana kwarrmakanthet kin itti, “Mpomma pul emprïk ipanon thaik theret.”

Nci cïnang athakꞌruk othikkiekat maꞌri meꞌra athoo, ittina oPoththuruc okwarikat ila oIeccuo piꞌrethok itti, “Amma thakꞌruk tharthuk oo maꞌri meꞌra, angkwacukko nan itti ngkwinan maꞌri mꞌrapuruk.” Akwokwarikat lon len akwikkat cik akwoo.

Ana ngorrot ngïꞌrïmak ul ittïttïk woul wonoppan toKapik okin oul ittïttïk woul ana ul iangkene lon lothonceꞌret lon cik ana cuththun coul woIouth ittïttïk appik ïꞌrïkat lon akin ïꞌrïkïkkat oIeccuo akin onekanthok ili oPilaththoc.
APilaththoc ipittathok itti, “Oung ili woIouthi?”
AIeccuo othïat tit itti, “Laik ammakka ngkwiꞌret.”
Aul ittïttïk woul wonoppan toKapik orukwekathok llon loppot.
APilaththoc appipittathok attang itti, “Ngkwaik pakannothïnthet ul enni tiri? Antokatha lon loronththa ilakin thaik thorukwethung ngngin.”
Anaruk oIeccuo pakannothïat tit aPilaththoc oprttakat tit.
Ittina thathuma thokat cik nokamuthe koThaurrot kaman kꞌrek cik itti nili nelikko pul nti ikorrkkor ipa ul ipitto itti pelikkako.
Ana pul pꞌrek pokat cik ikorrkkor ipoccot kꞌran itti oParapac akin oul ionu thukungkun ithokat thongwothe ul icamutta.
Acungkut coul akkakat acipittat oPilaththoc itti kwakkinthet kin ammakka akwokkettet appinappin.
APilaththoc ipittat itti, “Onon thongothe itti mpelikkinenon ili woIouthi?”
Kwappina kicce itti ul ittïttïk woul wonoppan toKapik wokat wonanok oIeccuo akka okin thokat thua ka kung.
Anaruk ul ittïttïk woul wonoppan toKapik werekekathe ul itti akin ipittot oPilaththoc itti akwelikkinekin oParapac.
APilaththoc ipittat kin attang itti, “Mpakkot taththa nopul ipa annakkaro itti ili woIouth?”
Akin iꞌrekat mpoꞌre cittan itti, “Nokkwethok nothapak.”
OPilaththoc ipittat kin itti, “Akaintha ngintha akka kwokkothe pamoloko?”
Anaruk okin thikkatheik akin okkot poꞌre cittan akin iꞌre itti, “Nokkwothok nothapak.”
OPilaththoc pangkathe itti kwapirie ul noka ana kwelikkanthet kin oParapac. Akwothïat oIeccuo akwothopoko ana okkuttat nothapak.
Ul irro wonekathe oIeccuo nokaꞌran koili ikrïk ana okin thakkarathe mungkut moul irro appik
Akin akiekathok kret kothlo ere maa ika nili ako, akin otheranthok tukwia tolï, akin akiekathok ica ere ili.
Akin ikkat cik akin akkakkarok itti, “Ili woIouth, taththa.”
Akin okkwekok ca ngkurrong ana othukkwothok nguk ana irrinok cik nungku akin innikot itti nthaꞌranok ngaꞌrama.
Anakka okin thocothothe okkothok ngure naak kicce okin thuekathok kret ikothlo ere maa akin akiekathok kret kung akin ipathok thapat akin othokkwethok nothapak.

Ana ikathar akin ocurat iaCcamaan ponokaꞌran koKirin akkwokat oththan pAlekenther ana oRuppuc. Kwokat akwoppo cinang akwanthan nti ipira thapat akweo icarak coman ana ul irro wonekiekathok thapak mpuꞌran.
Akin onakat oIeccuo nokaꞌran ikoccot kꞌran itti Culucutha, (ilonu itti kaꞌran kokꞌrintil koca).
Akin oIeccuo ngapak ngonu aꞌrupu wꞌrek tit apiet thokꞌrellako thoka cik anaruk kwꞌrakathe.
Ana okin thokkwekathok nothapak
ana okin thillillathe iret wung
nthokkwot moꞌrio nan akin okatha itti okkwen akkaneko kia.
Akka okin thokkwethok nothapak acïngkï cokkothe ukullacoꞌrin cocik corrot.
Lon ilakin thorukwethok ngngin lokurrakathe noꞌra wothapak itti, ILI WOIOUTH.
Okin thongwathe ul wothuꞌran nothapak weꞌra okin aththungon opilin thokkun wothothari ana opilin thokkun wothokure.
Ana okin ithokat cik akin okkette cïnang thikkatheik akin ocungkok ana oꞌrïntïtto ma ana erenok itti, “Oung ipaik pathokïtto tupan toKapik auno nomaꞌri mꞌrapuruki?
Orpu ntan nnothapak aꞌret ka kang.”
Ana cakuruk ul ittïttïk woul wonoppan toKapik ana ul iangkene lon lothonceꞌret lon cik nerettaranthet akin okkot ngure naak akin iꞌre itti, “Kwoꞌrethe ul wꞌrek anaruk kwomma oꞌret ka kung.
Kirrnni aMiccie empi poIccereil orpo ntan nothapak othakka itti unimma unoccokot lon lung nomïkït.” Okin ithokkwettathe nothapak akin aththungon thikkatheik akin ocungkok cakuruk.
Anakka cïngkï angko ippa ngïꞌrïmak ngoꞌratheik nocapu ncik appik puccuk mono acïngkï okkat cꞌrapuruk cipin.
Ana nocïngkï cꞌrapuruk cocipin cen aIeccuo eekat ngeme mpoꞌre cittan itti, “Eloi, Eloi, lama capakththani?” ilonu itti, “Kapik kin, Kapik kin ngkwoththet naun akaintha?”
Anakka ul wꞌrek iokat cik acoꞌro cïnang woccïkothe lon len okin thakanninakat lon len akin iꞌrekat itti, “Nokkwo kunu ncik kwaik pakkaro pul ipernte lon loKapik oIlia.”

Apilin ollat mono okwothonakat kret akwothapekat ngngapak ingor akwonekkekat nokwoꞌren akwekat oIeccuo itti kwïkko. Akwiꞌrekat itti, “Ntrun antokorronnok pellek unokatha amma oIlia anthan akworpethok cik nothapak.”
AIeccuo othukat cokwa mpoꞌre cittan akwommottakat.
Akret ikapettoik konoppan toKapik illakat tit mprak weꞌra, ncik toꞌra mono uat ciki nocapu.
Anakka ili woul arrial ukuluk irro iokat cik acoꞌro tokït koIeccuo woccïkothe akka kwet ngeme ana akka kwiot akwiꞌrekat itti, “Ïcat pul empi pokat ukul woKapik.”
Ul iari wꞌrek wokat cik, akathacceik nciththan. Ana nti iakin oMeriom moMacthelia, ana oMeriom onnan poIakup ipotte ana poIuccip, ana oCcaluma.
Ul iari enni akkommakothok ana ittarothok akka kwokat noththok poCelïl. Ul wꞌrek iari wokat cik cakuruk woppot iomakothok ntan nokaꞌran koUruccelim.
Caꞌri cokat cik cothokuccekot cik (ilonu itti acaꞌri caCcepith carthuk anthan). Manakka cipin cokat cik acapo,
oIuccip poRami ipokat iprïk icuththun coul woIouth ittïttïk ana ipokat cik akwoꞌrïkot ngili ngoKapik, poingkanthet oPilaththoc ella nꞌre akwipittathok kumi koIeccuo.
OPilaththoc poprttakathe tit akka kwoccïkothe itti oIeccuo piot akwakkarat ili woul irro ana kwipittathok itti amma oIeccuo piot akkumman.
Anakka kwinat lon len noili woul irro itti oIeccuo piot akwekat oIuccip kumi koIeccuo.
Ittina oIuccip pokerathe kret kie akwoꞌremethekathok ngngin ana kwaththocïkkathok ippu ipaꞌranthang pocuꞌrol. Akwothïat kaꞌraccak tocürük coppu.
OMeriom moMacthelia ana oMeriom onnan poIuccip thimmakathe na kwocïkkakot.
Anakka caꞌri caCcepith ceot ncik, oMeriom moMacthelia ana oMeriom onnan poIakup ana oCcaluma thokerathe ngaak ngamutha itti okin thathoꞌro kumi koIeccuo.
Ana ingïꞌrïmak nocaꞌri corokït nomaꞌri imeꞌreꞌrapuruk acïngkï coppot ana okin thokat cik nokathar akin eo thoppu,
akin ikkat cik akin ipittararot itti, “Oththa akkapaꞌrenerit pothok cik noppu?”
Anaruk akka okin thokathat cik akin immakat pothok ipokat pïttïk appopaꞌrettat cik noppu.
Manakka okin thiꞌrikot ippu akin immakat pul pokuꞌrit pakot kret kipuk apikkoik nthokkun wothothari woul iari ana okin thipathe nꞌre.
Apiꞌrekat kin itti, “Nokorronno opelle. Onon thaik thakwancot oIeccuo poNaccir ipokkwuttathe nothapak, okkurokot nti ithio kwakannoka cene nokatha kaꞌran nakin thaththïcethok cik.
Anaruk ngkonon annothiꞌret ul iammakothok ana oPoththuruc ‘kwaeot tokït kon noththok poCelïl anon tharthuk eo nanon othimmathok ammakka kwiꞌrethenon.’”
Akin ikkat cik akin okkweka ana oprttakot tit akin oppat thapat akin ollat nti ippu ana okin thakanniꞌrekat opilin akka okin thonat nꞌre.
Anakka oIeccuo purokot ngïꞌrïmak nocaꞌri corokït conomaꞌri meꞌreꞌrapuruk kummanthet oMeriom moMacthelia ncik cittokït okkwi ipa kwokïccet uꞌrupa iokithak weꞌreꞌrapuruk ntit.
Kwoingkathe ana kwaththerekanthet kin ithokat akin oIeccuo ithokat ithemeru ana oo.
Anakka okin thoccïkothe itti oIeccuo purokot ana itti kwimmarok okin thakannoccokat lon len nomïkït.
Apotteik aIeccuo appummanthet kin theꞌra noul iokat cik ammakothok ngka prek, akka okin thokat cik akin onyaro icarak coman.
Okin thopakkathe akin erekanthet opilingon anaruk okin thakannoccokat lon len nomïkït.

Nomaꞌri motte aIeccuo ummanthet ul iammakothok iattul ana ikken culukku akin thokat cik akin oꞌrkoik, akwothirriekat kin cik akka okin thellat thoccokot lon nomïkït ana thonthomat mïkït men akka okin thꞌrat occïkot lon lokkwion ithimmarok akka kurokot ntit nti ithio.
Kwiꞌrekathe kin itti, “Ngkonon nocapu ncik appik annothongkene ul appik lon iloporot loKapik.
Okkwi ipoccokothe lon iloporot nocïkït ana occo mamuthie kwaꞌrettat ana okkwi ipakannoccokot lon iloporot nocïkït kwakkmako.
Ana ul ioccokothe lon loKapik wakkot lon ilommaththik, okin okïcce uꞌrupu iokithak ngkꞌran kin ana okin there karru koul wꞌrek.
Okin thacciccokot inyil nyaun nyen ana ïkko ngee iokithak angokorronno okkot kin loꞌrek, okin thanekket nyaun noul iongo ana wathakka woporot.”
Anakka Ili oIeccuo perenet kin kwonekittakathe tothiꞌrot ana kwikkatheik thokkun wothothari woKapik.
Aul iammakothok oingkat athongkene naꞌran appik ana Ili worekathe akin aththungon ana kwokenekathe itti lon lung laik ïcat llon ilommaththik ilakin thokat akin okkot.
Luke: Pangkin oThiappiloc, ul woppot wokurrot lon ana aꞌrupu iokat cik ïcat tokït konnon.
Okin thokurrot lon ammakka lerettanet nïn nul immat lon ncinomun ana okin ithongkenet lon loKapik.
Ana inakka oun ngka kin pommakothe lon appik nci nomun kicce, mpongothe itti mpakurrot cene othettot cik kicce anokurrinung oThiappiloc pul iprïk,
othakka itti aina anganna lon ilaik ïcat ila ngkwappongkenettat.

Nocaꞌri coIruthuc ili woIouthia, pul pꞌrek pokat cik ponoppan toKapik poccot kꞌran itti oCekkeria ipokat ikuthuk koul wonoppan toKapik wApia ana opari Alicepeth pokat cakuruk pothiki thoul wonoppan toKapik worikuthuk kArun.
Okin oththuththeꞌra thokat thoporot tokït koKapik ana nthoccokothe lon loIli appik iliꞌrettat ana nthoꞌrumot nolon ilamakittat papenang.
Anaruk okin thellat nyukul akka Alicepeth pokat papucung ana okin aththeꞌra thokat thukkwat.
Caꞌri cꞌrek caCekkeria pokat cik akwokkot ngre noppan toKapik ammakka ook pul ponoppan toKapik nocaꞌri cung icapinthok
kwokat pummuntat nthokkwo moꞌrio ammakka thathuma thoul wonoppan toKapik thokat akweo noppan toIli akwothokꞌre ngaꞌra iokkunako amutha.
Anakka caꞌri caat cothokꞌre ngaꞌra iakkunako amutha, ul iaꞌra ngaꞌrama wokat cik waꞌrantakothe thapat aꞌra ngaꞌrama.
Ittina auꞌrupa wothothïlettat woIli ummanthok ncik, acoꞌrat thokkun wothothari woruꞌrot tonoppan toKapik na ngaꞌra iakkunako ngokat akꞌrettat.
Anakka oCekkeria pimmat uꞌrupa wothothïlettat woKapik akwirrat tit akwipat nꞌre.
Anaruk uꞌrupa wothothïlettat woKapik wiꞌrekathok itti, “Cekkeria, kirrnni ipo nꞌre. Kapik koccïkothe ngaꞌrama ngang, opari pang Alicepeth pakwoninung ukul iocura ana ngkwaccie kꞌran itti oIuanna.
Kwapirieng noka ana ul woppot wapirane thokwonta thung noka
akka kwaka prïk tokït koIli. Kwakannïkko ngapak ana Kanang ikupupure kaka naak nciki icarak connan.
Kwakkaprtto ul woIccereil woppot nti ilon ilokithak apakkinthet Ili Kapik ken.

Ana kweo tokït koIli iKanang ikupupure ana puꞌran popul pothernte lon loKapik oIlia ana kwapakket mïkït moththan ponyukulon ikuꞌri nynyukul nyen, ana kwakkaprtto ul iokat wꞌrat lon ilocoꞌrotheik angkot lon lothina cik nti ica loul woKapik. Kwakuccenthet thanthan thoIli ul cik.”
ACekkeria ipittat uꞌrupa wothothïlettat woKapik itti, “Mpina itti laik ïcat taththa? Mpukkwat ana opari pin pukkwat.”
Uꞌrupa wothothïlettat woKapik wothïanthok tit itti, “Oun oCepereil. Mpaik pacoꞌro tokït koKapik ana mpothïlathe anathiꞌrethung lon elli iloporot.
Anaruk inakka ngkworakket lon lin ilathokaik ïcat nocaꞌri cen, ngkwannere puccuk alon ila mpiꞌrethung othakkakat.”
Caꞌri cen ul wokat cik aꞌrïkot oCekkeria thapat aprttakot tit itti ngintha akka kwoccinet cik puccuk noppan toKapik.
Anakka kwoppothe thapat kwommakathe erenekin akwikat cik akwere nyaun akin inakat itti kwimmathe loꞌrek noppan toKapik anaruk kwoꞌrungkwathe pomma nthon.
Anakka maꞌri mung mothokkot ngre noppan toKapik momttathe kwopakkothe tuan.
Anakka lon len lomttathe ana nomaꞌri motte apari Alicepeth oppekathe ana kwikkatheik noppan anok ukuluk okorronno oppot thapat.
Kwiꞌrekathe itti, “Ili akkokkinthin elli, kokenerin thongat thung nomaꞌri emmi ana kwopaꞌrenin thothia cik thin tokït koul.”
Nokwanok ikꞌrakkuruk aKapik othïat uꞌrupa wothothïlettat wung ioccot kꞌran itti oCepereil ciki nokaꞌran koNaccir ikaik noththok poCelïl,
nokkul ioiꞌre iakannaꞌrutta ngngin aththik woccot kꞌran itti oMeriom iokat wokkaccakinet pul ipoccot kꞌran itti oIuccip thiki thoThauth.
Uꞌrupa wothothïlettat woKapik woingkanthok aiꞌrekat itti, “Taththa okkwi ipa Kapik kongothe cannan, Ili waik naung.”
OMeriom pipanthet lon len nꞌre akwoprttakanthet thomicco then tit.
Anaruk uꞌrupa wothothïlettat woKapik wiꞌrekathok itti, “Meriom, kirrnni ipo nꞌre, oung pul ipa Kapik kongothe.
Ngkwappet ana ngkwakwono ukul iocura ana ngkwaccie kꞌran itti oIeccuo.
Kwaka prïk ana kwakkarako itti ukul wokkwi ipaik cittothiꞌrot. Ili Kapik wethok prrok poththan oThauth,
ana kwathakka ili wothiki thoIakup thupuththuput ana ngili ngung ngakannomttat thupuththuput.”
AMeriom ipittat uꞌrupa wothothïlettat woKapik itti, “Elli lathakka taththa akka mparthuk poiꞌre ana mpomma pul ipocura?”
Auꞌrupa wothothïlettat woKapik othïat tit itti, “Kanang ikupupure kanthan naung ana puꞌran poKapik korothiꞌrot paka naung. Ilen akka ukul iakwonta nti iaung wakkarako itti ukul woKapik.
Ana manna Alicepeth pokuꞌri kang poppethe ipa ul wokat cik aere itti kwokat pucung. Ana kwoppethe ponu anok wꞌrakkuruk.
Akka lon lella ilalkothe Kapik.”
AMeriom othïat tit itti, “Oun pul iparekine Ili. Alothakkanin menik ammakka ngkwiꞌret.” Auꞌrupa wothothïlettat woKapik oththekat naak.
Caꞌri cen oMeriom purokathe akwiꞌrikittakat okuꞌrot nokaꞌran noththok poIouthia.
Akwoingkat tuan thoCekkerian akwomiccat Alicepeth.
Anakka Alicepeth poccïkothe poꞌre poMeriom aukul ikkat cik aurttuko nti icarak aKanang ikupupure oꞌrat nAlicepeth.
Akwiꞌrekat lon mpoꞌre cittan itti, “Oung akkethïettat nti iul iari appik ana ukul iathokwono wethïettat.
Turuk itti ngintha akka mpongakinthet ittina, itti onnan poIli painin?
Akka poꞌre pothomicco thang poꞌrorin iunu aukul ikkat cik aurttuko nthopira noka nciki icarak.
Pul pethïekothe cik ipoccokothe lon loKapik nocïkït ila Ili wiꞌrethung lathakka ïcat.”
AMeriom iꞌrekat itti,
“Mpopiranet Ili noka nci noucce win
ana kanang kin kopiranet Kapik noka akka ook pothoꞌret thin
akka kwokwarikothin ipa piak pung.
Inenni thiki enthi appik thakkaron itti pul ipa Kapik kethïetheik.
Akka okkwi ipakannalkakot pokkinthin lon lrïk
kꞌran kung kupupupure.
Thiak thung thaine ul iothianok cik thiki thiki.
Kwokkothe ngre mpuꞌran pung
ana kwopettothe ul cik iipot ka thoura ana iongothe lon loka ken.
Kworpethe nili cik nnorrok wen
anaruk kwoꞌrumot noul ia ul wella kït ken.
Kwoththikiethe ul iamat naꞌrupu woppot ioporot
anaruk kwothïlethe aꞌrthan ikathar nyaun incürük.
Kwittarothe piak pung iparekinok oIccereil,
ana kwokwarikathe itti kwipo thiak thung.
Ana ammakka kwonekkenthet Aprein ongappa ponnon lon cik ana thiki thung thupuththuput.”
OMeriom pikkatheik okin Alicepeth anok wꞌrapuruk akwopakkat tuan thanung.
Anakka caꞌri cainet Alicepeth itti kwakwono akwokonat ukul iocura.
Ul wonocürük ana kuꞌri kung woccïkathe itti Ili wipot thiak thung nthokkinthok lon iloporot ana okin thopirakathe noka okin aththungon.
Anakka ukul wothikkiet maꞌri mormor okin thakkakathe akin athokekkiet ana okin thokat thongothe itti okin thaccie kꞌran koththan itti oCekkeria
anaruk onnan piꞌrekathe itti, “Aa, kwaccietta kꞌran itti oIuanna.”
Aul iꞌrekathok itti, “Pul pella nti ikuꞌri kang iponu kꞌran ammakka engki.”
Ittina akin erekanthet oththan pokkul inyaun itti akwiꞌrekin itti ukul wacco kꞌran itti okkwen.
Akwipittat kuruthut akwokurrot nan itti, “Kꞌran kung itti oIuanna.” Aul oprttakat tit appik.
Nci cïnang athon thoththan pokkul anyat ana thuꞌre thung apprikat akwikkat cik akwere lon lothomereket Kapik.
Ul wonocürük wipathe nꞌre appik ana ul wikkatheik aeret lon len appik naꞌran wonoththok poIouthia.
Ana okkwion ithoccïkothe lon len thikkatheik akin oprttakot tit akin ipittarot lon itti, “Ukul enni wathothakka ngintha amma wocokkat?” akka ukun woIli Kapik wokat naak.
AKanang ikupupure oꞌrat naththan oCekkeria akwikkat cik akwere lon ilanthan akwiꞌrekat itti,
“Athopira noka oka noIli, Kapik koIccereil
akka kwaat ana kwelikkot ul wung.
Kwonekkenthet ton pul cik mpuꞌran prïk pathoꞌret ton pothiki thoThauth.
Ammakka kwiꞌrethe ul wothernte lon lung womaꞌrot.
Itti kwaꞌret ton nnothoꞌrak thonnon
ana nti inyaun nyoul iꞌrat ton.
Okkwokenet ongappan thonnon thoporot
ana nthoccot kït nothonekket lon cik thung ithupupure,
thonekket lon cik itha kwonekketheik okin ongappa ponnon Aprein.
Itti kwakkieron cik nti inyaun nyothoꞌrak thonnon
