ana okwokorronnoron aron ella nꞌre.
Ana oka thupupure ana thoporot tokït kung thupuththuput ammakka oron thaik.”
“Ana oung ukul win, ngkwakkarako itti pul pothernte lon loKapik kocittothiꞌrot
ngkwaeo tokït koIli akuccenthok kathar,
atherene ul wung lon lothoꞌrettat itti laka
nthoccïkarnthet lon ilokithak.
Elli akka Kapik konnon konu thiak thonnon.
Ana nti ithiak enthi oMiccie paineron ntothiꞌrot ere cïngkï amma acoppo.
OMiccie pathere lon ilaik ïcat ilaka ere kꞌran kocïngkï ikathocciene ul cik iaik iꞌrïmak
ana ionu nꞌre nothille
kwakkot lon elli itti akwipot ton ikathar kothikkoik thoporot tokït koKapik.”
Ana ukul wokat cik acokka ana athakka wonthomat iKanang ikupupure, ana kwikkatheik ithampang ithonthomat puccuk mono akwummat ncik tokït koul woIccereil.
Ana nomaꞌri men aIli oKkaiccer Akocoththoc othïat lon lonthoththomat itti ul appik iaik nomothok imaik inyaun nyongili ngoRoma wonu itti wakurro ꞌran wen iatham woIli woRoma.
Thokurro ꞌran enthi thocittokït akka oKirnioc pokat ili wonoththok poCcuria.
Aul appik oingkat naꞌran wen athokurro ꞌran wen.
Ittina oIuccip poingkathe acakuruk nokaꞌran koNaccir noththok poCelïl akweo Peththelam noththok poIouthia nokaꞌran na Ili oThauth pokwontathe akka kwokat thiki thoThauth.
Kweot tentre akwothokurrot kꞌran kung akin oMeriom iponomittanthok itti kwittanok ana caꞌri cen oMeriom pappoppethe.
Anakka okin thokat tentre acaꞌri akkakat cokkul itti wakwonta

ana oMeriom pokwonathe ukul wung wonothire wocura ana kwoꞌremethekathe ukul ikret akwïcïekat cik iththuk nokuppuꞌrung ika aꞌrupu worua oꞌrko taco nan akka kaꞌran kakkellanet kin ikaman ika ul ikkoik tit nakucci.
Ul iuꞌre aꞌrupu worua wꞌrek wokat cik ipira thapat ana okin thokat akin angwot aꞌrupu worua ngkoꞌra iccik kokaꞌran koPeththelam.
Ana uꞌrupa wothothïlettat woIli wummanthet kin ncik ana kꞌran kothrïk thoIli occat nakin ana okin thipathe nꞌre cannan.
Anaruk uꞌrupa wothothïlettat woKapik wiꞌrekathekin itti, “Nokorronno ipo nꞌre. Mponanet non lon iloporot ana lakane ul appik.
Inenni nokaꞌran koThauth pul pokwontanet non ipaꞌret non, ook oMiccie Ili.
Ana lon elli lakenenon ngok, onon thathiot ukul woꞌremethettat ikret ana wïcettatheik iththuk nokuppuꞌrung ika aꞌrupu worua oꞌrkot taco nan.”
Ana accokkot, auꞌrupa wothothïlettat woKapik woppot akkakat ntothiꞌrot akin omereket Kapik akin iꞌre itti,
“Thrïk thaine Kapik korothiꞌrot cittan
ana alon oka loporot nocapu noul ia kwongothe.”

Anakka uꞌrupa wothothïlettat woKapik woththet nakin, wokuꞌrathe tothiꞌrot, ul iuꞌre aꞌrupu worua wikkatheik aerettine itti, “Ton eo ci Peththelam aron othokatha lon elli ilokkattathe ila Ili wiꞌretheron lon len.”
Ittina okin thoingkathe akin iat oMeriom ana oIuccip ana ukul awïcatheik nokuppuꞌrung iththuk ika aꞌrupu worua oꞌrkot taco.
Anakka okin thimmat akin opettat lon cik lokkul ilakin thiꞌrettanet,
ana ul ioccïkothe appik woprttakatherit nolon ila ul iuꞌre aꞌrupu worua wiꞌrethekin.
Anaruk oMeriom poccokathe lon len appik nocïkït cung akwokwarttikot.
Ul iuꞌre aꞌrupu worua wopakkathe amereket Kapik ana opirane noka nolon appik ilakin thimmat ana occïkot ana ilokat cik ïcat ammakka okin thiꞌrettathe.
Anakka oIeccuo pothikkiet maꞌri mormor ana nocaꞌri cothokekkiethok kwocciettakathe kꞌran itti oIeccuo kꞌran ika uꞌrupa wothothïlettat woKapik wethok akkwarthuk oppettat.
Anakka caꞌri cen caat cothonthukko ammakka lon lothonceꞌret lon cik loMucca liꞌret, oIuccip okin oMeriom thonekathe oIeccuo nokaꞌran koUruccelim akwothettat Ili.
Ammakka lokurrakot ilon lothonceꞌret lon cik loIli itti, “Ukul wonothire iocura wonu itti wettat Ili.”

Ana okin cakuruk thoingkathe itti okin thathethet Ili aꞌrupu wothokiot ngüccük cik ammakka lokurrakot ilon lothonceꞌret lon cik loIli, “Mülükkür meꞌra ana amma annoka mülükkür ana waka minthang meꞌra imarran.”
Caꞌri enci puꞌrek pokat cik nokaꞌran koUruccelim poccot kꞌran itti oCcamaan kwokat poporot tokït koKapik. Kwokat cik akwoꞌrïkot Kapik akoꞌret ul woIccereil ana Kanang ikupupure kokat naak.
Kanang ikupupure kakkiꞌrethok itti kwannio akkwarthuk imma oMiccie ipa Ili wonekkethe lon len cik.
Kwiꞌrikettat noppan toKapik mpuꞌran poKanang koKapik. Caꞌri ica oMeriom ana oIuccip thonat ukul oIeccuo noppan toKapik akwothokkattanthet lon lothathuma ammakka laik iatham wothonceꞌret lon cik.
OCamaan ponekathe oIeccuo nokapen ana kwopirakanthet Kapik noka akwiꞌrekat itti,
“Ili, ngkwoꞌrumot nolon lang ila ngkwokat ponekketheik
ana inenni kirrnni piak pang apio appopirat noka.
Akka mpimmat ngkït kin pul ipa ngkwapponekketheik itti pathoꞌret ul,
ipa ngkwappokuccethe cik tokït koul appik.
Kwaka kꞌran ikacciene ul cik iannoka woIouth
ana kwaka thrïk thoul wang woIccereil.”
OIuccip ana oMeriom thoprttakatherit nolon ilerettathe ukul.

Ittina aCcamaan pethïekathekin akwiꞌrekat oMeriom itti, “Ukul enni wakorronno ul woppot noththok poIccereil iꞌrarok akïtto ana woppot iongothe lon lung aꞌrungkot cik. Walon ilothïlathe nnoKapik ana ul woppot wꞌra lon lung.
Othakka itti alon inako nan ilamuꞌruttakot ncik nomïkït moppot ana thiak thethung cïkït icarak ere kiꞌrittang.”
Pul pꞌrek pokat cik pothernte lon loKapik Anna pul ipopari ukul woPanuil ponopothok pAccir. Kwokat cik pukkwat, kwikkot cik akin olle luput leꞌreꞌrapuruk akka okin thittettot

anaruk olle piathe akwokwentakat curuma mono aluput othakkakat arrial wocoꞌrin ana ikken kocoꞌrin (84). Kwannokorronno noppan toKapik aththik anaruk kwokat cik akwaꞌraꞌra ngaꞌrama ngkoꞌra ana icïngkï, ocoꞌro nothuꞌrit ana aꞌra ngaꞌrama.
Caꞌri cen kwakkakanthet kin tokït ken akwekat Kapik thopira noka akwerekanthet ul lon lokkul appik iokat cik akin oꞌrïkot itti pul ipathoꞌret ul wonokaꞌran koUruccelim.
Anakka oMeriom ana oIuccip thokkothe lon appik ilonu itti lakkattat ammakka lon lothonceꞌret lon cik loIli, okin thopakkathe noththok poCelïl nokaꞌran ken koNaccir.
Ana ukul wocokkakathe athakkakat wonthomat. Wokat winaik nti ica ana thoporot thoKapik thokat nan.
Lokat cik itti amma thuput thaat ithie oththan ana onnan thaeo nokaꞌran koUruccelim akin thokkot kamuthe koThaurrot kaman kꞌrek cik.
Anakka kwokkothe luput attul ana ikken keꞌra (12) akin oingkanthet kamuthe ammakka lokat cik.
Anakka kamuthe komttathe okin thurokathe akin opakkot tuan nokaꞌran koNaccir anaruk ukul woththettakathe nan thoceken nokaꞌran koUruccelim ana okin thommat nan.
Akin opri itti kwaik iul iakin thaik nokurtti, okin thoingkathe okkwot caꞌri culukku. Ittina akin ikkat cik akin okwancothok nokuꞌri ken ana napurukon.
Anakka okin thanniothok okin thopakkathe ciki nokaꞌran koUruccelim akin othokwancothok.
Anakka maꞌri mothakkat mꞌrapuruk akin okwancothok akin othiathok noppan toKapik akwikkoik ithoꞌrkït thoul iangkene akwoccïkot kin ana ipitto kin lon.
Okkwion ithoccïkothok thokat cik akin oprttakot tit nothinaik thung ana nothothïlet tit tholon lung.
Anakka oththan akin onnan thimmarok okin thoprttakatherit. Annan iꞌrekathok itti, “Ukul wïn, ngkwokkinthet nïn ittina akaintha? ïnthokat cik ïnokwancothung ïnoththe amïkït mellat ikarak.”
Aukul ipittat itti, “Ngintha akka anthokat cik annokwancinthin? Nthomma itti mponu itti mpaka toppan tongappai?”
Akin ommakat ila kwonu itti kwiꞌret kin.
Ittina okin thoingkathe nokaꞌran koNaccir ana kwoccïkathe lon len. Anaruk onnan pangwathe lon len appik nocïkït cung.
Ittina oIeccuo pocokkakathe, athinaik thung nti ica arttakot nan ana Kapik kongakathok ana ul cakuruk wongakathok.

Ana noluput attul ana ikken ukuluk (15) longili woili irïk oThiperioc poKkaiccer wonoththok poRoma ana aꞌran appik. Ana caꞌri cen oPilaththoc oPunththioc pokat ili wonoththok poIouthia, ana oIruthuc oka ili cakuruk wonoththok poCelïl. Ana oPilippic opang poIruthuc pokat ili wonoththok poIththoria ana poThthïrïkinoththoc, ana oLiaccanoc oka ili iotte wonoththok poIpilina.
Ana Anan ana oKiappa oka ul ittïttïk wonoppan toKapik caꞌri cen alon loKapik akkakanthet oIuanna ukul woCekkeria akwokat cik ithampang.
Kwoingkathe naꞌran iccik korue toÜrüthün appik akwerene ul lon lomamuthie akwiꞌret kin itti, “Nopaꞌrine lon ilokithak cik annocco mamuthie ana Kapik kaccïkïnthet non lon lon ilokithak.”
Ammakka lokurrakot iatham wolon loIccaia pul pothernte lon loKapik itti,
“Poꞌre popul paik pakkakkaro nti ithampang itti,
‘Nokuccenthet Ili kathar
noceꞌrenthok athar cik.
Lupuꞌru lonu itti laꞌruntettat
ana moꞌrong arppippithietta ana cik ica thorokokkok opeꞌriccakot cik
Athar iompaꞌrot cik wanceꞌriettat cik
ana athar ionu muꞌrol tit wapekietta.
Ana thoꞌret thoKapik thaul ionyi imma appik.’”
AIuanna iꞌrekat cungkut coul iaat itti wathocco mamuthie nti ikkun wung itti, “Nyukul nyoinyil enyrïk, oththa akkiꞌrethenon itti onon thallot thua ka thoKapik ithanthan?
Nokkot ngre iakene itti onon thopaꞌrinet lon ilokithak cik. Nokorronno omet kakon itti, ‘Onïn nyukul nyAprein.’ Mpiꞌret non itti Kapik kina oprtto mothok emmi cik amokakat nyukul nyAprein.
Nantoccïkot, pul ipathio ponekkethe kïnyït kocemeke nolaka lokira. Ana pira ipakorronno okwono nyukul nyoporot, pakeccat cik aporrettakat icꞌrot.”
Acungkut coul ipittat itti, “Ana ngimpen akka onïn okkot?”
AIuanna othïat tit itti, “Okkwi iponu eret weꞌra akwethet okkwi ipellaik, ana okkwi iponu thuꞌrit kwonu itti kwakkot menik cakuruk.”
Aul iaꞌrntinthet nili akucci akkakat acakuruk itti wathocco mamuthie. Akin ipittat itti, “Pul ipangkene, ngintha akka ïnokkot?”
Akwiꞌrekat kin itti, “Nokorronno aꞌrntot akucci woppot nopangken ianthonu itti nthaꞌrnttot.”
Ittina ul wꞌrek irro ipittathok itti, “Ana onïn thakkot ngimpen?”
Akwothïat tit, “Nokorronno oththikot ul akucci ana okorronno ereket ul ngkarra. Noꞌrïkot akucci won tulluk iakin ethet non.”
Ul wokat cik aꞌrïkot oMiccie itti kwanthan ana okin thokat akin oprttakot tit akin opri ikkre oIuanna akkaka oMiccie.

AIuanna iꞌrekat kin appik itti, “Mpethet non mamuthie ngngꞌri, anaruk okkwi iponu puꞌran cannan nnaun panthan, mpakannekko nan manna itti mpakꞌro loꞌrak lowok wung. Kwethet non mamuthie ngKanang ikupupure ana nthik thothakkma.
Ana akwokkwo ton nnomïl akwïꞌrekat akwollakat liccit akwummo imoporot akunot ittit ana ton akwokꞌre nthik ithakinnio aththik.”
Ana oIuanna perekanthet ul lon loKapik loppot akwaꞌretto nakin itti okin thaprtto lon len cik.
Anaruk akka oIuanna paꞌrettot naIruthuc ili wonoththok poCelïl akka kwipot oIruthia pari popang ana nolon lꞌrek loppot ilokithak ila kwokkothe
ana oIruthuc papprarttat nolon ilokithak akka kwonekkethe oIuanna ikorrkkor.
Anakka ul wocceret mamuthie appik oIeccuo poccathe mamuthie cakuruk. Anakka kwokat cik akwaꞌra ngaꞌrama arothiꞌrot anyat.
AKanang ikupupure uat ntan naak kungkot cülükkür. Apoꞌre akkakat ntoKapik apiꞌre itti, “Oung ukul win ia mpongothe ana mpopiranet noka.”
OIeccuo ponat luput arrial ana attul (30) akka kwokuꞌret ngre ngung ncik tokït koul appik. Ittina ul wokat ame itti oIeccuo ukul woIuccip.
OIuccip ukul wEli,
Eli ukul woMaththathath,
oMaththathath ukul woLaui,
oLaui ukul woMelekki,
oMelekki ukul woIna,
oIna ukul woIuccip,
oIuccip ukul woMaththathia,
oMaththathia ukul wAmoc,
Amoc ukul woNaum,
oNaum ukul wAcceli,
Acceli ukul woNacai,
oNacai ukul woMath,
oMath ukul woMaththathia,
oMaththathia ukul woCcamai,
oCcamai ukul woCoccec,
oCoccec ukul woIotha,
oIoutha ukul woConan,
oConan ukul woRecca,
oRecca ukul woCerupapil,
oCerupapil ukul woCcaliththil,
oCcaliththil ukul woNiri,
oNiri ukul woMelekki,
oMelekki ukul wAthi,
Athi ukul woKkuccum,
oKkuccum ukul wAlmotham,
Almotham ukul woÏr,
oÏr ukul woCeccua,
oCeccua ukul wEliacir,
oEliacir ukul woIorim,
oIorim ukul woMaththathath,
oMaththathath ukul woLaui,
oLaui ukul woCcomoun,
oCcomoun ukul woIoutha,
oIoutha ukul woIuccip,
oIuccip ukul woConam,
oConam ukul wAliakkim,
Aliakkim ukul woMalia,
oMalia ukul woMinan,
oMinan ukul woMaththatha,
oMaththatha ukul woNathan,
oNathan ukul woThauth,
oThauth ukul woIecce,
oIecca ukul wOpet,
Opet ukul woPuac,
oPuac ukul woCalmon,
oCalmon ukul woNaccun,
oNaccun ukul wAminathap,
Aminathap ukul woRam,
oRam ukul wAccrun,
Accrun ukul woPparic,
oPparic ukul woIoutha,
oIoutha ukul woIakup,
oIakup ukul woIccaak,
oIccaak ukul wAprein,
Aprein ukul woThthera,
oThthera ukul woNaur,
oNaur ukul woCcoroc,
oCcoroc ukul woRau,
oRau ukul woPalec,
oPalec ukul wApir,
Apir ukul woCcela,
oCcela ukul woKinan,
oKinan ukul wArppakaccath,
Arppakaccath ukul woCcam,
oCcam ukul woNua,
oNua ukul woLamak,
oLamak ukul woMiththuccila,
oMiththuccila ukul wAnuk,
Anuk ukul woCarit,
oCarit ukul woMalalel,
oMalalel ukul woKkinan,
oKkinan ukul wAnuc,
Anuc ukul woCceth,
oCceth ukul wAtham,
Atham ukul woKapik.
OIeccuo ponat Kanang koKapik noka akka kwokkaprttakot nnorue irapangka toÜrüthün ana Kanang ikupupure kipathok ithampang ithonthomat

na pul pothopulut pennekkethok than maꞌri arrial weꞌra (40). OIeccuo papponat maꞌri arrial weꞌra (40) akkwocoꞌrot nothuꞌrit icïngkï ana ngkoꞌra ana akka kwocothothe maꞌri mothocoꞌro nothuꞌrit, kwokakathe piamat.
Apul pothopulut iꞌrekathok itti, “Amma oung ukul woKapik, iꞌrethe pothok empi apothakka arrakith.”
AIeccuo othïat tit itti, “Lokurrakot itti, ‘Pul iponyi pannikkoik narrakith tulluk.’
Apul pothopulut apponekathok noꞌra wocoꞌrong ana accokkot apokenekathok ngili ncik appik ngonocapu.
Apiꞌrekathok itti, “Mpethung ngili engi appik ana thrïk then akka ngettathin ana mpethet pul ipa mpongothe itti mpethet
ana amma ngkwaꞌranin ngaꞌrama ngili ngathakka ngang appik.”
AIeccuo othïanthok tit itti, “Lokurrakot itti, ‘Aꞌranet Ili, Kapik kang ngaꞌrama arekanthok pellek.’
Pul pothupulut ponekathok nokaꞌran koUruccelim ana noꞌra wonoppan toKapik, apul pothopulut iꞌrekathok itti, “Amma oung ukul woKapik orre ka kang nci cene.
Akka lokurrakot itti,
‘Kapik kathïot uꞌrupa wothothïlettat wung
angwothung papenang.
Ana waccinthung nyaun cik
akka tacok okkwo mpothok.’
AIeccuo othïanthok tit itti, “Liꞌrettat itti, ‘Kirrnni enekke Ili, Kapik kang.’
Anakka pul pothopulut pomarttot thennekke thung poththekathe naIeccuo itti kwappiothok caꞌri cꞌrek.
OIeccuo popakkathe noththok poCelïl mpuꞌran poKanang ikupupure ana lon lung lopettakatheik appik itti kwaat noththok.
Kwongkenekathe nomuththun maꞌrama ana ul appik womerekekathok.
Kwoingkathe nokaꞌran koNaccir na kupokkothe ana nocaꞌri caCcepith kwiꞌrikathe nocuththun caꞌrama ammakka kwokat akwokkettet. Ana kurokathe kapik akwakkakkaro lon nti iatham.
Akin ekathok atham wopul pothernte lon loKapik oIccaia. Akwanyat akwiat kaꞌran ikokurrakot nan itti,
“Kanang koIli kaik naun,
akka kakkarorin anerene ul lon iloporot iella alpꞌrek.
Kwothïothin anotherene ul iaik ikorrokkor lon lothelikkako
ana anyinthet ul kït iꞌrimathe
ana oꞌret ul iokwïettathe.
Ana Kapik kothïothin anathiꞌre itti thuput thung thaat itha kwoꞌret ul wung nan.”
Ittina akunukkwat atham, akwopakkekanthet pul ipethok akwikkat cik akwerenekin lon loKapik. Aul appik iokat cik nocuththun caꞌrama oceꞌrekat kït naak.
Akwiꞌrekat kin itti, “Lon latham enni inenni lothakkat ïcat ammakka nthoccïkothe.”
Aul ikkat cik aerethok lon loporot appik ana okin thoprttakathe tit nnolon iloporot ilaat nti ithon thung akin ikkat cik akin ipitto itti, “Okoronno oka ukul woIuccip enni?”

AIeccuo iꞌrekat kin itti, “Mpina ïcat itti onon thiꞌrethin lon elli itti, ‘Pul ipittiet ul, ittiethe ka kang cittokït, okkothe lon cene nokaꞌran kang ilanïn thoccïkothe itti ngkwokkothe nokaꞌran koKapprnaum.’”
Akwoꞌrungkat nolon akwere akwiꞌrekat itti, “Mpiꞌret non lon ilaik ïcat itti pul pothernte lon loKapik pannoka pongakothe nokaꞌran kung.
Mpapakkenthet non tit itti muruma mokat cik moppot noththok poIccereil nocaꞌri copul pothernte lon loKapik oIlia ana noluput ilꞌrapuruk ana appꞌrut tï toꞌratheik noththok.
Icci oIlia pappannothïlanthet pul pꞌrek nti akin anaruk Kapik kothïothok nocuruma icokat nokaꞌran ikoccot kꞌran itti Carepath noththok poCcithon.
Ana ul wokat cik woppot ionat ïnyï noka nocaꞌri copul pothernte lon loKapik, icci pul pellat nti iakin ipothikkiettat poporot oNaman ponoththok poCcuria tulluk.”
Anakka ul appik woccïkothe lon ila oIeccuo peret iokat nocuththun caꞌrama wuakathe ka.
Okin thurokathe akin othïathok thapat nti icarak coman akin onekathok noꞌra wocoꞌrong ica ul wokat wunot kaman othakka itti akwothorrettat nocapu ntan.
Anaruk kwokkathe icungkut coul akwoingkat.
Ittina kuathe thaiken nokaꞌran koKapprnaum noththok poCelïl ana caꞌri cokat caCcepith ana kwikkatheik akwongkene ul.
Okin thoprttakanthet thongkene thung tit akka lon lung lonat lon longili tit.
Nocuththun caꞌrama cen pul pꞌrek pokat cik pauꞌrupa iokithak woꞌrot nan akwekat kuri cittan, auꞌrupa iokithak iꞌrekat nti iaak itti,
“Ee Ieccuo poNaccir, ngintha akka ngkwongothe nanïn? Ngkwaththopeꞌriccot nïn ciki? Mpina itti oung okkwen, oung ipupupure ipa Kapik kothïothe.”
AIeccuo othirriekathok cik itti, “Angkik oppothe thapat nti iaak.” Ittina auꞌrupa iokithak orrekat pul nocapu tokït ken appik appat thapat nti iaak okorronno ipiek ka kongo.
Ul appik woprttakatherit ana akin erettarne itti, “Thongkene thointha enthi? Ngili ana puꞌran, kwiꞌret uꞌrupa iokithak lon ana waccïkothok ana woppathe thapat.”
Ana lon lung lopettakathe cik naꞌran appik nokaꞌran ken.
OIeccuo poththekathe nocuththun caꞌrama ana kwoingkathe thoCcamaangon. Opïthe poCcamaan ipopari pokat pongo akwango ippa ana okin thipittathe oIeccuo itti kwittarothok.
Ittina aIeccuo ikkat cik iccik kung akwothirriekat lü cik nti iaak alopaꞌrat cik. Kurokathe accokkot akwikkat cik akwokkinthet kin thuꞌrit.
Anakka cïngkï cokat cik acorungko, ul wonakanthet oIeccuo ul iongo mmio kurekkurek ana kwonnekkekathe nyaun nakin appik akwaꞌrakanthet kin ngaꞌrama ana okin thittakathe.

Uꞌrupa iokithak woppot woppopporekathe thapat nti iul mmpoꞌre cittan aiꞌre itti, “Oung ukul woKapik.” Anaruk oIeccuo pothirriekathekin cik ana kwakorronno okorronnat kin itti okin there akka okin thinarok itti ook oMiccie.
Ana akka cik cokattot, oIeccuo poingkathe nokaꞌran pellek. Ul wokat cik akwancothok anakka waat na kwokat okin thikkatheik akin oꞌramittothok cik itti kwannoththe nakin.
Anaruk oIeccuo piꞌrekathekin itti, “Mponu itti mpere lon iloporot longili ngoKapik naꞌran wꞌrek acakuruk, akka ilen akka mpothïlanthet.”
Ana kwikkatheik nocuththun caꞌrama noththok poIouthia akwere lon loKapik.
Caꞌri cꞌrek cokat cik aIeccuo pokat cik akwocoꞌro iccik korok irapangka toCeniccarth aul oꞌrntüttothok accïkot lon loKapik
Kwimmakathe uppuꞌrung wonoiꞌri weꞌra nokuthuthu korok irapangka aul iangwo ape woththet nan ana wokat cik aime loꞌrak iliꞌriththako nape.
Kwarrathe ikuppuꞌrung kulukku ikokat koCcamaan ana kwipittathok itti kwathothakkaret papotteik nokuthuthu korok irapangka ana kwikkatheik tit akwongkene ul.
Anakka kwomarttot lon kwiꞌrekathe oCcamaan itti, “Othakkarethe kuppuꞌrung konoiꞌri ipnan porok arret loꞌrok lape iꞌri aiꞌriththa ape.”
ACcamaan othïanthok tit itti, “Pul ipangkene, onïn thorekot cannan nokkꞌrokkꞌra ana onïn thanniꞌriththa papꞌrek. Anaruk mparret loꞌrok laape iꞌri ammakka ngkwiꞌret.”
Anakka okin thorrethe loꞌrok iꞌri ammakka kwiꞌrethekin okin thiꞌriththakathe ape woppot aloꞌrok lape ikkat cik ere lammotta.
Ittina akin akkarat opaththon then thꞌrek ithokat ikuppuꞌrung kꞌrek itti okin thanthan akin athittarot kin, akin akkakat akin oppeppekat ape uppuꞌrung aureꞌra aikkat cik ere wuo thoꞌronthong.
Anakka oCcamaan oPoththuruc pimmat menik akwirrat cik tokït koIeccuo akwiꞌrekat itti, “Opaꞌrik nti iccik kin, Ili, akka oun pul ipokithak.”
Akka ook ana opilingon ithakin thokat ithun thoprttakatherit nothiꞌriththa thaape iakin thiꞌriththat.
OIakup ana oIuanna thokat nyukul nyoCepethi, okin thokat akin ongutte ape okin oCcaimon. Okin thoprttakatherit cakuruk.
AIeccuo iꞌrekat oCcamaan itti, “Kirrnni ipo nꞌre nciki inenni ngkwaka pul pothiꞌriththa ul.”
Ittina okin thothathe uppuꞌrung wonoiꞌri nomarkan morok irapangka akin oththekat naꞌrupu appik akin omakathok.

Anakka oIeccuo pokat cik nokaꞌran kꞌrek koricarak coman, apul akkakat cïnang ponat ïnyï noka. Akka pimmat oIeccuo apekat ungku ncik ana toca ncik apipittathok itti, “Ili, amma oung akkongothe ana ngkwittiethin.”
AIeccuo othiekat ukun akwothanthok akwiꞌrekat itti, “Mpongothe itti mpittiethung, othakka poporot.” Ittina aïnyï ittakanthok accokkot.

Ittina aIeccuo iꞌrekathok lon lonthomat itti, “Kirrnni iꞌret pul pꞌrek lon elli anaruk ngko athokene pul ponoppan toKapik ka kang akiat papu pothokiot nguccuk cik ammakka oMucca piꞌret akenekin itti ngkwothakkat poporot.”
Ana lon loIeccuo lappaththakatheik cannan itti kwaik pittiet ul ana ul wakkakathe athoccïkot lon lung ana othakka thoporot nomio men.
Anaruk oIeccuo pikkatheik akwoththeththe noul akweo nokaꞌran pellek akwothaꞌra ngaꞌrama.

Caꞌri cokat cik aIeccuo pokat akwongkene, aul woPriccin ana ul iangkene lon lothonceꞌret lon cik akkakat naꞌran appik wonoththok poCelïl ana poIouthia ana nokaꞌran koUruccelim ana okin thokat cik akin ikkoik iccik kung cinang. Ana Ili wekathok puꞌran akwittiet ul iongo.
Ul wꞌrek iomura wakkakathe anneko pul ipakimico naꞌrangkal ana okin thennekkekathe itti okin thiꞌrikok ngngin noppan akin onekkethok cik tokït koIeccuo.

Okin thakinniat kathar ikakin iꞌrikok ngngin noppan akka cungkut coul cokat coppot, okin thokuꞌrathe toꞌra woman akin anyathe man ntoꞌra akin orpekat pul naꞌrangkal ia kwokat cik akwïcat cik nan tokït koIeccuo icungkut coul.
Akka oIeccuo pimmat thoccokot tholon loKapik nomïkït men kwiꞌrekathe kimico itti, “Puruko pin, lon lang ilokithak loccïkakothe.”
Aul woPriccin ana ul iangkene lon lothonceꞌret lon cik ikkat cik aeret nomïkït itti, “Oththa empi pacungko Kapik? Pul pella paccïkïnthet ul lon, Kapik kulluk.”
OIeccuo pinakathe lon ilakin thokat cik akin okwarttikot akwipittat kin itti, “Nthontha akka annokwarttikot lon elli nomïkït mon?
Liatha akkoporot itti liꞌretta itti, ‘Lon ilokithak lang loccïkakothe’ ana amma okkorronno oka menik mpiꞌre itti, ‘Urokothe kapik aeoi’?
Anaruk othakka itti annina itti ukul wopul iponyi wonu puꞌran nocapu itti waccïkïnthet ul lon ilokithak,” akwiꞌrekat pul ipakimico itti, “Mpiꞌrethung itti urokothe kapik aneko aꞌrangkal aeo tuan.”
Akurokat accokkot akwocoꞌrat tokït ken, akwonekat aꞌrangkal ia kwokat cik akwïcat cik nan akwoingkat taun akkwopiranet Kapik noka.
Ul appik wikkatheik aprttakot tit iokat cik cïnang akin opirakanthet Kapik noka. Okin thonat nꞌre akin iꞌrekat itti, “Onïn thimmat lon lommaththik inenni.”

Akka oIeccuo pothikkiet kimico koporot, kwoppathe thapat akwoingkat akwimmakat pul ipaꞌrntot akucci noul poccot kꞌran itti oLaui akkwaik nokaꞌran koul iaꞌrntinthet nili akucci, aIeccuo iꞌrekathok itti, “Omakothin.”
ALaui urokat kapik, akwoththekat naꞌrupu appik akwomakathok.
Ittina oLaui pokkanthet oIeccuo thuꞌrit tuan thanung ana ul woppot iaꞌrntinthet nili akucci ana opilingon thokat cik akin oꞌrkoik okin aththut,

Anaruk ul woPriccin ana ul iangkene lon lothonceꞌret lon cik woPriccin wikkathe cik aꞌretto noul iammakot oIeccuo itti, “Ngintha akka annoꞌrikineik nul iaꞌrntinthet nili akucci ana ul wolon ilokithak?”
OIeccuo pothïanthet kin tit itti, “Annoka ul ioporot akkongothe itti wittiettat anaruk ul iongo.
Mpakannao anathakkaro ul ioporot anaruk mpainet ul wolon ilokithak aine Kapik.”
Aul wꞌrek iꞌrekat oIeccuo itti, “Ul iammakot oIuanna waancoꞌro nothuꞌrit ana aꞌra ngaꞌrama ana cakuruk ul iammakot lon loul woPriccin anaruk ul wang iammakothung waik waꞌrkoik ana ïkkoik.”
OIeccuo popakkenthet kin tit itti, “Onon thaceꞌrene purukon thopul ipipo nothuꞌrit apul ipipo paik ithoꞌrkït theni?
Anaruk caꞌri canthan, nomaꞌri men amma pul ipipo ponekittat ntokït kin, akin antocoꞌro nothuꞌrit.”
AIeccuo iꞌrekat kin lon nthokkwie kuru ncik itti, “Pul pella pillo kret ikie apokkwo cït nthan ngkret ikïpe. Amma kwokkothe menik kwillo kret ikie akka kret ikie kannokattakot ngkret ikïpe.
Ana pul pella pipot thrupa ikaꞌruk ikïpe. Amma kwipotherit ana thinya ana thillo kaꞌruk ana kakittako.
Thrupa thonu itti thittat ikaꞌruk ikie ikokkattathe nouꞌrat.
Ana pul pella ipïkko ngapak ingïpe ana ïkko angꞌrek ingie ana kwiꞌrekathe itti, ‘Ngapak ingïpe akkoporot nangie.’”
Nocaꞌri cꞌrek cokat cik caCcepith aIeccuo pokkot ikkwon imïl ana ul iammakothok wikkatheik auot mïl ana ocottot akin oꞌrko.
Aul wꞌrek woPriccin ipittat itti, “Onon thontha akka annokkot lon ilonu itti lakannokkattat nocaꞌri caCcepith?”
OIeccuo popakkenthet kin tit itti, “Onon thakannakkakkaro lon nti iatham ila aThauth pappokkothe akka okin thokat thiamat nul wungi?
Kwiꞌrikot noppan toKapik akwummat arrakith iothun iettathe Kapik iokat itti ul wulluk wonoppan toKapik akkaꞌrko akwoꞌrkkat ana kwekathe ul wung cakuruk ana woꞌrkkathe.”
Menik aIeccuo iꞌrekat kin itti, “Ukul wopul iponyi akka Ili wocaꞌri caCcepith.”
Ana nocaꞌri cꞌrek caCcepith akwoingkat nocuththun caꞌrama ana kwokat cik akwongkene ana pul pokat cik than ponat ukun wothothari waiꞌrilla.
Ul woPriccin ana ul iangkene lon lothonceꞌret lon cik wokat cik akwancot lon ilakin orukwet oIeccuo ngngin, menik akin ikkat cik akin okathaccek kicce amma akwittiet pul nocaꞌri caCcepith.
Anaruk oIeccuo pinat lon len ilakin thonat nomïkït men ana kwiꞌrekathe pul iponat ukun waiꞌrilla itti, “Urokothe kapik tokït koul.” Ana kurokathe kapik akwocoꞌrat.

Ittina aIeccuo iꞌrekat kin itti, “Mpipittot non lon, liatha akkocoꞌrotheik itti lakkattat nocaꞌri caCcepith, itti okkot iloporori? Ana amma okorronno okkot iloporot ana ilokithaki? Okkie pul ciki ana amma okorronno okkie cik okkwori?”
AIeccuo okathakat kin appik akwiꞌrekat pul itti, “Othie ukun ntit.” Apul okkat menik aukun othakkakat woporot kirrkkir.
Anaruk okin thaththuaka ana okin thikkatheik akin erettarane itti okin thakkot ngimpen naIeccuo.
Caꞌri cen oIeccuo pokuꞌrathe tocoꞌrong akwothaꞌra ngaꞌrama ana kwaꞌrakathe ngaꞌrama nokkꞌrokkꞌra.
Akka ngorrot ngothakkat, akwakkarat ul iammakothok ana kwipathe ul cik iattul ana ikken keꞌra, okin then itha kwothikkiet ul wothothïlettat
ana ꞌran wen itti, oCcamaan (iponat kꞌran itti oPoththuruc) ana opang Anthrauc, ana oIakup ana oIuanna, ana oPilippic ana oPerththolomauc
ana oMaththa ana oThthoma ana oIakup ukul wAlappaoc, ana oCcamaan ipokat pongothe lon loththok pung,
ana oIoutha ukul woIakup, ana oIoutha Icikkariuththi ipokerathe oIeccuo nili.

Kuathe ntan nnocoꞌrong akin oul wung iammakothok akin ocoꞌrat nothampang. Ul iammakothok wokat cik woppot ana ul cakuruk woppot iaat nnoththok poIouthia ana nokaꞌran koUruccelim ana naꞌran iaik iccik korok irapangka toCcur ana toCcithon,
okin ithaat itti okin thathoccïkot lon lung ana ittiettat nomio men. Okkwion itha uꞌrupa iokithak wokkiethe thiak appik thittakathe.
Ana ul appik wannekkekathe itti wathntok akka puꞌran pokat cik apanthan nti iaak apittiet kin appik.
Akwokathakat ul iammakothok akwiꞌrekat itti,
“Thethïetta thaka thon onon ithella aꞌrupu cik akka ngili ngoKapik ngaka ngon.
Thethïetta thaka thon onon ithiamat inenni
akka onon thaththakat.
Thethïetta thaka thon onon ithaik thoo inenni,
akka onon thathocciro.
Thethïetta thaka thon amma ul wꞌrat non
ana ꞌra non nti iccik ken ana ocungko non
ana ꞌra ꞌran won nti ilon lokkul wopul iponyi.
Nopira noka caꞌri cen ana iththrako akka thocco thon tholon iloporot thaka thrïk tothiꞌrot. Akka kathar ken ika aththangon thokkinthet ul wothernte lon loKapik lon ngngin.
Anaruk angkre, ul ithathaꞌrathn
akka onon thoccot lon lon pꞌrïn.
Angkre, nanon ithoththakathe inenni,
akka onon thathiama.
Angkre, nanon onon ithaik thacciro inenni,
akka onon thathoccokot thiak ana oo.
Angkre, nanon amma ul omereket non,
akka oththangon thokat akin omereket ul wothernte lon loKapik ngkarra.”
“Anaruk mpiꞌret non okkwion ithaccïkothin, nongat ul iꞌrat non, nokkinthet ul iꞌrat non lon loporot.
Nipittot Kapik akethïe ul iattatta non, naꞌrane ul ngꞌrama iakkinthet non lon ilokithak.
Amma pul pꞌrek pokkworung thounu, appoprttinok thounu thꞌrek ana amma opilin ponekothung kret ikiththia ikakuꞌrupakot, korronnok akwoneko kret konoka cakuruk.
Ethet okkwi ipipittothung aꞌrupu ia kwongothe ana amma opilin ponekothung papꞌrek pang akorronno okkaprttothok.
Nokkinthet ul lon ammakka onon thongothe itti wakkinthet non.
Amma ngkwongothe ul iongothung, thocco tholon iloporot thang thaka thiatha ithakanung cik? Akka manna ul ionu lon ilokithak wangat ul iongothekin.
Ana amma ngkwokkinthet ul lon loporot iakkinthung lon iloporot lang liatha ilathokanung cik? Akka manna ul ionu lon ilokithak waik wakkot menik cakuruk.

Ana amma ngkwethet pul pꞌrek aꞌrupu wokamucu mono aꞌrikothok itti kwakkenung kamucu kang kiatha ikakanung cik naak? Akka manna ul ionu lon ilokithak wakkene ul aꞌrupu akin oꞌrïkat cik itti okin thakketta appik.

Anaruk ongathe ul iꞌrarung ana okkinthet kin lon loporot, ethet kin aꞌrupu akorronno oꞌrïkot cik itti okin thakkarttinung, ittina thocco tholon iloporot thon thaka thrïk ana onon thaka nyukul nyoKapik ikaik cittothiꞌrot akka kwoporot lon noul iakannopiranok noka ana iokithak.
Ona thiak ammakka Kapik oththe pon ponu thiak.”
“Amma ngkwakorronno ethet ul wꞌrek lon moloko ana ngkwakorronno ethettat lon moloko. Amma ngkwannakkma ul wꞌrek ana ngkwannakkmako. Noccïkïnthet ul lon ilokithak alon lon occïkakot.
Amma onon thethet ul aꞌrupu ana onon thethettat cakuruk. Akka amma ngkwethet aꞌrupu nuthuk ana ngkwiot woppot ntit cakuruk.”
AIeccuo iꞌrekat lon elli okkwienekin kuru ncik itti, “Pul ipiꞌrimathe pathutho pul ipiꞌrimathei? Okin thakannapot ippu aththuththeꞌrai?
Akka pul ipangkenetta pakannoka prïk nakkwi ipangkenek. Anaruk okkwi ipongkenettat kicce paka ammakka pul ipongkenerok.
Ngkwontha akka accot kït nokwira ikaik icït copangkang akorronno occot kït nokwoꞌren ikaik icït cang?

Taththa akka amet opangkang itti, ‘Pangkin, kirrnni anumminung kwira nti icït cang,’ angkwakinnimma kwoꞌren icït cang? Oung ipongothe itti ngkwinnikot lon, ummi kwoꞌren nti icït cang cittokït aimmaik kicce antummine opangkang kwira nti icït cung.”
“Pira pella ipoporot pakwono nyukul nyokithak ana pira pella ipokithak pakwono nyukul nyoporot.
Kira kurekkurek kinako nyukul nyen inyakokwono. Ul wakinniththo ïce nopira polï ana moꞌriompong nopira pakek.
Pul ipoporot pere lon iloporot nolon iloporot ilaik nocïkït cung, pul ipokithak pere lon ilokithak nolon ilokithak ilaik nocïkït cung. Akka thon there lon iloppathe nocïkït.”
“Nthontha akka annakkaron itti, ‘Ili, Ili,’ anon okorronno okkot ila aniꞌret non?
Okkwi ipainin mono occïkot lon lin ana akworeko ngngin, mpakenenon itti lon len laka tat.
Kwaka ere pul ipokat cik apuno man ana pipanthet millang cik nocik icoporot. Akka ngike ngaat ana ngokkwathe man ngka anaruk ngannoꞌrïntïttat akka mokat muntat papenang.

Anaruk okkwi ipaccïkot lon lin ana akwokorronno oreko ngngin, kwikkoik ere pul ipunot man mung nothampang nuthuk okorronno ipinthet millang cik nouttu, ana akka ngike ngaat angokkwat man ngka amapat thapo thokïtheththak.”
Anakka oIeccuo pocothothe lon elli aul occïkot, kwiꞌrikathe nokaꞌran koKapprnaum.
Ana kwaththiat pul iparekine ili woul arrial ukuluk irro woRoma ipa kwokat pongothe cannan appongo ana pikkoik ere pio.
Aili occïkat lon loIeccuo athïanthok ul wꞌrek ittïttïk woul woIouth itti kwanthan akwathittienthok pul iparekinok.
Anakka ul wen woinet oIeccuo akin erekanthok thiaththiak itti, “Pul empi pekkot nan itti ngkwittienthet ukul.
Akka kwongothe ul wonnon woIouth ana manna kuninet ton cuththun caꞌrama.”

Ittina aIeccuo oingkat okin aththungon. Akka oIeccuo okko iccik koman moili, aili woul arrial ukuluk irro othïat opurukon okin othiꞌret oIeccuo itti, “Ili, kirrnni okinya itti ngkwanthan akka mpakannekko nan itti ngkwiꞌriko noppan thanin.
Ilen akka mpokathat ka kin itti mpakanneko nan itti mpainung. Anaruk iꞌre lon tulluk ana pul iparekinin pathakka poporot.

Oun cakuruk paik inyaun nyoili wꞌrek ana mponu ul waik inyaun nyin. Mpiꞌret okkwempi itti, ‘Ngko’ ana kwaeo, ana okkwempꞌre itti, ‘Aꞌrik’ ana kwao, ana mpiꞌret pul iparekinin itti, ‘Okkothe elli’ ana kwakkot.”

Akka oIeccuo poccïkothe elli akwoprttakat tit nolon loili akwolliakat ul iokat cik ammakothok akwiꞌrekat itti, “Mpiꞌret non itti mpakanniot thoccokot tholon loKapik nocïkït thena ammakka thoili enni manna noththok poIccereil.”
Ittina aul iokat cik wothïlathe opakkat tuan okin othiat pul iparekine ili appothakkat poporot.
Ittina papotteik aIeccuo oingkat icarak coman icoccot kꞌran itti Nain akin oul iammakothok ana cungkut coul woppot icomakothekin.
Manakka okin okko ci tocürük coricarak coman, acungkut coul akkakat ngngeme ana mpul ipiot, ukul iokat iulukkuppu nannan ana onnan pokat curuma.
Akka Ili oIeccuo pimmat pul ipopari pen, kwipathe thiak then cannan ana kwiꞌrekathok itti, “Kirrnni oo.”
Ana kwoingkathe iccik kopul ipiot akwothntat kuppuꞌrung ikonat kumi nan aul iokat cik anneko ocoꞌrat. AIeccuo iꞌrekat kumi itti, “Mpiꞌrethung itti oung emprïk ipokuꞌrit urokwothe kapik.”
Apul ipappiot urokat kapik apikkat cik apere, aIeccuo iꞌrekat pul ipopari itti, “Ipi ukul wang.”

Akin irrat mïkït nti ikarak appik akin opirakanthet Kapik noka akin iꞌrekat itti, “Pul pothernte lon loKapik iprïk pummothe ncik ithoꞌrkït thonnon inenni.” Akin iꞌrekat itti, “Kapik kaat kaththittarot ul wung.”
Lon elli loIeccuo lappaththakatheik noththok poIouthia appik ana naꞌran appik.
Ul woIuanna iammakothok werekanthet oIuanna lon len appik ana aIuanna pakkarathe ul iammakothok weꞌra
ana kwothïathekin noIli akin othipittothok itti, “Oung oMiccie ipa oIuanna piꞌret itti kwaik panthani ana amma okorronno oka oung, onïn thaꞌrïkot opilin pꞌrek paik panthani?”

Akka ul waat naIeccuo okin thiꞌrekathe itti, “OIuanna pomamuthie pothïothenïn itti onïn thipittothung itti, ‘Oung oMiccie ipanïn thaik thaꞌrïkori ana amma okorronno oka oung, onïn thaꞌrïkot opilin pꞌreki?’”
Caꞌri cen oIeccuo pappittiethe ul iongat mmio ana okïcce uꞌrupa iokithak noul ana immiek ul cik woppot iokat cik wiꞌrimathe.

Akwiꞌrekat ul ia oIuanna pappothïothe itti, “Ngkonon opakkot annothiꞌret oIuanna lon ilanon thoccïkothe ana ilanon thimmat, ul ïꞌrïmathe wimmat cik ana iaimico waik wanyaro ana ionat ïnyï noka wittiettathe ana ul iokat nuril waik waccïkot cik ana okin ithillet thurokiettat nti ithio ana lon iloporot loKapik lerettanet ul iella aꞌrupu wꞌrek.
Thethïeko thaka noul iakannopaꞌrine lon lin cik.”

Akka ul weot iammakot oIuanna, oIeccuo pikkatheik akwerene cungkut coul lon loIuanna akwiꞌrekat kin itti, “Kathakka onon thoinet oIuanna ithampang ithonthomara, ngintha akka onon thoinet itti onon thathimma? Pul iponyi ipaprtto lon cik ere taco torithampang ithonthomat irukwit tukwit ira kanang kaik kauꞌrei?

Onon theot thaththokatha ngintha? Pul pakot eret wopeththerei? Ana ul manna iako eret ialio ana iikkoik thikkoik thothaꞌrthan ana waka ikaman ikopeththere ana wikkoik naꞌran woporot ana wonu aꞌrupu appik.
Anaruk ngintha akka onon thoinet itti onon thathokatha? Pul pothernte lon loKapiki? Mpiꞌret non itti ïï anaruk pul empi prïk nopul pothernte lon loKapik.
Ook ipa atham werethe itti,
‘Mpathïot pul pothothïlettat pin tokït kang
okkwi ipathokuccenthung kathar cik.’
Pul pella ipokwontat nocapu cene appik iprïk naIuanna anaruk okkwi ipotteik nti iul worothiꞌrot kwrïk naIuanna.”
Ul ioccïkothe lon loIuanna appik ana ul anganna iaꞌrntinthet nili akucci okin akkokat ithoccokathe lon loKapik ila Kapik kongothe itti lakkattat ana okin thoccot mamuthie nti ikkun woIuanna.
Anaruk ul woPriccin ana ul iangkene lon lothonceꞌret lon cik loul wꞌrat occïkot Kapik ana lon lung ana okin thannocco mamuthie nti ikkun woIuanna.
OIeccuo pappiriꞌrekat itti, “Mpungkwie ul enni ngngintha? Okin thammakka ngintha?
Okin thaik ere nyukul inyarran nyaik nyikkoik keccuk anyerene opangon mpoꞌre cittan akin ome itti,
‘Onïn thaik thangwine non kinye koremekkin
ana onon thaik thakorronno ukko,
onïn theet ngeme
ana onon thaik thakorronno oo.’
Akka oIuanna pomamuthie paat akkwokat cik akwannortteik ana ïkko ngapak, akin omekathok itti, ‘Kwonu uꞌrupa iokithak.’

Ana ukul wopul iponyi waat aꞌrko thuꞌrit ana ïkko ngapak ana onon thiꞌret itti, ‘Kwonu kïnyït kothuꞌrit ana kwongothe ngapak, ana ook opuruko poul iaꞌrntinthet nili akucci ana opuruko poul wolon ilokithak.’
Anaruk ul appik iammakot wokenet itti thinaik nti ica thinako ngngre ngen.”
Menik apul pꞌrek poul woPriccin akkarat oIeccuo tuan itti okin thathoꞌrko thuꞌrit, akwoingkat tuan topul poPriccin ana kwikkatheik othïngkakot kriki kothokkun wothokure iccik kokuppuꞌrung kothuꞌrit.
Ana nokaꞌran ken pul ipopari pꞌrek pokat cik than ipalle nul nuthuk, kwokat pinat nan itti oIeccuo paik paꞌrko thuꞌrit tuan topul poPriccin, ittina kwonakathe ngaak ngamutha ncuꞌru.
Anakka pokat apocoꞌro thoccul koIeccuo noracok tung akwoo angeme ngung oththapat noracok akwikkat cik akukukkwinthok ngeme noracok nuwan wung ana kwikkatheik akuntenthok ngaak ngamutha nan.

Akka pul poPriccin ipakkarothe oIeccuo tuan pimmat pul ipopari akka apokkot, akwiꞌrekat noucce wung itti, “Amma pul empi pappokat pul pothernte lon loKapik ïcat painat itti pul ipopari empi pia ipaathntok ana pokithak polon ilokithak.”
AIeccuo opakkekanthok tit itti, “Camaan mponu loꞌrek laniꞌrethung.”
ACcamaan othïanthok tit itti, “Pul ipangkene, iꞌrethin.”
AIeccuo iꞌrekathok itti, “Pul pꞌrek pappethet ul weꞌra akucci ngkamucu itti okin thathopakkenthok, opilin poccot arrial ukuluk maꞌri ukuluk (500) ana opilin arrial weꞌra ana alkaire (50).
Aul aureꞌra ommakat okkene pul iponat okucci nakin. Apul okkanthet kin ntit.” AIeccuo ipittat itti, “Oththa nti akin akkangat pul ipokkinet kin nti akucci cannan ntiakin aththuththeꞌra?”
ACcamaan othïat tit itti, “Okkwi ipa kwokkinet ntit iponat woppot.”
AIeccuo omekathok itti, “Ngkwothïotherit oceꞌret cik papenang.”

AIeccuo okathakat pul ipopari akwiꞌrekat oCcamaan itti, “Ngkwimmat pul ipopariri? Mpaat tuan thanang. Ngkwannethin ngꞌri ngoththeik anilakko ntacok anaruk pul ipopari empi pimethin tacok ngngeme ngorïkït kung ana ukukkwothin tacok nuan wung.
Ngkwannommiccon papenang ammakka mpaat tuan thanang anaruk ammakka pul ipopari empi paat pannocoꞌro nti ithokatha lon lin.
Anaruk oung ngkwannoꞌrokin manna ngaak ica anaruk kunothin ngaak ngamutha noracok.
Ilen akka aniꞌrenthung itti lon ilokithak lung loppot loccïkakinthok akka thongat thung thoppot cannan anaruk okkwi ipoccïkakïnthet lon ilokithak lotte ponu thongat thotte.”
Ittina aIeccuo iꞌrekat pul ipopari itti, “Ngko mpoccïkïnthung lon ilokithak lang.”
Aul ikkot cik nokuppuꞌrung kothuꞌrit wikkatheik aerekot nomikït men itti, “Oththa empi manna ipaccïkïnthet ul lon ilokithak?”
AIeccuo iꞌrekat pul ipopari itti, “Thoccokot lon loKapik nocïkït thang akkopaꞌrenung lon ilokithak lang cik ana ngkwaeo pupupure.”
Anakka lon len lomttathe oIeccuo poingkathe onyaro nomoꞌrong ammakka maik akwongkene ul lon iloporot longili ngoKapik ana ul wung wothothïlettat iattul ana ikken keꞌra wokat cik akin aththut.
Ana cakuruk ul iari wꞌrek ia kwokïccet uꞌrupa iokithak nan ana ia kwittiethe nomio ammakka oMeriom iponat kꞌran itti oMacthelia okkwi ipa oIeccuo pokïccet uꞌrupa iokithak nan weꞌreꞌrapuruk.
Ana oIona opari poKucci ook iponu lon ikkun loruan toIli oIruthuc, ana oCuccana ana opilingon thꞌrek thoppot. Ul iari enni wokat aittarot kin llon ilakin thongothe.
Anakka ul wokat cik aꞌrntakot mungkut mungkut naꞌran woppot kurekkurek oIeccuo perekanthet kin lon nthokkwie lon kuru ncik.
“Pul pokkwon peot itti pathee, akka kwokat akwee mïl, amꞌrek apukkat ikathar aul ocukkarat cik auꞌrupe ocumat appik.
Amꞌrek apukkat nokꞌrimi akka mummothe acïngkï okꞌrekat akka ngun ngellat nan.
Amïl mꞌrek apukkat ithoꞌrkït tholï akka mocokkat alï okiꞌrittat cik amillekat.
Ana icci amꞌrek mapukkathe nocapu icoporot. Mummathe amokwonat mïl mipiet kicce, kït ken arrial ukuluk (100).”
Akka kwiꞌret elli, akwappiꞌrekat mpoꞌre cittan itti, “Okkwi iponu unu itti kwaccïkot akwoccïkot.”
Aul iammakothok ipittathok itti lon lothokkwie lon kuru ncik elli lonu itti ngintha?
AIeccuo iꞌrekat kin itti, “Onon thokenettat kumitta kongili ngoKapik anaruk ul wꞌrek wakenetta lon nthokkwie lon kuru ncik.
‘Okin thakathacceik anaruk okin thakannimma,
okin thaccïkot anaruk okin thakannina.’
“Lon elli ilakene lon lothokkwietta kuru ncik lonu itti, cïl lon loKapik.
Mïl imapukkothe ikathar mungkwot okkwion ithaccïkot lon loKapik ana pul pothopulut panthan aponekat kin nomïkït othakka itti akin okorronno occokot lon loKapik nomïkït akin oꞌrettat.

Ana imapukkothe nokꞌrimi mungkwot ul ioccokothe lon loKapik nomïkït nthopira noka anaruk akka lon lakannoccokot cik nomïkït, lon len lakinnikkoik puccuk. Okin thoccokot lon nomïkït papotte anaruk amma thokkiettat thiak thainet kin ana okin thapaꞌrine cik.

Mïl imapukkothe ilï mungkwot ul ioccïkothe lon loKapik ana akka akin ikkoik, thirro mïkït nti ikarak tholon lothikkoik lonocapu ana thaꞌrthan ana thopira noka thaꞌrupu wonocapu thanomot kin cik akin okorronno upokkat ilon loKapik.
Anaruk mïl imapukkothe nocapu icoporot mungkot okkwion ithaccïkothe lon loKapik akin oꞌrumat nan nomïkït appang akin okkat lon iakin iloporot ana lakwono pangken.”
“Pul pella paccie cuꞌru cothik ithacco akwantokuꞌrupot cerok nan ana manna onekket thoceken copapꞌrek akwokorronno onekket noꞌret othakka itti aul immaik iꞌriko noppan.
Akka lon ilamuꞌruttakot linako nan ana ilocukkwakot nan littako ncik ana manna oka attattar.
Ittina nokkwo kunu ncik papenang. Okkwi ipaccïkot lon lin, kwarttakinthet nan, kwina arttot nan. Anaruk okkwi ipannoccïkot lon lin, ila kwina lotteik lanekittathok.”
Onnan poIeccuo ana opangon thakkakanthok akin othokathak, anaruk okin thanniat kathar ikakin immak ngngin akka cungkut coul cokat cik coppot.
Apilin iꞌrekat oIeccuo itti, “Onne okin opangkangon thaik thapat thaik thakwariccathung.”
AIeccuo othïat tit itti, “Ongaia ana opangkingon okin ul iaccïkot lon loKapik akin okkat lon len.”
Caꞌri cꞌrek cokat cik aIeccuo iꞌrekat ul iammakothok itti, “Ntun arrot tomarakan mꞌrek morok irapangka.” Okin tharrathe ikuppuꞌrung ana okin thoingkathe.

Akka okin eo ngkuppuꞌrung konoiꞌri oIeccuo poingkathe inthe. Kanang kakkakathe norok irapangka akokkuro akatta cik akuppuꞌrung konoiꞌri ikkat cik ere kuo thoꞌronthong ana okin thokakatheik ithiak ithokithak.
Ul iammakothok woingkathe ana wurttathok aiꞌrekathok itti, “Pul ipangkene, pul ipangkene, oron thaik thathïkïkko ngꞌri.”
Kurokathe kapik akwothirriekat kanang kokapik cik ana thopangka thoiꞌri cik acik okkwat ka cik appik.
AIeccuo ipittat ul iammakothok itti, “Thoccokot lon loKapik nomïkït mon thaik kartha?”
Aul wung iammakothok ikkat cik aipittararot lon nnꞌre itti, “Oththa empi? Kwothirriethe kanang kokapik cik ana ngꞌri ana lon lung loccïkakathe.”
Ana okin thoingkathe akin arrat tok cik irapangka tonocik coCcethirin icaik arrot cik noththok poCelïl.

Manakka oIeccuo porpotheik nocarkan corok irapangka akwocurat ipul ponat uꞌrupa iokithak ipa pokat nokaꞌran koCcethirin. Pul pen ponu luput loppot appokat cik apikikkoik cunthut ana kwannikikkoik tuan anaruk kwokat cik akwikikkoik nonupu.
Manakka kwimmat oIeccuo akwekat ngeme, akwapat iracok tung akwiꞌrekat mpoꞌre cittan itti, “Ieccuo ukul woKapik korothiꞌrot, ngintha akka ngkwongothe naun? Occïkothin korronno occokiethin thiak.”

Akka oIeccuo pokat piꞌrethe uꞌrupa iokithak itti wappot thapat nti ipul. Uꞌrupa iokithak wawokat cik apukko naak ana manna aul ïꞌrïkïkkok tacok ana nyaun ana akwanguttat anaruk kwokat akwommotho nyol inya kwïꞌrïkïkkakot ngngin ana uꞌrupa iokithak wokat aittethok ithampang thapat.
AIeccuo ipittat pul pen itti, “Ngkwoccot kꞌran itti oththa?”
Apothïat tit itti, “Kꞌran kin itti ‘cungkut’ akka onïn thoppot.”
Auꞌrupa iokithak ipittat oIeccuo lon thiaththiak itti kirrnni othïot kin thothïrïn.
Ana cungkut conuththuruk cokat cik cïnang iccik kocoꞌrong anuꞌro. Ana uꞌrupa iokithak wipittathe oIeccuo itti kwakorronno kin akin iꞌriko inuththuruk ana oIeccuo poccïkanthet kin.
Akka uꞌrupa iokithak woppothe thapat nti ipul, wiꞌrikikkathe inuththuruk ana nuththuruk noccorathe uo nokuthut korok anorttapat iꞌri ana nïkïkkathe ngꞌri.
Cïnang ul iokat cik auꞌre nuththuruk wimmat akka nuththuruk nillet okin thollathe kiththik akin othiꞌrekat ul icarak coman ana iaik nomipit.

Ana ul wakkakathe thapat athokatha lon len ilokat cik. Akka okin thaat iccik koIeccuo okin thaththiat pul ipapponat uꞌrupa iokithak noka aweot nti iaak ana kwokat akwikkoik iccik koIeccuo akkwakot eret ana akkwoporot ca ana okin thonat nꞌre.
Okkwion ithaththimmat lon len therekanthet ul lon tat akka oIeccuo pothikkiet pul iponu uꞌrupa iokithak poporot.
Menik aul appik wonocik coCcethirin omekat oIeccuo itti kwapaꞌroik noththok pen akka nꞌre noꞌrot nakin. Ittina aIeccuo arrat ikuppuꞌrung konoiꞌri akwoingkat.
Apul ipa uꞌrupa iokithak wokat woꞌrot nan ummat akwipittat oIeccuo itti okin thaeo akin aththungon anaruk oIeccuo popakkekanthok tit itti,
“Opakkothe tuan athiꞌret ul appik lon ila Kapik kokkinthung.” Ittina pul popakkathe ana paththerekanthet ul nokaꞌran engkꞌre appik lon ila oIeccuo pokkinthok.
Manakka oIeccuo pokkaprattakot nokaꞌran koKapprnaum attang na kwapparrothe ngngin, ul wopirakanthok noka cannan akka okin thokat cik akin oꞌrïkothok.
Ittina apul pꞌrek poccot kꞌran itti oIairoc ipokat ili wonocuththun caꞌrama akkakat apapat noracok toIeccuo akwipittathok nthiak itti kwanthan tuan thanung
akka ukul wung iopari iulukku wonat luput attul ana ikken keꞌra (12) wokat wongo ana wommaththik ere wio.
Akka oIeccuo pokat cik ikathar akweo ul wokkakathe woppot aꞌrntüttothok.
Pul pꞌrek ipopari pokat cik angüccük opellelle nti iaak luput attul ana ikken keꞌra (12), [kwikkethe ul ittiet ul akucci appik othakka itti aittiethok] ana pul pellat ipothikkierok poporot.
Pul ipopari pakkakathe nthoccul koIeccuo ana pothntathe thon thokret kung ana ngüccük ngocoꞌrathe nti iaak accokkot.
AIeccuo ipittat itti, “Oththa akkothntorin?”
Akin ocukkwat nan appik aPoththuruc iꞌrekat itti, “Pul ipangkene, ul wunukwothung ana waik wanentekot cik iccik kang.”
Anaruk oIeccuo piꞌrekathe itti, “Pul pꞌrek pothntorin akka mpina itti puꞌran peot nti iaun.”
Anakka pul ipopari pina itti pinakot nan pakkakathe apokkweka ana papathe iracok toIeccuo tokït koul appik ana perekanthet oIeccuo lon ila kwothntinok ana kwittakathe.
Ittina aIeccuo iꞌrekathok itti, “Ukul win, thoccokot tholon loKapik nocïkït cang thittiethung. Ngko lon loporot.”
Anakka oIeccuo pokat cik akwere, apul pꞌrek akkakat ntuan toili wonocuththun caꞌrama ioccot kꞌran itti oIairoc, appiꞌrekat itti, “Ukul wang wiot ana ngkwannommie pul ipangkene.”
Anakka oIeccuo poccïkothe lon len akwiꞌrekat oIairoc itti, “Kirrnni opelle, occokothe lon loKapik nocïkït ana ukul wang iopari wathakka woporot.”
Anakka kwaat tuan toIairoc, kwꞌrakathe itti pul pꞌrek piꞌriko noppan akin aththut anaruk oPoththuruc ana oIuanna ana oIakup ana oththan ana onnan pokkul iiot tulluk.
Ul wokat aoo cannan aIeccuo iꞌrekat kin itti, “Nangkoik, kwakannio anaruk kwaik inthe.”
Okin thoccirathok ngngin akka okin thinat nan itti ukul wawiot.
Anaruk oIeccuo poccokathe ukul ukun ana kwiꞌrekathe itti, “Ukul win, urokothe kapik.”
Ukul wokkatheik ana wurokathe kapik accokkot. Ittina oIeccuo piꞌrekathekin itti okin thethet aꞌrupu wꞌrek aꞌrko.
Aththan akin onnan thoprttakathe tit anaruk kwiꞌrekathekin lon lonthomat itti okin thanniꞌret pul pꞌrek lon elli.
Anakka oIeccuo pakkarot ul wung ithun wothothïlettat iattul ana ikken keꞌra, kwekathekin ngili ingakin okïcce uꞌrupa iokithak ngngin ana ittiet ul iongo ngngin.
Ana kwothïathekin akin othongkene lon longili ngoKapik ana ittiet ul iongo.
Kwiꞌrekathekin itti, “Nokorronno oneko alpꞌrek aththik nokurtti kon, nokorronno oneko kurrong ana kaꞌruk konokurtti ana thuꞌrit ana akucci ana eret weꞌra.
Ana man imanon thiꞌrikot tit, nikkoik tit puccuk annoththekat nokaꞌran ken.
Ana amma ul nokaꞌran ken wakinnikkienon cik, nokkwe tuꞌrupang cik nnoracok ton amma annoththe nokaꞌran ken aloka lon ilimmat lon ngkït itti okin thꞌrat lon lon.”
Ittina okin thurokathe akin oingkat naꞌran akin ikkat cik akin ongkene lon iloporot loIeccuo ana ittiet ul iongo naꞌran appik.
AIruthuc ili wonoththok poCelïl occïkat lon ilokat cik appik. Alon ocikittakanthok ca akka opilingon thokat cik akin ere itti oIuanna purokot nti ithio,
ana opilingon iꞌre itti pul pothernte lon loKapik oIlia pummothe ncik ana opilingon iꞌre icci itti pul pothernte lon loKapik pothupuththuput purokot nti ithio cakuruk.
Anaruk oIruthuc piꞌrekathe itti, “OIuanna pampokiothe ca cik ana okkwen pꞌrek empi ampappoccïkot lon len?” Ana kwokat cik akwokwantot kathar ika akwimmak ngngin.
Anakka ul wung wothothïlettat wokkaprttakot ntan okin therekanthet oIeccuo lon ilakin thokkothe. Menik kwipathekin ana okin thellek thoingkathe nokaꞌran koPeththcceitha
anaruk ul wawinat nan ana womakathok. Kwikkiekathe ul cik akwikkat cik akwerenekin lon longili ngoKapik ana kwittiekathe ul iokat cik wongothe itti wittiettat.

Anakka cipin cokat capot, ul wothothïlettat wung wakkakanthok aiꞌrekathok itti, “Omethe ul apettakot cik, akin eo naꞌran iccik konnon akin othokwancot thuꞌrit thꞌrek akin oꞌrko ana kaꞌran nakin ïcat akka kaꞌran engki kaik thomnther.”
AIeccuo iꞌrekat kin itti, “Nethet kin apꞌrek akin oꞌrko.”
Akin othïat tit itti, “Onïn thonu arrakith ukuluk tulluk ana ape weꞌra. Ngkwongothe itti oron thathokerine ul enni appik thuꞌriri?”
Ul iomura iokat cik ceneket athar ukuluk (5,000).
OIeccuo piꞌrekathe ul iammakothok iattul ana ikken keꞌra itti, “Nikkiekin cik nocapu mungkut mungkut ana icungkut culukku aul oka arrial weꞌra ana alkaire (50).”
Aul iammakothok ikkiekat ul cik ammakka kwiꞌret.

OIeccuo ponekathe arrakith ukuluk ana ape weꞌra akwokathakat cik tothiꞌrot ana kwopirakanthet Kapik noka ana kwomithathe iarrakith ana kwekathe ul iammakothok aikket ul. Ana cakuruk kwummathe ape weꞌra ana kwillillanthet kin tit appik.
Ul woꞌrkkathe thuꞌrit aththakakat appik aul iammakothok aꞌrntat thuꞌrit ithokwentakot nan oppappat nyalünthüng attul ana ikken keꞌra.
Ana caꞌri cꞌrek aIeccuo pokat cik akwaꞌra ngaꞌrama akin oul iammakothok iattul ana ikken keꞌra akwipittat kin itti, “Ul waik wame itti oun oththa?”
Akin othïat tit itti, “Ul waik wame itti oung oIuanna pomamuthie apilingon thame itti oIlia ana apilingon ome itti pul pothernte lon loKapik pomaꞌrot purokot nti ithio.”
AIeccuo ipittat ul wothothïlettat wung itti, “Ana onon there tat? Onon thame itti oun oththa?”
APoththuruc iꞌrekat itti, “Oung oMiccie pothïlathe noKapik.”
Menik aIeccuo iꞌrekat kin itti okin thakorronno iꞌret puꞌrek itti ook okkwen.

Akwiꞌrekat itti, “Ukul wopul iponyi wonu itti wakkiettat thiak cannan ana ul ittïttïk woul ana ul ittïttïk woul wonoppan toKapik ana ul iangkene lon lothonceꞌret lon cik wꞌrak ana wonu itti wakkuttat ana wurokietta nti ithio nomaꞌri imꞌrapuruk.”
Ana kwiꞌrekathekin appik itti, “Okkwi ipongothe itti kwamakot lon lin kwonu itti kure noka kung ana oneko thapak thung appinappin akwomakothin.
Okkwi ipongothe itti kwaꞌret thikkoik thung akure noka kung. Anaruk okkwi ipurethe thikkoik thung cik nti ilon lin kwaꞌret.
Ngintha akkoporot amma pul pothikkiet capu ncik appik cung ana kurethe calak cung cik?
Okkwi ipella lon lin ana ella kït kolon lin, oun ukul wopul iponyi wella kït kolon lung caꞌri ica anthan nthrïk thung ana nthrïk thoththan ana thouꞌrupa wothothïlettat woKapik.
Mpiꞌret non lon ïcat itti ul wꞌrek waik cene wannille aththik akin tharthuk imma ngili ngoKapik.”
Anakka maꞌri meot ncik mormor nocaꞌri ica kweret nan, kwipathe oPoththuruc ana oIuanna ana oIakup akwokuꞌrat kin ngngin toꞌra wocoꞌrong akin othaꞌra ngꞌrama.
Anakka kwokat cik akwaꞌra ngaꞌrama toca tung toprttakatheik ana eret wung ollio ere thuleꞌrak thokapik.
Aul iomura weꞌra oMucca ana oIlia,
ummat ncik nthrïk akin erene oIeccuo. Okin thokat cik akin eret kathar ika oIeccuo paik pathio ngngin nokaꞌran koUruccelim.
OPoththuruc okin opurukon thokat inthe anaruk akka okin thurttat nti inthe akin immakat thrïk thoIeccuo ana opilingon theꞌra akin ocoꞌro akin aththut.

Anakka ul weꞌra iomura wokat cik aththe naIeccuo aPoththuruc iꞌrekat oIeccuo itti, “Pul ipangkene, loporot itti oron thikkoik cene. Tun uno müꞌrük mꞌrapuruk culukku cang ana culukku coMucca ana culukku coIlia.” Kwokat pommat itti kwaik peret ngimpen.
Anakka kwokat cik akwere, nuththe nakkakathe nakin anoꞌrumat kin ana okin thipathe nꞌre akka okin thiꞌrikot inuththe.
Apoꞌre akkakat nti inuththe apiꞌre itti, “Ukul win enni ia mpakkarot itti wakkot ngre ngin ana nthaccïkot lon lung.”
Akka poꞌre peret akin immakat oIeccuo akkwaik pellek. Caꞌri cen ul iammakothok wangkatheik llon len aththung okin thakinniꞌrekat pul pꞌrek lon ilakin thimmat.
Ana ngorrot ngen akka okin thuot ntan ntocoꞌrong acungkut coul ocurarat iaak.
Apul pꞌrek ipocura akkarat nti ithoꞌrikït thoul apakkaro oIeccuo mpoꞌre itti, “Pul ipangkene, mpipittothung itti ngkwakathanin ukul win enni iulukku.

Auꞌrupa iokithak woꞌrot nan ana amma woꞌrot naak walliethok ikapa ana wicethok tit puccuk akwapat nocapu arre ntit ana okkiethok thiak kicce ana woo mpoꞌre cittan ana wuꞌre pok nti ithon ana wannokorronnok ana waik wakïttok.
Ana mpipittothe ul iammakothung itti okin thakïccenenïn anaruk okin thannokïccekat nan.”
AIeccuo iꞌrekat itti, “Nantokatha, onon ul iakannoccokot lon loKapik nomïkït ana tholon ilokithak tulluk. Oron thikkoik aththut manna kartha?” Akwiꞌrekat pul itti, “Nakut ukul wang cene.”
Anakka ukul wokat athakkarot iccik koIeccuo auꞌrupa iokithak iꞌrikat ikkul arrekat nocapu. AIeccuo othirriekat uꞌrupa iokithak cik aththekat nokkul akwekat oththan.
Aul iokat cik cïnang appik oprttakanthet lon len tit lopuꞌran poKapik.
Anakka okin thokat akin oprttakinthet lon len tit appik ila oIeccuo pokkothe kwiꞌrekathe ul iammakothok itti,
“Noccïkot lon papenang ila mpaik piꞌret non itti, ukul wopul iponyi waik wathokettat ul.”
Anaruk okin thanninakat lon len. Lokat lamuꞌruttakothekin othakka itti akin okorronno ina ana okin thonat nꞌre ipitto lon len.
Aul iammakothok ikkat cik apllarot llon itti, oththa akkaka prïk.
AIeccuo inakat lon ilakin thonat nomïkït men akwonekat ukul iotteik akwoceꞌrekat iccik kung.
Akwiꞌrekat kin itti, “Okkwi ipikkiet ukul cik enni iotteik ngkꞌran kin kwikkierin cik ana okkwi ipikkierin cik kwikkiet okkwi ipothïothin cik. Akka okkwi ipotteik ianon appik ook akkrïk.”
AIuanna iꞌrekat itti, “Pul ipangkene, ïnthimmat aul wꞌrek okïcce uꞌrupa iokithak ngkꞌran kang ana onïn thoceꞌrerok akka kwannoka uraththungon.”
AIeccuo iꞌrekat kin itti, “Nokorronno oceꞌrek akka pul ipannꞌra lon lon, ook ponnon.”
Manakka caꞌri cakat acokko napuththut itti oIeccuo panekittat tothiꞌrot akwonekkekat lon cik itti kuroko eo nokaꞌran koUruccelim.
Ana kwothïathe ul wothothïlettat tokït kung nokaꞌran koCcamirin itti akin othokuccenthok aꞌrupu cik.
Anaruk ul wonokaꞌran ken wꞌrakathe ikkiek cik akka kwokat cik akweo nokaꞌran koUruccelim.
Anakka ul iammakothok ionat ꞌran itti oIakup ana oIuanna thimmat lon len akin ipittat oIeccuo itti, “Ili, loporot itti onïn thipitto thik ntothiꞌrot athathokꞌrekini?”
Anaruk oIeccuo polliakathekin akwothirriekat kin cik
ana okin thoingkathe nokaꞌran kꞌrek.
Anakka okin thokat cik akin onyaro ikathar apuꞌrek iꞌrekat oIeccuo itti, “Mpamakothung na aeo.”
AIeccuo othïanthok tit itti, “Mipa monu kürük imuꞌrol ikakin ikkoik tit ana uꞌrupe wonu nune anaruk ukul wopul iponyi wella kaꞌran na anekket ca.”
Akwiꞌrekat opilin pꞌrek itti, “Omakothin.”
Anaruk pul pothïanthok tit itti, “Ili, korronnon anothocïkko opappa kappak.”
AIeccuo othïanthok tit itti, “Kirrnni aul illet ocïkko ul illet anaruk ngko atherene opilingon lon longili ngoKapik.”
Ana icci apilin appiꞌrekat itti, “Ili, mpamakothung anaruk korronnon anopakkot anothiꞌret ul woruan itti mpei paik paeo pꞌrin.”

AIeccuo othïanthok tit itti, “Pul ipongothe itti pamakothin ana apappopakkinthet lon lung ilipe, pannekko nan itti kwareko ingili ngoKapik, pikkoik ere pul ipara apolliakot thoceken aporakat tapak topaꞌrot cik.”
Anakka lon elli locothakothe, aIli oIeccuo ocumat ul arrial wꞌrapuruk ana alkaire ana ikken keꞌra (72) ana kwothïlekathekin tokït kung theꞌra theꞌra ana naꞌran appik ia kwokat cik akweo nan.
Akwiꞌrekat kin itti, “Kopon kokwonot mïl moppot anaruk ul iakio wotte. Nipittot pul pokkwon apothïot ul iakio ikkwon kung.
Ngkonon, mpaik pathïot non ere lungkat laik ithoꞌrkït thomipa.
Nokorronno oneko kaꞌruk kakucci ana kaꞌruk konokurtti ana wok ana okorronno omicco pul pꞌrek nokathar.
Amma anniꞌriko noppan topul pꞌrek, niꞌret ul wonoppan ten cittokït itti, ‘AKapik ethïet kaman engki cik.’
Amma pul pothomicco paik iul wonoppan ten, thomicco thon thaꞌro naak, ana amma pul pothomicco pella, thomicco thon thapakkinthet non.
Nikkoik iman men, annoꞌrko thuꞌrit ithakin ethet non akka pul ipareko ponu itti pacco aꞌrupu nti ire ngung. Nokorronno urttuko nti ikaman annoince iakꞌrek.
Amma onon akkiꞌrikot noththok pꞌrek mono akin ikkienon cik, noꞌrko thuꞌrit ithakin thonekkethe tokït kon itti onon thaꞌrko.
Nittiet ul iongo iaik cïnang, niꞌret kin itti, ‘Ngili ngoKapik ngakko napuththut iccik kon.’
Anaruk amma onon thiꞌrikot nokaꞌran kꞌrek mono akin okorronno ikkienon cik, ngkonon ikathar konokaꞌran ken anniꞌre itti,
‘Manna tuꞌrupang tonoththok pon irocciccokothe nïn, onïn thakkwenthet non cik nnoracok tïn. Anaruk nina nan itti ngili ngoKapik ngaik napuththut.’
Anaruk mpiꞌret non itti thakkmako thokaꞌran koCothum thaka thopappat nothonceꞌret lon cik ithaka nokaꞌran ikꞌrat ikkienon cik.”

“Angkre, ul woKuruccin, angkre, ul woPeththecceitha, akka amma lon ilommaththik ilokat lokkattathe ianon lokat lokkattathe nokaꞌran koCcur ana koCcithon, ul wonaꞌran wen waapaꞌrinet lon cik ilokithak akkomaꞌrot ana waakenet nthako eret iillillakot ana ipot mucuk ima.
Kapik kathipo thiak thoul wonokaꞌran koCcur ana koCcithon nocaꞌri cothakkmako nanon.
Onon enthrïk thonokaꞌran koKapprnaum onon thame itti onon thanekittat tothiꞌrori? Aa, onon thaarrettat thothïrïn.”
Kwappiꞌrekat ul immakothok itti, “Okkwi ipoccïkothe lon lon kwoccïkothe lon lin ana okkwi ipꞌrat lon lon kwꞌrat lon lin ana okkwi ipꞌrarin kwꞌrat okkwi ipothïothin.”

Anaruk akka ul wung iammakothok iarrial wꞌrapuruk ana alkaire ana ikken keꞌra wokkaprttakot awopirakat noka wiꞌrekathok itti, “Ili, uꞌrupa iokithak wokat cik manna accïkot lon lïn amma ïnere ngkꞌran kang.”
AIeccuo iꞌrekat kin itti, “Mpimmat pul pothopulut apapo ntothiꞌrot ere thuleꞌrak ithallio.
Ana mpethet non puꞌran annokakꞌrot inyil cik ana ünü ana alkot puꞌran popul pothopulut.
Anaruk nokorronno opira noka itti uꞌrupa iokithak waccïkot lon lon anaruk nopira noka itti ꞌran won wokurrakot tothiꞌrot.”

Caꞌri cen aIeccuo opirakat noka noKanang ikupupure, akwiꞌrekat itti, “Mpopiranung noka, ngappa pin, Ili worothiꞌrot ana wonocapu, akka ngkwamuꞌruttothe ul lon elli inaik nti ima ila mpiꞌrethe ul win iammakothin, akene ul iammakka nyukul inyarran. Ïcat ngappa, elli akka ngkwongothe itti laka.
Ongappa pethin aꞌrupu appik. Pul pella pina ukul, oththan pokkul pulluk akkinak. Ana pul pella pina oththan, ukul wulluk akkinak ana okkwion itha ukul wongothe itti wakenekin oththan.”
Ittina akwolliakat ul iammakothok akwiꞌrekat kin akka okin thokat thellek itti, “Kït kethïettat ikaik kakathacce lon ilanon thaik thakathacce.

Nantoccïkot aniꞌret non, ul woppot wothernte lon loKapik ana nili nokat nongothe itti nimma lon ilonon thaik thakathacce ana nakinnimma ana occïkot lon ilanon thaik thaccïkot ana nthakorronno occïkot.”

Apul pꞌrek ipangkene lon lothonceꞌret lon cik, urokat kapik akwipittat oIeccuo lon ngeꞌri itti akwiꞌriththak ngngin akwiꞌrekat itti, “Pul ipangkene, ngintha akka anokkot aniot thikkoik thothupuththuput?”
AIeccuo iꞌrekathok itti, “Liatha akkokurrakot iatham wolon lothonceꞌret lon cik? Ana lon len lonu ittirat?”
Apul iꞌrekat itti, “Liꞌrettat itti, ‘Ongathe Ili Kapik kang ncïkït cang appik ana ngka kang appik ana ngatheꞌre ngang appik ana mpuꞌran pang appik’
ana ‘Ongathe ul wꞌrek ammakka ngkwongothe ka kang.’
AIeccuo iꞌrekathok itti, “Ngkwothïotherit papenang. Okkothe elli ana ngkwikkoik thupuththuput.”
Anaruk pul pappongothe itti prrot noka kung akwiꞌrekat oIeccuo itti, “Ana okkwen akkapul ponocuruk cin?”

AIeccuo othïat tit nthokkwie lon kuru ncik itti, “Puꞌrek pokat cik apao nnokaꞌran koUruccelim apeo nokaꞌran kAria ana pocurakathe iul wothuꞌran. Ul wothuꞌran wuekathok eret ana okkwekok akin oththekat naak akwomma ngka ere kwio.
Apul ponoppan toKapik akkakat apokkat ikathar ken, manakka pimmat pul emprïk apokkat ciththan apoingkat.
Apul pꞌrek akkakat cakuruk ponoul woLaui iareko noppan toKapik manakka paat nokaꞌran kopul pen, apokkat ciththan akwoingkat.
Anaruk apul poul woCamirin pokat cik apeo nokurtti, apakkakat na pul pokat cik anakka pimmarok apipat thaik thung.

Akwoingkat akwocukkwat cik iccik kung akunat ngapak ïnyï ana ngaak akwïꞌrïkïkkanthok ïnyï kicce akwarriekathok teꞌringka akwoingkathok ngngin akwothonekkekathok ikaman ika ul aallerit nakucci akwokathakat lon lung.
Ana ngorrot ngen akummat akucci weꞌra akwekat pul pokaman akwiꞌrekathok itti, ‘Okatha lon lopul empi akka mpaik paeo ana amma mpokkaprttakot mpathokkenung akucci ia ngkwokïttothe naak.’”
AIeccuo ipittat pul ipangkene lon lothonceꞌret lon cik itti, “Pul piatha nti iul iꞌrapuruk ponocuruk copul ipapothe inyaun nyoul wothuꞌran apopokat?”
Apul ipangkene lon lothonceꞌret lon cik othïat tit itti, “Pul ipipot thiak thung.”
AIeccuo iꞌrekathok itti, “Ngko athokkot ammakka pul pen.”
Anakka oIeccuo pokat cik ikathar akin oul iammakothok okin thakkakathe nokaꞌran na pul ipopari pokat ipoccot kꞌran itti oMarththa apikkiekat kin cik tuan.
Ponat opang pꞌrek ipopari poccot kꞌran itti oMeriom ipikkot cik iccik koIeccuo akwoccïkot lon lung.

Anaruk oMarththa pokat piꞌrikothe akwokkot thuꞌrit ithokat thonu itti thakkattat. Kwakkakanthet oIeccuo akwiꞌrekathok itti, “Ili, ngkwannimma akka opangkin poththet naun pellek anokkot ngrei, lon len lannoka ere kwokwïethini? Iꞌrethok akwathittarothin.”
AIeccuo othïanthok tit itti, “Marththa, Marththa, ngkwiꞌrikothe llon loppot ana ngkwonu kït nolon loppot.
Anaruk lon lulukku ilonu itti laccakot kït nan ana opangkang oMeriom poccokothe iloporot ntit, ana lakorronno onekittathok.”

Caꞌri cꞌrek aIeccuo ikkat cik akwaꞌra ngaꞌrama nokaꞌran kꞌrek. Anakka kwomarttot thaꞌra ngaꞌrama apilin pꞌrek nti iul iammakothok iꞌrekathok itti, “Ili, ongkene nïn thaꞌra ngaꞌrama ammakka oIuanna pongkenet ul iammakothok wung.”
AIeccuo iꞌrekat kin itti, “Amma annaꞌra ngaꞌrama anniꞌre ittina,
‘Ngappa pïn, akꞌran kang othiakineik
angili ngang anthan,
[ila ngkwongothe itti lakkattat,
alokkattat nocapu ammakka lokkattathe tothiꞌrot].
Ethet nïn thuꞌrit ithekko nïn nocïngkï enci.
Occïkïnthet nïn lon lïn ilokithak
akka onïn cakuruk thaccïkanthet okkwion ithokkinthent nïn lon ilokithak
kirrnni apiet nïn ithenekketta.’”
Ittina aIeccuo iꞌrekat kin itti, “Oththa akkonu opuruko nti ianon mono akwoinok thampang thongkꞌra akwiꞌrethok itti, ‘Puruko pin, ethin arrakith wꞌrapuruk
akka opuruko pin pꞌrek painin nti ikurtti ana mpella alpꞌrek anethok akwoꞌrko.’
Ana apuruko pung ponoppan othïanthok tit nnoppan itti, ‘Kirrnni ommien cik. Mpunukkothe kathat pꞌrïn ana mpaik naꞌrangkal ïnonyukul nyin mpamma uroko anethung papꞌrek.’
Mpiꞌret non itti, amma pul pꞌrat uroko akwethet pul thuꞌrit itti opuruko, kuroko akwethok akka kwommierok cik.
Ilen akka aniꞌrenthet non itti noꞌrungkot nan ipitto ana lon len lettat non, nokwantot lon ana onon thiot, ana okkwi ipipitto thittarakot ana kwittarakot.
Akka okkwi ipipitto lon pettat ana okkwi ipakwantot piot ana okkwi ipipitto thittarakot ana kwittarakot.
Oththan poththa nti ianon amma opei pipittothok pape akwethok pinyil?
Ana manna amma kwipittot cin akwethok künü?
Amma onon manna ithonu lon ilokithak thina akka annethet nyukul nyon aꞌrupu ioporot, oththe pon porothiꞌrot pakannethet okkwion ithipittothok Kanang ikupupurei?”
Ana oIeccuo pokat cik akwokïcce uꞌrupa iokithak nnopul ipokat pommat ere. Manakka uꞌrupa iokithak wollot nti ipul pen aperekat aul irrat mïkït nti ikarak.
Anaruk apilingon iꞌrekat itti, “Kwaik pakïcce uꞌrupa iokithak ngkꞌran koPelecepul ili wouꞌrupa iokithak.”
Apilingon ennekkekathok nthipittothok lon ilommaththik.
OIeccuo pinat lon ilokat ima men ana kwiꞌrekathekin itti, “Ngili illillakot tit kurekkurek ngintat cik, ana amma ul woruan willillakot kurekkurek wakannoꞌrungkot cik.
Amma pul pothopulut poprttakothe ika kung, ngili ngung ngaꞌrungkot cik taththa? Mpiꞌret elli akka onon thaik thame itti mpaik pakïcce uꞌrupa iokithak mpuꞌran poPelecepul.
Ana amma mpakïcce uꞌrupa iokithak mpuꞌran poPelecepul, ul won iammakot non wakïcce uꞌrupa iokithak mpuꞌran poththa? Ittina okin thathakka ul iakkma non.
Anaruk amma oun akka akïcce uꞌrupa iokithak mpuꞌran poKapik ittina lakene itti ngili ngoKapik ngaik ithoꞌrkït thon.”
AIeccuo iꞌrekat itti, “Amma pul iponthomat mparran pakot uꞌrotto ana nyumurra ana paik pangwot kaman kung, pul pella pamunye aꞌrupu wung.
Anaruk amma pul pꞌrek iponthoththomat paꞌrumothok mono apalkothok paneko aꞌrupu wothoꞌrak wung appik ia kwapponekkethe cïkït nan ana kwillillo iaꞌrupu ia kwonat okin opilingon.”
AIeccuo appiꞌrekat itti, “Okkwi ipanïn thannoka aththut lakenen itti kwꞌrat lon lïn ana okkwi ipakinnittarothin ire kwaik pakïtto ngre ngin.”
“Amma uꞌrupa iokithak waat nti ipul, waeo nocik iconthomat akwantot kaꞌran ika aikkoik nan. Anamma wanniot weret noucce wung itti, ‘Mpapakkot iman ima mpoththet nan.’
Ana amma wokkaprttakot wathiot man mollakot kicce ana mothettakotheik
ana waeo ana wanthan nuꞌrupa wꞌrek weꞌreꞌrapuruk iokithak cannan naak akin iꞌriko ipul ana okin thikkoik than. Ana pul ipakin thoꞌrot nan paka pokïtheththak cannan nocaꞌri conomun.”
Anakka oIeccuo pokat cik akwere, apul pꞌrek ipopari nti ithoꞌrkït thoul iꞌrekat itti, “Athoporot oka nopul ipopari ipokwonorung ana akieng ngïmmïk.”
AIeccuo iꞌrekat itti, “Anaruk thopira noka thaka cannan nakkwion ithaik thaccïkot lon loKapik ana oreko ngngin.”
Anakka ul wokat aunukwot oIeccuo kwiꞌrekathekin itti, “Ul enni wolon ilokithak wipitto lon ilommaththik anaruk lella ilettat kin, lulluk ilommaththik ilokkattanthet oIunan.
Ana ammakka oIunan pul pothernte lon loKapik pokat lon ilommaththik loul woNinua, ittina ukul wopul iponyi waka lon ilommaththik loul iaik inenni.

Ili iopari wonoththok poCipa wurokot kapik nocaꞌri cothonceꞌret lon cik okin oul iaik inenni ana kwathokenekin itti nthokkothe lon moloko. Akka kwaat nci nacapu ciththan akwathoccïkot lon lothinaik nti ica loili ioccot kꞌran itti oCiliman. Ana inenni cene kwaik iprïk naIli oCiliman.

Nocaꞌri cothonceꞌret lon cik amma Kapik athonceꞌrenthet ul lon cik nocapu, ul wonokaꞌran koNinua wurokot kapik ana waceꞌrenthet non lon cik itti lon lon lamoloko, akka okin thokkaprttakot nti ithokkot lon ilokithak caꞌri ica oIunan pul pothernte lon loKapik perenet kin ana inenni cene kwaik iprïk naIunan.”

AIeccuo appiꞌrekat itti, “Pul pella paccie thik nocuꞌru iconu ngaak iacco apantokuꞌrupot cerok nan ana manna onekket thoceken copapꞌrek. Anaruk kwwonu itti kwanekket cik attattar othakka itti amma okkwion ithanthant nthapat akin immaik.
Cït corica cakꞌran koka kang. Ana amma cït cang coporot ana ngkwimma kathar ikoporot na akko. Anaruk amma cokithak ana ngkwakinnimma kathar ikoporot na akko.
Nokkwo kunu ncik, akꞌran ikaik ianon okorronno oka ngïꞌrïmak.
Ittina amma ka kang koppathe kꞌran, ana ngkwina kathar na aeo ana ngïꞌrïmak ngella, ka kang kaka koporot ere kꞌran amma akoccieik naung.”
Anakka oIeccuo pomarttot lon lung, apul pꞌrek nti iul woPriccin akkarathok tuan thanung akin othoꞌrkoik akin aththut, ittina oIeccuo piꞌrikathe noppan ana kwaththikkat cik nokuppuꞌrung kothuꞌrit.
Anaruk pul poPriccin pinakathe nan ana kwoprttakatherit akka oIeccuo pannilakko ammakka thathuma then akkwarthuk oꞌrkoik.
AIli oIeccuo iꞌrekathok itti, “Ul woPriccin, onon thame eththeꞌret won ana maththak nthapat anaruk mïkït mon moppappathe thukungkun ana aꞌrupu iokithak.
Onon thomaik nti ima, lakannoka itti Kapik ikokkothe thapat kokkothe icarak than cakuruki?
Nome ikarak kon nthethet ul iella aꞌrupu cik ana onon thathakka thoporot noka appik.

Angkre, ul woPriccin akka onon thethet Kapik aꞌrupu wuluwuluk naꞌrupu kurekkurek iattul attul appik ana aꞌrupu iakkattat ngucul. Anaruk annopaꞌrine lon ilocoꞌrothe cik ana thongat thoKapik. Onon thira thaꞌrungkot nothethet Kapik aꞌrupu wuluwuluk nnaꞌrupu iaara, anaruk nokorronno ure naꞌrupu ioporot.
Angkre, ul woPriccin, akka onon thongothe aꞌran ioporot nomuththun maꞌrama ana nthongothe itti ul wamicco non keccuk.
Angkre, akka onon thungkot nupu noul ionyi inamuꞌruttakot icapu ana ul wacukkarot cik awomma itti okin thaik thacukkarot nupu cik inoppappathe ka ikokuttat.”
Apul pꞌrek nti iul iangkene lon lothonceꞌret lon cik iꞌrekat itti, “Pul ipangkene, akka menik ngkwaik pacungko nïn llon elli cakuruk.”
AIeccuo othïat tit itti, “Angkre, onon ul iangkene lon lothonceꞌret lon cik, akka onon thakkiet ul lon loppot ilalkothekin ana onon manna thakorronno othie caun culukku itti onon thittarot kin.
Angkre, nanon akka onon akkuno nonupu preththere noul wothernte lon loKapik illet maꞌrot.
Onon thakene itti onon thongothe lon ila thiki thon thokkothe itti locoꞌrotheik okin thongwot ul wothernte lon loKapik ana onon thakkot nupu nopreththere.
Ilen akka Kapik kerethe noucce wung itti, ‘Mpathïnthet kin ul wothernte lon lin ana ul wothothïlettat win aꞌrek akin ongwo ana aꞌrek akin occokiet thiak.’
Ilen akka ul wonomaꞌri emmi akkaka wonu lon louccuk ngoul wothernte lon lin iongwuttat nci ammakka capu ncik appik cokuꞌrettat ncik

nnothokkuttat thApil oingkanthet oCekkeria okin ithonguttathe ithoꞌrkït thonoppan toKapik ana tuꞌrot tothokꞌret aꞌrupu wothokiot ngüccük cik. Ïï mpiꞌrethenon itti, ul wonomaꞌri emmi ien akkacco lon len ikkun appik.

Angkre, ul iangkene lon lothonceꞌret lon cik akka onon thullukkwinthet ul kathar ikiniekin lon loKapik. Onon ngka kon thanniꞌriko ana onon thoceꞌret okkwion ithaik thenekke itti okin thiꞌriko ilon loKapik.”
Anakka oIeccuo poththet nocik cen, aul woPriccin ana ul iangkene lon lothonceꞌret lon cik ikkat cik akin olikinok lon cik nci nokkït ana ipittittothok lon nuthuk.
Akin oꞌrïkothok amma akwiꞌre lon lꞌrek moloko akin occokothok.

Anakka cungkut coul woppot caꞌrntakothe tothun ana opilingon thꞌrek thikkatheik akin ocukkwarot pangken cik, aIeccuo iꞌrekat ul iammakothok cittokït itti, “Noꞌrumoik nolon ilanthan noul woPriccin ilammakka müꞌrükül ilammikkot ul.
Lon appik ilocukkwakot nan linako nan ana ilamuꞌruttakot littako ncik
Ana ilanon therethe iꞌrïmak laccïkakot icïngkï ana ilerettathe thonu noppan lakkuttanthet kuri noꞌret.”
Akwappiꞌrekat itti, “Opuruko pingon, nokorronno ipo nꞌre nokkwion ithakkwot ka ana okin thakannappokkot lon lꞌrek.
Anaruk mpakenenon okkwion ithanon opellene. Nopellene okkwi ipakkwot ka ana kwonu puꞌran itti kwarrethung ciththothïrïn. Mpiꞌret non itti ook akka annopellene.
Nyaꞌrkang nyukuluk nyakannoketta nakucci weꞌrai? Anaruk ngella ngulukku ngurettat nan ngKapik.
Wan won wonoꞌra wongantettat appik. Ittina nokorronno ipo nꞌre akka onon akkoporot cannan nonyaꞌrkang.”
AIeccuo appiꞌrekat itti, “Mpiꞌret non lon ïcat itti okkwi ipiꞌre tokït koul itti kwinan, ukul wopul iponyi wiꞌre itti winak tokït kouꞌrupa wothothïlettat woKapik.
Ana okkwi ipoꞌruminthin kït tokït koul, mpaꞌruminthok kït tokït kouꞌrupa wothothïlettat woKapik.
Ana okkwi ipere llon lokithak nokkul wopul iponyi, lon lung laccïkakot anaruk okkwi iperet Kanang ikupupure llon ilokithak lon ilokithak lung lakorronno occïkakot.
Amma onon thonekittathe nomuththun maꞌrama ana tokït konili ana ul ionu lon ikkun, nokorronno ipo nꞌre itti nthrrot noka kon tat ana manna itti onon thiꞌre itti tat.
Akka Kanang ikupupure kakenenon caꞌri cen itti nthiꞌre tat.”
Apul pꞌrek nti icungkut coul iꞌrekat oIeccuo itti, “Pul ipangkene, iꞌrethe opangkin akwopettinin aꞌrupu wopappa ianïn opakkot nan.”
AIeccuo othïanthok tit itti, “Pangkin, oththa akkonekkethin cik itti mpakꞌrinenon lon lon ana illillinenon iaꞌrupu won ianon thopakkothe nan?”
Ittina akwappiꞌrekat kin itti, “Nokkwo kunu ncik ana oꞌrumoik nolon lothrïk nan ncik appik akka thikkoik thopul iponyi thannoka itti pul pana thaꞌrthan thoppot.”
Akwerekanthet kin lon elli nthokkwie lon kuru ncik itti, “Capu cꞌrek cokat cik copul ipapaꞌrthan cokwonot mïl moppot.
Akwiꞌrekat noucce itti, ‘Ngintha akka anokkot? Mpella kaꞌran ika anipot mïl tit.’
Ittina akwiꞌrekat ka kung itti, ‘Katha elli akka anokkot mpangwo irit win appik anuno aꞌrek ittïttïk ana ien akka anipot mïl tit appik ana aꞌrupu wꞌrek.
Ana caꞌri cen anopira noka anomekat ka kin itti, Ngkwonu aꞌrupu woppot wakanno omttat aththaman noluput ilanthan. Okathacce lon nuthuk, oꞌrku thuꞌrit ana ïcat cik ana apira noka.’
Anaruk aKapik iꞌrekathok itti, ‘Katha oung emprïk ngkwommaik nti ica. Ngkoꞌra engi ngkwaik pio ana oththa akkapakkot naꞌrupu ia ngkwipinthet ka kang cik?’
Laka ittina noul ipinthet ka ken aꞌrupu cik anaruk okin thannïꞌrïko lon len okin oKapik loporot.”
Ittina aIeccuo iꞌrekat ul iammakothok itti, “Ilen akka aniꞌrenthet non itti nokorronno opellene lon lothikkoik thon itti ngimpen akka annoꞌrko ana ngimpen akka annako.
Akka thikkoik akkoporot cannan nothuꞌrit ana ka akkoporot cannan noret.
Nantokatha nongkorak akka nakannora ana nakannokio ana nella irit cik iakin ipot mïl tit anaruk Kapik akkaꞌrikiekin. Onon thoporot cannan nouꞌrupe.
Oththa nti ianon iparttot caꞌri culukku nomaꞌri mothikkoik mung amma kwonu nꞌre?
Inakka onon thomma arttot caꞌri culukku nothikkoik thon, ngintha akka onon opellene itti onon thaꞌrko ngimpen ana ako ngimpen?
Nantokatha tat akka poꞌren ocokka. Pakannoreko apakie ka ken. Anaruk mpiꞌret non itti manna oCiliman nthaꞌrthan thung ithrïk, kwakannako eret wopeththere ere poꞌren empi.
Amma Kapik kaꞌrumo noraco irakaik inenni ana ngorrot arorrettat ithik, Kapik kakannoꞌrumo nanoni? onon ithonu thoccokot lon loKapik nomïkït thoththeik.
Ittina nokorronno onekket mïkït naꞌrupu ianon oꞌrko ana ïkko, nokorronno opellene lon len.
Akka ul wonocapu ncik appik iomma lon loKapik wammakot aꞌrupu ammakka enni appik anaruk oththe pon pina itti nthongothe aꞌrupu wen.
Anaruk nipitto ngili ngoKapik ana aꞌrupu enni wettat non.”
“Lungkat lin, nokorronno ona nꞌre akka oththe pon popirat noka itti kwethet non ngili ngung.

Okette aꞌrupu ia ngkwonu aikket ul iella aꞌrupu cik. Aꞌrntinthet ka kang aꞌruk wothaꞌrthan tothiꞌrot ithakorronno okïttako ana na athoꞌrumako nan ana pul pothuꞌran pella ipamunye ana na nangak nella inacukwiet.
Akka cïkït cang caka na thaꞌrthan thang thaik cakuruk.”
AIeccuo aꞌrungkat noꞌron akwere itti, “Okuccekinthet ngre cik karkkopul ipakot eret wore ana kꞌran kothik kung kocciettat.
Oka ammakka ul iaik waꞌrikot opït pen amma akwokkaprttako ntan nti ithïpa akin ina akka akin anyinok kathat koricürük aththaman.

Laka loporot noul iareko tuan itti opït pen poruan pathiot kin akin thaik ngkït thapat amma kwaat, mpiꞌret non lon ilaik ïcat ook ngka kung kwako eret wore ana kwikkiekin cik, akwikkekat kin thuꞌrit akin oꞌrko.
Okin thapira noka cannan amma kwaththiot kin ngkït thapat amma manna kwantanthan thampang thongkꞌra cannan.
Anaruk nina nan itti, amma pul poruan pappina caꞌri ica pul pothuꞌran paik panthan nan, kwira pannokorronno pul pothuꞌran apiꞌriko noppan.
Ittina nokuccekot cik cakuruk akka ukul wopul iponyi wanthan nocaꞌri icanon thomma itti kwaik pao nan.”
APoththuruc ipittat Ili oIeccuo lon itti, “Ili, ngkwaik peret nïn llon ilokkwiettat kuru ncik ellii? Okorronno oka meniki, ngkwaik peret ul appiki?”
AIli oIeccuo othïat tit itti, “Pul ipaccokot lon ana ipinaik nti ica ana okuccet loncik papenang, ook okkwi ipa pul iprïk onekket cik ipakatha lon loul iarekinok apethet kin thuꞌrit nocaꞌri icoporot.
Laka loporot cannan nopul ipareko pen ipa apït athiot akwokkot ngre papenang amma kwokkaprttakot ntan.
Ittina mponu itti mpiꞌret non ïcat itti opït pethok lon lokaman ikkun appik.
Anaruk amma pul ipareko popri itti, ‘Opït pin paccoik kwannao aththaman,’ akwikkat cik akwokkwe ul iareko iomura ana iari ana akwikkoik akwoꞌrko thuꞌrit ana ïkko ngapak ana okkwiet ka kung ngapak.
Menik opït popul ipareko panthan nocaꞌri ana nocïngkï ica pul ipareko pomma nan itti kwaik panthan nan. Ana amma kwaat kwaccokiethok thiak cannan akworrekathok iul iannoccïkot lon nomïkït.
Pul ipareko ipina ngre ngopït ana pannokuccekinthet cik manna okorronno oreko ngre inga apït ponu itti ngarekitta, kwapoko cannan.

Anaruk okkwi ipommat ngre ngopït ana ipakkot lon moloko, kwapoko uꞌret wotteik. Ana amma opilin peettathe aꞌrupu woppot aꞌrupu woppot wipittakothok ana okkwi ipoccokiettathe aꞌrupu woppot, ana kwipittakot aꞌrupu woppot cannan.”
AIeccuo appiꞌrekat itti, “Mpaat paththokwot thik nocapu tholon lothonceꞌret lon cik ana mpappongothe itti amma thokurathe ana thaik thacco.
Mponu itti mpaccokot thiak cannan. Mpannoka poporot noka ana mpaꞌrungkot pannoka poporot noka puccuk athoccokot thiak omttakat.
Nthame itti ikkre mpaat nocapu anona thikkoik thoporori? Aa, mpiꞌret non itti, okonnoka thikkoik thoporot anaruk thopettakorit.
Nciki inenni oingkat puccuk, ul woruan waik ukuluk willakorit weꞌra ana wꞌrapuruk, ieꞌra wꞌra lon lopangon ithꞌrapuruk ana iꞌrapuruk wꞌra lon lopangon itheꞌra.
Okin thillillako tit oththan ponyukul pꞌra lon lonyukul
ana nyukul nyꞌra lon loththan pen,
ana onnan pꞌra lon lonyukul inyari
ana nyukul inyari nyꞌra lon lonnan pen,
ana opïthe pꞌra lon lari wonyukul nyung
ana ari wonyukul nyung wꞌra lon lonnan polle.”
Akwiꞌrekat cungkut coul itti, “Amma onon thimmat anuththe aꞌrntakot ithiꞌrot na acïngkï arungko, anniꞌre itti kapik kaik kapo ana kapo ïcat.
Ana amma kanang okkurarot nthokkun wothothari amma akatha nacïngkï ummot ngngin, nthame itti cik caik cathakka cippa ana ïcat cathakka cippa.
Onon ithongothe itti nthinnikot lon, onon thina akka annina cik corothiꞌrot ana conocapu. Ngintha akka nthommanet lon ilaik inenni?”
“Nthontha akka nthꞌrat okwarttikinthet ka kon lon iloporot annokkot?

Amma pul pꞌrek porukwethung mpapꞌrek, akwancot kathar ikanon okꞌro lon len anon thaik nokathar anneo imakkma. Amma onon thannokꞌro lon naththeꞌra, ana kwanekothung tokït kopul ipakkma ana pul ipakkma pethung pul iprro ana pul iprro parrethung ikorrkkor.
Ana amma ellrïk lokkattathe mono arrettat ikorrkkor ngkwannoppot thapat kirrkkir puccuk aeekat kin akucci wokït iokwentakot.”
Caꞌri cen ul wꞌrek wokat cik iꞌrethe oIeccuo lon loul wonoththok poCelïl ia ili oPilaththoc pongwot caꞌri icakin thokat akin ethet Kapik aꞌrupu wothokiot ngüccük cik noppan toKapik.
AIeccuo othïat tit itti, “Ntheret nomïkït mon itti ul enni wonoththok poCelïl wokat wolon ilokithak cannan noul wꞌrek appik woCelïl akka okin thokkiettathe thiak ngkathar ngngki?
Mpiꞌret non itti annoka menik, anaruk amma onon thannopaꞌrine lon cik ilokithak onon thille appik cakuruk.

Laka laraththa noul iokat willet iattul ana ikken mormor (18) ia kaman ikukwit kukwit kapothe nan korikꞌral koCiluam? Nthame itti okin thokat tholon ilokithak cannan noul iaik nokaꞌran koUruccelim appiki?
Mpiꞌret non itti annoka menik anaruk amma onon thannopaꞌrine lon cik ilokithak cik ana onon thille appik.”
OIeccuo piꞌrekathe ul lon elli okkwie kuru ncik, itti, “Pul pꞌrek pokat cik ponat pira popïcït ittak akwoingkat itti kwothiththo nyukul nyen anaruk kwakanniat nyukul.

Menik apul iꞌrekat pul ipakathanok lon lottak itti, ‘Luput lothakkat lꞌrapuruk anaukko cene itti mpiththo ïcït nopïcït anaruk anokorronno incet aththik. Okiotheik, ngintha akka apokittinthet karak cik?’
Apul ipakatha lon lottak iꞌrekathok itti, ‘Opït pin, antokorronno thuput thulukku anorane cik anipot pocok tit.
Amma pokwonot nyukul thuput ithanthan laka loporot. Ana amma pannokwono antokiot cik.’”
Ana nocaꞌri caCcepith aIeccuo pappokat cik akwongkene ul lon nocuththun caꞌrama.
Ana pul pꞌrek ipopari pokat cik cïnang ipa uꞌrupa iokithak wothikkiet kimico ana ponu luput attul ana ikken mormor (18) pappuꞌrumakot cik ana pommat ocoꞌrot tit kirrkkir.
Anakka oIeccuo pimmarok akwakkarathok tokït koul akwomekathok itti, “Pul ipopari, ngko ngkwothikkiettat poporot nomio mang.”
Ittina akwonekkekat nyaun naak apul ocoꞌrat tit accokkot akwopirakanthet Kapik noka.
Apul iprïk ponocuththun caꞌrama uakat ka akka oIeccuo pittiethe pul ipopari nocaꞌri caCcepith apiꞌrekat ul itti, “Maꞌri maik mꞌrakkuruk mongre nanthan annittiettat nan annoka nocaꞌri caCcepith.”
AIli iꞌrekathok itti, “Onon ithinnikot lon, opilin nti ianon pannokꞌro ngura ngung ana ngeꞌringka nothoꞌrak nocaꞌri caCcepith akwothïkkïe ngꞌrii?
Pul ipopari empi pothiki thAprein ipa pul pothopulut pïꞌrïkïkkot thupuththuput luput attul ana ikken mormor lakannoka loporot itti kwelikkako nti iloꞌrak nocaꞌri caCcepethi?”
Anakka kwiꞌret lon elli, aul appik iꞌrat lon lung othiakat cik anaruk ul wopirakathe noka appik nolon ilopreththere ila kwokat akwokkot.
