Ittina aIeccuo iꞌrekat itti, “Ngili ngoKapik ngungkot ngintha ana ngintha akka anungkie ngngin?
Ngili ngoKapik ngungkot core icoththe cannan iceera nocapu. Pacokka apothakkakat pira ana uꞌrupe wuno nune nouꞌri wen.”
AIeccuo appipittat lon itti, “Ngintha akkungkot ngili ngoKapik?
Ngili ngoKapik ngikkoik ere müꞌrükül ima pul ipopari pocikittot mmꞌre moppot mono amꞌre inyakat ncik appik.”
Ittina aIeccuo oingkat okko ikarkoman ana naꞌran akwongkene akka kwokat cik akweo nokaꞌran koUruccelim.
Apul pꞌrek ipittathok itti, “Ili, ul wathoꞌrettat wotteik tulluki?”
AIeccuo othïanthet kin tit itti,
“Noꞌrumoik annina akka anniꞌriko nti icürük cokathat icomü akka mpiꞌret non itti, ul woppot wenekke itti wiꞌriko anaruk okin thakinniꞌriko.
Amma pul pokaman purokot mono unukkwot kathat ana nthacoꞌro thapat annakkakkaro ana annuet cik itti, ‘Paththi, anyinet nïn kathat.’
Anaruk kwathïot tit itti, ‘Mpommanon, ana manna itti onon thaat ngkartha.’
Ana onon thiꞌre itti, ‘Oron thoꞌrkot cik tothun ana ngkwongkenet iathar nakaman kïn kaik.’
Ana kwathïot tit itti, ‘Mpommanon, ana manna itti onon thaat ngkartha. Nopaꞌroik ntokït kin, onon ul appik iakkot lon ilokithak.’
Caꞌri cen onon thoo ana okꞌrellot kïnyït thocipit amma onon thimat Aprein ana oIccaak ana oIakup ana ul appik wothernte lon loKapik ingili ngorothiꞌrot anon ngka kon thorrettathe thapat.

Ul wanthan na acïngkï ummot ngngin ana na acorungkwot ana nthokkun wothokure amma akatha na acïngkï ummot ngngin ana thokkun wothothari amma akatha na acïngkï ummot ngngin ana wathikkoik nokamuthe ingili ngoKapik.
Okkwion ithaik tokït inenni thathoka thoceken ana okkwion ithaik thoceken inenni thathoka tokït.”
Caꞌri cen aul wꞌrek woPriccin akkakanthet oIeccuo aiꞌrekathok itti, “Opaꞌrik ncene aeo imakkren oIruthuc pongothe itti kwakkwothung.”
AIeccuo othïanthok tit itti, “Ngkonon aniꞌret pul emprïk ipokithak itti mpakïcce uꞌrupa iokithak ana ittiet ul iongo inenni ana ngorrot ana nomaꞌri imꞌrapuruk mpamartto lon lin.
Anaruk mpaik nokathar inenni ana ngorrot ana nomaꞌri imomakothe mpiꞌret non ïcarïcat itti, pul pella pothernte lon loKapik piot nokaꞌran koka nokaꞌran koUruccelim.”

“Uruccelim, Uruccelim, oung ipangwo ul wothernte lon loKapik ana okincot ul cik iothïlanthet non antokatha maꞌri mornoththa ima mpenekket itti mpaꞌrntot non tothun ammakka thakuꞌruk aꞌrntot opeon iuꞌruccu ana onon thꞌrat.
Nokatha kaman kon kei koththettanet non nan thellek.
Mpiꞌret non ïcat itti onon thakinnimman attang puccuk acaꞌri akkakat ica anniꞌret itti, ‘Athethïe oka nopul ipaat ngkꞌran koIli.’
Caꞌri cꞌrek caCcepith caIeccuo pappeot tuan topul pꞌrek iprïk nti iul woPriccin akin thoꞌrkoik. Kwokat akwoccurat kït nan papenang.
Cïnang apul pꞌrek ocoꞌrat tokït koIeccuo poththakathe tacok cik.
AIeccuo ipittat ul woPriccin ana ul iangkene lon lothonceꞌret lon cik akwiꞌrekat kin itti, “Lon locoꞌrotheik itti pul pittiettat nocaꞌri caCcepithi? ana amma okorronnok itti ïï pakinnittiettari?”
Anaruk okin thangkatheik menik aIeccuo onekat pul akwittiekat akwothïat ikathar.
Ittina kwipittathekin itti, “Amma opilin nti ianon ponu ukul ana manna ngura ngapothe irok nocaꞌri caCcepith, ngkwakannontho nti iroki?”
Ana okin thellakathe ilakin iꞌre.
Anakka oIeccuo pinat itti ul iakkarakot wummo aꞌran iathiakine cik wocittokït aikkoik nan akwokkwiekanthet kin lon kuru ncik itti,
“Amma opilin pakkarothung kamuthe kothipa kirrnni ikkoik nokaꞌran ikathiakine cik akka opilin pikko paththoka pakkarakot cakuruk ipathiakine cik naung.
Akka pul poruan ipakkarot non aththuththeꞌra panthan ana pamethung itti, ‘Urokinet pul empi nokaꞌran engki apikkoik.’ Ittina athiakat cik aurokat athikkat cik thoceken.

Anaruk amma ngkwakkarakothe kamuthe kꞌrek ikkik ciththoceken ana amma pul ipakkarorung paat ana pamethung itti, ‘Opuruko pin, aꞌrik athikkoik nokaꞌran ikoporot.’ Ittina ngkwaka pothiakinet cik tokït kopuruko pangon ithakkarakot appik.
Akka okkwi ipathikkie ka kung prïk kwathikkietta potte, ana okkwi ipathikkie ka kung potte kwathikkietta prïk.”

Ittina aIeccuo iꞌrekat pul ipakkarro ul itti, “Amma ngkwokkothe thuꞌrit korronno akkarot opuruko pangon ana opangkangon ana ul ionu kaman iccik kang iaaꞌrthan akka amma ngkwakkarot kin ana okin thaꞌrkoik ana okin thakkarothung kamuthe ken cakuruk ana ittina ngkwokkettat pꞌrïn.
Anaruk amma ngkwonu kamuthe akkari ul iella aꞌrupu cik ana ianiꞌrilla ana iaimico ana iꞌrimathe
ana ngkwethïettat cik. Akka okin thomma ethung lon iloporot, Kapik akkethung lon iloporot nocaꞌri ica ul ioporot uroko nti ithio.”
Anaruk akka puꞌrek nti iul iokat cik nokuppuꞌrung kothuꞌrit okin oIeccuon poccïkothe lon len akwiꞌrekat oIeccuo itti, “Thethïe thaka nopul ipaꞌrkoik nokamuthe ingili ngoKapik.”
AIeccuo othïat tit itti, “Pul pꞌrek pokkothe kamuthe mono apakkarat ul woppot.
Ana nocaꞌri cokamuthe kwothïathe ul wung iarekinok athiꞌret ul iokat wakkarakot itti, ‘Wanthan akka thuꞌrit thokuccettatheik pꞌrïn appik ana kamuthe kaik kathokkattat.’
Anaruk okin appik thikkatheik akin ere lon kurekkurek ilannokorronnokin itti okin thaeo. Opaththi porokït piꞌret itti, ‘Mpurno okero kopon ana mpaik pathokatha ana ngkwakorronnon aneo.’
Apilin iꞌrekat itti, ‘Mpurno okero nyura attul inyarako ngngin ana mpaik pathenekke ana ngkwakorronnon aneo.’
Apilin iꞌrekat itti, ‘Mpurnnipo pari ana mpaik pakannanthan.’

Apul ipareko okkaprttakat ntan apathiꞌrekat opït. Ittina apul poruan uakat ka apothïat pul ipareko itti, ‘Ngko cokoccokot akkatte iathar ittïttïk ana iarran woricarak coman aipo ul ntan cene iella aꞌrupu cik ana ul iomma onyaro ana iiꞌrimathe ana ul iaimico.’
Apul ipareko iꞌrekat opït itti, ‘Lon ila ngkwiꞌret itti lakkattat lokkattathe appik anaruk icci lꞌrek lappokkattat.’
Apït iꞌrekat pul ipareko itti, ‘Ngko akkette iathar ittïttïk ana iarran wokaman aiꞌret ul anthan puccuk akaman kin oppakat nul.
Mpiꞌrethung itti pul pella nti iul iakkarakot pinot thuꞌrit enthi aththik.’”
Ul wakat cik cungkut coppot ammakot oIeccuo akwoprttakat kin akwiꞌrekat itti,
“Amma opilin painin ana kwakannongathin cannan naththan ana onnan ana opari ana nyukul nyung ana opangon ithomura ana ithari ana manna thikkoik thung, kwannothakka pul pin ipammakothin.
Okkwi ipakannangkot itti kwaccokot thiak ana io nti ilon lin kwannothakka pul pin ipammakothin.
Nantome itti opilin pongothe nti ianon itti kuno man mïttïk ana mukwit. Kwannikkoik kappak akwothangante cekerek caꞌrupu iunta ngngin akwokatha itti amma kwonu akucci woppot iamarttinok ngrei?
Akka amma kwokkothe millang mono akwomma omartto thuno, okkwi ipimma lon len paccirok ngngin
akwiꞌre itti, ‘Opaththi empi purokiet man ncik itti kuno ana kwomakathe omartto.’

Nantome itti ili waik wathorro iili wꞌrek, wannikkoik athangante ul worithoꞌrak wung akwokatha itti amma ook akkarro ili wen ionu ul worithoꞌrak athar arrial (20,000) nul wung worithoꞌrak iaik athar attuli (10,000)?
Akka amma lalkothok itti kwannorro iaak kwathïot pul apothipitto lon lothopakkot ikuꞌri akkwarthuk ciththan.
Laik menik cakuruk okkwi ipannopaꞌrine lon cik appik, kwannothakka pul pin ipammakothin.”
“Nguculoththu ngoporot anaruk amma ngothakkat ngocalang, ngappothikkietta ngira taththa?
Ngannoka ngoporot nocapu ana nopocok anaruk nguntat cik.
Okkwi iponu unu itti kwoccïkot akwoccïkot.”
Caꞌri cꞌrek cokat cik aul iaꞌrntinthet nili akucci ana ul wolon ilokithak wokat cik iccik koIeccuo accïkot lon lung.
Anaruk ul woPriccin ana ul iangkene lon lothonceꞌret lon cik ikkat cik aerekot itti, “Pul empi pikkiet ul cik ionu lon ilokithak ana okin oꞌrkoik akin aththungon.”
Menik aIeccuo iꞌrekat lon okkwie kuru ncik itti,

“Nantome itti amma opilin nti ianon ponu lungkat arrial ukuluk (100) mono athungkat thulukku urat cik ntipangen. Kwannoththe nolungkat ilarrial wocoꞌrin ana alkaire ana ikken ukulacoꞌrin (99) akwothokwantot thungkat ithulukku ithuratheik ipira thapat puccuk akwiari?
Ana amma kwiothe kwapira noka akwonekat tocalak
akwopakkat ngngin tuan. Ittina amma kweot tuan kwakkaro opurukon ana ul wonocürük appik akwomet kin itti, ‘Nanthan unopira noka akka mpiothe thungkat thin ithokat thuratheik.’

Mpiꞌret non itti laka menik cakuruk, thopira noka thakaik tothiꞌrot mpul pulukku ipakkoik nti ilon ilokithak noul iaik arrial wocoꞌrin ana alkaire ana ikken ukullacoꞌrin ioporot iannangkot itti okin thakkaprttako nti ilon iokithak.”
“Nantome itti amma pul ipopari ponu akucci attul ana kuretheik nan kulukku kwannothoccie thik ana ollaik noppan appik ana okwantot cik kicce kicce puccuk akwiari?
Ana amma kwiothe kwakkaro opurukon ana ul wonocürük akwomet kin itti, ‘Nanthan unopira noka akka mpiothe ka kucci kin ikakkuratheik.’
Mpiꞌret non itti, ittina cakuruk uꞌrupa wothothïlettat woKapik wapira noka nopul ipokkarttakot nti ilon ilokithak.”
AIeccuo appikkat cik akwere okkwie lon kuru ncik itti, “Puꞌrek pokat cik ponu nyukul nyeꞌra.
Aukul iotte iꞌrekat oththan itti, ‘Pappa, opettinet nïn iaꞌrupu aethin ain.’ Ana kwillillanthet kin iaꞌrupu.
Aukul iotteik ikkat cik papotteik aꞌrntat aꞌrupu wung appik ia kwoccot akwoingkat ngngin ci noththok poka akwokïttat aꞌrupu wung cik nuthuk appik ia konat.
Manakka kwokïttothe aꞌrupu wung cik appik arï oꞌrat cik noththok pen appik tommaththik arï ikkat cik arokkwothok akka kwellat papꞌrek cik ipa kwoꞌrko.
Menik akwoingkat akwothorekat nopul pꞌrek ponoththok pen ipothïathok topon itti akwothoꞌrilikie nuththuruk thuꞌrit.
Ana kwappongothe itti kwaꞌrko thuꞌrit thonuththuruk itha kwokat cik akwikket anaruk pul pellakathe ipethok.
Anaruk kwopakkekathe lon nocïkït akwiꞌrekat itti, ‘Ul wornoththa iapappa porekiet tuan ana thuꞌrit thaik thoppot ana cene anio ntï.
Mpaeo anopakkinthet opappa anomethok itti, Pappa, mpokkothe lon moloko tokït koKapik ana tokït kang.
Mpakannoka pekkot nan itti mpakkarako itti ukul wang. Othikkien pul iparekinung.’
Ittina akurokat akwopakkanthet oththan.
Anaruk akka kwokat cik akkwarthuk ciththan, oththan pimmakathok athiak oppakat nocïkït thokkul wung. Akwollat taak akwïꞌrïkathok topere.
Aukul iꞌrekathok itti, ‘Pappa, mpokkothe lon moloko tokït koKapik ana tokït kang. Ana mpannekko itti mpakkarako itti ukul wang.’
Anaruk oththan piꞌrekathe ul iorekot tuan itti, ‘Nona eret iie iopeththere annakiek cokoccokot. Nakiek callong nocaun ana wok iracok.
Nona ngura iotte iittathe annokkwot. Ntürün oꞌrkoik ana ukkwo.
Akka ukul win enni wokat wiot ana wokkot cik ana wokat wuratheik ana wincathe.’ Ittina akin ikkat cik akin oꞌrkoik ana ukkwo.
Anaruk ukul wung irïk wellat ntopon manakka akko napuththut tuan accïkat ciririk ana ngïca.
Ittina kwakkarathe pul pꞌrek ipareko tuan ana kwipittathok itti, ‘Ngintha akkaik tuan?’
Apul ipareko othïnthok tit itti, ‘Opangkang paat ana oththe pokkwinthok ngura iotte iittathe akka kwokkaprttakot poporot.’
Ukul irïk wuakathe ka ana wꞌrakathe iꞌriko noppan. Menik oththan poppanthok thapat akuethok itti kwiꞌriko noppan.

Anaruk kwiꞌrekathe oththan itti, ‘Antokatha luput elli appik mpokat anorekinung cannan ere piak ana mpannarrot lon lang cik aththik ana ngkwakannethin manna ïmït wulukku anokkwot ïnnoꞌrko ïnopuruko pingon.
Anaruk akka ukul wang enni ioccot aꞌrupu wung appik ana waththokïttot cik akin oul iari iaꞌro nul nuthuk ana waat tuan ana ngkwokkwinthok ngura iotte iittathe.’
Aththan iꞌrekathok itti, ‘Ukul win, ngkwaik iraththeꞌra appinappin ana aꞌrupu win appik ien wang.
Anaruk oron thonu itti oron thakkot kamuthe ana opira noka akka opangkang empi pappuratheik ana kwincathe ana kwappokat piot ana kwokkot cik.’”
AIeccuo iꞌrekat ul iammakothok itti, “Pul pꞌrek pokat cik papaꞌrthan ana ponat pul iporekinok aul onakanthok lon itti pul iparekinok paik pakïttïnok thaꞌrthan.
Ittina apul ipapaꞌrthan akkarathok akwipittathok itti, ‘Lon liatha elli ila mpaik paccïkot aul erethung ngngin? Okenen ngintha akka ngkwokkothe akka ngkwannapporekinin pꞌrïn.’
Apul ipareko erekat noucce itti, ‘Ngintha akka anokkot inenni akka opït pin paik panekothin ngre? Ana mpomma ipot cik ana mpothiat cik ipittot ul aꞌrupu.’
Akwiꞌrekat itti, ‘Mpina lon ila anokkot akka amma kwopaꞌrerin cik nore aul ina akka aikkien cik tuan thanen.’
Menik akwakkarat ul iokat wannokke aꞌrupu wopït pung akwipittat okkwi porokït itti, ‘Ngkwonu kamucu kornoththa ikokwentakot nocalak cang kopït pin?’
Apaththi pen othïat tit itti, ‘Kokwentakot melun maak ngoceththun arrial ukuluk maꞌri mormor (800).’
Apul iparekinok iꞌrekathok itti, ‘Oneki kaꞌrmacak akurro itti ngkwokwentakinet melun maak ngoceththun arrial ukuluk maꞌri mocoꞌrin (400).’
Akwappipittat opilin itti, ‘Ana ngkwokwentakinet kamucu kornok?’
Akwiꞌrekathok itti, ‘Mpokwentakinet othan womïl kathar kulukku (1000).’
Apul ipareko iꞌrekathok itti, ‘Oneki kaꞌrmacak akurro itti ngkwokwentakinet arrial ukuluk maꞌri moromor (800).’
Opït pen pomerekekathe pul ipakannoreko ncïkït culukku nothinangka. Akka ul wonocapu enci winangka okkot lon lonocapu. Anaruk ul wongili ngoKapik wannoka winangka llon lonocapu.”
AIeccuo iꞌrekat itti, “Nokkot thuruko nthaꞌrthan thon thonocapu akka amma thaꞌrthan thomarttakot annina akka annikkiettaik ikaman kothupuththuput.
Okkwi ipoꞌrumot nolon ilotteik kwaꞌrumo nolon iloppot cakuruk ana okkwi ipannoꞌrumo nolon ilotte kwannoꞌrumo nolon iloppot.
Ittina amma ngkwappannoꞌrumo nolon lonocapu papenang, oththa akkethung lon lothaꞌrthan ithaik ïcat?
Ana amma ngkwannoꞌrumo naꞌrupu wopul pꞌrek oththa akkethung aꞌrupu wang itti ngkwaꞌrumo nan?
Pul pella ipareko parekine nili neꞌra kwonu itti kwꞌra ili wꞌrek akwongat aꞌrek ana manna itti kwoccokot wulukku akworakke aꞌrek. Ittina lomma itti onon thangat Kapik ana ongat thaꞌrthan.”
Manakka ul woPriccin woccïkothe lon elli okin thikkathe cik akin okkothok ngure ngngin akka okin thaththongothe akucci.
AIeccuo iꞌrekat kin itti, “Onon thathikkie ka kon thoporot tokït koul anaruk Kapik kina ilaik nomikït mon. Akka lon ila ul okatha itti loporot lella lon cik tokït koKapik.”

“Lon lothonceꞌret lon cik loMucca lokat cik ana ul wothernte lon loKapik werntet puccuk mono aIuanna pomamuthie akkakat. Nci cïnang alon iloporot longili ngoKapik antikkat cik alongkenetta ana ul woppot waik wennekke itti waeo ingili ngoKapik.
Tothiꞌrot ana capu thintat cik aththaman anaruk tamping tella tulukku irintat cik nolon lothonceꞌret lon cik.
Okkwi ipathïo pari pung itti akwappipo apꞌrek kwaik paꞌro nul iari ittat. Ana okkwi ipipot pari pothïlat kwaik paꞌro nul iari ittat.”
AIeccuo ikkat cik akwere icci itti, “Pul pꞌrek pokat cik papaꞌrthan ana pakot eret ionu cekerek crïk ana ikkoik nokaꞌran ikopeththere ana akwoꞌrko thuꞌrit thothiot ana okkot kamuthe appinappin.
Ana pul pꞌrek pokat cik poccot kꞌran itti oLiaccir pokat papiak pellat papꞌrek cik ana ponat ïnyï noka ana ul wokat cik annennekok annekkethok tocürük copul ipapaꞌrthan.
Ana pokat apoꞌrïkot itti paꞌrko thuꞌrit itha apukkot cik noküpppüꞌrüng kopul ipapaꞌrthan. Ana luk lokat cik alacceccenok ïnyï.
Acaꞌri akkakat apul ipa piak iat auꞌrupa wothothïlettat woKapik onekathok tothiꞌrot na Aprein paik apul ipapaꞌrthan iat cakuruk akwocïkkakat.
Apul ipapaꞌrthan onthat kït nciki thothïrïn na kwokat cik akwoccokot thiak akwimmakat Aprein ciththan ana oLiaccir iccik kung.
Akwakkarat kin itti, ‘Ngappa pin Aprein, ipi thiak thin othïnthin oLiaccir akwothape caun ngꞌri akwonekkenthin nothuꞌre akka mpaik paccokot thiak cannan icꞌrot enci.’

Anaruk Aprein pothïanthok tit itti, ‘Ukul win, antokwarttikot itti akka ngkwokat parthuk io, ngkwonat aꞌrupu wang ioporot appik ana oLiaccir puruk ponat aꞌrupu wulluk iokithak appik anaruk inenni cene kwopirat noka ana ngkwaik paccokot thiak.
Ana icci inenni oron thonu thupuꞌru thukwit thopettot iaron thannokorronno opilin nti ianïn itti kwarrot cik ntan itti kwainenon ana cakuruk nti ianon pul pella parrot cik ntan itti painenïn.’
Apul ipokat papaꞌrthan appothïat tit itti, ‘Pappa, amma menik mpipittothung itti othïothe oLiaccir tuan topappa.
Akka mponu opangkingon ukuluk akwotherenekin othakka itti akin akorronno anthan cakuruk nokaꞌran engki kothoccokot thiak.’
Aprein iꞌrekathok itti, ‘Okin thonu oMucca ana ul wothernte lon loKapik kirrnni akin occïkot kin.’
Apul ipapaꞌrthan iꞌrekat Aprein itti, ‘Aa, pappa, amma puꞌrek purokot nti ithio mono apoinekin okin thaccïkothok akin opaꞌranthet lon iokithak cik.’
Aprein appiꞌrekathok itti, ‘Amma okin thannoccïkot lon loMucca ana ul wothernte lon loKapik okin thannokkwine lon lꞌrek kunu ncik ana antoka manna itti pul pꞌrek purokot nti ithio.’”
AIeccuo iꞌrekat ul iammakothok itti, “Laik ilakorronno ul akkot lon ilokithak akka lon ammakka elli lonu itti lakaik anaruk angkre nopul ipana lon len.
Laka loporot naak itti kwaꞌrettane cna icalak akwantorrettat irok irapangka nothokorronno kin akin okkiet opilin nti iakkwion itharran lon ilokithak.
Ittina noꞌrumo noka kon.
Amma opangkang pꞌrek pokkothe lon lokithak aꞌretti naak ana amma kwocottakot ntit accïkïnthok.
Antoka manna itti kwokkinthung lon lokithak maꞌri meꞌreꞌrapuruk nocaꞌri culukku, mono akwainung akwomethung itti ‘Mpopaꞌrinet lon cik,’ accïkïnthok lon ilokithak.”
Aul wothothïlettat woIeccuo ipittathok itti, “Arttinthet nïn nothoccokot lon lang nomïkït.”
AIeccuo othïanthet kin tit itti, “Amma onon akkonu thoccokot tholon loKapik thotteik ere core icoththe, nthamet pira itti, ‘Uroki ncü athocïkko ka kang irok irapangka,’ ana paccïkot non.
Nantome itti opilin ponu pul iparanok ana manna uꞌre lungkat. Amma paat nti ikkwon opït pamethok itti, ‘Aꞌrik aththikkoik aꞌrko thuꞌriri’?
Lannoka menik anaruk kwiꞌrethok itti, ‘Okuccenthin thuꞌrit cik aꞌrikothin anoꞌrkoik kappak amma mpoꞌrkot cik antoꞌrkoik.’
Kwapirie pul ipareko noka akka kwokkothe lon iliꞌrettathok itti kwakkori? Kwannopiriek noka.
Ittina menik onon cakuruk amma onon thokkothe lon ilanon thaththiꞌrettathe itti nthakkot onon nthira thiꞌre cakuruk itti, ‘Onïn ul iareko tulluk onïn thannekko nan itti ïnthapirietta noka.’”
Anakka oIeccuo pokat cik akweo nokaꞌran koUruccelim okko nokwen konoththok poCcamira ana noththok poCelïl.
Ana akka kwokat cik akwiꞌriko icarak coman, kwocurathe iul attul wonat ïnyï noka acoꞌrat ciththan
aikkat akkaro mpoꞌre cittan itti, “OIeccuo pul ipangkene, ipi thiak thïn.”
Anakka kwimmat kin akwiꞌrekat itti, “Ngkonon annothokene ul wonoppan toKapik ka kon.” Anakka okin thokat cik akin eo akin othiat ka ken akin thothakkat thoporot.
Akka opilin nti iakin paththiot itti kwothakkat poporot, kwokkaprttakathe ntan akwopirakanthet Kapik noka mpoꞌre cittan.
Akworrekat ka kung iracok toIeccuo akwopirakanthok noka ana kwokat poul wonoththok poCcamirin.
AIeccuo iꞌrekat itti, “Okin thakorronno othikkietta thoporot attuli? Ana opilingon thꞌrek thaik kren ukulacoꞌrin?
Pul pella ipokkaprttakot itti pathopirane Kapik noka ook empi pokwat.”
OIeccuo piꞌrekathok itti, “Uroki aeo akka thoccokot tholon loKapik thang nocïkït thothikkierung poporot.”
Aul wꞌrek woPriccin ipittat oIeccuo itti, “Ngili ngoKapik nganthan acintha.”
AIeccuo iꞌrekat kin itti, “Ngili ngoKapik ngakorronno anthan nuthuk nci nokkït angimmako.
Pul pella ipiꞌre itti, ‘Katha ngei cene’ ana manna itti, ‘Katha ngeꞌre ceneket’ akka ngili ngoKapik ngaik ianon.”
Menik akwiꞌrekat ul iammakothok itti, “Caꞌri canthan icanon okwancot cik ngngin itti nthimma caꞌri culukku nocaꞌri cokkul wopul iponyi anaruk onon thakinnimma.
Ul wꞌrek wakaik iiꞌret non itti, ‘Katha kwei’ ana itti, ‘Katha kweꞌre ceneket,’ anaruk nokorronno omakot kin.
Akka ukul wopul iponyi amma anthan nocaꞌri cung caka ere thuleꞌrak ithallio ntothiꞌrot athocciekat cik tothiꞌrot appik nci thocipit puccuk oingkat thocipit ceꞌrek.
Anaruk kwonu cittokït itti kwaccokot thiak cannan ana ul iaik inenni wꞌrak.
Ana ammakka lokat nocaꞌri coNua, lakaik nocaꞌri cokkul wopul iponyi cakuruk.
Nocaꞌri cen ul wokat cik aꞌrkoik ana ïkko ngapak ana ittetto puccuk mono acaꞌri akkakat, aNua iꞌrikat ikuppuꞌrung konoiꞌri angike akkakat mono ongwat kin appik ithokat thanniꞌriko ikuppuꞌrung.
Lokat cik cakuruk menik nocaꞌri coLot, ul wokat cik aꞌrkoik ana ïkko ngapak ana okette ana okero ana ora ana uno.
Anaruk caꞌri ica oLot poththet nokaꞌran koCcothum aKapik orrekat thik ana monyïk molik ntothiꞌrot mono amokꞌrekat kin appik ithokat nokaꞌran koCcothum.
Laka menik caꞌri ica ukul wopul iponyi ummot ncik.
Nocaꞌri cen pul pella ipaik ci toꞌra woman mung imonu aꞌrupu tit aporpot cik ntan itti pathummo aꞌrupu. Ana menik pul pella ipaik topon piꞌre itti papakkot tuan apothummo aꞌrupu wꞌrek.
Nantokwarikot lon lopari poLot.
Okkwi ipome itti kwaꞌrumo nothikkoik thung kuret cik ana okkwi ipuret thikkoik thung cik kwangwot.
Mpiꞌret non itti, ngkoꞌra ngen ul waka weꞌra naꞌrangkal ulukku apꞌrek panekitta apꞌrek oththetta nan.
Ana ul iari weꞌra iakakot mïl ithun, pꞌrek panekitta ana apꞌrek oththetta nan.”
[“Ul weꞌra iomura iareko ikkwon pꞌrek panekitta ana apꞌrek paththetta nan.”]
Aul wung imakothok ipittathok itti, “Ili, elli lakaik kartha?”
AIeccuo othïanthet kin tit itti, “Na ka ikiot kaik nengki naꞌrntakot nan.” OIeccuo pothïotherit llon elli akwokene itti thao thung thinako nan.
Ittina aIeccuo iꞌrekat ul iammakothok lon nthokkwie kuru ncik, akwokenekin itti okin nthonu itti okin thaꞌra ngaꞌrama appinappin okorronno ocoꞌro ntit.
Akwiꞌrekat kin itti, “Pul pꞌrek pokat cik nokaꞌran kꞌrek, ponu lon lothonceꞌret lon cik ikkun pokat cik apokorronno opellene Kapik ana manna okorronno occot kït noul.
Ana pul ipopari pꞌrek pokat nokaꞌran ken pacuruma ana pokat apoincene pul pothonceꞌret lon cik apipittittothok itti, ‘Onceꞌrenthet nïn lon cik onïn opul pꞌrek panïn thonu lon lokithak onïn aththut.’
Apul ipanceꞌret lon cik pikkatheik maꞌri moppot apꞌrat okkot lon lꞌrek anaruk kwiꞌrekathe ka kung itti, ‘Antoka manna itti mpannopellene Kapik ana manna ul ionyi.
Anaruk akka curuma enci caik caukkinin, mponu itti mpakꞌrinok lon lung akka amma mpannittarothok ana cakkinthin poꞌre ica.’”
Ana Ili wiꞌrekathe itti, “Nantoccïkot lon ila pul ipannonceꞌret lon cik ipakwïettot akka piꞌret.
Kapik kannonceꞌrenthet ul wung ia kwakkarot lon ciki, ioo ngkoꞌra ana icïngkï? Kaꞌrungkot nan opakkukkwet kini?
Mpiꞌret non itti kwaccot kït nan itti lon len lonceꞌrettatheik ana cokoccokot, anaruk amma ukul wopul iponyi waat, wathiot ul nocapu awoccokothe lon loKapik nomïkïri?”
OIeccuo papprokkwiekat lon kuru ncik akweret ul iakatha ka ken itti okin thoporot tokït koKapik ana akin okatha ul appik itti wokithak.
“Ul wꞌrek weot weꞌra itti wathaꞌra ngaꞌrama noppan toKapik, opilin noul woPriccin ana opilin noul iaꞌrntot akucci.

Apul poPriccin urokat kapik ana paꞌrakanthet ka kung ngaꞌrama itti, ‘Kapik kin mpopirat noka akka mpannoka ammakka ul wꞌrek, woluꞌran ana iakkot lon ilokithak ana iaꞌro nari woul, ana manna ammakka pul empi ipaꞌrintinthet nili akucci.
Mpacoꞌro nothuꞌrit maꞌri meꞌra nomaꞌri imeꞌreꞌrapuruk ana mpillillo iaꞌrupu appik ia Kapik kethin kurekkurek attul attul anethet Kapik nan puluk puluk.’

Anaruk pul ipaꞌrntot akucci pocoꞌrothe ciththan ciththan napilingon. Ana kwipathe nꞌre okatha tothiꞌrot ana kwonekkekathe ukun topere akkwannoka poporot noka akwiꞌrekat itti, ‘Kapik, ipi thiak thin, oun pul polon ilokithak.’”

Ittina aIeccuo iꞌrekat itti, “Mpiꞌret non itti pul ipaꞌrntot akucci akkeot tuan poporot tokït koKapik, akka okkwi ipathikkie ka kung prïk kwathikkietta potte ana okkwi ipathikkie ka kung potte kwathikkietta prïk.”
Ul wokat cik cakuruk annane oIeccuo nyukul inyarran othakka itti akwethïenekin. Anakka ul iammakothok wimmat menik okin thothirriekathe ul cik ionat nyukul.
Anaruk oIeccuo pakkarathe nyukul inyarran anyainok ana kwiꞌrekathe itti, “Nokorronno nyukul inyarran anyao naun nokorronno oceꞌrekin akka ngili ngoKapik ngoul iammakka okin.
Mpiꞌret non lon ilaik ïcat itti, okkwi ipannocco ngili ngoKapik ammakka nyukul inyarran, kwanniꞌrikorit.”
Aili wꞌrek woul woIouth ipittat oIeccuo itti, “Pul ipangkene ipoporot, ngintha akka anokkot aniꞌriko ithikkoik thothupuththuput?”
AIeccuo othïanthok tit itti, “Ngkwakkakkaron itti pul ipoporot akaintha? Pul pella poporot Kapik kulluk akkoporot.
Ngkwina lon ilattuli ilonthomat ila Kapik kethet oMuccai iliꞌre itti, ‘Kirrnni aꞌro nul iari ittat, kirrnni okkwot pul, kirrnni omunye, kirrnni ere lon ngkarra, othianet oththe ana onne cik.’
Aili iꞌrekat itti, “Mpokkothe lon ellrïk appik amparthuk potteik.”

Manakka oIeccuo poccïkothe ila kwiꞌret akwiꞌrekathok itti, “Lon laik lulukku langkwarthuk okkot, okette aꞌrupu appik ethet ul iella alpꞌrek cik akucci ana ngkwaka paꞌrthan tothiꞌrot ittina aina akka amakothin.”
Manakka kwoccïkothe elli kuakathe ka cannan akka kwokat paꞌrthan prïk.
AIeccuo okathakathok akwiꞌrekat itti, “Lommaththik itti pul ipapaꞌrthan piꞌriko ingili ngoKapik.
Anaruk lippappat itti thamla thakko icürük coipre nopul ipapaꞌrthan itti piꞌriko ingili ngoKapik.”
Okkwion ithoccïkothe lon len ipittat oIeccuo itti, “Amma ittina oththa akkaꞌrettat?”
AIeccuo othïat tit itti, “Lon ilonthomat nopul iponyi lakannoka lonthomat noKapik.”
APoththuruc iꞌrekat oIeccuo itti, “Onïn thoththet naꞌrupu appik ïnomakothung.”
AIeccuo iꞌrekat kin itti, “Mpiꞌret non lon ilaik ïcat, okkwi ipoththet nokaman kung ana nopari pung ana napangon ana naththan ana onnan ana nyukul nyung nti ilon longili ngoKapik
kwacco lon loppot iloporot nothikkoik thung cene inenni ana kwacco thikkoik thothupuththuput noluput ilanthan.”

AIeccuo onekat ul wothothïlettat wung iattul ana ikken keꞌra thocipit akwiꞌrekat kin itti, “Noccïkot, oron thaik thakuꞌrot nokaꞌran koUruccelim ana lon appik ila ul wothernte lon loKapik ilerethe ukul wopul iponyi laik lathothakka ïcat.
Kwaik pathettat ul iakonnoka woIouth okin thaccirok ngngin ana ocungkok ana othukkothok nguk ana okkwekok ana okkwothok
ana nomaꞌri mꞌrapuruk kuroko nti ithio.”
Aul woIeccuo iammakothok okinninakat lon len ila oIeccuo paik peret akka lon len lokat lamuꞌruttakothekin.
Annakka oIeccuo pokat cik akweo nokaꞌran kAria, apul pꞌrek pokat cik piꞌrimathe apikkoik nokuthut kokathar apipittot ul aꞌrupu.
Manakka pul pen poccïkothe aul okkot poꞌre aeo apul pen ipittat itti, “Ngintha akkaik.”
Akin iꞌrekathok itti oIeccuo poNaccir paik paeo.
Akwikkat cik akwakkakkaro oIeccuo itti, “Ukul woThauth, ipi thiak thin.”
Aul iokat cik tokït othirriekathok cik aiꞌrekathok itti, “Angkik,” anaruk kwikkatheik akwokkot poꞌre cannan itti, “Ukul woThauth, ipi thiak thin.”
OIeccuo pocoꞌrathe akwiꞌrekat kin lon lonthomat itti, “Nonakok cene.” Anakka kwaat iccik koIeccuo aIeccuo iꞌrekat pul pen itti,
“Ngkwongothe itti mpakkinthung ngintha?”
Akwothïat tit itti, “Ili, mpongothe itti mpimmaik.”
AIeccuo iꞌrekathok itti, “Thoccokot lon loKapik nocïkït cang thimmierung cik.”
Ncïnang akwimmakat cik ana kwomakathe oIeccuo akwopirakanthet Kapik noka. Anakka ul appik wimmat akin ikkat cik akin opirane Kapik noka.
OIeccuo piꞌrikathe nokaꞌran kAria ana kwokat cik akwokko ikathar cinang.
Apul pꞌrek pokat cik ipa ili woul iaꞌrntot akucci poccot kꞌran itti oCcakka papaꞌrthan.
Kwokat cik pongothe itti kwimma itti oIeccuo okkwen anaruk kwokat cik puththut puththut akkwannimmakat cik akka ul wokat cik woppot.
Ittina akwollat tokït koIeccuo kwarrat topira popïcït itti akwina akka akwimma oIeccuo akka kwokat cik pathokko ikathar ken.
Manakka oIeccuo paat nokaꞌran ken akwocoꞌrat akwokathakat tothiꞌrot akwiꞌrekat oCcakka itti, “Aꞌrik uintan cokoccokot mpaik paeo tuan thanang inenni.”
Ittina akworpat accokot ana kwikkiekathe oIeccuo cik tuan nthopira noka cannan.
Aul appik immakat lon len ana wikkatheik aꞌrettakot itti oIeccuo peot tuan topul polon ilokithak akin othikkoik okin aththut.

Anaruk oCcakka pocoꞌrathe kapik ana kwiꞌrekathe Ili itti, “Ili, occïkothin caꞌri enci inenni mpaik pillo iaꞌrupu win appꞌrut anikket ul iella aꞌrupu cik, ana amma mpokwïethe opilin ana mpakkekok maꞌri mocoꞌrin arttot nan.”
AIeccuo iꞌrekat itti, “Inenni thoꞌret thaat tuan topul empi akka ook cakuruk ukul wAprein.
Akka ukul wopul iponyi waat itti wathokwantot ana oꞌret ul iuratheik.”

Anakka okin thokat cik akin occïkot lon elli, kwappiꞌrekat kin lon okkwie kuru ncik akka kwokat cik akwokko napuththut iccik konokaꞌran koUruccelim ana ul wikkatheik aiꞌre itti ngili ngoKapik ngaik nganthan inenni.
Kwiꞌrekathe itti, “Pul pꞌrek prïk pokat cik peot nocoꞌrong ciththan othakka itti akwothothikkiettatta ili irïk akwantokkaprttako ntan tuan.
Ana kwakkarathe ul attul iarekinok akwikkekat kin akucci ana kwiꞌrekathe kin itti, ‘Nocco akucci enni annorekie ananthan.’
Anaruk ul wung wokat wꞌrarok ana wothïathe ul nocoꞌrong na kwaththothakka ili athiꞌre itti, ‘Onïn thannangkot itti pul empi pathakka ili wïn.’
Anaruk kwothakkakathe ili ana kwokkaprttakathe ntan tuan ana kwothïanthet ul ia kwappethet akucci itti warekie, akwokatha itti ngimpen akka okin thokkothe ngngin.
Apul porokït akkakat apiꞌrekat itti, ‘Pït pin, akucci wang ia ngkwethin warttakothe nan attul.’
Apït pung iꞌrekat itti, ‘Ngkwokkothe lon loporot, pul iparekinin ipoporot. Ana inakka ngkwoꞌrumot nongere engngi ngoththeik papenang ia ngkwoccot, ittina mpanekkethung ili waꞌran attul.’
Apilin akkakat akwiꞌrekat itti, ‘Pït pin, akucci wung warttakothe nan ukuluk.’
Aili iꞌrekathok itti, ‘Ngkwacco aꞌran ukuluk akatha lon len.’
Apilin pꞌrek akkakat akwiꞌrekat itti, ‘Pït pin, akucci wang wei ia ngkwethin mpïꞌrïkothe ikret.
Mpokat ponu nꞌre nang akka ngkwommaththik pella thiak nocïkït ngkwonnekot ul aꞌrupu iakannoka wang ana okio aꞌrupu ia ngkwannee.’
Apït othïat tit itti, ‘Mpakkmang nti ilon lang, oung pul ipareko ipokithak. Ngkwina kicce itti mpommaththik pella thiak ana mpaaneko aꞌrupu iannoka win, ana mpakio aꞌrupu ia mpannee?
Ngintha akka ngkwannorekiene akucci win othakka itti amma mpaat anoneko mpangken iparttakothe nan?’
Ittina akwiꞌrekat okkwion ithokat cik akin acoꞌro cïnang itti, ‘Nonekothok akucci annethet pul iponu akucci attul.’
Akin iꞌrekat itti, ‘Pït pïn, pul empeꞌre ponu attul.’
Akwopakkekanthet kin tit itti, ‘Mpiꞌret non itti, Okkwi iponu woppot kwettat arttot nan anaruk okkwi ipellaik kwanekittat manna ia konu appik.
Anaruk okin ithathoꞌrak thin ithannangkot itti mpaka ili wen, nona kin annongwot kin tokït kin cene.’”
Anakka oIeccuo piꞌret lon elli, akwoingkat okuꞌrot nokaꞌran koUruccelim.
Manakka akwokko ciki iccik konokaꞌran koPeththppaci ana Peththania nocoꞌrong coCeththun, kwothïathe ul weꞌra nti iul iammakothok akwiꞌrekat kin itti,
“Ngkonon nokaꞌran tokït kon ana amma anniꞌriko tit onon thathiot ngeꞌringka iotte ngïꞌrïkakot ia pul pella parrothe tan. Nokꞌro annonanin.
Amma pul pꞌrek pipittothe non itti, ‘Onon thaik thakꞌro ngeꞌringka akaintha?’ anniꞌrethok itti, ‘Ili akkiꞌret itti onïn thathokꞌro.’”
Okin ithokat thothïlathe thoingkathe ana okin thaththiat ammakka oIeccuo piꞌrethekin.
Anakka okin thokat cik akin okꞌro ngeꞌringka aul ionu ngeꞌringka ipittat kin itti, “Nthontha akka anokꞌro ngeꞌringka?”
Akin othïat tit itti, “Ili akkiꞌret itti onïn thakꞌro.”
Okin thonakanthet oIeccuo ngeꞌringka iotte akin ipanthok eret cik tan akin arriekathok tan.
Akka akweo, aul ikkat cik aipinthok eret cik ikathar akwonyaro nan.
Anakka kwaat iccik kokaꞌran na kathar kokkot uo thaiken nocoꞌrong coCeththun, ul iammakothok appik wikkatheik apirane Kapik noka nolon mpoꞌre cittan appik ilommaththik ilakin thimmat aiꞌre itti,
“Athethïetta oka noili iaik wanthan ngkꞌran koIli.”
“Athomicco oka tothiꞌrot ana thrïk oine Kapik tothiꞌrot.”
Aul wꞌrek woPriccin iꞌrekat oIeccuo itti, “Pul ipangkene, othirriethe ul cik iammakothung wang akin angkoik.”
AIeccuo iꞌrekat itti, “Mpiꞌret non amma okin akkangkot cik ana mothok moo.”
Manakka akwokko iccik konokaꞌran koUruccelim akwimmakat kaꞌran akwikkat cik akwoot pothok
ana kwiꞌrekathe itti, “Lokithak cannan inenni itti ul wang womma itti ngimpen akkananekin thomicco. Anaruk inenni lamuꞌruttakot nokït kon.
Maꞌri mainenon amma thoꞌrak thang okkwot karrang naung ana nopothok poUruccelim ana ullukkinthet non cik naꞌran appik ana okkwet non ithoꞌrkït.
Okin thoꞌrumathung akin okakꞌrathung cik nocapu, oung ana nyukul inyanon thaik. Ana okin thannokwento pothok pulukku topangken akka onon thomma caꞌri coKapik ica akainenon nan.”
Ittina oIeccuo piꞌrikathe noppan toKapik ana kwikkatheik akwokïccet ul thapat iokat cik akettet aꞌrupu.
Akwiꞌrekat ul itti, “Lokurrakot itti, ‘Man min maꞌrama’ ana onon thothikkiet moul wothuꞌran.”

Ana oIeccuo pikkatheik akwongkene noppan toKapik. Ana ul ittïttïk woul wonoppan toKapik ana ul iangkene lon lothonceꞌret lon cik ana ul wꞌrek ittïttïk wikkatheik akwariccat kathar ika kin okkwothok ngngin
anaruk okin thakinniat kathar ikakin okkot lon len ngngin akka ul waik woppot accïkot lon ila oIeccuo pokat cik akwere.

Nocaꞌri cꞌrek caIeccuo pokat cik akwongkene ul noppan toKapik ana akwerene kin lon iloporot loKapik, ul ittïttïk woul wonoppan toKapik ana ul iangkene lon lothonceꞌret lon cik nul ittïttïk akkakat naak
aiꞌrekathok itti, “Iꞌrethenïn ngkwaik pangkene ngngili ngiatha ana oththa akkethung ngili ngen?”
AIeccuo omekat kin itti, “Mponu thipitto anipittot non. Niꞌrethin,
mamuthie moIuanna mokat ntothiꞌrori ana amma okorronno oka ntothiꞌrot ana mokat nopul iponyi?”
Akin ikkat cik akin erettarne thellek akin iꞌre itti, “Amma oron thiꞌret itti, ‘Ntothiꞌrot’ ana kwiꞌretton itti, ‘Onon thontha akka onon thannoccokot lon lung nomïkït?’
Ana amma oron thiꞌret itti, ‘Nopul iponyi’ ana ul appik wakinco oron mothok akka okin thoccokothe lon itti oIuanna pokat pul wothernte lon loKapik.”
Ittina akin othïanthok itti, “Onïn thomma itti maat ngkeren.”
AIeccuo iꞌrekat kin itti, “Mpakinniꞌret non itti ngngili ngiatha inga mpaik pakkot llon elli cakuruk.”
Akwikkat cik akwerene ul okkwie lon kuru ncik akwiꞌre itti, “Pul pꞌrek peet maa apekat ul wꞌrek ara, amma okin thokiot akin ethok motte nan akwoingkat nokurtti imakkren akwoccat cik.
Anakka caꞌri caat cothokio apothïat pul pung iparekinok itti akin ethok aꞌrupu iakin thethok. Anaruk okin thokkwekathe pul iparekinok mono othïat ikathar nyaun ncürük.
Akwothïat pul ipareko pꞌrek anaruk okin thokkwekathe ana okkiet thiak akin othïat nyaun ncürük. Akwappothïat apꞌrek akin ipiekathok ka kongo akin othïathok nyaun ncürük.
Ana icci akwappothïat apꞌrek ana okin thokkwekathe ana okin thorrekathe thapat nti ikkwon.
Ittina apul iponu kopon iꞌrekat itti, ‘Ngintha akka anokkot? Mpathïot ukul win ia mpongothe amma manna okin othiane cik.’
Anaruk akka okin thimmat ukul akin ikkat cik akin erethok. Akin iꞌre itti, ‘Ook empi ipapakkot naꞌrupu, ntrun okkwot athaꞌrthan thung oka thonnon.’
Ittina akin orrekathok thapat nti itharak akin okkwathok.
Pul iponu kopon pakkot kin ngintha?
Kwanthan ana kwathongwo ul iara kopon kokira komaa akwekat ul wꞌrek kopon ken.”
Anakka ul woccïkothe elli, akin iꞌrekat itti, “Alon elli okorronno oka aththik.”
AIeccuo okathakat kin akwipittat kin lon itti, “Lon ilokurrakot itti,
‘Pothok ipa ul iuno wꞌrat
ipen akkathakkat cillang.’
Lonu itti ngintha?
Okkwi ipapothe nopothok pen kwacotta kicce, anaruk okkwi ipa pothok papothe nan kwakakꞌrakot cik.”

Ul iangkene lon lothonceꞌret lon cik ana ul ittïttïk woul wonoppan toKapik wokat wongothe itti waccokothok akka okin thinat itti thokkwie lon kuru ncik enthi thokat cik atheret kin. Anaruk okin thonat nꞌre noul.

Anakka okin thokat cik akin occot kït naak, okin thothïathe ul iattet lon ainok akin innikot itti okin ul ioporot othakka itti akin iꞌrak llon ila akwiꞌre othakka itti akin occokiethok nili nonoththok.

Ittina aul iattet lon ipittathok itti, “Pul ipangkene, onïn thina itti oung pul ipiꞌre lon ilaik ïcat ana ongkene lon ilocoꞌrotheik ana ngkwakannokkwine ul kunu ncik anaruk ngkwangkene lon loKapik ammakka kongothe.
Locoꞌrotheik itti onïn thaꞌrntinthet oKkaiccer akucci ana amma okorronno oka menik locoꞌrotheiki?”
Anaruk oIeccuo pinakathe lon len ana kwiꞌrekathekin itti,
“Nantokenen thinar. Purrut poththa empi ana kꞌran engki nokakucci?”
Akin othïanthok tit itti, “PoKkaiccer.”
Ittina aIeccuo iꞌrekat kin itti, “Nethet oKkaiccer aꞌrupu woKkaiccer ana woKapik annethet Kapik.”
Okin thommakathe occokothok tokït koul nolon ila kwiꞌret, ittina okin thangkatheik ana oprttakot tit nolon ila kwothïotherit ngngin.
Aul wꞌrek woCcathukkin iokat ame itti pul pakannuroko nti ithio akkakanthet oIeccuo akin athipittothok lon len.
Akin ipittathok itti, “Pul ipangkene, oMucca pokurrinet nïn itti amma pul ipocura piot nopari appella nyukul ana lonu itti opang papakkot nopari pen akwokwonine opang nyukul.
Ana inenni ul wꞌrek wokat cik weꞌreꞌrapuruk woththan pulukku, opaththi ponothon piathe nnopari appellat nyukul cik.
Apang pꞌrek opakkat nopari apappiat cakuruk akwella nyukul cik.
Apang pꞌrek appopakkat nan menik akwiat cakuruk alon len okakat nakin ithokat theꞌreꞌrapuruk. Okin thillekathe appik akin thella nyukul.
Ana pꞌrin apul ipopari iat cakuruk.
Ana amma caꞌri caat ica ul uroko nti ithio, pari paka poththa? Akka ul wopakkothe nan weꞌreꞌrapuruk.”
AIeccuo othïat tit itti, “Thittetto thoul iaik nocapu cene.
Anaruk ul iekkot nan itti wuroko nti ithio ana ikkoik thupuththuput wonu itti wannitta ana ipo ari.
Akka okin thikkoik ere uꞌrupa wothothïlettat woKapik ana okin thannille ana okin nyukul nyoKapik akka okin thuroko nti ithio.
Ana nolon lopira ipokat cik apokꞌro, lon lung oMucca ngka kung piꞌret itti ul illet wuroko nti ithio attang akka kwakkarot Ili itti, ‘Kapik kAprein ana Kapik koIccaak ana Kapik koIakup.’
Lon elli lonu lon itti Kapik kothikkoik kakannoka kothio akka okin appik thaik thikkoik iaak.”
Aul wꞌrek iangkene lon lothoceꞌret lon cik othïat tit itti, “Pul ipangkene, ngkwiꞌret lon papenang.”
Apul ellakat ipappipittothok lon lꞌrek.
Ittina aIeccuo iꞌrekat kin itti, “Ana tat akka akin iꞌrene itti oMiccie ukul woThauth?
OThauth ngka kung piꞌret iatham woMocumur itti,
‘Ili Kapik wiꞌrethe Ili win itti,
Ikkik thokkun wothothari win.
Puccuk analkanthung thoꞌrak thang anocukkarat kin cik.’
OThauth pakkarot oMiccie itti, ‘Ili win’ ana tat akka akwoka ukul wung?”
Anakka ul appik wokat cik accïkot lon, aIeccuo iꞌrekat ul iammakothok tokït koul itti,
“Noꞌrumoik noul iangkene lon lothonceꞌret lon cik. Okin thongothe itti okin thanyaro neret iukwirukwit ana omiccako keccuk ana ikkoik naꞌran iathiakine cik nomuththun maꞌrama ana nokamuthe.
Okin thiꞌrikikko ikaman komuruma akin onneko aꞌrupu wen appik, ana aꞌra ngaꞌrama ngukwit. Ul ammakka enni wakkmako thakkmako thokithak cannan.”
AIeccuo pokat cik akwikkoik akwokathacce ul iannekket akucci nokaꞌran kothaꞌrntot akucci iaꞌrntakinthet ngre ngonoppan toKapik, ul iaꞌrthan woppot wonekkekathe akucci woppot.
Kwimmakathe pul pꞌrek ipopari ipokat curuma apponekkethe akucci weꞌra wokït.
AIeccuo iꞌrekat itti, “Mpiꞌret non lon ilaik ïcat, curuma enci icopari akkonekkethe akucci woppot noul enni appik.
Ul enni appik wonekkethe aꞌrupu nnaꞌrupu iakin thonu woppot anaruk curuma enci icopari conekkethe nnaꞌrupu ia kwonat appik itti kwikkoik ngngin.”
Ul iammakothok wꞌrek wikkatheik aeret thire thomothok imuntat ntupan toKapik ana thire then ithokkattathe nnaꞌrupu iettathe Kapik. Anaruk oIeccuo piꞌrekathekin itti,
“Mothok emmi appik imanon okathacce, caꞌri cꞌrek canthan canon okinnimma pothok pulukku pokwentakot topangken, müntat nocapu mulumuluk appik.”
Akin ipittathok itti, “Lon len lakaik acintha? Ana lon liatha ilakene itti lon elli lathokaik?”

Akwothïanthet kin tit itti, “Noꞌrumoik annokorronno occïkïnthet ul wꞌrek itti wammikkot non aththik, akka ul woppot wanthan ngkꞌran kin akin iꞌre itti, ‘Oun oMiccie,’ ana ‘Nocaꞌri cen akkwaik akwokko apuththuththut,’ anaruk annokorronno occïkot kin.
Ana amma onon thoccïkothe lon lothoꞌrak ana aul othattarorit, nokorronno ipo nꞌre. Lon elli lonu itti lakaik cittokït, anaruk thocothakot thakorronno oka itti thakko napuththut.”
Ittina kwiꞌrekathekin itti, “Ul wonomoꞌrong wathattarorit, ana ngili ngothattarorit.
Capu caꞌrïntïttako ncik ana tï takaik ana mio makaik naꞌran appik ammakka waik ana aꞌrupu wꞌrek ipietto nꞌre ana lon lothoꞌrarot cik ana lon ilakene lon lanthan ntothiꞌrot.

Anaruk alon elli larthuk othakka appik, okin thikko thacciccokot non ana okkiet non thiak. Okin thanekot non nomuththun maꞌrama ana ikorrkkor, ana onon thanekittat tokït konili ana elli appik nti ilon lin.
Elli lakkattat othakka itti anon okanekin lon ilakin imma ngkït.
Anaruk nokorronno ipo nꞌre itti nthathiꞌre tat amma annothïnthet kin ilon.
Akka mpethet non lon ana thinaik nti ima othakka itti amma annerene ul iꞌrat non akin occïkot lon lon.
Ana oththen ana opangkangon ana ul wokuꞌri kon ana opuruko pangon thakettenon ana opilingon thangutta.
Ul appik wꞌranon nti ilon lin.
Anaruk kwan kella ikapot cik nocapu nnoca.
Ngonoccokot mïkït tangattang, ana onon thaꞌret ka kon.”
“Amma onon thimmat ul irro wokkwethe kaꞌran koUruccelim ithoꞌrkït onon thina itti thokïttakoik then thakko napuththut.
Ittina ul iaik noththok poIouthia akin ollo okuꞌrot tomoꞌrong ana ul iaik icarak coman akin oppot thapat ana okkwion ithaik thapat nti icarak coman akin oꞌrungkot.
Akka caꞌri enci cothakkma othakka itti alon othakka appik ilokurrakot itti lathoka.
Laka lokitheththak noul iari ioppeppethe ana ul iakie nomaꞌri men. Ul wareko thiak cannan noththok akka Kapik kua ka koul.

Opilingon thanguttat ithoꞌrak ana opilingon niꞌrittang iukwit wukwit ana opilingon onekittat ikorrkkor nomoꞌrong appik. Kaꞌran koUruccelim kakakꞌrakot cik nul iakonnoka woIouth puccuk amaꞌri moul iakannoka woIouth omttakat.”
“Lon ilakene lon lakaik lakkattanthet cïngkï ana kwanok ana mothot. Ana nocapu nomoꞌrong appik ul wannoka woporot ana opellene okin thoccïkothe poꞌre ponok inapangka inïttïnïttïk.
Ul appik wipo nꞌre nen cannan nolon ilaik lanthan nocapu ncik appik akka tothiꞌrot taik taꞌrïntïttako ncik appik.
Nocaꞌri cen ukul wopul iponyi wimmakot inuththe anthan mpuꞌran ana nthrïk.
Ana amma lon ellrïk uroko ncik, nonthot ma kapik ana okwiccekot cik akka thoꞌrettat thon therik thakko napuththut.”
Kwiꞌrekathekin lon elli nthokkwie kuru ncik itti, “Nantokatha pira popïcït ana kira kꞌrek appik.
Amma onon thimmat natha nen aniat, onon thina itti karran kakko napuththut.
Ngkathar engki amma onon imma lon elli alokkattat anon ina nan itti ngili ngoKapik ngakko napuththut.
Mpiꞌret non lon ilaik ïcat itti, lon elli appik lathakka aul wonomaꞌri emmi wannille.
Tothiꞌrot ana capu thintat cik anaruk lon lin lakorronno intat cik aththik.”
“Noꞌrumoik akka anon okorronno iꞌrikikke kakon ilon lonocapu ammakka itti thïkko ngapak ana thirro mïkït nti ikarak nolon lothikkoik akka caꞌri canthan anon thomma nan.
Akka caine ul appik iaik nocapu.
Noꞌrumoik, naꞌra ngaꞌrama othakka itti anon olukkot thoꞌrarot cik tholon ilaik lanthan ana annina akka annocoꞌro tokït kokkul wopul iponyi.”
OIeccuo pokat cik akwongkene noppan toKapik appinappin ana cipin akwokuꞌrot nocoꞌrong coCeththun
ana ul waukkathe ngngꞌrïmak athoccïkot thongkene thung noppan toKapik.
Akka caꞌri caat cokamuthe karrakith iella müꞌrükül tit ikoccot kꞌran itti Kamuthe koThaurrot kaman kꞌrek cik kokat akokko napuththut,
ul ittïttïk woul wonoppan toKapik ana ul iangkene lon lothonceꞌret lon cik wikkatheik akwariccat kathar ikakin okkwot oIeccuo ngngin. Anaruk okin thokat akin opellene ul.
Ittina pul pothopulut piꞌrikathe iaIoutha ipoccot kꞌran itti Icikkariuththi opilin nti iul wung wothothïlettat iattul ana ikken keꞌra.
Ana oIoutha poingkanthet ul ittïttïk woul wonoppan toKapik ana okin ithangwot tupan taꞌrama ana okin therekathe itti tat akka akwokerot kin oIeccuo.
Okin thopirakathe noka ana okin thongakathe itti okin thethok akucci.
AIoutha angkat ana kwikkatheik akwokwncot caꞌri ica akwoccokiet oIeccuo nili ngngin aul ella woppot.
Ittina acaꞌri akkakat cokamuthe karrakith iella müꞌrükül tit ana thokkwinthet Kapik thungkat thokamuthe koThaurrot kaman kꞌrek cik.
OIeccuo pothïathe oPoththuruc ana oIuanna akwiꞌrekat kin itti, “Ngkonon annothokkot cik na aron othoꞌrkot thuꞌrit thokamuthe koThaurrot kaman kꞌrek cik.”
Akin ipittathok itti, “Ngkwongothe itti onïn thathokkot cik kartha?”
AIeccuo othïanthet kin itti, “Ngkonon nokaꞌran koUruccelim ana onon thacurot ipul ipocura aponneko ngꞌri ngkummuk annomakothok iman na akwiꞌriko.
Anniꞌret pul pen itti, ‘Pul ipangkene piꞌret itti, Man maik kartha ima anathoꞌrkot thuꞌrit thokamuthe koThaurrot kaman kꞌrek cik tit onïn oul iammakothin?’
Ana kwakenenon man maik toꞌra mïttïk mokuccettathe cik kicce, annokkot cik naron athoꞌrkot thuꞌrit thokamuthe kothaurrot kaman kꞌrek cik.”
Okin thoingkathe akin othïat lon ammakka oIeccuo papperenet kin ana okin thokkathe cik papenang ana okin thokkathe thuꞌrit thokamuthe koThaurrot kaman kꞌrek cik.
Anakka cik caat cothoꞌrko thuꞌrit aIeccuo ana ul wung wothothïlettat ikkat cik othïngkarakot iriki wonyaun nyothokure ammrththakot kokuppuꞌrung kothuꞌrit.
Ana oIeccuo piꞌrekathekin itti, “Mpongothe itti mpaꞌrko thuꞌrit enthi thokamuthe koThaurrot kaman kꞌrek cik unaththungon amparthuk occokot thiak.
Akka mpiꞌret non itti mpakannappoꞌrko thuꞌrit unaththungon attang puccuk angili ngoKapik akkakat.”
Ittina aIeccuo onekat keththeꞌret akwopiriekat Kapik noka, akwiꞌrekat kin itti, “Noneko annïkko ikkettot appik.
Akka mpiꞌret non itti mpakannappïkko ngapak engki attang nciki inenni puccuk angili ngoKapik akkakat.”
Ana kwonekathe arrakith akwopiriekat Kapik noka akwomithat tit akwekat kin akwiꞌrekat kin itti, “Ka kin engki ikettathenon nokkot menik annokwarttikothin.”
Anakka okin thoꞌrkot cik akwonekat keththeꞌret akwiꞌrekat itti, “Keththeꞌret engki kothonekket lon cik ilie ila Kapik kokkothe ngüccük ngin inguntanthet non cik.
Anaruk okkwi ipaik pathokerothin ul onïn thaik thaꞌrko thuꞌrit ïnaththeꞌra nokuppuꞌrung kulukku.
Ukul wopul iponyi wio ammakka Kapik konekkenthok cik anaruk angkre nopul ipakerok.”
Okin thikkatheik akin ipittarot itti oththa akkikko pakkot lon elli.
Akin ikkat cik akin aꞌretto cakuruk itti, “Oththa akkaka prïk nti iaron?”
AIeccuo iꞌrekat kin itti, “Nili noul iakonnoka woIouth narekie ul thiak thiak anaruk ul warthuk wakkarokin itti ul ioporot.
Anaruk nokorronno oka menik, pul iprïk ntianon apoka ere ukul iotteik ana okkwi iponu lon lonoththok ikkun paka ere pul iparekine ul.

Oththa akrïk, okkwi ipikkoik nokuppuꞌrung aul iareko orekinok ana amma okorronno oka menik okkwi iparekine ul akrïki? Onon thiꞌre itti okkwi ipikkoik nokuppuꞌrung akrïk anaruk mpei cene ithoꞌrkït thon ammakka pul iparekinenon.
Onon thocoꞌrothin appik akka mpokat ilon ilokithak.
Ana ammakka ongappa pethin ngili ikkun mpakkinthet non cakuruk ammakka kwokkinthin
ittina oron thaꞌrkoik ana ïkkoik uraththungon nokuppuꞌrung kin kothuꞌrit ingili ngngin ana annikkoik norrok annakkma ul mothok mothok moul woIccereil iattul ana ikken keꞌra.”
AIeccuo iꞌrekat oCcamaan itti, “Camaan, antoccïkot, pul pothopulut pipittot itti penekkenon appik ere pul amma apïꞌre mïl nti nartta.
Anaruk mpaꞌranung ngaꞌrama itti athoccokot lon loKapik nocïkït cang okorronno apot cik ana amma ngkwokkaprttakot ntan apoꞌrie opangkangon than ithoccokot lon loKapik nocïkït.”
Anaruk oCcamaan pothïanthet oIeccuo tit itti, “Orit thaeo ikorrkkor iraththeꞌra ana iththille iraththeꞌra cakuruk.”
AIeccuo othïanthok tit itti, “Poththuruc, mpiꞌrethung lon ilaik ïcat itti, athakꞌruk tharthuk oo ngkoꞌra engi ngkwacukkwo nolon itti ngkwomman maꞌri mꞌrapuruk.”
Ittina aIeccuo ipittat itti, “Katha akka mpothïothenon nokurtti anthellat aꞌruk wakucci ana aꞌruk wokurtti ana wok iracok, onon nthonat thiak thaꞌrupu wꞌreki?”
Akin othïat tit itti, “Onïn thellat thiak thaꞌrupu wꞌrek.”
AIeccuo iꞌrekat kin itti, “Ana inenni okkwi iponu kaꞌruk kakucci akwoneko ana manna kaꞌruk kokurtti akwoneko ana okkwi ipella kiꞌrittang ikukwit akwarot kret kung icekere akwokero kꞌrittang.
Lokurrakot itti, ‘Kwokuttakothe nul iokithak.’
Ana mpiꞌrethenon itti lakaik naun ilokurrakot ana ïcat ilokurrakot ilerethin laik lathakka.”
Aul iammakothok iꞌrekat itti, “Okatha cene Ili, iꞌrittang wei cene weꞌra.”
AIeccuo othïanthet kin itti, “Lekkot.”
AIeccuo oingkat nocoꞌrong coCeththun ammakka akwokkettet appinappin aul iammakothok omakathok.
Anakka kweot nokaꞌran ken akwiꞌrekat kin itti, “Naꞌra ngaꞌrama akka anon apot ilon lothenekketta tholon ilokithak.”
Akwoththekat nakin akwoingat ciththan papotteik akweekat ungku ncik akwaꞌrakat ngaꞌrama itti,
“Ngappa, amma ngkwongothe, onekothin thoccokot thiak enthi, annoka ammakka mpongothe, anaruk ammakka ngkwongothe.”
Uꞌrupa wothothïlettat woKapik wakkakanthok ntothiꞌrot ana wikkatheik amerekethok itti kwapoꞌrathan.
OIeccuo pokat nothiak akwaꞌrakat ngaꞌrama cannan ana nguttetta ngikkatheik angoththopot cik nocapu nti iaak ere ngüccük.
Anakka kurokot nnaꞌrama kwopakkanthet ul iammakothok ana kwaththiat akin thaik inthe akka okin thokat ithiak cakuruk.
Anakka oIeccuo poinet kin akwipittat kin itti, “Ngintha akka annoine inthe? Nuroko annaꞌra ngaꞌrama othakka itti anon okkorronno apot ilon lothenekketta tholon ilokithak.”

Manakka oIeccuo pokat cik akkwarthuk paik perenekin, acungkut coul akkakat ana pul ipoccot kꞌran itti oIoutha nti iul wung iattul ana ikken keꞌra akkwonat kin akwothakkarat iccik koIeccuo akwomiccathok ïꞌrïkothok topere.
Anaruk oIeccuo pipittathok itti, “Ioutha, ngkwaat itti ngkwathokerot nili ukul wopul iponyi nthomicco ïꞌrïkarot toperei?”
Anakka ul iammakot oIeccuo wimmat lon ilaik lathokkattat, akin ipittat oIeccuo itti, “Ili, ïnthaꞌrumot kin niꞌrittangi?”
Apilin nti iul iammakothok okiat kunu cik kopul iparekine pul iprïk ponoppan toKapik kothokkun wothothari.
Anaruk oIeccuo piꞌrekathekin itti, “Lekkot pꞌrïn.” Ana kwothantathe kunu nukun wung ana kopakkatherit koporot.

Ittina aIeccuo iꞌrekat ul ittïttïk woul wonoppan toKapik ana okin ithangwot cik noppan toKapik ana ul ittïttïk woul iainok itti, “Nthame itti oun pul ipaurrot lon cik akka onon thainin mmuꞌrang ana iꞌrittang iukwit wukwiri?

Mpokat cik unaththungon appinappin noppan toKapik ana anthakannoccokothin. Anaruk caꞌri con enci ica annokkot lon ilanon thongothe itti onon thakkot amma pul pothopulut okkwi iponu puꞌran poïꞌrïmak paik ire.”
Ittina akin occokathok akin onekathok tuan topul iprïk ponoppan toKapik. OPoththuruc pokat cik akwommakot kin nciththan.
Anaruk akka okin thokwothe thik nocaꞌrakat akin ïkot oPoththuruc pikkatheik iakin.
Aukul ioiꞌre iareko immakat oPoththuruc akwïkot thik akwokathakathok kicce aiꞌrekat itti, “Pul empi pokat cik akin oIeccuo.”
Anaruk kwocukkathe nan akwiꞌret itti, “Ukul, mpommak.”
Papotteik apul pꞌrek appiꞌrekat oPoththuruc itti, “Ngkwokat cik onaththeꞌra.”
APoththuruc iꞌrekat itti, “Pul empi okonnoka oun.”
Ana okin thokkothe cïngkï culukku apul pꞌrek appiꞌrekat itti, “Kwokat cik okin oIeccuo akka ook pul ponoul woCelïl.”
APoththuruc iꞌrekat itti, “Mpomma lon ilanon thaik theret” ana akka kwokat cik akwere, athakꞌruk oat.
Ittina aIli oprttakat cik akathakat oPoththuruc. Menik aPoththuruc okwarikat lon ila Ili wokat wiꞌrethok itti, “Inenni athakꞌruk tharthuk oo, ngkwacukkwo nolon itti ngkwinan maꞌri mꞌrapuruk.”
APoththuruc oingkat thapat akwikkat cik akwoo puccuk.
Ana ul iokat cik angwot oIeccuo wikkatheik akkothok ngure ngngin ana akkwekok.
Akin ïꞌrïkïkkothok kret toca akin nthipittothok itti, “Oththa akkokkworung?”
Ana okin ocungkok ngkꞌret koppot.
Ana ngorrot ngïꞌrïmak aul ittïttïk woul wonoppan toKapik ana ul iangkene lon lothonceꞌret lon cik ikkat cik tothun aIeccuo onekittakat tokït ken.
Akin ipittat oIeccuo itti, “Iꞌrethenïn amma oung oMicce?”
AIeccuo othïanthet kin tit itti, “Amma mpiꞌrethenon ana onon thannoccïkot lon lin.
Ana amma mpipittothenon lon ana onon thannothïnthin tit.
Ana nci inenni ukul wopul iponyi wikkoik noprrok thokkun wothothari woKapik ikrïk.”
Akin appik ipittathok itti, “Oung ukul woKapiki?”
Akwothïat tit itti, “Locoꞌrotheik ilanon thiꞌret itti oun ukul woKapik.”
Ittina akin iꞌrekat itti, “Oron thongothe ul immat lon ngkït arttot nan wothentha? Oron thoccïkothe nothuꞌre thung.”
Ittina aul iokat cik appik urokot kapik anekanthet oPilaththoc oIeccuo.

Ana okin thikkatheik akin oruket oIeccuo lon itti, “Onïn thiothe pul empi apongkene ul lon ilakorronnokin akin okkot lon moloko. Kwiꞌret itti okin thannoccïkot lon lonili, ana akwomet ul itti okin thakorronno aꞌrintinthet oKkaiccer akucci ana akwiꞌret ka kung itti ook oMiccie Ili wonnon.”
Ittina aPilaththoc ipittathok itti, “Oung ili woIouthi?”
AIeccuo othïat tit itti, “Laik ammakka ngkwiꞌret.”
Ittina aPilaththoc iꞌrekat ul woul wonoppan toKapik ana ul appik akwiꞌrekat kin itti, “Mpanniot lon lꞌrek ilamoloko ila anoruket pul empi ngngin.”
Anaruk okin thikkatheik akin ere itti, “Kwokat cik akwongkene ana ereket ul nthongkene thung noththok poIouthia appik. Kwokuꞌret ncik nnoththok poCelïl ana inenni kwei paat ci noththok cene cakuruk.”
Manakka oPilaththoc poccïkothe elli akwipittat itti, “Pul empi ponoththok poCelïli?”
Anakka kwinat itti oIeccuo ponoththok poCelïl ipa Ili oIruthuc ponat ikkun, kwothïanthet oIruthuc oIeccuo.

Manakka oIruthuc pimmat oIeccuo, akwopirakat noka akka kwappongothe nci nan itti kwimmak akka kwappoccïkothe lon ilerettathok ana kwokat pongothe itti kwimma lon ilommaththik alokkattat nti ikkun wung.
Akwikkat cik akwipittot oIeccuo lon loppot anaruk oIeccuo pannothïanthok tit.
Ul ittïttïk woul wonoppan toKapik ana ul iangkene lon lothonceꞌret lon cik wokat cik acoꞌro aerethok ana orukwethok lon ilokithak.
Ittina oIruthuc ana ul wung irro thikkatheik akin ocoꞌro ana okkothok ngure ngngin ana occirok ngngin. Okin thakiekathok kret kopeththere akin othïanthok oPilaththoc.
Caꞌri cen oIruthuc okin oPilaththoc thokkwathe thuruko akka tokït okin thaththꞌrarot.
APilaththoc akkarat ul ittïttïk woul wonoppan toKapik ana nili ana ul appik.
Ana kwiꞌrekathekin itti, “Onon thonanin pul empi itti paik pangkene ul moloko ana mpipittothok lon tokït kon ana mpanniot lon lꞌrek ilaik moloko naak.
OIruthuc manna panniat lon naak ana kwokkaprttinet ton ngok ntan ana ammakka onon thimmat itti pul empi pannokkot lon ilamoloko ilekko nan itti kwakkuttat.
Ana ittina mpakkwekok akwelikkako.”
[Akka kwokat ponu itti kwelikkinekkin pul pulukku nti ikorrkkor nokamuthe koThaurrot kaman kꞌrek cik.]
Okin thiꞌrekathe mpoꞌre pulukku itti, “Okkwothok, alikkinenïn oParapac.”
(OParapac papponekkettathe ikorrkkor akka kwenekket itti kwereket ul nokaꞌran koUruccelim ana okkwot pul.)
OPilaththoc pokat pongothe itti kwapelikko oIeccuo, akwapperekanthet kin.
Anaruk okin thikkatheik akin okkot poꞌre akin iꞌre itti, “Nokkwethok nothapak, nokkwethok nothapak.”
Akwappipittat kin othikkie maꞌri mꞌrapuruk opakkenthet kin itti, “Akaintha? Ngintha akka pul empi pokkothe akka mpakinniot lon ila anakkmak ngngin mpakkwekok anelikkok.”
Anaruk ul wikkatheik akkot poꞌre itti pakkuttat nothapak apoꞌre pen alkat lon ilokat cik.
Ittina aPilaththoc okkanthet kin ammakka okin thongothe.
Ana kwelikkanthet kin pul ipakin thaththongothe itti pelikkako nti ikorrkkor ipappokkothe camutta ana okkwot pul ana kwokkathe naIeccuo ilakin thongothe.
Anakka okin thokat cik akin eo oIeccuo ngngin akin iat oCcamaan ponokaꞌran koKirin akkwokat cik akwao ntopon ana okin thonekiekathok thapak akwomakot oIeccuo nthoceken.
Acungkut coul cokat acomakothok ana ul iari wokat cik akkwe tomïkït aoot oIeccuo.
AIeccuo oprttakat kin akwiꞌrekat kin itti, “Nyukul inyari nyonokaꞌran koUruccelim, nokorronno oothin anaruk noot ka kon ana nyukul nyon.
Akka caꞌri cꞌrek cao canon iꞌre itti, ‘Loporot noul iaucung ana kïmmïk ikannakatta nan.’
Ittina
‘Okin thiꞌret moꞌrong itti, Noꞌrot nïn cik!
ana iꞌret lorokokkok itti, Noꞌrumot nïn.’
Amma ul okkot lon elli acik coporot, okin thakkot taththa amma cik cokithak?”
Aul wꞌrek weꞌra cakuruk onekittakat okin oIeccuo ionat thuꞌran akin othokkwettat nolapak.
Anakka okin thaat nokaꞌran ikoccot kꞌran itti kꞌrintil koca nakin thokkwethe oIeccuo nothapak okin oul ieꞌra ionat thuꞌran apꞌrek nthokkun wothothari ana pꞌrek nthokkun wothokure.
OIeccuo piꞌrekathe itti, “Ngappa, occïkïnthet kin lon ilokithak akka okin thomma ilakin thaik thakkot.” Ana ul irro willillathe iret nthokkwo moꞌrio.
Aul ikkat cik akathaccek anili nen ikkat cik anoccirok ngngin. Akin iꞌre itti, “Kwoꞌrethe ul wꞌrek, akwoꞌret ka kung amma ook oMiccie ipa Kapik kakkarot.”
Aul irro cakuruk akkakat ana wikkathe cik akkothok ngure ngngin ana wekathok ngapak ingor.
Akin iꞌre itti, “Amma oung ili woIouth, oꞌrethe ka kang.”
Ana lon lokat cik lokurrakot toꞌra wung nokuruthut itti, ILI ENNI WOUL WOIOUTH.
Apul pꞌrek nti iul wothuꞌran ipokkwettathe nothapak ocungkat oIeccuo itti, “Oꞌrethe ka kang aꞌrekat nïn cakuruk amma oung oMiccie.”
Anaruk apilin othirriekathok cik itti, “Ngkwannopellene Kapiki? Unthaik ilon lulukku.
Orit thoccot lon moloko nti ilon lorit ilarit thokkothe anaruk pul empi pella lon ila kwokkothe ila moloko.”
Ittina akwiꞌrekat oIeccuo itti, “Okwarikothin amma aiꞌriko ingili.”
AIeccuo othïanthok tit itti, “Mpiꞌrethung ilaik ïcat itti orit thaka iraththeꞌra tothiꞌrot inenni.”
Ana cïngkï cokat cuat ippa angïꞌrïmak oꞌrat cik nocapu puccuk mono acïngkï okkat cꞌrapuruk cipin.
Acïngkï oꞌruttakat angïꞌrïmak oꞌrat cik. Akret ikapettoik ikokat cik akaꞌriko noppan toKapik akillakat tit mprak weꞌra.
AIeccuo akkarat mpoꞌre cittan itti, “Ngappa, mpanekket kanang kin kothikkoik inyaun nyang.” Akwothukwat cokwa akwiat.
Anakka ili woul arrial ukuluk irro wimmat lon ilokkattathe akwopirakanthet Kapik noka aiꞌrekat itti, “Ïcat pul empi pellat lon cik ilamoloko.”
Menik ul appik iaꞌrantakothe itti wimma lon ilokat cik wikkatheik akkwe tomïkït men ana okin thoingkathe.
Anaruk okkwion appik ithinarok ana ul iari iommakothok noththok poCelïl wocoꞌrathe ciththan akathacce lon len.
Pul pꞌrek pokat cik poccot kꞌran itti oIuccip poRami ipokat iprïk icuththun coul woIouth ittïttïk, pul ipoporot tokït koKapik
ana kwokat pannangkot lon ila nili nonocuththun nokat niꞌret ana lon ilakin thokkothe. Kwokat ponokaꞌran koIouthia ikoccot kꞌran itti Rami. Kwokat cik akwoꞌrïkot ngili ngoKapik.
Kwoingkanthet oPilaththoc akwipittathok kumi koIeccuo.
Ittina akwonekat kumi akwoꞌremethekat ngkret ika ul ocïkkarko ngngin akwothocïkkat ippu ipaꞌranthang pocuꞌrol pie pannocïkkako pul pꞌrek tit.
Okat nocaꞌri cothokuccekot cik caꞌri caCcepith cokat napuththut caik cao.
Ana ul iari iommakothe oIeccuo nnoththok poCelïl womakathe oIuccip akin immakat tupu ana tat akka kumi koIeccuo kïcettatheik tit.

Ittina okin thoingkathe tuan akin othocikitto ngaak cik ana amutha akin athoꞌro kumi koIeccuo anaruk okin thikkatheik tuan nocaꞌri caCcepith ammakka thathuma thaik itti pul pella ipareko nocaꞌri caCcepith.
Ana nocaꞌri corokït nnomaꞌri imeꞌreꞌrapuruk ana ngïꞌrïmak aul iari onekat ngaak iakin thocikittot cik akin oingkat thoppu.
Okin thaththiat kaꞌraccak kopaꞌrettat cik ntoppu.
Anaruk akka okin thiꞌrikot ippu, okin thakanniat kumi koIli oIeccuo.
Anakka okin thokat cik akin oprttakot tit nolon len, aul wꞌrek weꞌra iomura ummat ncik wakot eret wallio ere kꞌran kothuleꞌrak thokapik acoꞌrat iccik ken.
Aul iari ipat nꞌre nen ana wirriekathe toma cik nocapu anaruk ul wen iomura wiꞌrekathekin itti, “Ngintha akka annokwariccanthet okkwi ipaik ngkït thapat iul illet?
Okkwella cïnang kurokot nti ithio nokwarikot lon ila kwappiꞌrethenon akka kwokat cik noththok poCelïl itti,
‘Ukul wopul iponyi waul wolon ilokithak occokot ana wakkwettat nothapak ana nomaꞌri imꞌrapuruk wuroko nti ithio.’”
Menik akin okwarikat lon lung.
Akka okin thokkaprttakot nthoppu akin erekanthet ul iattul ana ikken culukku ana ul wꞌrek appik lon ilokat cik.
Ul iokat cik oMeriom moMacthelia ana oIona ana oMeriom onnan poIakup ana opilingon thꞌrek ithakin thokat aththut akka okin therenet ul wung wothothïlettat.
Anaruk okin thaththꞌrat occïkot lon loul iari, akka lon len lokat cik alokathako ere lon nuthuk lella lon cik.

Ana oPoththuruc purokathe ana kwollathe thoppu. Ana kwirratheik noppu akwokathakat ippu ana kwimmakathe kret ika aIeccuo pappocïkkakot ngngin akkaik pellek. Ittina kwopakkathe tuan ana kwikkatheik akwoprttakat tit nolon len.
Ana nocaꞌri cen aul wꞌrek weꞌra iammakot oIeccuo wokat cik aeo nokaꞌran ikoccot kꞌran itti Amaoc ikokat ciththan papotteik nokaꞌran koUruccelim.
Okin thokat cik akin erettine lon appik ilokat cik lokkattathe.
Anakka okin thikkot cik akin erettine, aIeccuo ngka kung akkakat akwikkat cik akin onyaro okin auththungon.
Anaruk Kapik kakkongwothekin mïkït nti ikarak itti okin thannina itti ook oIeccuo.
Akwipittat kin itti, “Ngintha akka onon thaik thanyaro anneret?”
Akin ocoꞌrat akin thannoka thopirat noka akin irrat cik ee ma ncik nocapu.
Apilin ntiakin poccot kꞌran itti oKalapiuc ipittat oIeccuo itti, “Oung pellek akkie cene nokaꞌran koUruccelim pomma lon ilokkattathe nomaꞌri emmi?”
AIeccuo ipittat kin itti, “Ngintha akkokat cik.”
Akin othïat tit itti, “Ilokkattathe naIeccuo poNaccir ipokat pul pothernte lon loKapik ipinat cik nthere lon ana ngre tokït koKapik ana tokït koul appik.
Ana ul ittïttïk woul wonoppan toKapik ana nili nonnon nonekot oIeccuo ana nethet nili noRoma akin akkmak itti kwakuttat, ana okin thokkwekathok nothapak
anaruk onïn thokat ïnoꞌrïkot cik itti ook akkelikko ul woIccereil ana maꞌri mei mokkothe mꞌrapuruk ammakka kwiot.
Anaruk ul wꞌrek iari iokat cik ammakothok wirriet nïn mïkït nti ikarak itti okin theot thoppu ngïꞌrïmak
ana okin thakanniot kumi koIeccuo. Ana okin thiꞌrethenïn itti uꞌrupa wothothïlettat woKapik wumminthet kin ncik ana wiꞌret itti oIeccuo paik ngkït thapat.
Ittina ul wꞌrek iomura nti ianïn woingkathe ana okin thaththiat ammakka ul iari wiꞌrethenïn anaruk okin thannimmak.”
Kwiꞌrekathekin itti, “Nthontha akka nthommaik ittina ana nthannoka thacokoccokot nthoccokot lon nomïkït ila ul wothernte lon loKapik weret.
Nthomma itti oMiccie ponu itti kwaccokot thiak llon elli akwantiꞌriko ithrïk thungi?”
Menik aIeccuo ikkat cik akwerenekin lon ilerethok iatham woKapik ana ilokurrakot cakuruk nci natham woMucca oingkanthet natham noul wothernte lon loKapik appik.
Anakka okin thaat iccik koricarak coman nakin thaik thaeo, aIeccuo ikkat cik ere kwaik paeo ciththan.
Anaruk okin thokkaprttathe oIeccuo akin iꞌrekathok itti, “Ton ikkoik akka cik ceot.” Ana kwoingkathe akin othikkoik okin auththungon.
Anakka kwikkot cik nokuppuꞌrung kothuꞌrit akin aththeꞌran oIeccuo ponekathe arrakith ana kwopirakanthet Kapik noka ana kwomithathe tit akwikkat cik akwikket kin.
Ittina kït ken kimmakathe cik ana okin thinakathe oIeccuo ana kwintakatheik ntokït ken.
Okin thikkatheik akin erettarne itti, “Orit thokat thannopira noka akka kwokat cik akwerenerit ana ongkene atham wolon iloporori?”
Okin thurokathe akin opakkat nokaꞌran koUruccelim akin othiat ul wung wothothïlettat iattul ana ikken culukku ana opilingon ithokat cik okin aththungon akin thaik tothun.
Akin iꞌrekat ul ieꞌra itti, “Ïcat Ili wurokot ana wumminthet oCcamaan ncik.”
Ana ul ieꞌra wikkatheik aerenekin lon ilokkattathe ikathar ana tat akka okin thinat oIeccuo nthomitho iarrakith.
Anakka okin thokat cik akin ere aIeccuo ummanthet kin ncik ngka kung ithoꞌrkït then akwiꞌrekat kin itti, “Ntharaththa atti nthoporot?”
Anaruk okin thirratherit ana ipo nꞌre akin ikkat cik ere okin thimmat purrut.
AIeccuo iꞌrekat kin itti, “Ngintha akka onon opellene ana nthontha akka nthakannoccokot lon nomïkït itti mpaik ngkït thapat?
Nokatha nyaun nyin ana tacok tin, ka kin engki nantothnton anninan, purrut pella ka ana mummian ammakka mponu.”
Akka kwiꞌret lon len akwokenekat kin nyaun nyung ana tacok tung.
Anaruk okin thaththakannoccokat lon len akka okin thaththokat thopirat noka cannan ana nthoprttakotherit ana oIeccuo pipittathekin itti, “Onon thonu alepꞌrek cene iaꞌrttai?”
Ana akin thekathok pape paputtat.
Ana kwonekathe ana kwoꞌrkkathe tokït ken.

Akwiꞌrekat kin itti, “Elli ila mpappiꞌrethenon akka mpokat unaththungon. Lon appik lomarttakot ammakka lerettathin iatham wolon lothonceꞌret lon cik woMucca ana inatham noul wothernte lon loKapik ana iatham woMocumur.”
Ittina kwanyanthet kin ma othakka itti akin ina atham woKapik.
Akwiꞌrekat kin itti, “Elli akkokurrakot itti oMiccie paccokot thiak ana kuroko nti ithio nomaꞌri imꞌrapuruk.
Ana lon lothokkarttako nti ilon ilokithak ana thoccïkarnthet lon ilokithak lakaik ngkꞌran koIeccuo ana liꞌrettat ul appik okuꞌre ncik nokaꞌran koUruccelim.
Ana onon thimmat lon elli appik ngkït kon ana mpongothe itti onon thatherene opilingon thꞌrek.
Ana mpaik pathothïnthet non ila ngappa papponekketheik, anaruk nikkoik nokaꞌran koUruccelim puccuk Kanang ikupupure akkakanthet non akoppappakat ianon mpuꞌran ntothiꞌrot.”
Anakka kwipothekin thapat nokaꞌran koPeththania akwonthat nyaun kapik akwethïekat kin.
Anakka kwokat cik akwethïekin kwoththekathe nakin akwonekittakat tothiꞌrot.
Ittina okin thikkatheik akin aꞌranok ngaꞌrama ana okin thopakkathe nokaꞌran koUruccelim akin thopirat noka anganna.
Ana okin thikikkatheik noppan toKapik appin akin aꞌrane Kapik ngaꞌrama.
John: Ncinomun papꞌrek pellat cik, lon lokat cik ana lon lokat cik noKapik.
Ana ncinomun kwokat cik okin oKapik.
Ana Kapik kokkathe aꞌrupu appik nti ikkun wolon len ana papella ipokat cik pokkattathe aukun wolon len wakonnokkot.
Thikkoik thaat nnolon ana thikkoik then ithen akkanane ul kꞌran ikimmiekin cik appik.
Kꞌran kaccieik iꞌrïmak, ana ngïꞌrïmak ngannalkot kꞌran ken.
Pul pꞌrek pakkakathe ipa Kapik kothïothe ponat kꞌran itti oIuanna.
Kwaat itti akwatherene ul lon lokꞌran ken ikainet ul, othakka itti aul appik occokot lon nomïkït nti ilon loIuanna.
Ook ngka kung pakannoka kꞌran ikacco, kwaat itti akwatherene ul lon lopul ipethekkin kꞌran ikacco.
Kꞌran ikacco ikaik ïcat ikacciene ul cik appik kokat cik akao nocapu.
Lon lokat cik nocapu antoka manna itti capu ncik appik cokkattathe nti ikkun wung anaruk capu commarok.
Kwainet pothok ipokat pung anaruk ul wung wakinnikkiek cik.
Anaruk okkwion ithikkierok cik ana ithoccokothe lon lokꞌran kung nomïkït, kwokorronnathekin akin othakka nyukul nyoKapik,
nyukul inya akorronno okwonta nti iul ionyi ana akka ul ionyi wongothe itti okin thakwonta anaruk okin thokwontat noKapik.
Lon lothakkakathe ka kopul iponyi akikkat cik iaron. Oron thimmat thrïk thung, thrïk thung pulluk pen okkwi ipaat naththan, nthoporot thoppot ana lon ilaik ïcat.
OIuanna pocoꞌrothok ntherethok llon ilaik ïcat akwiꞌre mpoꞌre cittan itti, “Ook empi ipa mpiꞌret lon len itti, ‘Okkwi ipamakothin prïk naun akka kwokat cik tokït naun.’”
Ana nti ithoporot thung ithoppot, kwethïetheron cik arttot nomaꞌri moppot.
Akka lon lothonceꞌret lon cik loKapik lakkethet ton nti ikkun woMucca ana thoporot ana lon ilaik ïcat laIeccuo oMiccie akkonat.
Pul pella pimmat Kapik kirrkkir. Anaruk ukul wung wulluk, iammakka Kapik ïcat ana iaik iccik kung, ien akkiniet ton Kapik.
Lon elli ila Iuanna pomamuthie peret ngka kung akka ul ittïttïk woIouth wonokaꞌran koUruccelim wothïothe ul wonoppan toKapik ana ul woLaui akin othipittothok itti ook okkwen.
Kwakonnocukkwat nolon anaruk kwiꞌret ncinokkït itti, “Mpannoka oMiccie.”
Akin ipittathok itti, “Ana oung okkwen? Oung oIliai?”
Ana kwiꞌrekathe itti, “Mpakannoka oIlia.”
Ana okin thipittathok itti, “Ana oung pul ipernte lon loKapiki?”
Kwothïanthet kin tit itti, “Aa.”
Ittina pꞌrïn akin iꞌrekathok itti, “Ana oung okkwen? Iꞌrethenïn lon ilanïn onekine ul iothïothenïn. Ngkwiꞌre itti oung oththa?”
OIuanna pothïatherit llon lopul pothernte lon loKapik oIccaia iliꞌre itti,
“Oun poꞌre ipaik pakkakkaro nti ithampang, apiꞌre itti,
‘Nokkinthet Ili kathar kocoꞌrotheik.’”
Ittina ul woPriccin iarothïlathe,
ipittat oIuanna itti, “Ana ngkwonin akka aethet ul mamuthie amma ngkwannoka oMiccie ana manna okonnoka oIlia ana manna okonnoka pul pothernte lon loKapik?”
AIuanna othïat tit itti, “Mpethet non mamuthie ngngꞌri, anaruk opilin paik ianon ipanon thomma.
Ook ipamakothin ook ipa mpakannekko nan itti mpakꞌrinok loꞌrak lowok.”
Elli appik lokkattathe nokaꞌran koPeththania nokuthut korue toÜrüthün nthokarkan nacïngkï ummot ngngin, na aIuanna pokat akwikket ul mamuthie.
Ngorrot ngen oIuanna pimmakathe oIeccuo akwanthan naak akwiꞌrekat itti, “Nantokatha, thungkat thoKapik okkwi ipapaꞌre lon ilokithak cik nnocapu.
Ook ipa mpokat cik aneret akka mpiꞌret itti, ‘Pul ipamakothin prïk naun akka kwokat cik amparthuk okwonta.’
Manna inenni oun ngka kin mpommak itti kwaka okkwen anaruk lon ila mpaik pikkenthet ul mamuthie ngngꞌri othakka itti aul woIccereil inak.”
Ittina aIuanna iꞌrekat lon ila kwimmat itti, “Mpimmat Kanang ikupupure akuo ntothiꞌrot ere cülükkür akoꞌrat naak.

Mpakannainarok anaruk okkwi ipothïothin anathikket ul mamuthie ngngꞌri, akkiꞌrethin itti pul ipanon thaik thakathecce, Kanang koKapik kaꞌro nan akikkat cik naak, ook ipikket ul mamuthie ngKanang ikupupure.
Mpimmat ana mpaik piꞌre ila mpimmat itti ook ukul woKapik.”
Ana ngorrot ngen, oIuanna pokat cik akwocoꞌro nnul iammakothok weꞌra.
Kwimmakathe oIeccuo akwoppo cïnang. Ana kwiꞌrekathe itti, “Nokatha thungkat thoKapik theꞌre.”
Anakka ul iammakothok ieꞌra woccïkothe akwiꞌre lon elli, okin thomakathe oIeccuo.
Manakka oIeccuo polliakothe, akwimmakat kin akin omakothok akwipittat kin itti, “Ngintha akka annokwariccat?”
Okin thiꞌrekathe itti, “Pul ipangkene, kaman kang kaik kartha?”
Akwiꞌrekat kin itti, “Nanthan annathokatha.”
Menik akin oingkat akin othokathakat na kwokat akwikkoik ana okin thikkatheik cipin cen okin aththut ana cïngkï cokat cocoꞌrin cocipin.
Anthrauc opang poCamaan oPoththuruc okin nti iakin itheꞌra ithoccïkothe lon ila Iuanna piꞌret akin omakathok.
Lon ila Anthrauc pokkothe cittokït itti kwiothe opang poCamaan akwerekanthok itti, “Onïn thiothe oMiccie okkwi ipa Kapik kothiothe.”
Ana kwonakathok na aIeccuo.
Ana oIeccuo pokathakathok ana kwiꞌrekathe itti, “Ngkwoccot kꞌran itti oCamaan ukul woIuanna. Ngkwakkarako itti oCcappa” (ilonu itti oPoththuruc).
Ana ngorrot ngen, oIeccuo piꞌrekathe itti kwaeo noththok poCelïl ana kwiathe oPilippic ana kwiꞌrekathok itti “Omakothin.”
OPilippic pokat ponokaꞌran koPeththcceitha ammakka Anthrauc ana oPoththuruc.

OPilippic piathe oNaththanail akwiꞌrekathok itti, “Onïn thiothe okkwi ipa oMucca pappokurrot lon len iatham wothonceꞌret lon cik ana ipa ul wothernte lon loKapik wokurrot lon len cakuruk itti oIeccuo poNaccir, ukul woIuccip.”
ANaththanail ipittat itti, “Lon lꞌrek lakaik iloporot lanthan nokaꞌran koNacciri?”
APilippic omekathok itti, “Aꞌrik aththokatha.”
Anakka oIeccuo pimmat oNaththanail akwanthan naak, akwiꞌrekat itti, “Katha okkwempi paIccereil ïcarïcat ipella loꞌrek moloko manna lotte.”
ANaththanail ipittathok itti, “Ngkwinan taththa?”
AIeccuo othïat tit itti, “Mpimmarung akka ngkwokat cik icuꞌre copïcït, aPilippic parthuk akkarong.”
ANaththanail iꞌrekat lon mpoꞌre cittan itti, “Pul ipangkene, oung ukul woKapik, oung Ili woIccereil.”
AIeccuo iꞌrekat itti, “Ngkwoccokothe lon nocïkït akka mpiꞌret itti mpimmathung icuꞌre copïcïri? Ngkwimma lon lommaththik nolon elli.”
AIeccuo apparttat nan itti, “Mpiꞌret non lon ilaik ïcat, onon thimma tothiꞌrot tanyattatheik ana uꞌrupa wothothïlettat woKapik awaik akuꞌrot ana uo ntan nokkul wopul iponyi.”
Ana nocaꞌri icꞌrapuruk athïpa thꞌrek okakat cik nokaꞌran koKana ikaik noththok poCelïl ana onnan poIeccuo oingkat than.
Ana oIeccuo ana ul iammakothok thaththakkarakothe thïpa then cakuruk.
Anakka ngapak ngomttathe noul, annan poIeccuo iꞌrekathok itti, “Ngapak ngomttathe.”
AIeccuo iꞌrekat itti, “Pul ipopari, ngkwiꞌrethin pothentha? Caꞌri cin carthuk anthan.”
Annan iꞌrekat ul iareko itti, “Nokkot ila akwiꞌret non.”
Ana ummuk
woiꞌri wokat cïnang iccik ken wꞌrakkuruk wokkattathe nomothok, ammakka lon lothonceꞌret lon cik loIouth ileret ummuk iothuntakot ana iannothuntako. Kulukku kokat akoneko ngꞌri ngoppot.
AIeccuo iꞌrekat ul iareko itti, “Noppeppet ngꞌri ummuk,” akin oppeppekat.
Ittina akwiꞌrekat kin itti, “Nokkwot ngꞌri ngotte nan annethet pul pothïpa.” Okin thokkathe menik ana
pul pothïpa pinathe ngꞌri ioporttakot cik angothokkat ngapak, kwommat na ngaat ngngin anaruk ul iareko iokkuret ngꞌri winat nan. Ittina kwakkarathe pul ipipot thocipit,
akwiꞌrekathok itti, “Ul appik wanane ul ngapak ioporot akin antonanekin ngꞌri ngokwonyi akin thoththakathe pꞌrïn anaruk ngkwangwothe ngapak cik ioporot manna ina.”
Lon elli lokat lon ilommaththik lonomun nolon ilommaththik ila oIeccuo pokkothe nokaꞌran koKana noththok poCelïl. Kwokenekathe ul iammakothok thrïk thung ana woccokathe lon lung nomïkït men.
Anakka lon elli locothakothe akin uat nokaꞌran koKapprnaum akin onnan ana opangon ana ul iammakothok. Okin thikkatheik than maꞌri motte.
Anakka caꞌri cokamuthe koul woIouth koThaurrot kaman kꞌrek cik kokat napuththut, aIeccuo okuꞌrat nokaꞌran koUruccelim.
Ana kwaththiat ul akette kie ana lungkat ana mülükkür noppan toKapik ana opilingon thokat cik akin ikkoik nouppuꞌrung akin okwicitto akucci.
OIeccuo pummathe pua akwokïccekat kin appik llungkat ana kie noppan toKapik. Kworrekathe kït kakucci koul iokat cik akwicitto akucci ana okuꞌrupot uppuꞌrung wen cik.
Akwomekat ul iakette mülükkür itti, “Nattet aꞌrupu enni thapat ncene. Nokorronno othikkie man mongappa kaꞌran kocekerek caꞌrupu.”
Aul iammakothok okwarikat itti lokurrakot itti, “Thiak thoman moKapik thaik thakkwothin.”
Ittina aul ittïttïk woIouth ipittathok itti, “Lon lang liatha ilommaththik ilakene puꞌran ipakkot lon elli ngngin?”
AIeccuo othïanthet kin tit itti, “Nokïtto tupan toKapik enti ana mpuno prek attang nomaꞌri mꞌrapuruk.”
Aul ittïttïk woIouth othïat tit itti, “Muntat luput arrial weꞌra ana ikken kꞌrakkuruk (46) ame itti ngkuno nomaꞌri mꞌrapuruke?”
Anaruk tupan toKapik ira kwerethe tokat ka kung.
Anakka kurokot nti ithio, aul iammakothok okwarikat lon ila kwiꞌret. Ittina akin occokat lon nomïkït lAtham woKapik ana ila oIeccuo peret.
Anakka kwokat cik nokaꞌran koUruccelim nokamuthe koThaurrot kaman kꞌrek cik, ul woppot wimmakathe lon ilommaththik ila kwokat cik akwokkot ana woccokathe lon nomïkït lokꞌran kung.
Anaruk oIeccuo pakannonekket cïkït nakin akka kwinat kin appik.
Kwokat pakannangkot itti opilin piꞌrethok itti ul warat akka kwinat itti ngimpen akkokat nomïkït moul ionyi.
Puꞌrek pokat cik poul woPriccin poccot kꞌran itti oNikkothemoc, kwokat nocuththun coul woIouth ittïttïk.
Kwainet oIeccuo ngkoꞌra akwiꞌrekathok itti, “Pul ipangkene, onïn thina itti oung pul ipangkene ipaat noKapik akka pul pella ipakkot lon ilommaththik ila ngkwaik pakkot amma Kapik kella naung.”
AIeccuo othïat tit itti, “Mpiꞌrethung lon ilaik ïcat, amma pul pakannokwonta attang kwakinnimma ngili ngoKapik.”
ANikkothemoc ipittat oIeccuo itti, “Pul pakwonta taththa appukkwat thomocco? Kwappopakkot icarak connan attang othakka itti akwokwontai?”
AIeccuo othïat tit itti, “Mpiꞌrethung lon ilaik ïcat, pul pella piꞌriko ingili ngoKapik amma kwakannokwonta ngngꞌri ana ngKanang koKapik.
Pul iponyi pacco ka nannan ana naththan anaruk Kanang koKapik kakwono kanang ikaik iaron.
Onon thonu itti nthakannoprttakinthet lon lin tit ila mpiꞌret, ‘Onon thonu itti nthakwonta attang.’
Kanang kakkurot na kongothe itti kakkurot, onon thaccïkot poꞌre pen, anaruk onon nthamma na kaik kanthan ngngin ana na kaik kaeo. Ittina ngkwamma itti pul pakwonta noKanang koKapik tat.”
ANikkothemoc iꞌrekat itti, “Elli laka taththa?”
AIeccuo othïat tit itti, “Oung pul ipangkene poIecceril. Ana ngkwakannina lon ellii?
Mpiꞌrethung lon ilaik ïcat, onïn theret lon ilanïn thina ana onïn thacoꞌrot lon ilanïn thimmat anaruk icci onon thakannangkot itti onon thaccïkot lon ilanïn iꞌret non.
Mperenet non lon laꞌrupu wonocapu ana onon thꞌrat occokot lon len nomïkït ana onon thantoccokot lon nomïkït taththa amma mperenet non laꞌrupu worothiꞌrot?
Pul pella ipokat tothiꞌrot, ukul wulluk wopul iponyi akkaat ntothiꞌrot.
Ana ammakka oMucca ponthothe pinyil kapik ithampang ithonthomat,
ittina ukul wopul iponyi wonu itti wanthuttat kapik cakuruk,
othakka itti okkwi ipoccokothe lon lukkul wen nocïkït akwiot thikkoik thothupuththuput.
Akka Kapik kongothe ul ncik nocapu appik mono akekat kin ukul wung iulukku, othakka itti amma okkwi ipoccokothe lon lokkul wen nocïkït akwokorronno io anaruk akwikkoik thupuththuput.
Akka Kapik kakannothïot ukul wung nocapu ncik appik othakka itti athakkma ul nocapu anaruk itti athoꞌret kin.
Okkwi ipoccokothe lon lokkul wen nocïkït kwakorronno akkmako anaruk okkwi ipakorronno occokot, kwakkmako ntit akka kwakanno occokot lon lokkul woKapik iulukku nocïkït.
Okin thakkmako ngkathar engki, kꞌran ikimmiettoik kaat nocapu ncik appik, anaruk ul wꞌrat aangat lon loïꞌrïmak akka lon ilakin thokkothe lokat lokithak.
Okkwi ipakkot lon ilokithak kwaꞌrat kꞌran ikacco ana kwakannanthan nokꞌran ikacco akka kwapelle itti lon lung linako nan.
Anaruk okkwi ipakkot lon loporot kwanthan nokꞌran othakka itti alinako nan itti lon ila kwokkothe lokkattathe mpuꞌran poKapik.”
Anakka elli locothakothe oIeccuo ana ul iammakothok thoingkathe nocipit conoththok poIouthia, akwikkat cik than akin aththungon akwikket ul mamuthie.
OIuanna pokat cik cakuruk akwikket ul mamuthie nokaꞌran kEnun iccik koCcalim akka ngꞌri ngokat cik than ngoppot ana ul wokat cik aukkwo than woppot athoccere mamuthie.
Lon elli lokat cik aIuanna parthuk onekkettat ikorrkkor.
Ul woIuanna iammakothok wꞌrek wikkatheik aꞌrettaro nan okin opul pꞌrek poIouth noꞌron lothothunto.

Opilingon noul iammakot oIuanna akkakanthet oIuanna akin iꞌrekathok itti, “Pul ipangkene, opaththi ipanon thokat cik annaththeꞌra nokarkan kꞌrek koUruthun ipa ngkwerethe paik pikket ul mamuthie ana ul appik waik waukkwinok athoccere mamuthie.”
OIuanna pothïatherit itti, “Pul pacco aꞌrupu amma Kapik kethok tulluk.
Ana onon thina nan akka mpiꞌret itti, ‘Mpakannoka oMiccie anaruk mpothïlathe tokït kung.’

Pul ipocura ipipot, ook pꞌre popul ipopari ipittat. Opuruko ipaat ithïpa thopul ipipot paꞌrïkot cik ana occïkot lon lung akwopirakat noka cannan amma akwoccïkot poꞌre popul ipipot. Mpopirat noka inenni pꞌrin.
Kwonu itti kwaka prïk, ana mponu itti mpaka potte.
Okkwi ipanthan ntothiꞌrot prïk naꞌrupu appik, okkwi ponocapu paka ponocapu ana kwere ere pul ponocapu. Okkwi ipaat ntothiꞌrot prïk noul ana aꞌrupu appik.
Kwerethe lon ila kwimmat ana occïkot anaruk pul pella poccïkïnthok lon lung.
Pul ipoccïkothe lon len, pocoꞌrothe lon itti Kapik kiꞌre lon ïcat.
Akka pul ipa Kapik kothïothe pere lon loKapik akka Kapik kethettot Kanang ikupupure koppot.
Oththan pokkul pongothe ukul ana kwethok lon ikkun wung appik.
Okkwi ipoccokothe lon nocïkït lokkul, kwiot thikkoik thothupuththuput ana okkwi ipꞌrat occïkot lon lokkul, kwakanniot thikkoik thothupuththuput akka thuaka thoKapik thaꞌrungkot naak.”
Aul woPriccin occïkat itti ul wokat cik aukkine oIeccuo ana kwokat cik akwikket kin mamuthie ana ul iammakothok wakot cik arttakat nan woppot noul woIuanna.
Ana ilokat cik ïcat itti, okonnoka oIeccuo akkokat cik akwikket ul mamuthie anaruk ul iammakothok akkokat cik aikket ul mamuthie.
Manakka oIeccuo poccïkothe lon len kwoththekathe noththok poIouthia akwopakkat attang noththok poCelïl.
Anakka kwokat cik akweo ikathar, kwapponu itti kwappo noththok poCcamira.
Ittina kwakkakathe nokaꞌran ikoccot kꞌran itti Cukar noththok poCcamira iccik kocapu ica oIakup pethet opei oIuccip.
Ana tok toIakup tokat cik ceneket ana oIeccuo pappokinyanet kurtti akwikkat cik iccik korok. Ana cïngkï cokat acangko ippa.
Anakka pul ipopari poul woCamirin paat thorok itti pathokkwo ngꞌri, oIeccuo piꞌrekathok itti, “Ethin ngꞌri anïkko.”
(Ul iammakothok waweot icarak coman athokette thuꞌrit.)
Apul ipopari poCamirin iꞌrekathok itti, “Oung pul poul woIouth ana oun pul poul woCamirin ana ngkwipittothin itti mpethung ngꞌri taththa?” (Akka ul woIouth wakïnnïkkarot ngꞌri okin ul woCamirin.)
AIeccuo othïanthok tit itti, “Amma ngkwinat thethet nuthuk thoKapik ana okkwi ipaik pipittothung ngꞌri itti kwïkko, ngkwipittothok ana kwethung ngꞌri ngothikkoik thothupuththuput.”
Apul ipopari iꞌrekat itti, “Ili, ngkwella papu ipakkura ngꞌri nti irok ana tok tukwit. Ngkwiot ngꞌri ngothikkoik thupuththuput kartha?”
Oung akkrïk nangappa pïn oIakupi ipethet nïn tok enti, ira kwïkkot ngꞌri ntit ana nyukul nyung ana aꞌrupu worua wungi?
AIeccuo othïat tit itti, “Okkwi ipïkko ngꞌri noiꞌri engi, pica pappokkwothok attang,
anaruk okkwi ipïkko ngꞌri ianethok, pica pakorronno appokkwothok, akka ngꞌri ia anethok ngathakka cakuꞌrang coiꞌri icallo ngꞌri thothupuththuput.”
Apul ipopari iꞌrekathok itti, “Ili, ethin ngꞌri ngen othakka itti apica okorronno okkwothin ana anokorronno anthan thorok itti mpathokkwo ngꞌri attang.”
Akwiꞌrekat pul ipopari itti, “Ngko athakkaro olle pang annanthan annaththeꞌra.”
Apul ipopari othïat tit itti, “Mpella pꞌre.”
AIeccuo omekathok itti, “Ïcat, lon ila ngkwiꞌret laik ïcat.
Lon ilaik ïcat itti ngkwonat eꞌre ukuluk ana pul ipanon thaik ina okorronno oka pꞌre pang. Ittina ila ngkwiꞌret laik ïcat.”
Apul ipopari iꞌrekat itti, “Ili, mpakatha ere ngkwapul potherente lon loKapik.
