Ongappan thoul woCamiria thokat cik akin aꞌrat ngaꞌrama nocoꞌrong enci anaruk onon ul woIouth thiꞌret itti kaꞌran nanïn thonu itti ïnthaꞌrat ngaꞌrama kaik nokaꞌran koUruccelim.”
AIeccuo iꞌrekat itti, “Pul ipopari, occïkothe lon lin, caꞌri cꞌrek caik canthan ica anon okorronno aꞌranthet Kapik ongappa ngaꞌrama nocoꞌrong enci ana manna nokaꞌran koUruccelim.
Onon thoul woCcamirin thaꞌrane aꞌrupu ngaꞌrama ianon thomma, onïn ul woIouth thaꞌrane aꞌrupu ngaꞌrama ianïn thina akka thoꞌrettat thanthan noul woIouth.
Anaruk caꞌri caik canthan ana cei caat amma ul iaꞌra ngaꞌrama ïcarïcat aꞌrane ongappa ngaꞌrama ngkanang ana llon ilaik ïcat akka okin ithaꞌra ngaꞌrama ammakka enthi akka ongappa paik pakwantot.
Kapik kaKanang ana okkwion ithaꞌranok ngaꞌrama thonu itti okin thaꞌra ngaꞌrama ngkanang ana lon ilaik ïcat.”
Apul ipopari iꞌrekat itti, “Mpina itti oMiccie paik panthan okkwi ipa Kapik kaik kathiot, ana amma kwaat kwakeneron lon ncik appik.”
Ittina aIeccuo iꞌrekat itti “Oun pen ipaik perenung.”

Ana ittina aul iammakothok okkaprttakat ntan akin oprttakat tit akka okin thaththiothok akwerene pul ipopari. Anaruk pul pella ipipittathe itti, “Ngintha akkaik?” Ana manna itti, “Ngkwerene pul empi akaintha?”
Ittina apul ipopari oththekat nokummuk koiꞌri ikakkwaththokkwo ngngꞌri apollat opakkat icarak coman apiꞌrekat ul itti,
“Nantanthan, annathokatha pul pꞌrek piꞌrethin lon ncik appik ila mpokkothe, pul pen pikko paka oMicciei?”
Ul wakkakathe nti icarak coman appik athokatha oIeccuo.
OIeccuo pappakannoꞌrko papꞌrek aththik, aul iammakothok iꞌrekathok itti, “Pul ipangkene, oꞌrku aꞌrpꞌrek.”
Anaruk kwomekathekin itti, “Mponu thuꞌrit itha anoꞌrko thanon thomma.”
Ul iammakothok wikkatheik aerettarne itti, “Opilin paththoka ponanok thuꞌriri?”
AIeccuo iꞌrekat itti, “Thuꞌrit thin thokkot lon ila okkwi ipothïothin pongothe ana omartto ngre ngung.
Onon thonu lon lanniꞌre itti, ‘Anok wokwentakot wocoꞌrin aul antokioi?’ Anaruk mpiꞌret non itti, nantokatha opon wathuput thaat pꞌrïn itti wakecca.
Ana pul ipakio poccot aꞌrupu nti ithokio, ana kwaik paꞌrntot mïl mothikkoik thothupuththuput othakka itti akkwi ipee ana okkwi ipakio opira noka aththuththeꞌra.
Ittina lon iliꞌrettat itti, ‘Okkulukku pee ana opilin pakio’ laik ïcat.
Mpothïothenon annothokio aꞌrupu ianon thakannora. Opilingon thorekot ngre ngonthomat cannan ana onon thathokio aꞌrupu wore ngen.”
Ul woppot woCcamirin woricarak coman cen woccokathe lon loIeccuo nomïkït men akka pul ipopari piꞌret itti, “Kwiꞌrethin lon ila mpokkothe appik.”
Anakka ul woCcamirin wainok womekathok itti kwikkoik okin aththut ana kwikkatheik maꞌri meꞌra.
Ana nti ilon lung ila kweret, ul warttakathe nan woppot ana woccokathe lon lung nomïkït men.

Okin thiꞌrekathe pul ipopari itti, “Onïn thaik thakannoccokot lon nomïkït mïn nti ilon ila ngkwiꞌret tulluk anaruk nti ilon ila anïn thoccïkothe nunu wïn, ana onïn thina pꞌrïn itti pul empi pothoꞌret ul ncik appik.”
Anakka kwikkot cik maꞌri meꞌra, kwoingkathe noththok poCelïl.
Cene oIeccuo ngka kung pappiꞌret itti pul pothernte lon loKapik paul wung wakannothianok cik nokaꞌran kung.

Anakka kwaat noththok poCelïl, ul wonoththok poCelïl wikkiekathok cik lon loporot, akka okin thokat thimmat lon ila kwokkothe nokaꞌran koUruccelim nokamuthe koThaurrot kaman kꞌrek cik akka okin thokat than.

OIeccuo pappropakkat nokaꞌran koKana attang noththok poCelïl na kwoprttot ngꞌri cik athakkakat ngapak. Ana pul pꞌrek pokat cik than parekine ili irïk ana ponat ukul wongo ana wokat nokaꞌran koKapprnaum.
Manakka pul empi poccïkothe itti oIeccuo paat nnoththok poIouthia ana kwaik noththok poCelïl, kwoingkanthok ana kwipittathok itti kwanthan akwathothikkienok ukul woporot, iokat cik ere wio.
AIeccuo iꞌrekathok itti, “Ul enni onon thakanno occokot lon loKapik nomïkït mon amma nthakannimma lon ilommaththik lokkattathe.”
Apul iparekine ili pen omekat itti, “Ili tit eo aukul warthuk io.”
AIeccuo othïat tit itti, “Opakkothe, ukul wang wakkoik.” Apul occïkat lon loIeccuo apopakkat tuan.
Anakka kwokat nokathar akwopakkot tuan, aul iarekinok tuan okttat iaak llon itti ukul wang iocura wokkot cik.
Anakka kwipittothekin itti ukul wothakkat woporot acin, okin thiꞌrekathok itti, “Lü locoꞌrot nti iaak meccin icïngkï ippa.”
Ittina aththan pokkul inakat itti caꞌri cen ica oIeccuo piꞌrethok itti, “Ukul wang wakkoik.” Ana menik ook ana ul woruan thanung occokat lon nomïkït loKapik.
Lon ilommaththik elli ileꞌra ila Ieccuo pokkothe akka kwaat noththok poIouthia akweo noththok poCelïl.
Nomaꞌri motteik oIeccuo pokuꞌrathe nokaꞌran koUruccelim nokamuthe koul woIouth.
Ana ciki icarak coman conokaꞌran koUruccelim, kꞌral kokat iccik kokathat kolungkat konat kꞌran ngkarru koIpranin itti kꞌral koPeththictha ikokkwettathe ithoꞌrkït nucu ukuluk.
Ul woppot wokakkat cik aïcaccat cik than ana anna ul than iongo ana iꞌrimathe ana iaimico [akin oꞌrïllïkot ngꞌri iauro.
Ana caꞌri cꞌrek uꞌrupa wothothïlettat woIli wokat cik than aꞌrïntïtto ngꞌri ana okkwi iporpot tit cittokït aiꞌri ngaꞌrïntïttakot kwittat nnomio ima kwonat.]
Pul pꞌrek pokat cik than pongo luput arrial ana alkaire ana ikken mormor (38).
Anakka oIeccuo pimmarok akwïcat cik, akwinakat itti pul pen pokat cik ittina luput loppot akwipittat pul pen itti, “Ngkwongothe itti ngkwathakka poporori?”
Apul ipongo othïat tit itti, “Pul pella ipittarothin itti parpekin ikꞌral amma ngꞌri ngoꞌrïntïttakot ncik. Amma mpenekket itti mparpo ikꞌral anothïot opilin poththethe tokït kin.”
Ittina aIeccuo iꞌrekathok itti, “Urokothe kapik, aneko aꞌrangkal wang aeo.”
Apul othakkakat poporot accokkot ana ponekathe aꞌrangkal ana poingkathe.
Lon elli lokkattathe nocaꞌri caCcepith,
ana ul woIouth wiꞌrekathe pul ipothakkat poporot itti, “Caꞌri enci caCcepith ana lon lothonceꞌret lon cik lakannokorronnung itti ngkwaneko aꞌrangkal wang.”
Anaruk pul piꞌrekathe itti, “Pul ipothikkierin poporot piꞌrethin itti, ‘Oneki aꞌrangkal wang aeo.’”
Okin thipittathok itti, “Pul piatha pen ipiꞌrethung itti oneki aꞌrangkal wang aeo?”
Pul ipothakkat poporot pappommat kꞌran kwokkwi ipittiethok akka oIeccuo pappiꞌrikot icungkut coul icokat cik cïnang.
Ana nomaꞌri motte oIeccuo paththiathok noppan toKapik akwiꞌrekathok itti, “Antoccïkot, katha ngkwothakkat poporot kirrnni appokkot lon lꞌrek ilokithak akka alꞌrek ainung ilokithak cannan.”
Pul poingkathe ana paththiꞌrekat ul woIouth itti, oIeccuo akkothikkierok poporot.
Ittina ul woIouth wikkatheik akkiet oIeccuo thiak akka kwittiethe pul pen nocaꞌri caCcepith.
OIeccuo piꞌrekathekin itti, “Ongappa paik pareko appinappin ana manna inenni ana oun cakuruk paik pareko.”

Ana nti ilon elli ul woIouth wikkatheik akwancot kathar ikakin okkwothok ngngin, okorronno oka itti akka kwarrothe lon lacaꞌri caCcepith cik tulluk, anaruk akka kwokat cik akwakkaro Kapik itti oththan pung, ana akwarppithie ka kung ngKapik.
OIeccuo pothïanthet kin tit itti, “Mpiꞌret non ilaik ïcat, ukul wakannokkot ngre nti ica cung pellek, wakkot ngre ia kwimmat oththan akwokkot, akka ngre ia aththan okkot ukul wakkot cakuruk.
Oththan pokkul pongothe ukul ana kwakenek lon ila akwokkot appik. Ana oththan pokkul pakene ukul manna aꞌrupu wïttïttïk nenni ia akwokkot nnothittiet pul empi. Ana onon thaprttakot tit ïcarïcat.
Ana ammakka oththan purokie ul illet nti ithio ana ethet kin thikkoik, ana cakuruk ukul wethet okkwion thikkoik itha kwongothe itti kwethet.
Ana icci oththan pokkul pakannakkma pul pꞌrek anaruk kwethet ukul lon lothakkma cik appik ikkun,
othakka itti aul appik othiane ukul cik ammakka okin thothianet oththan cik. Okkwi ipakannothiane ukul cik kwakannothiane oththan cik ipothïothok.
Mpiꞌret non lon ilaik ïcat itti, okkwi ipaccïkot lon lin ana occokot lon nocïkït lokkwi ipothïothin kwikkoik thothupuththuput ana kwakannakkamako kwarrothe thio cik akweo nothikkoik.
Mpiꞌret non lon ilaik ïcat itti, caꞌri caik canthan ana manna cei caat amma okin ithillet occïkot poꞌre pokkul woKapik ana okkwion ithoccïkothe thakkoik.
Ana inakka oththan pokkul akkonu puꞌran pothikkoik ika kung, kwethet ukul wung puꞌran pothikkoik cakuruk ika kung.
Ana kwethok lon lothakkma ikkun akka ook ukul wopul iponyi.
Nokorronno oprttakot tit noꞌron elli akka caꞌri caik canthan caul appik iaik impu occïkot poꞌre pung
ana okin thappot thapat ana okkwion ithokkothe lon loporot thuroko akin oꞌrungkat cik, ana okkwion ithokkothe lokithak thuroko akin akkmakat.
Mpakannokkot lon lꞌrek ngka kin pellek, mpakkma ammakka anoccïkot aliꞌrettathin ana thakkma thin thocoꞌrotheik akka mpakannangkot itti mpapirie ka kin noka anaruk okkwi ipothïothin.”
“Amma oun akkopri itti mperet lon lin ngka kin there thin thakannoka ïcat.
Opilin pꞌrek paik peret lon lin ana mpina itti theret lon lin ilon lang laik ïcat.
Onon thothïnthet oIuanna ul ana kwerenet kin lon ilaik ïcat.
Okonnoka itti mpongothe theret ithoul ionyi erethin ngngin anaruk mpiꞌret elli othakka itti annoꞌrettat.
OIuanna pokat kꞌran kothik ikoccot akocciekat cik ana onon thopirakathe noka ngkꞌran kothik thung papotteik.
Anaruk mponu papꞌrek prïk iperethe nolon loIuanna. Akka ngre ia ngappa pethin itti mpamartto ana iampaik pakkot ngakene itti ongappa pothïothin.
Ana ongappa ipothïothin perethe lon lin ngka kung. Onon thakannoccïkot poꞌre pung ana manna imma ka kung,
ana manna lon lung lella ianon akka onon thakannoccokot lon nomïkït lokkwi ipa kwothïothe.
Onon thakkakkarot natham noKapik kicce akka onon thiꞌre itti amma nthakkakkarot ana onon thiot thikkoik thothupuththuput. Natham nen neret lon lin,
ana icci onon thꞌrat ainin anniot thikkoik.
Mpakannangkot thopirie noka thoul ionyi
anaruk mpina non. Mpina itti onon thella thongat thoKapik nomïkït mon.
Mpaat ngkꞌran kongappa ana onon thꞌrarin anaruk amma opilin paat ngkꞌran kung onon thangat lon lung.
Onon thaccokot lon nomïkït taththa amma onon thapirarne noka, anaruk onon thaik thannokwantot thopira noka ithaik thanthan nakkwi ipa Kapik tulluk?
Anaruk nokorronno iꞌre itti mparukwet non tokït kongappa. OMucca akkarukwet non, ook ipanon thonekkethe mïkït nan.
Amma onon thaththoccokothe lon loMucca nomïkït mon onon thaaccokothe alin akka ila kwokurrot kwerethin ngngin.
Anaruk onon thaccokot lon ila aniꞌret non taththa amma onon thakonnoccokot lon nomïkït ilokurrakot?”
Ana nomaꞌri motte oIeccuo parrathe nocarkan cꞌrek corok irapangka toCelïl ironu kꞌran cakuruk itti tok irapangka toThipiria,
ana ul woppot womakathok akka okin thimmat lon ilommaththik ila kwokkothe noul iongo.
AIeccuo okuꞌrat noꞌra wocoꞌrong akwikkat cik okin oul iammakothok.
Kamuthe koul woIouth koThaurrot kaman kꞌrek cik kokat akokko napuththut.
Anakka oIeccuo pokathat cik akwimmakat ul woppot anthan naak, akwiꞌrekat oPilippic itti, “Oron thakerine ul enni thuꞌrit kartha akin oꞌrko?”
Kwipittot elli othakka itti akwenekkek anaruk kwappinat ila kwaik pathokkot.
APilippic othïanthok tit itti, “Tat akka manna akucci iarekitta ngngin anok mormor wakannokero thuꞌrit thekko noul enni itti okkulukku pinot manna thoththe.”
Apilin nti iul iammakothok ipoccot kꞌran itti Anthrauc opang poCcamaan oPoththuruc iꞌrekat itti,
“Ukul wꞌrek wei wonu arrakith ukuluk ana ape weꞌra, anaruk wekko noul taththa enni ioppot ittina?”
AIeccuo iꞌrekat kin itti, “Nikkie ul cik.” Ana taco tokat cik toppot nokaꞌran ken ana ul wikkatheik nan, ul iomura wokat athar ukuluk (5,000).
OIeccuo ponekathe arrakith akwopirakanthet Kapik noka, athikkettakat ul ikkiettat cik ammakka okin ipittot. Kwokkathe ammakka menik nape.
Anakka ul woꞌrkot cik mono oththakakat, kwiꞌrekathe ul iammakothok itti, “Naꞌrntot thuꞌrit ithokwentakot nan. Nokorronno okorronno itti thakïttakot cik thoththe.”
Ittina okin thaꞌrntathe thuꞌrit ithokwentakot nan akin oppeppekat nyalünthüng attul ana ikken keꞌra narrakith iokat ukuluk ia ul ioꞌrkot nan wokwentako.
Anakka ul wimmat lon ilommaththik ila oIeccuo pokkothe, okin thikkatheik akin ere itti, “Ïcarïcat pul empi pothernte lon loKapik ipokat ponu itti panthan nocapu ncik appik.”
AIeccuo inakat itti okin thaik thathothikkiek ili mpuꞌran akwoingkat tocoꞌrong ngka kung pellek.
Anakka cipin capot aul immakothok uat thorok irapangka,

akin arrat ikuppuꞌrung konoiꞌri akin arrot tok irapangka eo nokaꞌran ikoccot kꞌran itti Kapprnaum. Anakka okin thokat cik akin eo, ittina ngïꞌrïmak ngokat ngoꞌrot cik ana oIeccuo papparthuk anthan nakin.
Akanang ikkat cik akokkurarot cannan ana ngꞌri ngikkatheik athapllarot ongkuꞌrot ciki ithiꞌrot thokapik.
Anakka okin tholliethe kuppuꞌrung konoiꞌri ipanan porok irapangka, akin immakat oIeccuo akwonyaro noꞌra woiꞌri akwanthan nakin ana okin thipathe nꞌre.
Anaruk kwiꞌrekathekin itti, “Oun ana nthakorronno opelle.”
Okin thokat thongothe itti okin tharriethok ikuppuꞌrung. Ana akka okin thokkothe ellrïk okin thaththiat itti okin thaat nokꞌran nakin thokat cik akin eo.
Ana ngorrot ngen aul iokwentakot nokuthut korok inakat itti kuppuꞌrung kulukku kokat cik ceneket, ana oIeccuo pappakannarrot tit okin oul immakothok, anaruk weot thellek.
Ana uppuꞌrung wonoiꞌri wꞌrek wakkakathe nokaꞌran koThipiria acoꞌrat iccik kokaꞌran na ul woꞌrkothe thuꞌrit itha oIeccuo popiranet Kapik noka nan.
Anakka ul waththiot itti oIeccuo ana ul immakothok wella ikuppuꞌrung konoiꞌri okin tharrathe iuppuꞌrung wen akin oingkat nokaꞌran koKapprnaum akin othokwantot oIeccuo.
Anakka okin thiothok nocarkan corok, okin thipittathok itti, “Pul ipangkene, ngkwaat cene acintha?”
AIeccuo othïat tit itti, “Mpiꞌret non ilaik ïcat, onon thaik thakwancothin okorronno oka itti akka onon thimmat lon ilommaththik anaruk akka onon thoꞌrkot thuꞌrit ana onon thoththakathe.
Nokorronno orekine thuꞌrit ithakïttako anaruk norekine thuꞌrit ithikkoik thupuththuput itha ukul woKapik ethet non. Akka Kapik kethok lon len ikkun itti kwakkot.”
Ana okin thipittathok itti, “Onïn thakkot taththa ïnokkot ngre inga Kapik kongothe?”
AIeccuo omekat kin itti, “Ngre ngoKapik ngaik itti ngkwaccokot lon nocïkït lokkwi ipa kwothïothe.”
Ittina akin ipittathok, itti, “Lon liatha ilakene ilommaththik ïnïmma ïnoccokot lon lang nomïkït? Ngintha akka akkot?
Thiki thïn thomaꞌrot thoꞌrkot thuꞌrit ithoccot kꞌran itti manna ithampang ithonthomat, ammakka lokurrakot itti, ‘Kwethet kin thuꞌrit ntothiꞌrot akin oꞌrko.’
OIeccuo piꞌrekathekin itti, “Mpiꞌret non lon ilaik ïcat, okorronno oka oMucca akkethet non thuꞌrit ntothiꞌrot anaruk ongappa pin akkethet non thuꞌrit ithaik ïcat ntothiꞌrot.
Akka thuꞌrit thoKapik thakkwi ipanthan ntothiꞌrot ana ethet capu ncik appik thikkoik thung.”
Akin iꞌrekat itti, “Pul ipangkene, nciki inenni ethet nïn thuꞌrit enthrïk.”
AIeccuo iꞌrekat itti, “Oun thuꞌrit thothikkoik. Okkwi ipainin tï takorronno okkwothok ana okkwi ipoccokothe lon lin nocïkït cung pica pakorronno appokkwothok.
Anaruk ammakka mpiꞌrethenon itti, onon thimmarin ana icci onon thꞌrat occokot lon lin nomïkït mon.
Okkwion itha ongappa ethin thainin ana okkwi ipainin mpakannokïccek.
Akka mpakannanthan ntothiꞌrot itti mpathokkot lon ila mpongothe, anaruk itti anothokkot ilakkwi ipothïothin itti mpathokkot.
Ana ilen elli ila okkwi ipothïothin pongothe itti mpakannuret opilin cik aththik nti iakkwion itha kwethin appik ana cakuruk itti anurokiekin nocaꞌri cothakkma.
Akka lon ila oNgappa pongothe itti okkwi ipainet ana occokot lon len nocïkït piot thikkoik thothupuththuput, ana mpurokiek nti ithio nocaꞌri cothakkamako.”
Ul woIouth wikkatheik aerekot noꞌron ila kwiꞌret itti, “Oun thuꞌrit ithaat ntothiꞌrot.”
Okin thiꞌrekathe itti, “Okonnoka oIeccuo empi, ukul woIuccip ana onnan paron thinai? Taththa akka akwiꞌre itti, ‘Mpaat ntothiꞌrot’?”
AIeccuo othïat tit itti, “Nokorronno erekot.
Pul pella ipainin amma ongappa ipothïothin pakannonakok, ana mpurokiek nti ithio nocaꞌri cothakkamako.
Lokurrakot inatham noul wothernte lon loKapik itti, ‘Okin appik thaKapik ongkene.’ Ana okkwi ipaccïkot lon longappa ana ina lon naak painin.
Pul pella ipimmat Kapik anaruk okkwi ipaat noKapik, ook pulluk akkimmat oththan.
Mpiꞌret non lon ilaik ïcat okkwi ipaccokot lon nocïkït pikkoik thupuththuput.
Oun thuꞌrit thothikkoik.
Thiki thon thoꞌrkot thuꞌrit ithoccot kꞌran itti mannaa ithampang ithonthomat, ana icci okin thillet akka mannaa mokat makannoka thuꞌrit thothikkoik.
Anaruk thuꞌrit thei ithaat ntothiꞌrot itha pul oꞌrko ana pakannio.
Oun arrakith wothikkoik iaat ntothiꞌrot. Ana okkwi ipaꞌrko narrakith enni kwakkoik thupuththuput. Arrakith enni waka kin ikanethet thikkoik thoul wonocapu ncik appik.”
Ittina aul woIouth ikkat cik aꞌrettakot cannan aiꞌre itti, “Pul empi pethet ton ka kung aron oꞌrko taththa?”
AIeccuo iꞌrekat kin itti “Mpiꞌret non lon ilaik ïcat amma ngkwakannoꞌrko ka kokkul wopul iponyi ana ïkko ngüccük, ngkwella thikkoik.
Anaruk okkwi ipaꞌrko ka kin ana ïkko ngüccük ngin kwonu thikkoik thothupuththuput ana mpurokiek nocaꞌri cothakkamako.
Akka ka kin ana ngüccük ngin thathuꞌrit ïcarïcat.
Okkwi ipaꞌrko ka kin ana ïkko ngüccük ngin kwaꞌrungkot iaun ana mpaꞌrungkot iaak.
Ana ammakka ongappa ipaik pothïothin ana mpaik akka kwaik, ittina okkwi ipaꞌrko ka kin kwakkoik nti iaun.
Thuꞌrit enthi ithaat ntothiꞌrot. Thiki thon thoꞌrkot thuꞌrit thomannaa ana okin thillet anaruk okkwi ipaꞌrko nothuꞌrit enthi kwakkoik thupuththuput.”
Kwiꞌret lon elli akkwokat cik akwongkene nocuththun caꞌrama nokaꞌran koKapprnaum.
Anakka ul woppot nti iul iammakothok woccïkothe thongkene enthi aiꞌrekat itti, “Thongkene enthi thonthomat cannan. Oththa akkangkot?”
AIeccuo inakat nan itti ul iammakothok wokat cik aꞌrettakinthet thongkene then akwiꞌrekat kin itti, “Alin elli luethenon ka ciki?
Laka taththa nanon amma annimma ukul wopul iponyi akuꞌrot tothiꞌrot, aeo na wokat ncinnan?
Kanang koKapik keettot thikkoik, ka kella lon cik, lon ila mperenet non lakanang kathikkoik.
Ana icci opilingon thꞌrek thaik ianon thakonnoccokot lon nomïkït men.” Akka oIeccuo pinat nan ncimaꞌrot okkwion ithakannoccokot lon nocïkït ana okkwi ipathokerok.
Kwoꞌrungkathe nan akwere itti, “Ilen elli akka mpiꞌrenthet non itti pul pella painin amma ongappa pannethin ngok.”
Nci nocaꞌri enci ul iammakothok woppot wocottakathe nti iaak ana wꞌrakathe ommakothok.
AIeccuo ipittat kin ithattul ana ikken keꞌra itti, “Onon thongothe itti onon thaeo cakuruki, okorronno oka meniki?”
ACcamaan oPoththuruc othïanthok tit itti, “Ili, onïn thaine oththa? Akka oung akkonu lon lothikkoik lothupuththuput.
Onïn thoccokothe lon nomïkït ana onïn thina itti oung ipupure poKapik.”
AIeccuo othïat tit itti, “Oun akkakannakkaronon ithattul ana ikken keꞌrai? Ana icci okkulukku ntianon pothakkat pul pothopulut.”
Kwokat akweret oIoutha ukul woCcaman coIcikkariuththi, okkwi ipokat ntiakin ithattul ana ikken keꞌra, anaruk nomaꞌri mꞌrek ook ipathokerok.
Anakka elli lomttathe aIeccuo oingkat naꞌran koCelïl othakka itti akwoka ciththan nnoththok poIouthia akka ul woIouth wokat cik aꞌrïkothok itti wakkwothok.
Anaruk akka caꞌri cokamuthe koMüꞌrük
koul woIouth kokat akokko napuththut,
apangon thoIeccuo iꞌrekathok itti, “Ngkwonu itti ngkwaththe nokaꞌran engki aeo noththok poIouthia othakka itti aul iammakothung imma lon ilommaththik ilakkot.
Pul pella ipongothe itti pathakka pul iprïk tokït koul ana aporeko nthuꞌran. Ana inakka ngkwaik pakkot lon ammakka elli, okene ul ka kang nocapu ncik appik.”
Opangon manna thaththakannoccokot lon lung nomïkït men.
Ittina aIeccuo iꞌrekat kin itti, “Caꞌri cin icekkot nan carthuk anthan anaruk nanon maꞌri mekkot nan appik nuthuk.
Capu ncik appik cakannꞌranon anaruk cꞌrarin akka mperethe lon ila ul waik wakkot nocapu lokithak.
Ngkonon nokamuthe. Mparthuk paik pakanneo nokamuthe akka naun caꞌri cin icekkot nan carthuk anthan.”
Anakka kwiꞌrethekin lon elli akwikkat cik noththok poCelïl.
Anakka opangon theot nokamuthe, oIeccuo poingkathe nokamuthe cakuruk nthuꞌran.
Nocaꞌri cokamuthe ul woIouth wokat cik akwancathok aipitto itti, “Pul empꞌre paik kartha?”
Ul wokat cik aerethok, opilingon thokat akin iꞌre itti “Ook pul ipoporot.” Opilingon thothïatherit itti, “Aa, kwammikkot ul.”
Anaruk pul pellat ipiꞌrethe lon tokït koul mpoꞌre cittan akka okin thokat akin opellene ul woIouth ionu lon ikkun.
Anakka kamuthe kokat ere kamattat pꞌrin aIeccuo iꞌrikat ithꞌrapak thonoppan toKapik akwikkat cik akwongkene.
Ul woIouth woprttakatherit aikkat cik aipitto itti, “Pul empi piothe thinaik enthi kartha appakannongkenetta?”
AIeccuo othïat tit itti, “Thongkene thin thakannoka thin thaat nakkwi ipothïothin.
Amma okkwi ipongothe itti kwakkot lon ila Kapik kongothe, kwina itti thongkene enthi thaat noKapik ana manna okkorronno oka naun ana noun.
Okkwi iperet lon loka kung, kwaik pakwantinthet ka kung thothiakine cik, anaruk okkwi iparekine thoporot thokkwi ipothïothok, lon lung locoꞌrotheik lella karrarit.
OMucca pakannethet non lon lothonceꞌret lon ciki? Ana icci pul pella nti ianon ipoccokothe itti kwareko ngngin, ngintha akka onon thonganthet itti nthakkwinthin?”
Aul omekathok itti, “Ngkwonu uꞌrupa iokithak, oththa akkongothe itti kwakkwothung?”
AIeccuo iꞌrekat kin itti, “Mpokkothe lon lulukku ilommaththik ana onon thoprttakatherit appik.
Icci oMucca ponanet non lon lothokekkot ana antoka manna itti ook akkakannona anaruk thiki thon ana onon thokekkiethe nyukul nyon nocaꞌri caCcepith.
Inenni amma ul wonu itti wakekkiettat nocaꞌri caCcepith othakka itti alon lothonceꞌret lon cik loMucca anguttat onon thontha akka annua ka kin nothothikkie pul poporot nocaꞌri caCcepith?
Nokorronno akkma pul ipa nthimmat tulluk, nakkma pul llon ilaik ïcat ana locoꞌrotheik.”
Ana nolon len ul wꞌrek wonokaꞌran koUruccelim wikkatheik aipitto itti, “Okoronnoka pul empi ipakin thaik thakwancot itti okin thakkwori?
Kwaik pere ncinokkït ana okin thaik thakanniꞌrethok lon lꞌrek. Nili nina nan ïcat itti ook oMicciei?
Anaruk onïn thina itti pul empi pokeren, akka amma oMiccie anthan pul pella pina itti ook pokeren.”

Ittina oIeccuo pikkatheik akwongkene icci noppan toKapik akwiꞌrekat itti, “Ïï onon thinan ana onon thina itti oun pokeren. Mpakannoka cene akka mpongothe itti mpaka cene ngka kin anaruk okkwi ipothïothin paik ïcat ana onon thommak
anaruk mpinak akka mpaat naak ana kwothïothin.”
Ittina akin enekkekat itti okin thaccokothok, anaruk pul pellat iponekkethe ukun naak akka caꞌri cung cokat carthuk.
Ana icci ul wokat cik woppot ioccokothe lon lung nomïkït men ana wiꞌrekathe itti, “Amma oMiccie akkaat kwakkot lon ilommaththik loppot nnopul empii?”
Aul woPriccin occïkat aul erethok llon elli. Ittina ul ittïttïk woul wonoppan toKapik ana ul woPriccin othïat ul iangwot tupan toKapik athoccokothok.
OIeccuo piꞌrekathe itti, “Oron thakaik oron aththut maꞌri motte ana mpaine okkwi ipothïothin.
Onon thakwariccathin anaruk onon thakanniothin ana na mpaik onon thakannanthan.”

Aul woIouth erettaranthet itti, “Pul empi pongothe itti paeo kartha othakka itti aron okorronno iothok? Kwaeo na ul wonnon iopettakotheik iul iakannoka ul woIouthi akwothongkene ul iakannoka woIouthi?
Kwappongothe itti kwiꞌre itti kaththa akka kwiꞌret itti, ‘Onon thakwariccathin ana onon thakanniothin’ ana ‘Na mpaik onon thakannanthan’?”
Ana nocaꞌri icïrïk ica kamuthe kocothakothe nan, oIeccuo purokathe akwiꞌrekat lon mpoꞌre cittan itti, “Okkwi ipa pica paik pakkwot akwainin akwathïkko ngꞌri.
Okkwi ipoccokothe lon lin nocïkït cung nue noiꞌri ngothikkoik nallo nti iaak ammakka atham wiꞌret.”
Kwokat cik akweret Kanang koKapik ikakin athocco ithoccokothe lon lung nomïkït. Kanang koKapik kokat karthuk ettat kin akka oIeccuo pokat parthuk pakannothikkietta prïk.
Anakka ul woccïkothe lon lung, wꞌrek wiꞌrekathe itti, “Ïcat pul empi papul pothernte lon loKapik.”
Aꞌrek iꞌrekat itti, “Ook oMiccie.”
Ana icci apilingon ipittat itti, “OMiccie panthan noththok poCelïl taththa?
Atham wakinniꞌre itti oMiccie panthan noul woThauthi ana nokaꞌran koPeththelami na Thauth pikkot ciki?”
Ul willillakatherit nti ilon loIeccuo
opilingon thokat thongothe itti okin thaccokothok anaruk pul pellat iponekkethe ukun naak.
Ul iangwot tupan toKapik wopakkanthet ul ittïttïk woul wonoppan toKapik ana ul woPriccin ithipittothekin itti, “Onon thontha akka onon thakannonakok cene?”
Aul iangwot cik iꞌrekat itti, “Pul pella iperet kirrkkir ammakka pul empi ere.”
Aul woPriccin othïat tit itti, “Kwammikkothenon cakuruki?”
Onon thimmat itti opilin nti inili ana manna ul woPriccin poccokothe lon lung nocïkïri?
Aa, pul pella anaruk ul enni wattattakot akka womma lon lothonceꞌret lon cik loMucca.
ONikkothemoc ipokat poinet oIeccuo ana ipokat poul woPriccin pipittot itti,
“Lon lothonceꞌret lon cik lakkma pul kappaki apparthuk inako lon lung ila kwokkothei?”
Okin thothïanthok tit itti, “Ngkwonoththok poCelïl cakuruki? Okatha iatham ana ngkwathiot itti pul pothernte lon loKapik pella panthan noththok poCelïl.”
Ittina okin thopettakatheik kurekkurek oince ikaman ken.
Anaruk oIeccuo poingkathe nocoꞌrong coCeththun.
Ana ngïꞌrïmak ngorrot ngen kwappropakkat noppan toKapik ana ul appik wakkakanthok akwikkat cik ithoꞌrkït then ana kwikkatheik akwongkenekin.
Aul iangkene lon lothonceꞌret lon cik ana ul woPriccin onakat pul ipopari noppan poccokittathe mpul ipocura akin aꞌro ana okin thoceꞌrekathe pul ipopari tokït koIeccuo ana tokït koul.
Akin iꞌrekat oIeccuo itti, “Pul ipangkene, pul ipopari empi poccokittathe apaꞌro mpul ipocura.
Lon lothonceꞌret lon cik loMucca liꞌret itti pul ammakka empi pakincakot cik mmothok, ngkwiꞌre taththa?”
Okin thokat akin ipittot oIeccuo lon elli othakka itti akin ïꞌrak ana akin iot kathar ikakin orukwethok ngngin. Anaruk oIeccuo pocukkwatheik nocapu akwikkat cik akwakurroik nocapu ncaun.
Anakka okin thokat cik akin ommiek nthipitto lon, kwocoꞌrathe kapik akwiꞌrekat kin itti, “Amma opilin ntianon pella lon cik ilokithak akwoꞌro pul ipopari empi cittokït mpothok.”
Akwappocukkwat cik attang akwokurro nocapu.
Ana okkwion ithoccïkothe lon ila oIeccuo piꞌret okin thoincekathe thuluththuluk, ul iukkwat cottokït apilingon antomakot puccuk mono aIeccuo okwentakat pellek okin opul ipopari pen apocoꞌro cïnang.
OIeccuo pocoꞌrathe kapik ana kwiꞌrekathe pul ipopari itti, “Okin thartha? Pella ipakkmarungi?”
Apul ipopari othïat tit itti, “Aa pul pella, pït pin.”
AIeccuo iꞌrekathok itti, “Mpakannakkmang ngko apaꞌrine thikkoik ithokithak cik.”
Ana oIeccuo pappererekanthet ul attang akwiꞌrekat kin itti, “Oun kꞌran ikimmie capu cik appik. Okkwi ipamakothin kwakannonyaro iꞌrïmak ana kwana kꞌran ikimmie cik kothikkoik.”
Aul woPriccin iꞌrekathok itti, “Ngkwaik peret thoka kang ana theret thoka kang enthrïk thakannoka ïcat.”

AIeccuo othïat tit itti, “Antoka manna itti mpaik peret thoka kin ana ila mpaik peret ka kin ngngin laik ïcat akka mpina na mpaat ngngin ana na mpaik paeo. Anaruk onon thomma na mpaat ngngin ana na mpaik paeo.
Onon thakkma ul ngkathar ikaul ionyi akkma ngngin anaruk mpakannakkma ul.
Anaruk amma mpakkma, thakkma thin thocoꞌrotheik akka mpakannoka prek nore engi, onïn thaik ïnongappa okkwi ipothïothin.
Ilon lothonceꞌret lon cik lon lokurrakot itti amma ul weꞌra werethe nolon ana theret then thaka ïcat.
Mperet nolon loka kin pellek, pul pꞌrek iperet nolon loka kin ook ongappa okkwi ipothïothin.”
Ittina akin ipittathok itti, “Oththe paik kartha?”
AIeccuo othïanthet kin tit itti, “Onon thomman ana manna ongappa, amma onon thaththinan, onon thainat ongappa cakuruk.”

Kweret lon elli akka kwokat cik akwongkene noppan toKapik iccik kokaꞌran kothaꞌrntot akucci iaꞌrntakinthet ngre ngonoppan toKapik. Pul pellat ipaꞌrumothok itti paccokothok akka caꞌri cung cokat carthuk.
AIeccuo appiꞌrekat kin attang itti, “Mpaik paeo ana onon thakwariccathin, ana onon thillet ilon lon ilokithak. Ana na aneo onon thakannao nokaꞌran ken.”
Elli lokorronnathe ul woIouth aipitto itti, “Kwakkwot ka kungi? Ilen akka akwiꞌrene itti, na aneo, onon thakannao nokaꞌran keni?”
Anaruk kwoꞌrungkathe nolon akwiꞌre itti, “Onon thonocapu thaiken ana oun porothiꞌrot. Onon thonocapu enci. Anaruk mpakannoka ponocapu enci.
Mpiꞌrethenon itti onon thillet ilon lon ilokithak amma onon thakannoccokot lon nomïkït itti oun okkwi ipa mpaik piꞌre itti oun, onon thillet ilon lon ilokithak kirrkkir.”
Okin thipittathok itti, “Oung oththa?”
AIeccuo othïanthet kin itti, “Oun pul ipa mpiꞌrethenon nci nomun itti mpaka.
Mponu loppot ila anerenenon nothakkma non. Anaruk okkwi ipothïothin akkiꞌre lon ilaik ïcat ana ila mpoccïkothe naak mperene ul nocapu ncik appik.”
Okin thaththakannina itti kwokat cik akwerenthet kin oththan pung.

Ittina aIeccuo iꞌrekat kin itti, “Caꞌri icanon okkwot ukul wopul iponyi mono onthot nothapak, onon thina itti oun okkwi ipa aniꞌre itti oun ana mpakannokkot lon lꞌrek pellek anaruk mpaik pere tulluk ila ongappa pongkenerin.
Okkwi ipothïothin paik naun, kwakorronno okorronnonon thellek, akka mpakkettet lon ilapiriek noka appinappin.”
Anakka kweret lon elli, ul woppot woccokathe lon lung nomïkït.
AIeccuo iꞌrekat ul woIouth ioccokothe lon lung nomïkït itti, “Amma onon thoꞌrungkwothe ithongkene thin, onon thaka ul ïcarïcat iammakothin.
Ana onon thina lon ilaik ïcat ana lon ilaik ïcat lelikko non nti ilon ilokithak.”
Okin thothïanthet oIeccuo tit itti, “Onïn thathiki thAprein ana onïn thokat thakorronno oka iak wopilin. Ana tat akka aiꞌre itti onïn thelikkako?”
AIeccuo othïanthet kin tit itti, “Mpiꞌret non ilaik ïcat itti okkwi ipakkot lon ilokithak kwapiak polon ilokithak.
Iak wonu kaꞌran cik ikuꞌri okorronno oka kothupuththuput, anaruk ukul wonu aꞌran cik ikuꞌri wothupuththuput.
Ittina amma ukul woKapik welikkot non ana onon thelikkako kirrkkir.
Mpina itti onon thathiki thAprein, anaruk onon thaik thakwantot kathar ikanon okkwothin ngngin akka lon lin lella kaꞌran nomïkït mon.
Mpaik perenenon lon ila ongappa pokenerin ana onon thakkot ilanon thoccïkothe naththen.”
Akin othïat tit itti, “Ongappa pïn Aprein.”
AIeccuo iꞌrekat kin itti, “Amma onon akkakkokat nyukul nyAprein, onon thaakkothe lon ammakka Aprein pokkothe.
Ammakka lon laik onon thongothe itti nthakkwothin, pul iperenet non lon ilaik ïcat ila mpoccïkothe noKapik. Aprein pakannokkot lon ammakka lon elli.
Onon thaik thakkot lon ila oththen thokkettethe.”
Akin othïanthok tit itti, “Onïn thakorronno oka nyukul nyorittak, ongappa pïn pulukku ook Kapik ngka kung.”
OIeccuo piꞌrekathekin itti, “Amma Kapik kokat oththe pon, onon thira thangathin akka mpaat noKapik ana mpei cene. Mpakannao ngkathar kin, anaruk kwothïothin.
Ngintha akka onon thommanet occïkïnthet lon lin ila mpaik pere? Laik ittina akka onon thakorronno okkwine lon lin kunu ncik.

Oththe pon pul pothopulut ana nthongothe itti onon thamakot lon ila oththe pon pongothe. Kwokat pul ipangutte ul ncimaꞌrot ana kwonat karra ana kwappokat pꞌrat lon ilaik ïcat akka kwellat lon ilaik ïcat nocïkït. Amma akwammikkot, kwere lon lulluk loka kung ana ook pokarra ana ook oththan poul iere karra appik.
Anaruk akka mperenenon lon ilaik ïcat ana ilen akka onon thꞌrat occokinthet lon lin ila mpaik pere.
Oththa ntianon akkakenen itti mponu lon lokithak? Amma mpaik perenenon lon ilaik ïcat, ngintha akka annokorronno occokinthet lon nomïkït?
Okkwi iponu oththan paKapik kwaccïkot lon ila Kapik iꞌre. Lon ilakorronnonon annokorronno occïkïnthet lon lin itti akka onon thakannoka thoKapik.”
Aul woIouth iꞌrekat oIeccuo itti, “Lon lïn lakannoka ïcat itti ngkwonoul woCcamirin ana ngkwannoka pïn ana ngkwonu uꞌrupa iokithaki?”
AIeccuo iꞌrekat kin itti, “Mpella uꞌrupa iokithak anaruk mpothianet ongappa cik ana onon thakorrnno othianok cik.
Mpaik pakorronno okwantinthet ka kin thrïk anaruk opilin paik pakwantinthet ana ook okkwi ipa athakkma.
Mpiꞌret non ilaik ïcat itti okkwi ipoꞌrumot nolon lin, kwakannio aththik.”

Menik aul woIouth iꞌrekat itti, “Onïn thantrina pꞌrïn itti ngkwonu uꞌrupa iokithak. Aprein piot ana ul wothernte lon loKapik willet cakuruk. Ana tat akka aiꞌre itti pul ipaccïkot lon lang pannio aththik?
Oung akkrïk nangappa pïn Apreini? Kwiot ana ul wothernte lon loKapik cakuruk willet. Ngkwaik pame itti oung oththa?”
AIeccuo iꞌrekat kin itti, “Amma mpaik pathikkie ka kin prïk, lon len lella lon cik. Ongappa ipanon thaik thiꞌre itti ook oththe pon ook ipathikkien prïk.
Onon thommak anaruk mpinak. Ana amma mpiꞌret itti mpommak, mpaka ponu karra karkkon anaruk mpinak ana mpoꞌrumot nolon lung.
Oththe pon Aprein popirakathe noka akka nothokwarttikot caꞌri cothao thin akka kwimmat akwopirakat noka. Kwimmakathe maꞌri mothanthan min ana kwopirakathe noka.”
Aul woIouth iꞌrekathok itti, “Ngkwarthuk manna okkot luput arrial weꞌra ana alkaire (50), ana ngkwiꞌre itti ngkwimmat Aprein taththa?”
AIeccuo othïanthet kin tit itti, “Mpiꞌret non ilaik ïcat, mpokat cik Aprein parthuk akwonta.”
Menik aul ocumat mothok itti wakincok, anaruk kurakathekin akwopaꞌrat cik noppan toKapik.
Anakka oIeccuo pokat cik nokathar, kwimmakathe pul piꞌrimathe ammakka pokwontat nti icarak connan.
Aul iammakothok ipittathok itti, “Pul ipangkene, oththa akkokkothe lon ilokithak mono apul empi okwontakanthet piꞌrimathe? Ooki ana amma okorronno oka ook oththangoni?”
AIeccuo othïanthet kin tit itti, “Okorronno oka oththangon ana manna okorronno oka pul pen akkokkothe lon lokithak, anaruk elli lothakkat ittina othakka itti angre ngoKapik immakot ithikkoik thung.
Inakka cïngkï carthuk orungko, oron thonu itti oron thakkot ngre ngokkwi ipothïothin. Ngkoꞌra ngaik ngao ana pul pella ipareko ingkoꞌra.
Ana inakka mpaik nocapu, oun kꞌran ikaccie cik nocapu appik.”
Manakka oIeccuo piꞌret lon elli, kwothukkwathe nguk nocapu ana kwoukkwathe nonunthu ana kwothathe pul ipiꞌrimathe ikït.
Kwiꞌrekathe pul pen itti, “Ngko, athilakko ikït ikꞌral ikoccot kꞌran itti Ciluam” (ilonu itti 'thothïot'). Ana pul poingkathe ana paththilakkat ana pakkakathe tuan appimmat cik.
Ul wonocürük cung ana okkwion ithokat akin okathacceccek akka akwipittittot ul aꞌrupu, wikkatheik aprttakot tit ana aipittarot itti, “Annoka pul empi ipokat cik apipittitto aꞌrupu ikathari?”
Ul wꞌrek wiꞌrekathe itti ook pul pen ipokat ipiꞌrimathe. Ana aꞌrek iꞌre itti, “Okorronno oka ook kungkworok nuthuk.”
Anaruk kwiꞌrekathe ul itti, “Oun ipokat piꞌrimathe.”
Okin thipittathok itti, “Ngkwimmat cik taththa?”

Kwothïanthet kin tit itti, “Pul pꞌrek poccot kꞌran itti oIeccuo poukkwot ngacok ana kwothathin ikït. Ana kwiꞌrekathin itti ngko athilakko toca ikꞌral koCiluam. Ana mpoingkathe ana mpaththilakkat toca ana mpimakatheik.”
Ana okin thipittathok itti, “Pul pen paik kartha?”
Ana kwiꞌrekathekin itti, “Mpomma na kwaik.”
Okin thonakanthet ul woPriccin pul ipokat piꞌrimathe.
Caꞌri ica oIeccuo poukkwot nunthu nan ana anyinthet pul ipokat piꞌrimathe kït cokat caCcepith.
Ana ul woPriccin wipittathok cakuruk itti kwimmat cik tat, ana pul ipokat piꞌrimathe pothïanthet kin tit itti, “Kwothothin ngacok ikït ana mpaththilakkat ana mpimmakatheik ina.”

Aul wꞌrek woPriccin iꞌrekat itti, “Pul empi paKapik akkakorronno othïot akka pakorronno oꞌrumo nolon lothonceꞌret lon cik locaꞌri caCcepith.” Anaruk aꞌrek wiꞌrekathe itti, “Pul polon ilokithak pakkot lon elli ilommaththik taththa?” Ittina okin onakathe lon leꞌrarit.
Ittina pꞌrïn akin appopakkanthet pul ipokat piꞌrimathe akin ipittathok itti, “Ngkwiꞌre itti oththa akka akkanyinthung kït? Kït kang akka kwanyothe.”
Apul othïanthet kin tit itti, “Ook pul pothernte lon loKapik.”
Anaruk ul ittïttïk woIouth wokat wꞌrat angkot lon itti pul empi pokat piꞌrimathe ana pimmat cik akin akkaro oththan ana onnan kappak.
Akka oththan ana onnan thaat akin ipittat kin itti, “Ukul won enni? Ien enni ianon thiꞌret itti wokwontat wiꞌrimathei? Ana tat akka wei wimmat cik inenni?”
Aththan ana onnan popul ipiꞌrimathe othïanthet kin tit itti, “Onïn thina itti ook ukul wïn ana wokwontat wiꞌrimathe.
Anaruk onïn thomma tat akka kwimmat cik, ana manna onïn thomma okkwi ipimmierok cik, nipittothok, kwocokkat ana kwina ere lon loka kung.”
Oththangon thaththiꞌret lon elli akka okin thokat cik akin opellene ul woIouth akka wonekkethe lon cik itti okkwi ipiꞌret itti oIeccuo ook oMiccie kwapaꞌrettaik nocuththun caꞌrama.
Ana ilen akka oththangon thiꞌrenet itti, “Kwocokkat nipittothok.”
Aul ittïttïk woIouth appakkarat pul pen ipiꞌrimathe akin iꞌrekathok itti, “Iꞌrethenïn tokït koKapik ikrïk itti ngkwiꞌre lon ilaik ïcat. Akka onïn thina itti pul ipimmierung cik polon ilokithak.”
Apul othïat tit itti, “Mpomma amma ook polon ilokithak ana manna itti kwannoka polon ilokithak, lulukku ila mpina tulluk itti mpokat piꞌrimathe anaruk inenni mpimmat cik.”
Aul ittïttïk woIouth ipittathok itti, “Ngintha akka kwokkinthung? Ana tat akka kwimmierung cik?”
Akwothïanthet kin tit itti, “Mpiꞌrethenon ntit akkumman ana onon thꞌrat occïkot. Ngintha akka annappipittine itti nthappoccïkot? Nthongothe itti onon thathakka ul iammakothok cakuruki?”
Ana ul woIouth wocungkwathok ana wiꞌrekathe itti, “Oung pul pung ipamakothok, anaruk onïn thaul iammakot oMucca.
Onïn thina kicce itti Kapik kerenet oMucca, anaruk onïn thomma manna na pul empi paat ngngin.”
Apul ipokat piꞌrimathe iꞌrekat kin itti, “Lon lon lointha ellrïk, onon thomma na kwaat ngngin anaruk kwanyinthin kït.
Oron thina itti Kapik kakannoccïkot ul wolon ilokithak. Anaruk kaccïkot ul iongothe lon lung ana iakkot lon ila kwongothe.
Ammakka capu cokuꞌrettat ncik pul pella manna ipoccïkothe itti pul panyittanthet kït ipokwontat piꞌrimathe.
Amma pul empi pappakannoka poKapik pakannokkothe lon elli.”
Aul woIouth ittïttïk iꞌrekat pul ipokat piꞌrimathe itti, “Ngkwokwonttat ana upokkot ilon ilokithak, ngkwonu itti ngkwangkenenïn lon lꞌreki?” Okin thokïccekathok nnocuththun kirrkkir.
Ana oIeccuo poccïkathe itti okin thokïccerok nnocuththun anakka kwiothok, kwiꞌrekathok itti, “Ngkwaccokot lon nocïkït lokkul wopul iponyii?”
Apul ipokat piꞌrimathe ipittathok itti, “Ook oththa pït pin, iꞌrethin othakka itti anoccokot lon lung nocïkït.”
AIeccuo iꞌrekathok itti, “Ngkwimmarok ntit ana kwaik perenung.”
Ittina apul pen iꞌrekat itti, “Ili, mpoccokothe lon lang nocïkït.” Ana kwaꞌrakanthet oIeccuo ngaꞌrama.
OIeccuo piꞌrekathe itti, “Mpaat nocapu appik anathakkma ul, othakka itti aul iꞌrimathe immaik ana ul immat cik aiꞌrimat.”
Ul wꞌrek woPriccin iokat cik okin aththut woccïkathe akka kwiꞌret lon len, aipittat itti, “Ngimpene? Onïn thiꞌrimathe cakuruke?”
AIeccuo othïanthet kin tit itti, “Amma onon thaththiꞌrimathe, onon thakorronno okat tholon ilokithak. Anaruk onon thaik thinnikot itti onon thimmat cik ittina lon ilokithak laꞌrungkotheik.”
AIeccuo iꞌrekat itti, “Mpiꞌret non lon ilaik ïcat, pul ipanniꞌriko nti icürük cokuthuk, akwullo karrang, okkathuꞌran emprïk ana pul ipaththikot aꞌrupu.
Pul ipiꞌriko nti icürük cokuthuk, ook opït polungkat.
Ana pul ipangwot cik panyinok kathat ana lungkat laccïkot poꞌre pung. Kwakkaro lungkat lung nnꞌran wen akwoppiekat thapat.
Ana amma kwoppiethe thapat nti iththuk, kwaeo tokït ken alantomakothok ana laccïkothok akka lina poꞌre pung.
Anaruk lakorronno omakot pul ipa lomma, ana lallot pul pen akka lomma poꞌre popul pen.”
OIeccuo perenet kin lon elli okkwie lon kuru ncik anaruk okin thannina lon ila kwokat cik akwerenekin.
Ittina aIeccuo appiꞌrekat kin itti, “Mpiꞌret non lon ilaik ïcat, Oun cürük cokuthuk na lungkat okko.
Okin appik ithaat amparthuk ao akin innikot itti okin ul iuꞌre, okin thothuꞌran ana ithaththikot aꞌrupu anaruk lungkat lakorronno occïkot kin.
Oun cürük ana okkwi ipokkot icürük cen kwaꞌrettat. Kwiꞌriko noppan ana oppot thapat akwoppo icürük ana kwiot thuꞌrit.
Pul iponu thuꞌran pao tulluk itti pathomunye ana ongwaro ana okïttoik anaruk mpaat itti akin ona thikkoik thonu thethïettat.
Oun pul ipuꞌre ipoporot. Pul ipuꞌre ipoporot pangat itti pio nti ilon lolungkat lung.
Pul iponakattat itti puꞌre pakannoka ammakka opït polungkat akka amma pul pen pimmat mipa amanthan ana papaꞌrine lungkat cik ana pallo ana mipa mallot tolungkat amoꞌrumat amopettat cik.
Pul pen pallo akka kwakannoka pul polungkat ana kwella kït ken.
Oun pul ipuꞌre ipoporot, mpina lungkat lin ana lungkat lin linan cakuruk
ammakka ongappa pinan ana mpina ongappa ana mpio nti ilon lolungkat lin.
Mponu lungkat lꞌrek lella ilakorronno oka nti iththuk kolungkat elli. Mponu itti mpanakin cakuruk. Laccïkothin ana laka ithun iththuk kulukku ana pul ipuꞌre paka pulukku.
Ongappa pongothin akka mpangkothe itti mpio anappuroko attang.

Pul pella panekothin thikkoik thin anaruk oun pellek ngka kin akkongothe itti mpio. Oun akkonu puꞌran itti mpakorronno ka kin itti mpio ana mponu puꞌran itti mpurokie ka kin nti ithio. Lon ila mpaik pere langappa akkiꞌrethin itti mpakkot.”
Anakka kwiꞌret lon elli aul woIouth appillillakat tit attang.
Ul woppot nti iakin wiꞌrekathe itti, “Uꞌrupa iokithak woꞌrot naak ana kwipot purrut. Ngintha akka aron occïkïnthet lon lung?”
Anaruk ul wꞌrek wiꞌrekathe itti, “There thung enthi thakannoka thopul ipa uꞌrupa iokithak woꞌrot nan. Uꞌrupa iokithak wanyot kït kopul ipiꞌrimathei?”
Ittina acaꞌri cokamuthe kothothuntet tupan toKapik akkakat nokaꞌran koUruccelim. Ana cik cokat icpo,
oIeccuo pokat cik akwonyaro ithꞌrapak tonoppan toKapik ithrara ithonat kꞌran itti Thrara thoCiliman.
Ul woIouth waꞌrntakathe iccik kung aiꞌre itti, “Ngkwaprttakiet nïn tit manna kartha? Amma oung oMiccie aiꞌret nïn nci nokkït.”
AIeccuo othïanthet kin itti, “Mpiꞌrethenon, anaruk onon thakorronno occokot lon lin nomïkït. Lon ilommaththik ila anokkot ngkꞌran kongappa leret lon lin.
Anaruk onon thakannoccokot lon lin nomïkït akka onon thakannoka lungkat lin.
Lungkat lin laccïkot poꞌre pin ana mpina ana linan ana lammakothin.
Mpethet kin thikkoik thothupuththuput ana okin thakorronno intat cik ana pul pella panekothin kin.
Ongappa ipethin kin akkïrïk naꞌrupu appik, ana pul pella ipaneko kin ntikkun wongappa.
Oun ana ongappa onïn thulukku.”
Aul woIouth apponekat mothok attang itti wakincothok cik.
Anaruk oIeccuo piꞌrekathekin itti, “Mpokenet non lon loppot ilommaththik nangappa, liatha akka onon thongothe itti nthakincothin cik ntit?”
Aul woIouth othïanthok tit itti, “Onïn thakorronno angkot itti onïn thakincothung cik nti ire ioppot ia ngkwokkothe anaruk akka ngkwaik pakatha ka kang ngkwaKapik anaruk ngkwapul iponyi.”
OIeccuo pothïanthet kin tit itti, “Lakorronno okurrako ilon lothonceꞌret lon cik lon na Kapik kiꞌrethe itti, ‘Ul ionu lon ikkun wꞌrek itti onon apik’?
Lon loKapik lakkarot ul wen itti apik ana lon loKapik laik ïcat appinappin.
Oun ipa angappa pakkarot ana othïot nocapu ncik appik, ana tat akka annorukwethin llon itti mpiꞌret itti, ‘MpaKapik’? Othakka itti akka mpiꞌret itti, ‘Oun ukul woKapiki’?
Amma mpaik pakorronno okkot ngre ngongappa annokorronno occokot lon lin nomïkït mon.
Anaruk amma mpaik pakkot ana manna onon thantokorronno occokot nomïkït mon, noccokot lon ilommaththik lꞌrek ilanon thina itti ongappa paik iaun ana mpaik iaak.”
Menik okin thenekkekathe itti okin thaccokot oIeccuo anaruk kurakathekin akwoingkat.
Ittina oIeccuo parrathe tue toÜrüthün cik akweo nokaꞌran na aIuanna pomamuthie pokat cik akwikket ul mamuthie nomaꞌri morokït. OIeccuo pikkot cik nan
ana ul woppot wakkakanthok. Okin thiꞌrekathe itti, “OIuanna pomamuthie pakorronno okkot lon ilommaththik, anaruk lon ila kwerethe pul empi ngngin lokat ïcat appik.”
Ana ul woppot woccokathe lon loIeccuo nomïkït.
Pul pꞌrek pokat cik poccot kꞌran itti oLiaccir. Pokat pongo ana kwokat ponokaꞌran koPeththania ipokat kaꞌran koMeriom ana opang ipopari oMarththa.
OMeriom ipa apang oLiaccir paik nonthe pongo ook oMeriom ipoꞌrot Ili amutha ana ukukkwot tacok toIli nuan wung.
Ittina apangon thoLiaccir othïanthet oIeccuo thon itti, “Ili, okkwi ipa ngkwongothe pongo.”
Anakka oIeccuo poccïkothe elli akwiꞌrekat itti, “Thonga enthi thakorronno ocothakot itti kwio. Anaruk othakka itti aKapik othikkietta krïk ana athrïk aine ukul wung nti ithio then.”
OIeccuo pokat pongothe oMarththa ana opang ipopari ana opang pen ipocura oLiaccir.
Anakka oIeccuo poccïkothe itti oLiaccir pongo, kwapprikkat cik nokaꞌran na kwokat maꞌri meꞌra icci.
Menik kwiꞌrekathe ul iammakothok itti, “Ntun eo opakkot noththok poIouthia.”
Anaruk okin thiꞌrekathe itti, “Pul ipangkene, onïn thapri itti ul woIouth wira wakincothung cik tentre ana ngkwappopakkinthet kin tat?”
AIeccuo othïat tit itti, “Mpapri itti caꞌri conu kït komïngkïrit attul ana ikken keꞌra? Ittina okkwi ipanyaro icïngkï kwakorronno ommukko nopothok akka kwimmaik ngkꞌran kocïngkï conocapu.
Anaruk amma akwonyaro ngkoꞌra kwammukko akka kꞌran ikaccienok cik kella.”
Akka oIeccuo piꞌret elli, akwapparttat nan itti, “Opuruko ponnon oLiaccir pakko inthe anaruk mpaik paeo anothurttok.”
Aul iammakothok iꞌrekathok itti, “Ili, amma kwaik inthe ana kurtta.”
OIeccuo pappokat akwere itti oLiaccir piot anaruk ul immakothok wokat wommat akin ome itti kwakko inthe nuthuk.
Ittina kwiꞌrekathekin nci nokkït itti, “OLiaccir piot,
ana nti ilon lon mpopirat noka akka mpellat tentre naak othakka itti annoccokot lon nomïkït. Ntrun oinok.”
OThthoma ipokat poccot kꞌran cakuruk itti Tharo iꞌrekat ul woIeccuo iammakothok wꞌrek itti, “Ntun eo cakuruk othakka itti aron othille uraththut.”
Anakka oIeccuo paat, kwaththiat oLiaccir akkwiot ntit akkwonu maꞌri mocoꞌrin ippu.
Kaꞌran koPeththania kokat kannoka ciththan nokaꞌran koUruccelim,
ul woppot woIouth wawoinet oMarththa okin opang oMeriom athipitto kin akka opang pen pokat piot.
Anakka oMarththa poccïkothe itti oIeccuo paik panthan, kwoingkathe thapat akwothocurot iaak, anaruk oMeriom pikkatheik tuan.
AMarththa iꞌrekat oIeccuo itti, “Ili, amma ngkwappokat cik cene ana opangkin pannaiot.
Anaruk mpina itti manna inenni Kapik kethung ilaipitto.”
AIeccuo iꞌrekat oMarththa itti, “Opangkang puroko attang.”
Amarththa othïat tit itti, “Mpina itti kuroko attang nocaꞌri cothurttuko.”
AIeccuo iꞌrekathok itti, “Oun thuroko ana thikkoik. Ana okkwi ipoccokothe lon lin nocïkït kwakkoik antoka manna itti kwiot,
ana okkwi ipaik ngkït thapat ana kwoccokothe lon lin nocïkït kwakorronno io, ngkwaccokot lon elli nocïkïri?”
Akwothïanthet oIeccuo tit itti, “Ili, mpoccokothe lon nocïkït itti, oung oMiccie, ukul woKapik okkwi ipokat ponu itti kwanthan nocapu ncik appik.”
Anakka kwiꞌrethe oIeccuo lon elli akwoingkat akwothakkarat opang ipopari oMeriom thocipit. Akwiꞌrekathok itti, “Pul ipangkene paik cene ana kwaik pipittong.”
Manakka oMeriom poccïkothe lon elli akurokat kapik accokkot akwoingkanthok.
OIeccuo pokat parthuk iꞌriko icarak coman kwokat nokaꞌran na aMarththa paththocurot iaak.
Anakka ul woIouth iathipitto oMeriom wimmat tat akka kwurokot accokkot akweo thapat, okin thomakathok akin iꞌre itti ikkre kwaik pathoot thoppu.
Manakka oMeriom peot nokaꞌran na oIeccuo pokat cik, kwimmakathe oIeccuo ana kwapathe iracok tung akwiꞌrekat itti, “Ili, amma ngkwappokat cik cene ana opangkin pannaiot.”
Anakka oIeccuo pimmat oMeriom akwoo ana ul woIouth iaat akin aththut aoo cakuruk kwokakathe piccillang ka ana kwakorronno okakat poporot noka.
AIeccuo ipittat itti, “Onon thocïkkarorok kartha?”
Akin othïanthet oIeccuo tit itti, “Ili, aꞌrik athokatha.”
OIeccuo pikkatheik akwoo.
Ittina aul woIouth iꞌrekat itti, “Nantokatha akka kwongothok.”
Anaruk opilin ntiakin piꞌrekathe itti, “Okorronno oka ook ipanyinthet pul ipa piꞌrimathe kïri, kwakannokorronnot oLiaccir itti kwakorronno ioi?”
Acïkït okꞌrellat oIeccuo attang ana kwoingkathe thoppu thocuꞌrol ipaꞌranthang. Tupu tokat tunukkakothe ngkaꞌraccak.
Kwiꞌrekathekin itti, “Nopaꞌre pothok cik.”
Anaruk oMarththa opang popul ipiot piꞌrekathe itti, “Ili, kwiot ponu maꞌri mocoꞌrin ana kwaththoka pakkunakot.”
AIeccuo iꞌrekat itti, “Mpappakanniꞌret non itti amma okkwi ipoccokothe lon loKapik nocïkït ana kwimma thrïk thoKapiki?”
Okin thopaꞌrekathe pothok cik aIeccuo okathakat tothiꞌrot akwiꞌrekat itti, “Ngappa, mpopiranung noka akka ngkwoccïkothin.
Mpina itti ngkwaccïkothin appinappin, anaruk mpiꞌret elli othakka itti aul enni iaik wacoꞌro cene ina itti oung akkothïothin.”
Anakka oIeccuo piꞌret elli, kwakkarathe mpoꞌre cittan itti, “Liaccir, oppothe thapat.”
Apul ipappiot oppat thapat ana nyaun ana tacok tokat toꞌremethettat nneret wothocïkkako ana kret kulukkwothok toca.
OIeccuo piꞌrekathekin itti, “Nokꞌrothok eret akweo.”
Ul woppot woIouth iaat itti wathokatha oMeriom anakka wimmat lon ila oIeccuo pokkothe, woccokathe lon lung nomïkït men.
Anaruk opilingon thoingkanthet ul woPriccin akin iꞌrekat kin lon ila oIeccuo pokkothe.
Ittina aul ittïttïk woul wonoppan toKapik ana ul woPriccin thakkaranthe cuththun coul woIouth ittïttïk. Akin ipittat itti, “Ngintha akka oron okkot? Pul empi paik pakkot lon ilommaththik loppot.
Amma oron thakorronnok akwokkot ittina ana ul appik waccokot lon lung nomïkït, ana ul woRoma wanthan ana waneko tupan toKapik appik ana ul wonnon appik.”
Opilin nti iakin poccot kꞌran itti oKiappa ook ipokat pul iprïk ponoppan toKapik nothuput then piꞌrekathe itti, “Onon thomma lon lꞌrek aththik.
Onon thomma itti laka loporot itti pul pulukku pine ul woppot ana okorronno oka itti ul woppot wille, aintakat ciki?”
Kwakorronno iꞌre elli ngka kung anaruk ammakka pul iprïk ponoppan toKapik nothuput then perethe lon ilaik lanthan itti oIeccuo piot nothapak nti ilon loul woIouth,
ana okorronno oka tulluk itti kwine ul woIouth anaruk kwine nyukul inyopettakotheik nyoKapik othakka itti akwaꞌrnttot kin tothun akwothikkiekin thulukku.
Ana nocaꞌri cen anili noIouth ikkat cik anipot lon cik ilakin okkwot oIeccuo ngngin.
OIeccuo pikkatheik akwokorronno onyaro ncinokkït iul woIouth. Ana kwoingkathe nokaꞌran koIppraim ikokat iccik koka kothampang ithonthomat ana kwikkatheik than okin oul iammakathok.

Anakka caꞌri cokamuthe koul woIouth koThaurrot kaman kꞌrek cik kokat cik akokko napuththut, ul woppot wakkakathe nokaꞌran koUruccelim athimet lon len ilokithak cik akamuthe koThaurrot kaman kꞌrek karthuk ao.
Okin thikkatheik akin akwariccat oIeccuo, anakka okin thocoꞌrot ithꞌrapak thonoppan toKapik okin thikkatheik akin ipittararot itti, “Atti kwanthan nokamuthe cung?”
Anaruk ul ittïttïk woul wonoppan toKapik ana ul woPriccin wokat wonekkethe lon cik itti amma opilin piothe oIeccuo, akwathiꞌret kin othakka itti akin athoccokothok.
Anakka maꞌri mellat ncik mꞌrakkuruk akamuthe koThaurrot kaman kꞌrek cik okkattat, oIeccuo popakkathe nokaꞌran koPeththania na kwappurokiethe oLiaccir nti itho.

Thuꞌrit thokkattakathe nti ithothiane oIeccuo cik athettakathok aMarththa ikkat cik akwittarot kin ana oLiaccir pokat cik nti iakin ithokat akin othïngkakot iriki wokkun wothokure iccik kung nokuppuꞌrung kothuꞌrit cakuruk.

Menik oMeriom ponekathe cuꞌru camutha ionu cekerek crïk ana kunanthet oIeccuo noracok ana kwikkatheik akukukkwot nnuan wung. Ana man moppakathe utha wamutha iakkunako irruk. Amutha wokat wokkattathe nnopoꞌren ipoccot kꞌran itti narth.
Apilin nti iul immakothok ipoccot kꞌran itti oIoutha Icikkariuththi, ipathokerot ul oIeccuo pokat cik cakuruk akwiꞌrekat itti,
“Ngintha akka aron okïttinthet ngaak engi cik ingira ngaketta nakucci woppot aikkettat ul iaiak. Amutha wonu cekerek cakucci iarekako ngngnin thuput.”
Kwanniꞌre lon elli othakka itti kwonu thiak thoul iaiak anaruk akka kwonat thuꞌran ana kwokat pul ipoccokothe kaꞌruk kakucci, ana kwokat akwomunye akucci iokat ikaꞌruk.
OIeccuo piꞌrekathe itti, “Nokorronnok, kwappangwotheik itti akwathocïkkon ngngin.
Onon thonu ul iaiak ithoꞌrkït thon appinappin anaruk mpakorronno oka ithoꞌrkït thon appinappin.”
Anakka ul woIouth winat nan itti oIeccuo pokat ceneket, woingkathe athokathak ana okorronno oka oIeccuo tulluk anaruk okin thaththokatha oLiaccir cakuruk ipa oIeccuo pappurokiet nti ithio.
Ul ittïttïk woul wonoppan toKapik wipathe lon cik ila akin okkwot oLiaccir ngngin cakuruk,
akka ook akkokorronnot ul woIouth woppot apaꞌrine lon loul wonoppan toKapik cik, accokot lon loIeccuo nomïkït.
Ana ngorrot ngen, aul iaat nokamuthe occïkat itti oIeccuo paik ikathar paik panthan nokaꞌran koUruccelim.
Okin thongathathe uꞌri wokira kothemur akin oingkat othocurarot iaak akin iꞌre mpoꞌre cittan itti,
“Ton opirane Kapik noka korothiꞌrot.”
“Athethïetta oka nakkwi ipaik panthan ngkꞌran koIli.”
“Athethïetta oka noili woIccereil.”
OIeccuo piathe ngeꞌringka ngotte ana kwarratheran ammakka lokurrakot itti,
“Ul woIccereil, nokorronno ipo nꞌre,
nantokatha ili won waik wanthan,
warrothe teꞌringka iotte.”

Caꞌri cen ul iammakothok warommat lon len, anaruk akka oIeccuo purokot nti ithio ana othikkietta prïk, akin antokwarikat lon ilokat lokurrakot iatham woKapik ierethe lon lung ana okin thokkanthok lon len.
Ana ul iokat cik okin aththeꞌran akka kwakkarot oLiaccir nti ippu akurokiekathok nti ithio wikkatheik apettot lon len cik appik.
Ul woppot woingkathe athokathak akka wokat woccïkothe lon ila kwokkothe ilommaththik.
Ittina ul woPriccin werettaranthet itti, “Oron thaik thakorronno okkot lon lꞌrek. Nantokatha akka ul waik wamakothok nocapu ncik appik.”
Ul wꞌrek iakorronno oka woIouth waat itti wathaꞌra ngaꞌrama nocaꞌri cokamuthe.
Ul iakorronno oka woIouth wen wakkakanthet oPilippic ipokat ponokaꞌran koPeththcceitha ikaik noththok poCelïl akin ipittathok itti, “Pït pïn, ïnthongothe itti onïn therene oIeccuo.”
OPilippic poingkathe akwothiꞌret Anthrauc, ana Anthrauc ana oPilippic thopakkathe akin othiꞌret oIeccuo.
AIeccuo othïanthet kin itti, “Caꞌri caat cokkul wopul iponyi itti wathikkietta wïrïk.
Mpiꞌret non lon ilaik ïcat itti amma core cocïl cakannapot nocapu mono acio caꞌrungkwot cik cïl culukku anaruk amma ciot cakwono mïl moppot.
Pul ipongothe thikkoik thung kuret cik, ana okkwi ipꞌrat thikkoik thung nocapu enci thanguttanthok cik thikkoik thothupuththuput.
Okkwi iparekinin ponu itti kwamakothin ana na mpaik pul iparekinin ponu itti pakaik. Ongappa pathikkie okkwi iparekinin pothiakinet cik.
Mpaik piirro cïkït nti icarak cannan ana mpomma akka aniꞌre, ‘Ngappa oꞌrethin nolon ilaik lainin’? Anaruk ilen akka mpainet nocaꞌri enci.
Ngappa, athrïk oka nokꞌran kang.”
Ittina apoꞌre akkakat ntothiꞌrot apiꞌre itti, “Mpethet thrïk ana mpappethet thrïk attang.”
Manakka ul woccïkothe lon len aiꞌrekat itti thuleꞌrak thoKapik apilingon iꞌre itti uꞌrupa wothothïlettat woKapik waik werenok.
OIeccuo piꞌrekathekin itti, “Poꞌre empi itti apittarot non, pakorronno oka pin.
Inenni caꞌri cothakkmako cene nocapu ana inenni pul pothopulut ili wonocapu enci wakïccettat thapat.
Anaruk amma mponthuttathe nothapak mpanyine ul kathar appik ainin.”
Kwiꞌret elli akwokene thio itha kwaik pathio.
Aul iꞌrekat itti, “Onïn thinat nti iatham wothonceꞌret lon cik itti oMiccie pakinnio thupuththuput ana tat akka appiꞌre itti ukul wopul iponyi wio? Oththa ukul wopul iponyi?”
Menik aIeccuo iꞌrekat kin itti, “Kꞌran kaik kathocciek papotte okorronno oka puccuk nonyaro inakka onon thonu kꞌran ikaccieik aïꞌrïmak ngarthuk oꞌroik. Pul ipanyaro iꞌrïmak pomma na kwaik paeo.
Onoccokot lon nomïkït lokꞌran ikaccieik inakka onon thonu, othakka itti anon oka nyukul nyokꞌran ikaccieik.” Anakka kwomarttot there kwoththekathe nakin ana kwintakatheik.
Anaruk antoka manna itti oIeccuo pokkothe lon ilommaththik tokït ken, okin thokat thakorronno occokat lon lung nomïkït.
Elli lokkattathe othakka itti alon ila pul pothernte lon loKapik oIccaia papiꞌret ngngin oka ïcat itti,
“Ili, oththa akkoccokothe lon nomïkït ilanïn theret.
Ana oththa akkimmat puꞌran pang iprïk?”
Okin thakorronno occokat lon nomïkït nti ilon lꞌrek attang ammakka pul ipernte lon loKapik oIccaia perethekin ngngin imakkren,
“Kwiꞌrimiethekin kït ana onthomiet kin mïkït
othakka itti akin okorronno immaik ngkït ana manna inaik mmïkït men
ana oprttakoik ana mpittiet kin.”
oIccaia piꞌret elli akka kwimmat thrïk thoIeccuo ana ilen akka kwerenthet oIeccuo.

Ul iokat cik woppot ittïttïk woIouth woccokothe lon loIeccuo nomïkït anaruk okin thokat akin okorronno ere lon loIeccuo nci nokkït akka okin thokat akin opellene ul woPriccin akka akïccekin nocuththun caꞌrama.
Okin thaththongothe thomerekattat thoul nnothomerekattat thoKapik.
OIeccuo piꞌrekathekin lon mpoꞌre cittan itti, “Okkwi ipoccokothe lon nocïkït lin, kwakorronno occokot lon lin tulluk anaruk kwoccokothe lon lokkwi ipothïothin.
Ana amma akwokathaccen, kwimma okkwi ipothïothin.
Mpaat nocapu ncik appik ammakka kꞌran ikaccieik othakka itti okkwi ipoccokothe lon lin okorronno ikkoik iꞌrïmak.
Amma opilin poccïkothe lon ana kwakorronno oꞌrumo nan, mpakarronno akkma akka mpakorronno ao itti mpathakkma capu ncik appik anaruk mpaat anathoꞌret ul.
Thakkma thaik thokkwi ipꞌrarin ana ꞌra lon lin ila anere, lon len ila mperet lathakkmak nocaꞌri cothakkmako.
Mpakorronno ere ngka kin anaruk ongappa ipothïothin akkakenen itti ngintha akka aniꞌre ana mpiꞌre tat.
Mpina kicce itti lon lung lanekarot nothikkoik thothupuththuput. Anaruk lon ilaniꞌre laNgappa akkiꞌrethin itti mpiꞌre.”

Anakka kamuthe koThaurrot kaman kꞌrek cik kokuntakinet caꞌri culukku, oIeccuo pinat itti caꞌri cung caat itti kwaththe nocapu ncik appik akwoine oththan. Kwokat pongothe ul wung immakothok nomaꞌri ima kwokat cik nan nocapu, ana inenni kwongothekin kirrkkir.
Okin thokat cik akin oꞌrko thuꞌrit thocipin ana pul pothopulut piꞌrikathe iaIoutha poIcikkariuththi ukul woCcaman othakka itti akwokero oIeccuo.
OIeccuo pinat itti oththan pethok puꞌran polon appik ana itti kwaat noKapik ana kwaine Kapik.
OIeccuo purokathe nothuꞌrit akuekat kret cik ika kwappakot nopangken akwïꞌrïkat kret kꞌrek kottakarran ikin akwothukukkot ngngꞌri.
Akwunat ngꞌri nocaththak cïttïk akwikkat cik akwime tacok toul immakothok akwukukkwot ngkret ika kwokat pokkwethe ikin.
Anakka kwainet oCcamaan iponu kꞌran itti oPoththuruc, kwiꞌrekathok itti, “Ili win, ngkwaik pathime tacok tini?”
AIeccuo othïanthok tit itti, “Ngkwomma lon ila mpaik pakkinthung anaruk nomaꞌri imanthan ngkwina.”
OPoththuruc pꞌrakathe, akwiꞌrekat itti, “Ngkwakorronno ime tacok tin.”
OIeccuo pothïathe tit itti, “Amma mpakorronno imenung tacok tang ana ngkwakorronno oka pin.”
OCcamaan oPoththuruc pothïathe tit itti, “Ili, kirrnni imenin tacok tulluk, anaruk imenin nyaun ana ca cakuruk.”
OIeccuo pothïatherit itti, “Pul ipopakkot ponu itti pimetta tacok tulluk, ka kung appik kella nguꞌru. Ana onon ul win iammakothin, onon thannoka appik thupupure.”
Akka kwinat okkwi ipokat cik pathokerok, ana ilen akka kwiꞌrenet itti onon thannoka appik thupupure.
Anakka kwomarttot thimenekin tacok kicce akwakat kret kung, akwopakkat nokaꞌran kung akwikkat cik akwipittat kin itti, “Onon thina lon ila mpokkinthet noni?
Onon thakkaron itti, ‘Pul ipangkene,’ ana itti, ‘Ili’ ana laik ïcat akka mpamenik.
Inenni onon thimmat akka oun Ili won ana pul ipangkene pon pimet tacok ton, onon cakuruk thonu itti onon thimentarene tacok.
Mpokenet non othakka itti annokkot ammakka mpokkinthet non.
Mpiꞌret non lon ilaik ïcat itti pul pella ipareko paka prïk nopul ipa kworekine, ana manna pul ipothïlathe pakorronno oka prïk nopul ipothïothok.
Ana inenni onon thina lon elli amma onon thokkothe ana onon thethïettat.”
“Mpaik pakorronno eret non appik, mpina okin itha mpumot nti ianon. Anaruk elli lokkattathe othakka itti alothakka ila atham wiꞌret itti, ‘Okkwi ipanïn thaik thaꞌrko thuꞌrit pakeron.’
Mpaik piꞌret non inenni alarthuk othakka, akka amma lothakkat annoccokot lon nomïkït itti oun oMiccie.
Mpiꞌret non lon ilaik ïcat itti okkwi ipikkiet pul cik ipa mpothïothe kwikkierin cik, ana okkwi ipikkierin cik kwikkiet okkwi ipothïothin cik.”
Anakka kwiꞌret lon elli, cïkït cokat acirro nti icarak akwiꞌrekat itti, “Mpiꞌret non lon ilaik ïcat itti opilin nti ianon paik pathokeron.”
Aul immakothok ikkat cik akathaccetto, othakka itti akin ina itti okkwen akka oIeccuo pokat cik akweret.
Opilin nti iul iammakot oIeccuo ook ipa oIeccuo pongothe, pokat cik akwothïngkakot cik thokkun wothokure iccik koIeccuo nokuppuꞌrung kothuꞌrit.
OCcamaan ipoccot kꞌran cakuruk itti oPuththuruc auꞌrekat ca akwiꞌrekat pul ipammakot oIeccuo ipokat iccik kung itti, “Antipittothok itti kwaik peret oththa.”
Apul pen ipammakot oIeccuo othïngkakot oIeccuo akwipittathok itti, “Ili, oththa pen?”
OIeccuo pothïatherit itti, “Ook ipa mpaik pathethet arrakith enni amma mpothapet.” OIeccuo pothapekathe arrakith ngngucul ana kwekathe oIoutha Icikkariuththi ukul woCcamaan.
Anakka oIoutha poccot arrakith, apul pothopulut iꞌrikat iaak. Ittina aIeccuo iꞌrekathok itti, “Okkothe ila ngkwonu itti ngkwakkot cokoccokot.”
Pul pella ipinat lon itti oIeccuo piꞌrenthok ittina akain nokaꞌran kothuꞌrit.
Anaruk oIoutha pokat pul ipaccokot akucci wen, ittina opilingon thokat cik akin ome itti ikkre oIeccuo pokat akwomethok itti kwakero papꞌrek pokamuthe ana manna itti kwethet ul iaik nothiak.
Manakka oIoutha poccot arrakith, akwoppat thapat ana cik cokat ingkoꞌra.
Anakka kweot, aIeccuo iꞌrekat itti, “Inenni ukul wopul iponyi waik wathothikkietta wrïk ana Kapik kothikkiettat krïk iaak.
Ana amma Kapik kothikkiettat krïk iaak ana Kapik kathikkie ukul wrïk iaak ana kathikkiek prïk accokkot.
Nyukul nyin, oron thakaik aththut maꞌri motte. Onon thakwariccathin ana ammakka mpiꞌrethe ul woIouth, mpiꞌret non inenni, nokaꞌran na mpaik paeo onon thakannanthan.
Lon lin ilonthomat ilie ila aniꞌret non itti nongarot. Ammakka mpongothenon, onon thonu itti nthangarot cakuruk.
Ittina ul appik wina itti onon ul iammakothin amma onon thongarothe.”
OCcamaan ipoccot kꞌran cakuruk itti oPoththuruc ipittathok itti, “Ili, ngkwaik paeo kartha?”
Ana oIeccuo pothïatherit itti “Orit thakanneo iraththeꞌra ina, anaruk ngkwamakothin nomaꞌri imanthan.”
APoththuruc ipittat itti, “Ngintha akkakorronno okorronnon itti mpamakothung ina, Ili? Mpio nti ilon lang.”
AIeccuo othïat tit itti, “Ngkwokuccekotheik ïcat itti ngkwio nti ilon lini? Mpiꞌrethung lon ilaik ïcat itti athakꞌruk tharthuk oo ngkoꞌra engi ngkwacukkwo nolon maꞌri mꞌrapuruk itti ngkwomman.”
“Nokorronno ïrro mïkït nti ikarak. Nonekket cïkït noKapik ana naun acakuruk.
Kaman kaik koppot tuan na ongappa, amma okat karra ana mpakorronno iꞌret non. Mpaik paeo tentre anothokuccenthet non kaꞌran cik.
Ana amma mpokuccenthet non kaꞌran cik kicce ana mpakkaprttako ntan anathipo non aron oka uraththungon, othakka itti annoka na mpaik.
Onon thina kathar ika anekot non na mpaik paeo.”
OThthoma piꞌrekathok itti, “Ili, onïn thomma na ngkwaik paeo, ana onïn thina kathar taththa?”
AIeccuo othïat tit itti, “Oun kathar ana lon ilaik ïcat ana thikkoik. Pul pella paine ongappa amma kwakonnoppo naun.
Amma onon thaththinan kicce itti oun okkwen ana onon thina ongappa cakuruk. Nci inenni onon thinak ana onon thimmarok.”
OPilippic piꞌrekathe itti, “Ili, okenenïn ongappa ana lekkot.”
AIeccuo othïat tit itti, “Pilippic, ngkwommani ana manna mpokat cik ithoꞌrkït thon nomaꞌri emmi appik? Okkwi ipimmarin, kwimmat ongappa. Ngintha akka aiꞌrene itti, ‘Okenenïn ongappa?’
Ngkwakorronno occokot lon nocïkït itti mpaik iangappa ana ongappa paik iauni? Lon ila mpaik perenenon lakorronno oka lin. Anaruk longappa ipaik iaun akkaik pakkot ngre ngung.
Occokothe lon lin nocïkït amma aniꞌre itti mpaik iangappa ana ongappa paik iaun, ana manna nongre ia mpokkothe.
Mpiꞌret non lon ilaik ïcat, okkwi ipoccokothe lon lin nocïkït, kwakkot lon ila mpokat cik anokkettet. Kwakkot manna lïrïk nelli akka mpaik paine ongappa.
Ana mpakkot ilanon ipitto ngkꞌran kin, othakka itti aukul onane oththan thrïk.
Nipittothin lon ilanon thongothe ngkꞌran kin ana mpakkinthet non.”
“Amma onon thongothin, onon thaccïkot lon lin.
Ana mpipittot ongappa, ana kwethet non opilin akwittarot non ana oka nanon thupuththuput,

Kanang ikupupure kolon ilaik ïcat. Okkwion ithakorronno occokot lon lung nomïkït thakorronno ikkiek cik akka nthakinnimmak ana manna nthommak. Anaruk onon thinak, akka kwaik ianon inenni ana kwaka nanon nomaꞌri imanthan.
Mpakorronno okorronnonon ere nyukul inya aththan ana onnan piot nan anaruk mpainenon.
Nomaꞌri motte ul ncik appik wakorronno appimman anaruk onon thimman. Akka mpaik ngkït thapat ana onon thakaik ngkït thapat cakuruk.
Nocaꞌri cen, onon thina itti mpaik iangappa ana onon thaik iaun ana mpaik ianon.
Okkwi ipoccïkothe lon lin ana kwaik pareko ngngin, kwongothin. Ana okkwi ipongothin, ongappa pangathok ana mpangathok cakuruk ana mpakenek ka kin.”
Ittina aIoutha (okonnoka oIoutha ngoIcikkariuththi) iꞌrekat itti, “Ili, ngkwontha akka ngkwongothe itti ngkwakenenïn ka kang ana akorronno okene ul nocapu ncik appik.”
OIeccuo pothïatherit itti, “Amma pul pongothin ana pammakot thongkene thin, ongappa pin pangathok ana onïn thainok ana onïn thikkoik ïnaththut.
Okkwi ipakorronno ongathin, kwakorronno ommakot thongkene thin. Lon elli ilanon thaik thaccïkot lakorronno oka lin, lon longappa ipothïothin.
Mpaik perenenon elli appik inakka mpaik parthuk uraththungon.
Anaruk okkwi ipittarot non, ook Kanang ikupupure, okkwi ipa ongappa othïot ngkꞌran kin, kwangkenenon aꞌrupu appik ana okwarikiet non lon appik ila mpiꞌrethenon.
Mpaththenenon nothomicco, mpethet non thomicco thin. Mpaik pakorronno ethet non ammakka capu ncik appik ethet non. Nokorronno okorronno mïkït mon amirro nti ikarak, nokorronno ipo nꞌre.
Onon thoccïkothe aniꞌre itti, ‘Mpaik paeo ana mpaik painenon.’ Amma onon thongothin ana onon thaka thopirat noka itti mpaik paine ongappa, akka ongappa prïk naun.
Mpiꞌrethenon alarthuk othakka, othakka itti amma lothakkat annoccokot lon nomïkït.
Mpakorronno erenenon lon loppot, akka pul pothopulut ili wonocapu ncik appik enci waik wanthan. Mpakorronno oka inyaun nyung,
anaruk capu ncik appik conu itti cina itti mpongothe ongappa ana mpakkot lon ila ongappa piꞌrethin itti mpakkot. Nuroko aron eo.”
“Oun pira ipakwono nyukul nyoporot ïcat ana ongappa akkakatha lon lokira.
Kwathiot uꞌri wokira cik appik iakorronno okwono ana uꞌri iakwono akwokwet othakka itti akwono nyukul nyoppot.
Onon thothikkiettat thoꞌrillir nti ilon ila mperenet non.
Noꞌrungkwot iaun ana mpaꞌrungkwot ianon. Kuꞌri kopira kella ikakwono prek, konu itti kaka nopira ana ittina onon thakorronno okkot lon lꞌrek amma onon thella iaun.
Oun pira ana onon uꞌri wopira. Amma pul poꞌrungkwothe iaun ana mpoꞌrungkwothe iaak, kwakkot lon loporot loppot. Ana okkwi ipella iaun kwakorronno okkot lon lꞌrek.
Ana amma okkwi ipakorronno oꞌrungkwot iaun, kwarretta ere kuꞌri kopira ikonthomat, ammakka kuꞌri ken kummuntat cik akorrettat ithik akokꞌro.
Amma onon thoꞌrungkwothe iaun ana lon lin laꞌrungkwot ianon, ana amma nthipittot lon lꞌrek, onon thiot.
Elli lanane ongappa thrïk itti onon thakkot lon loppot iloporot ammakka kira ikakwono nyukul nyoporot ana annokene ka kon itti onon ul iammakothin.
Ammakka ongappa pongothin, mpongothenon. Ittina noꞌrungkwot ithongat thin.
Amma onon thaccïkot lon lin, onon thaꞌrungkwot ithongat thin ammakka mpoccïkothe lon longappa ana aꞌrungkot ithongat thung.
Mperenet non elli anothikkienon thopirat noka llon lin ana thopira noka thon oka thoporot kirrkkir.
Lon lin ilonthomat itti nongarot ammakka mpongothe non.
Thongarot thella thrïk cannan nothongat itti pul piine opuruko pungon.”
Onon opuruko pingon amma onon thakkot lon ila aniꞌret non itti nthakkot.
Mpakorronno appakkaronon itti iak pꞌrin akka iak womma ila apït paik pakkot. Anaruk mperenenon ammakka opuruko pingon ana mperenet non lon appik ila ongappa pongkenerin.
Onon thakorronno onekkethin cik anaruk oun akkonekkethenon cik annokkot lon loporot ammakka pira ipakwono nyukul nyoporot thupuththuput. Ana ongappa pethet non ilanon ipitto ngkꞌran kin.
Lon lin ila aniꞌret non ilonthomat itti onon thangarot.
“Amma ul wonocapu ncik appik wantꞌra non, nina nan itti wꞌrarin cittokït.

Ana amma onon thocapu ncik appik, cangat non itti onon thung. Anaruk onon thakorronno oka thocapu ncik appik akka mpakkarot non nti iakin nocapu ncik appik. Ilen akka ul wocapu ncik appik wꞌranet non.

Nokwarttikot lon ila mpiꞌrethenon itti, ‘Pul ipareko pella prïk nopul ipa akworekine.’ Amma okin thoccokiethin thiak ana okin thaccokiet non thiak cakuruk. Ana amma okin thoccïkothe lon ila mpongkenet kin ana okin thaccïkot lon lon cakuruk.
Okin thakkot non menik nti ilon lokꞌran kin akka okin thomma okkwi ipothïothin.
Amma mpokat pakorronno anthan ana erenekin, okin thakorronno okat thamoloko llon ilokithak. Inenni okin thella lon cik ilakin orrot noka ken ngngin.
Okkwi ipꞌrarin, kwꞌrat ongappa cakuruk.

Amma mpappakorronno okkot lon ithoꞌrkït then ila pul pella pokkothe nan, okin thakorronno occot lon itti okin thokithak. Anaruk inenni okin thimmat lon ilommaththik ila mpokkothe anaruk okin tharthuk thꞌrarin ana ꞌra ongappa.
Anaruk elli lokkattathe othakka itti alothakka ammakka lokurrakot iatham wothonceꞌret lon cik len iliꞌre itti, ‘Lon lella ilakin thꞌrathin nan.’
Amma okkwi ipittararot paat ipa anothïnthet non nangappa, Kanang ikupupure ikaik ïcat ikanthan naak, kerenenon lon lin.
Anaruk onon thonu itti onon theret cakuruk akka oron thokat cik uraththungon ncinomun.”
“Mperenet non lon elli appik othakka itti annokorronno urttat cik.
Okin thathokïccet non thapat nocuththun caꞌrama, caꞌri caik canthan ica ul iangwonon ome itti okin thaik thakkinthet Kapik lon loporot.
Okin thakkot menik akka okin thomma ongappa ana manna okin thomman.
Mpiꞌrethenon lon elli othakka itti amma caꞌri cen caat anon okwarikot itti mpokat piꞌrethenon lon len. Mpokat pakinniꞌret non lon elli ncinomun akka oron thaththokat aththut.”
“Anaruk inenni mpaik paine okkwi ipothïothin, ana manna pul pella nti ianon ipipittothin itti, ‘Ngkwaik paeo kereni?’
Onon thakorronno oka thoporot noka akka mperenet non lon elli.
Anaruk mpaik perenenon lon ilaik ïcat, loporot nanon itti mpaeo akka amma mpakorronno eo okkwi ipittarot non pakorronno anthan. Anaruk amma mpeot ana mpathothïnthet non ngok.
Amma kwaat, kwangkene ul wonocapu lon lolon ilokithak ana ongkenekin itti okin thaka thoporot tat tokït koKapik ana ongkenekin lon lothakkma thoKapik.
Kwakenekin lon lothokithaka then akka okin thakorronno occokot lon lin nomïkït.
Ana kwakenekin lon lothoka thoporot then tokït koKapik akka mpaik paine ongappa nanon okorronno appimman.
Ana kwakenekin lon lothakkma thoKapik akka Kapik kakkmat pul pothopulut ntit ili wonocapu.
Mponu lon lanerenenon loppot inenni anaruk lalkot non.
Anaruk amma Kanang kolon ilaik ïcat anthan, kwangwot non ilon iloporot appik. Anaruk kere lon tulluk ila koccïkothe ana kerenenon lon ilaik lathanthan.
Kanang ken ikupupure kananin thrïk akka kaneko lon ila mponu itti mpiꞌret non akokenenon.
Aꞌrupu wongappa appik ien win, ilen akka mpiꞌrenet itti Kanang ikupupure kaneko nnolon lin akokenenon.”
“Papotteik onon thakinnimman ana papotteik onon thimman.”

Aul iammakothok wꞌrek ikkat cik aerettarne itti, “Ngintha akkonu itti, ‘Papotteik onon thakorronno appimman ana papotteik onon thappimman,’ ana ngintha akka akwiꞌrene itti, ‘Akka mpaik paine ongappa pin’?”
Okin thoꞌrungkwathe nan akin ipitto itti, “Ngintha akkonu itti, ‘papotteik’? Oron thomma lon ila kwaik pere.”

OIeccuo pinat nan itti okin thongothe itti okin thipittothok lon len, akwiꞌrekat kin itti, “Onon thaik thipittarot lon ila mpiꞌret itti, ‘Papotteik onon thakorronno imman ana papotteik onon thappimmani’?
Mpiꞌret non lon ilaik ïcat itti onon thangkꞌriko ana oo anaruk aul wonocapu ncik appik occiro ana opira noka. Onon thipo thiak anaruk thiak thon thaprttakoik ana thathakka thopira noka.
Ka kakꞌrello pul ipopari amma apokwono ana ka kakꞌrellok akka caꞌri cung caat itti kwakwono anaruk amma ukul wokwontat kure nothokꞌrellako akka kwopirat noka nokkul itti wokwontathe nocapu appik.
Ittina inenni caꞌri cothoccokot thiak con enci, anaruk mpappimma non ana onon thapira noka ana pul pella panekot non thopira noka thon.
Caꞌri cen onon thakorronno appipittothin papꞌrek aththik. Mpiꞌret non lon ilaik ïcat itti ongappa pethet non aꞌrupu appik ia annipitto ngkꞌran kin.
Ana manna inenni onon thakorronno ipitto lon lꞌrek ngkꞌran kin aththik. Nipitto ana onon thacco ana thopira noka thaka thoporot kirrkkir.
Mpokat anere nthokkwie lon kuru ncik ana caꞌri canthan ica anokorronno erenenon nthokkwie lon kuru ncik anaruk mperenenon lon longappa nci nokkït.
Caꞌri cen, onon thipitto lon ngkꞌran kin. Mpaik pakorronno iꞌre itti mpipittinthet non ongappa nti ianon.
Aa, ongappa ngka kung pongothenon akka onon thongothin ana onon thoccokothe lon nomïkït itti mpaat noKapik.
Mpaat nangappa anao nocapu appik ana inenni mpaik paththe nocapu appik anopakkinthet ongappa.”
Ittina aul woIeccuo iammakothok iꞌrekat itti, “Inenni ngkwaik pere lon nci nokkït, ngkwaik pakorronno ere okkwie lon kuru ncik.
Ittina onïn thimmat itti ngkwina lon appik ana lakorronnoka manna itti ngkwipittakot lon lꞌrek, elli lakorronnonïn, anïn occokot lon nomïkït itti ngkwaat noKapik.”
AIeccuo iꞌrekat itti, “Onon thantroccokot lon loKapik nomïkït mon ocothot pꞌrïn.
Anaruk caꞌri caik cao ana caat manna amma anon opettakot cik ikaman kon kurekkurek, onon thaththe naun pellek, anaruk mpakorronno oka pellek, ongappa paik naun.
Mpiꞌrethenon lon elli itti annapot mïkït cik. Onon thaccokiettat thiak cene nocapu ncik appik anaruk nopoꞌrathan, akka mpalkothe lon lonocapu appik.”
Manakka oIeccuo piꞌret lon elli, akwokathakat tothiꞌrot akwiꞌrekat itti, “Pappa, caꞌri cei caat pꞌrin ethet ukul wang thrïk othakka itti aukul wang ina akka ethung thrïk.
Akka ngkwethok ngili ikkun ngolon loul appik itti akwethet kin thikkoik thothupuththuput okkwion itha ngkwethok.
Thikkoik thothupuththuput itti akin inang, oung pellek ipaKapik ikaik ïcat, ana oIeccuo oMiccie ipa ngkwothïothe.
Mpokenet ul thrïk thang nocapu nthomartto ngre ia ngkwethin itti mpakkot.
Ana inenni, ngappa, ethin thrïk nci na ngkwaik itharit thonat nci maꞌrot acapu appik carthuk okuꞌretta ncik.”
“Mpokenet ul ia ngkwethin cene nocapu itti oung okkwen. Okin thokat thang ana ngkwethin kin ana okin thoccïkothe lon lang.
Ana inenni okin thina itti aꞌrupu ncik appik ia ngkwethin waat naung.
Mpethet kin lon ila ngkwethin ana okin thoccokothe. Okin thinat ïcat itti mpaat naung ana okin thoccokothe lon nomïkït itti oung akkothïothin.
Mpaꞌranekin ngaꞌrama, anaruk mpaik pakorronno aꞌrane ul wocapu ncik appik anaruk mpaik paꞌrane okkwion itha ngkwethin akka okin thang.
Ila mponu appik lang ana ila ngkwonu appik lin. Ana thrïk thainin nti iakin.

Mpaik pakorronno ikkoik nocapu ncik appik puccuk anaruk okin tharthuk thaik nocapu ncik appik ana mpaik painung. Ngappa ipupupure, angwothekin mpuꞌran pokꞌran kang, kꞌran ika ngkwethin othakka itti akin oka thulukku ammakka orit thulukku.

Caꞌri ica mpokat ïnaththut mpangwothekin ana oꞌrumo nakin ngkꞌran ika ngkwethin, opilin pellat ipuratheik tulluk okkulukku iponu itti kurat cik othakka itti alon okaik ammakka lokurrakot iatham woKapik.
Mperik painung anaruk mpiꞌre elli amparthuk paik nocapu othakka itti akin oppappat nthopira noka thin.
Mpethet kin lon lang ana ul wonocapu enci wꞌrat akka okin thannoka thonocapu enci ammakka mpakannoka ponocapu enci.
Thaꞌra ngaꞌrama thin annoka itti aneko kin nocapu anaruk othakka itti angwot kin nti inyaun nyopul pothopulut.
Okin thakorronno oka thonocapu ncik appik ammakka mpakorronno oka ponocapu.
Othikkiekin thupupure llon ilaik ïcat, lon lang laik ïcat.
Ammakka ngkwothïothin nocapu ana mpothïothekin nocapu cakuruk.
Mpakuccet ka kin cik anoreko nti ilon len othakka itti akin okuccekot cik cakuruk akin orekinung ïcat.”
“Mpaik pakorronno aꞌranekin ngaꞌrama thellek. Mpaik paꞌrane okkwion cakuruk ithathoccokot lon lin amma okin thoccïkothe lon len.
Othakka itti akin oka thulukku appik, ngappa, ammakka ngkwaik iaun, mpaik iaung. Ana akin oka iarit othakka itti aul appik occokot lon nomïkït itti oung akkothïothin.
Mpethet kin thrïk itha ngkwethin othakka itti akin oka thulukku ammakka orit thulukku.
Mpaka iakin ana ngkwaka iaun, ittina okin thathakka thulukku othakka itti aul nocapu ina itti ngkwothïothin ana ngkwongothekin ammakka ngkwongothin.
Ngappa, mpongothe itti ul ia ngkwethin wanïn oka aththut na anoka akin imma thrïk thin, thrïk itha ngkwethin akka ngkwongothin nci nomun acapu carthuk okuꞌretta ncik.
Ngappa ipoporot, ul wonocapu wommang, mpinang ana okin thina itti ngkwothïothin.
Mpokenerung kin ana mpaꞌrungkwot nan okeneng kin, athongat thang itha ngkwongothin oka iakin, ana oun ngka kin anoka iakin.”

Anakka oIeccuo pomarttot thaꞌra ngaꞌrama, kwoingkathe okin oul iammakothok arrot thupuꞌru thoKithurun. Nthocipit cothupuꞌru cꞌrek, kaꞌran kꞌrek kokat cik than konat kira koceththun, aIeccuo iꞌrikat tit akin oul iammakothok.
OIoutha ipokerothe oIeccuo nili pinat nokaꞌran ken akka oIeccuo pokat than maꞌri moppot akwikikkoik than okin oul iammakothok.
Ittina oIoutha pakkakathe cïnang nnul irro ana nili nꞌrek noul ittïttïk woul wonoppan toKapik ana ul woPriccin okin thokat akin onneko lik noꞌren ana arran.
Ana akka oIeccuo pinat lon appik ilokat cik lathothakka, kwoppanthet kin thapat ana kwipittathekin itti, “Oththa akka annokwantot?”
Akin othïat tit itti onïn thaik thakwantot “OIeccuo poNaccir.”
AIeccuo iꞌrekat kin itti, “Oun ook.” Ana oIoutha ipokerothok ul pokat cik akin ocoꞌro aththut.
Manakka oIeccuo piꞌret itti, “Oun pen,” akin opakkat thomeken akin apukkat nocapu appik.
Akwappipittat kin attang itti, “Oththa akka anon okwantot?”
Akin iꞌrekat itti, “Onïn thaik thakwantot oIeccuo poNaccir.”
AIeccuo iꞌrekat kin itti, “Akka mpiꞌrethenon itti oun ook. Amma onon thaik thakwantothin nokorronno aul enni eo.”
Elli lothakkat othakka itti alon lung ila kwappiꞌret othakka itti, “Mpakorronno uret opilin cik ntiakin itha ngkwethin.”
Ittina aCcamaan oPoththuruc iponat kiꞌrittang ikukwit akwothat akwokiat kunu koMalkkac pul iparekine pul iprïk ponoppan toKapik.
AIeccuo iꞌrekat oPoththuruc itti, “Opakkethe kiꞌrittang ikukwit ikaꞌruk, mpira pakorronno occokot thiak itha ngappa pothïothin itti mpaccokori?”
Ittina aul irro ana ili wen ana nili nꞌrek noul woIouth occokat oIeccuo, akin ïꞌrïkïkkathok
akin onakathok cittokït tokït kAnnan ipokat opïthe poKiappa pul iprïk ponoppan toKapik nothuput then.
OKiappa ipappomethe ul woIouth itti laka loporot itti pul pio pulukku nti ilon loul appik.

OCcamaan oPoththuruc ana pul ipammakothok wꞌrek thokat cik akin ommakot oIeccuo. Anakka pul ipammakothok pen pokat pinakot mpul iprïk ponoppan toKapik, kwiꞌrikathe okin oIeccuo ithaꞌrapak thonoppan topul iprïk ponoppan toKapik,

anaruk oPoththuruc pokat cik akwoꞌrïkot cik thapat. Pul ipammakothok pꞌrek ipa pul iprïk ponoppan toKapik pokat pinat akkakat thapat aperekanthet ukul iopari iokat cik angwot cürük akwiꞌrikiekat oPoththuruc noppan.
Aukul iopari iokat icürük ipittat oPoththuruc itti, “Ngkwakorronno oka opilin nti iul iammakothoki, oung pai?”
APoththuruc othïat tit itti, “Mpakorronno oka ïnaththungon.”
Cik cokat cirruk ana ul iarekine ul ana ul iangwot cik ikkat cik aïkot thik ana oPoththuruc pokat cik cïnang cakuruk akin aththungon akwïkot thik.
Apul iprïk ponoppan toKapik ipittat oIeccuo lon loul iammakothok ana lon lothongkene thung.
AIeccuo othïanthok tit itti, “Mperenet ul appik nci nokkït ana mpokat cik anongkekkene nomuththun maꞌrama ana manna noppan toKapik na ul woIouth wokat aꞌrntattakot. Lella ila mpiꞌret nthuꞌran.
Nthontha akka annipittothin lon? Nipittot okkwion ithoccïkothe akka anere, okin thina ila mperet.”
Manakka oIeccuo piꞌret lon len apul ipangwot cik ipokat iccik kung okkwathok toca. Apiꞌrekathok itti, “Kathar engki akka erene pul iprïk ponoppan toKapik ngngini?”
AIeccuo iꞌrekathok itti, “Amma mpiꞌret lon moloko akenen ila mpiꞌret moloko ana amma mpiꞌret lon oceꞌret cik, ngintha akka ngkwokkwinin?”
Ittina Annan pothïathok naKiappa pul iprïk ponoppan toKapik akkwꞌrikikkakot.
Anakka oPoththuruc pokat cik akkwaik akwïkot thik akin appipittathok itti “Ngkwakorronno oka opilin nti iul iammakothoki oung pai?”
Akwocukkat nan akwiꞌrekat itti, “Mpakorronno oka poul wothothïlettat wung.”
Apul pꞌrek iparekine pul iprïk ponoppan toKapik pokat kuꞌri kopul ipa oPoththuruc pappokiothe kunu cik, iꞌrekathok itti, “Mpannimmathung nokaꞌran kokira koceththuni?”
APoththuruc appocukkwat nan, caꞌri cen athakꞌruk oa.

Ana ngïꞌrïmak aul woIouth ipat oIeccuo ntuan toKiappa akin oingkathok ngngin tuan toili woRoma. Anaruk okin thakorronno iꞌrikat noppan ten akka okin thaththꞌrat itti okin thipot lon ilokithak noka ken akka okin okorronno oꞌrko thuꞌrit thokamuthe koThaurrot kaman kꞌrek cik.
APilaththoc akkakanthet kin thapat akwipittat kin itti, “Lon liatha ila non thorukwethe pul empi ngngin?”
Akin othïanthok tit itti, “Amma kwappakorronno okkot lon moloko, onïn thakorronno onanung ngok cene.”
APilaththoc iꞌrekat kin itti, “Nonekok annakkmak llon lothonceꞌret lon cik lon.”
Akin othïat tit itti, “Onïn thella lon cik itti onïn thakkwot pul pꞌrek.”
Elli lokkattathe othakka itti alothakka ammakka oIeccuo piꞌret akweret thio thung itha kwaik pio.
APilaththoc opakkat noppan toili akwakkarat oIeccuo akwipittathok itti, “Oung ili woIouthi?”
AIeccuo ipittathok itti, “Lon ellrik langi, ana amma okorronno oka lang opilingon therenung lon lini?”
