Anakka kanang kopappat kaat nthokkun wothothari amma akatha na acïngkï ummot ngngin, okin thomekathe itti lathakkanet kin loporot pꞌrïn itti okin thaeo. Ittina okin thonthathe paponte ipakin ipakorronno kuppuꞌrung akocoꞌro iꞌri akin oingkat omakot carkan conoththok poKkrit.
Anaruk papotteik akanang akkakat kommaththik na acïngkï ummot ngngin nocik iconthomat corithoꞌrikït thorok irapangka akokkurat kin.
Kanang koceꞌrekathe kuppuꞌrung konoiꞌri ana kommakathe eo na anïn thokat thongothe itti onïn thaeo, ittina onïn thokorronnathe kanang akipo kuppuꞌrung na kokat cik akeo.

Anakka onïn thokkot nocik iconthomat corithoꞌrikït thorok irapangka icoccot kꞌran itti Kautha, onïn thothathe kuppuꞌrung konoiꞌri ikotte ika anïn thokat anïn othutho thoceken cokuppuꞌrung ikrïk mpuꞌran ïnonthat ikuppuꞌrung koniꞌri ikrïk.

Okin thokkiekathe loꞌrak thoceken cokuppuꞌrung akin ïꞌrïkarot tothun. Okin thonat nꞌre akka kanang othïot kin nocarkan coLipia akin iꞌrakat ithamur. Ittina okin thorpekathe paponte icuꞌre cokuppuꞌrung irok othakka akuppuꞌrung ollo kiccekicce ngkanang akin okorronat kuppuꞌrung konoiꞌri akanang itte.
Kanang kaꞌrungkwothe menik puccuk, ana ngorrot ngen okin thikkatheik akin orrekat aꞌrupu ia ikuppuꞌrung kokat akonneko irok irapangka.
Ana nomaꞌri imꞌrapuruk okin thorrekathe aꞌrupu wokuppuꞌrung wꞌrek nynyaun nyen.
Manakka onïn thikkot cik maꞌri moppot anïn thannimma cïngkï ana mothot, ana kanang kokat cik akokkurarot cannan, amïkït mïn ellakat ikarak pꞌrin anïn ellakat lon lolon itti onïn thaik thakkoik.
Anakka ul wikkot cik maꞌri moppot ntï aPoluc urokat kapik akwiꞌrekat kin itti, “Ul onon thira thaaccïkothe lon lin annokorronno uroko noththok poKkrit ana onon thokorronno okïttot aꞌrupu enni.
Anaruk mperenenon itti thakorronno ipo nꞌre akka pul pella nti ianon puret ka kung cik anaruk kuppuꞌrung konoiꞌri kuluk akkakïttako.
Maman ngkoꞌra uꞌrupa wothothïlettat woKapik kin ika mpaik parekine wocoꞌrot iccik kin,

aiꞌrekat itti, ‘Poluc, kirrnni opelle ngkwonu itti ngkwaka tokït koili oKkaiccer nokaꞌran kothonceꞌret lon cik ana Kapik kethet non thikkoik appik oung ana ul ianon thaik theo anaththut appik nothoporot thung.’
Ittina nokorronno irro mïkït nti ikarak akka mpoccokothe lon nocïkït loKapik itti lakaik ammakka kwiꞌrethin.
Anaruk oron thee ka ncik nocik iconthomat corithoꞌrikït thorok irapangka aron iꞌrakat.”

Anakka maꞌri mothakkat attul ana ikken kocoꞌrin (14), onïn thokat iiꞌri norok irapangka tAthria irokat ithoꞌrïkït tonoththok poKrik ana poIththalia. Ana thampang thongkꞌra aul iallillie kuppuꞌrung konoiꞌri okathakat ere onïn thakko napuththut nocarkan corirok.

Akin onekat thoꞌrak thakin thïꞌrïkothe paponte nan akin ennekke thokwit thorok irapangka akin iat thukwit thekkot uꞌricil arrial wꞌrakkuruk (120) uo thoꞌronthong. Ana papotteik akin appennekkekat akin iat thukwit thothakkat uꞌricil arrial wocoꞌrin ana alkaire (90) uo thoꞌronthong.

Ana okin thipathe nꞌre akka kuppuꞌrung konoiꞌri ee ka muꞌrol iꞌri ana nthoceken cokuppuꞌrung konoiꞌri akin orpekat paponte ipaceꞌre kuppuꞌrung irok wocoꞌrin akin aꞌrakanthet Kapik ngaꞌrama itti acïngkï ua.

Aul iallillie kuppuꞌrung konoiꞌri iꞌrekat itti wura akin orpekat kuppuꞌrung konoiꞌri ikotte iiꞌri akin innikot itti okin thathorpet aꞌrponte cik iaceꞌre kuppuꞌrung konoiꞌri irok irapangka ikrïk ntokït.
Anaruk oPoluc piꞌrekathe ili woul arrial ukuluk irro ana ul iallillie kuppuꞌrung itti, “Amma ul iallillie kuppuꞌrung konoiꞌri wella ikuppuꞌrung cene ana oron thannoꞌrettat.”
Menik aul irro ommothat loꞌrak iloccokothe kuppuꞌrung konoiꞌri ikotte cik akin okorronnat akapot iiꞌri.

Anakka cik cokat carthuk okatto oPoluc piꞌrekathe ul itti waꞌrkoik akwiꞌrekat itti, “Nomaꞌri attul ana ikken kocoꞌrin onon thokat thellat mïkït ikarak ana nthoꞌrungkathe ntï, nthannoꞌrkkat pꞌrek aththik.
Ineni mpiꞌret non itti ngonon oꞌrko thuꞌrit thotte. Nthonu itti nthaꞌrko annokkoik. Pul pella pio ka kongo aththik.”
Anakka kwerenet kin lon elli kwonekathe arrakith akwaꞌrakanthet Kapik ngaꞌrama tokït ken akwomithat tit akwikkat cik akwoꞌrko aꞌrek.
Okin appik thopoꞌriettakathe than akin oꞌrkkat thuꞌrit ngka ken.
Onïn ithokat ikuppuꞌrung konoiꞌri maun arrial ukuluk maꞌri meꞌra ana ikken arrial wꞌrapuruk ana alkaire ana ikken kꞌrakkuruk (276).
Anakka okin thoꞌrkot thuꞌrit mono omanakat, okin thoorrekathe mïl irok irapangka nti ikuppuꞌrung konoiꞌri akothakka kippappat.
Anakka cïngkï cuat aul iallillie kuppuꞌrung konoiꞌri ommakat kaꞌran nakin okko anaruk akka okin thimmat carkan cotteik akin iꞌrekat itti okin thathïot kuppuꞌrung konoiꞌri nan amma okin akkathïo.

Akin okeccekat loꞌrak ilonat aꞌrponte nan thoꞌronthong irok irapangka akin oththekat nan irok irapangka. Okin thokellekathe loꞌrak ilïꞌrïkot kwoꞌren ikaprtto kuppuꞌrung amma okin ollillie. Okin thonthathe kret kapik ikallillie kuppuꞌrung konoiꞌri ngkanang akin oprttat eo ngngin tocarakan.
Anaruk kuppuꞌrung keekathe ca ncarkan cokamur akommakat eo. Ana cuꞌre cen cikkatheik acocotta akka thopangka thoiꞌri thokat cik athokkwe cannan.
Ana ul irro wiꞌrekathe itti wangwo ul worikorrkkor akka aththouththa aeo tomarakan apelle.
Anaruk ili woul arrial ukuluk irro wawongothe itti wakkie oPoluc cik ana kwoceꞌrekathe ul irro nolon len. Kwiꞌrekathe itti okkwion ithina oththouththa akin irrot tomarakan tokït.
Ana opilingon omakittot kin nouruthut ana nomprak wokuppuꞌrung ikokïttakot. Ittina okin thoingkathe appik tomarakan.
Manakka onïn thaat tocarakan appik thoporot, apilin iꞌrekat nïn itti cik iconthomat corithoꞌrikït thorok irapangka coccot kꞌran itti Malththa.
Aul wonocik cen okkanthet nïn lon loporot anganna, okin thikkiet nïn cik ana okin thokwanthet nïn thik akka kapik kokat cik akapo ana cik cokat cik cirruk.
Anakka oPoluc pokat cik akwaꞌrntot oꞌren akworret ithik alü okïccekat pinyil apapꞌrilakat nokkun apokꞌrathok.

Anakka ul woncik iconthomat corirok irapngka cen wimmat pinyil apapꞌrilako nokkun woPoluc akin erettaranthet itti, “Pul empi paththoka ipangwo ul akka amma kwokkot cik nti irok irapangka anaruk lon lothonceꞌret lon cik lannokorronnok.”
Anaruk oPoluc pokkwathe pinyil nokkun apapat ithik aloꞌrek ellakat ilainok.

Okin thokat akin oꞌrïkothok itti kwaththakat cik ana manna itti kwapot nocapu piot anakka okin thoꞌrïkothe cik ittaꞌrene puccuk mono okathakat itti loꞌrek lella akin oprttat lon len cik nak akin iꞌrekat itti kapik engki.
Cïnang nocik cen oPappilioc ili wonocik cen wonat lampang napuththut. Kwikkiekathenïn cik maꞌri mꞌrapuruk akwokkinthet nïn lon loporot.
Ana oththan poPappilioc pappokat noppan pongo ana kwokat akwangko ippa ana opre. APoluc iꞌrikathok noppan akwonekkekat nyaun naak akwaꞌrakat ngaꞌrama akwothakkakat poporot.
Anakka oPoluc pokkothe menik aul akkakanthok iongo wonocik iconthomat corirok irapngka cen appik akwittiet kin.
Okin thopiriet nïn noka ngkathar koppot, anakka onïn thokat anïn uroko pꞌrïn, okin thipanthet nïn aꞌrupu ikuppuꞌrung konoiꞌri ianïn thongothe.

Anakka anok wothakkat wꞌrapuruk onïn tharrathe kuppuꞌrung konoiꞌri ikokkwothe cpo cinang nocik coMalththa. Kuppuꞌrung ken kokat koIcikkantharia ana tokït kokuppuꞌrung kwoꞌren kꞌrek kokat cik kokkattathe ere kapik ikokat laro ithonat ꞌran itti oKkacththo ana oPolluk.
Ana onïn thorpatheik nokaꞌran koCarakkoc anïn ikkat cik nan maꞌri mꞌrapuruk.

Anïn urokat nthan anïn eo omakot carkan corok mono anïn akkakat nokaꞌran koRikion noththok poIththalia ana ngorrot ngen akanang akkakat nthokkun wothothari amma akatha na acïngkï ummot ngngin ïnnakkakat nokaꞌran koPuththuli nocaꞌri culukku.
Onïn thiathe ul ioccokothe lon loIeccuo wꞌrek than akin omekat nïn itti onïn thikkoik nakin maꞌri meꞌreꞌrapuruk. Ittina onïn thakkakathe nokaꞌran koRoma.

Ana ul ioccokothe lon loIeccuo woccïkathe nokaꞌran koRoma itti onïn thaat ana okin thakkakathe thapat noththok akin othocurot ianïn nokaꞌran kApiuc ikokat kaꞌran kokeccuk. Opilingon thaththiat nïn nokaꞌran koccot kꞌran itti Aꞌran Wꞌrapuruk Ikkakoik tit. Ana akka oPoluc pimmat kin kwopirakanthet Kapik noka ana kwopoꞌriettakathe than.
Anakka onïn thaat nokaꞌran koRoma akin ikkiekat oPoluc cik nokaꞌran pellek ana pul pꞌrek angwothok othakka itti akka akura.

Anakka maꞌri mꞌrapuruk meot ncik, oPoluc pakkarathe ul woIouth ittïttïk. Anakka okin thaꞌrntakothe tothun, aPoluc iꞌrekat kin itti, “Pangkingon, antoka manna itti mpannokkinthet ul wonnon lon lꞌrek lokithak aththik ana manna thathuma thothiki itheot thonnon anaruk ul woIouth woccokothin nokaꞌran koUruccelim ana okin thethin ul woRoma ikkun.
Okin thokathaccet ilon lin ana okin thomekathe itti okin thelikkon akka lon lellat ilokithak ila mpokkothe ilakorronnon itti mpakkuttat.
Anaruk ul woIouth wꞌrakathe ana ilen akkokorronnathin anothïot lon lin tokït koili irïk oKkaiccer. Annoka itti mpongothe itti mparukwet ul win llon lꞌrek.
Ana nti ilon elli, mpakkarinet non anatherenenon. Mpïꞌrïkïkkot nynyol enyi nti ilon lothoꞌrikot cik thoIccereil.”
Akin iꞌrekathok itti, “Onïn thanniot kaꞌrmacak ikerethung llon ilokithak nnoththok poIouthia ana ul wella iaat ieret lon ilokithak naung cakuruk.
Anaruk onïn thongothe itti onïn thantoccïkot lon lang ila ngkwonu akka onïn thina nan itti ul naꞌran appik wꞌrat lon ila ngkwaik pangkene.”

Ana okin thonekkekathe caꞌri cik icakin aine oPoluc ngngin, ana okin thakkakanthok thoppot na kwokat cik akwikkoik. OPoluc pikkatheik akwongkene ana erenekin lon ngili ngoKapik nci ingïꞌrïmak mono acipin apat. Ana akwongkenekin lon loIeccuo llon nti iatham woMucca lothonceꞌret lon cik ana llon lorinatham noul wothernte lon loKapik.
Apilingon thangkathe ana opilingon thꞌrakathe lon lung.

Ul wannïꞌrïkat lon tothun ana okin wopettakatheik ntuan thanung akka oPoluc piꞌrethekin kin lon elli itti, “Kanang ikupupure kiꞌrethe oththen lon ïcat akka kiꞌret mpul pothernte lon loKapik oIccaia itti,
‘Ngoinet ul ennrïk aiꞌret kin itti,
Onon thantoccïkot lon ana onon thannina,
onon thantokathacce cik ana onon thannimmaik.
Akka mïkït moul enni monthomathe ikarak,
okin thonu unu ana okin thomma occïkot cik,
okin thonu kït ana okin thomma immaik.
Akka amma okonnoka ittina okin thaimmat cik
ana occïkot cik nunu wen,
ina lon mmïkït men
ana opaꞌrine lon cik ana mpittiet kin.’
Ittina mpongothe itti onon thina itti Kapik kothïnthet ul iannoka woIouth thoꞌrettat thung ana okin thaccïkot.”
[Anakka kwiꞌret lon len aul woIouth oppat thapat oththe naak akin thokat akin opllarot cannan.]
APoluc ikkat cik luput leꞌra ikaman akka kwokat pethet kin akucci ana kwikkiekathe ul cik appik iainok.
Kwongkenet ana lon longili ngoKapik ana ere lon loIli oIeccuo oMiccie ella nꞌre ana pul pella poceꞌrekathok.
Romans: Oun oPoluc iparekine oMiccie oIeccuo ana oun ipakkarakot itti anothakka pul pothothïlettat pung anongkene ul lon iloporot loKapik,
ila konekketheik ncimaꞌrot nnul wothernte lon loKapik inatham inupupure,
ileret ukul wung oIeccuo oMiccie iothakkat pul iponyi ana iokwontat nti ithiki thoThauth.
Ana ook ipokenettat ngKanang ikupupure itti ook ukul woKapik ana nthuroko thung nti ithio, ook oIeccuo oMiccie Ili wonnon.

Ana oron thipakot thiak then nti ilon lung ana kꞌran kung ana ekko nan itti oron thathakka ul wothothïlettat woIeccuo, aron akkaro ul nti iul iakannoka woIouth akin occïkot thoccïkot ithanthan nolon lothoccokot lon nocïkït.
Ana onon acakuruk thaik iul iakkarakot athoka ul woIeccuo oMiccie.
Mpaik pakurrinenon appik ul wonokaꞌran koRoma iaKapik kongothe ana kakkarot itti athakka ul iupupure woKapik. OIeccuo oMiccie pethet non thoporot ana lon iloporot loKapik oNgappa ponnon.
Cittokït mpongothe itti mpapirane Kapik kin noka ana oIeccuo oMiccie akkathikkie lon ïcat akka thoccokot lon nomïkït thon thappaththatheik nocapu ncik appik.
Kapik ika mpaik parekine ncïkït culukku nthongkene tholon iloporot lokkul wung, iken akkina nan itti mpaik pakwarttikot non
iaꞌrama ngngin appinappin, ana mpuꞌran poKapik mpongothe itti kanyinin kathar anothomïrïkot non.
Mpaik pakwancot kathar ika animma non ngngin, othakka itti anethet non lon loKanang ikupupure akothikkienon thonthomat,
elli lonu itti onon ana oun thittararot nthoccokot lon nomïkït monnon aron oka thonthomat.

Pangkingon, mpongothe itti onon thina nan itti mpenekket maꞌri moppot itti mpathomïrïkot non (anaruk mpolikakinet cik manna ina) othakka itti anetherene ul lon loIeccuo ianon ammakka mpokkothe iul iakannoka woIouth wꞌrek llon loIeccuo.
Akka mponu itti mpangkene ul appik woKrik ana iakannoka woKrik iinaik nti ima ana ikannoka winaik.
Ilen akka mponganthet itti mpathongkenenon cakuruk lon iloporot loIeccuo onon ithaik nokaꞌran koRoma.
Mpakannothiane thongkene lon iloporot loIeccuo cik akka ilen puꞌran poKapik pothoꞌret thoul appik okkwion ithoccokothe lon nomïkït, cittokït ul woIouth ana ul iannoka woIouth.

Akka lon lothothakka poporot tokït koKapik lokenettat ilon iloporot loIeccuo, thoporot nthoccokot lon nomïkït nocaꞌri conomun oingkanthet nocaꞌri icocothothe. Ammakka lokurrakot iatham itti “Pul ipoporot tokït koKapik pakkoik nthoccokot tholon loKapik nocïkït.”
Kapik kokenet tat akka kua ka ntothiꞌrot nolon loul iammakot lon lonocapu ana ul iokithak iaꞌrumot lon iloporot llon ilokithak.
Akka lon ilakin thonu itti okin thina loKapik laik apparthak tokït ken aKapik akkonekketheik apparthak tokït ken.

Akka ammakka Kapik kokuꞌret capu ncik appik, Kapik ngka kung ikommakot nan ana puꞌran pung pothupuththuput ipakannocoꞌro, ook Kapik ïcarïcat, kimmakot kicce ana kinakot llon ila kokkothe, othakka itti aul ella lon cik itti okin thomma ilaik.
Antoka manna itti okin thinat Kapik, okin thꞌrat omereket Kapik ana manna opiriek noka, anaruk thokwarttikot cik then thokat lon lulluk ilella lon cik ana mïkït men imommaik mokat iꞌrïmak.
Antoka manna itti nthinnikothe itti okin thinaik anaruk okin thothakkakathe thommaik.
Ana okin thokucittathe thrïk thoKapik cik akin aꞌrane urrut iokat cik wungkot ul ionyi ana uꞌrupe ana aꞌrupu worikira ana aꞌrupu iauro ngaꞌrama.
Anakka ul wommat cik nti ima, Kapik kokorronnathekin akin ongat lon ilokithak ammakka thaꞌro nnul nuthuk ana okkarot lon noka ken ilokithak.

Okin thopaꞌrinet lon loKapik cik ilaik ïcat akin ere lon ngkarra ana aꞌrane aꞌrupu wonocapu ngaꞌrama iokkattathe nynyaun akin okorronno Kapik ikokuꞌret capu ncik, ook ipamerekettat thupuththuput, Amin.
Ana nti ilon elli appik Kapik kokorronnathekin akin ongat cannan itti okin thaꞌro nnul iomura, ana manna ul iari wen woporttot thaꞌro then nul iomura akin aꞌraro ngngin ithari.
Ana menik cakuruk ul iomura wokorronnot thaꞌro nul iari akin aꞌro nul iomura. Ana ilen akka okin thattattakinet llon lokithak nti ilon len ilakin thokkothe.
Anakka okin thakannokwairttikot cik papenang nolon loKapik, Kapik kekathekin ngatheꞌre ngokithak akin okkot lon ilonu itti lakannokkattat.
Okin thothakkakathe ul ionu lon lulluk ilokithak ima ammakka thïrïk nan ana ngatheꞌre nyokithak. Okin thꞌrat ul, okin thangwo ul, okin thathatto iul, okin thammikkot ana okin theret ul.
Okin therettot llon lokithak, okin thꞌrat Kapik, okin thacungkaro, okin thipot ka thoura, okin thakwancot kathar ikakin okkot lon ilokithak ngngin, okin thakannoccïkot lon loththangon ana lonnangon.
Okin thommaik ana okin thakorronno ere lon ilaik ïcat, okin thakannoccokot lon nomïkït ana ella thiak thoul wꞌrek.

Ana manna okin thina itti Kapik kiꞌret itti okkwion ithakkot lon ammakka elli okin thille ana okin thoꞌrungkwathe nan okkot lon elli anaruk okin thikkatheik akin ongkene opilingon itti okin thakkot tat.
Ittina onon thella lon cik ilanon akkma opilingon ngngin, akka lon ila akkmak ngngin ngkwaik pakkma ka kang, akka onon ithaik thakkma thaik thakkot menik cakuruk.
Akka oron thina itti thakkma itha Kapik akkma ul enni ngngin thakkmako llon ilaik ïcat.
Ana oung emprïk amma akkma ul angkwaik akkot lon len, ngkwame itti ngkwalukkwot thakkma thoKapiki?
ngkworakket thoporot thungi ana thonongkwot ilon thungi? akorronno ina nan itti Kapik nthongat thung nthoporot thung enthi itti ngkwapaꞌrine lon cik ilokithaki?
Anaruk akka onon thonthomat ma ana mïkït imakannopaꞌrine lon cik ilokithak, onon thaik thaꞌrntinthet ka kon thua ka ithokithak nocaꞌri ica Kapik athokene ul thakkma thung ithocoꞌrotheik.
Kapik kethet ul loporot ngngre iakin thokkothe.
Ana ul iokat cik akkot lon iloporot wokat cik akwancot thrïk ana thothiakine cik ana thikkoik thothupuththupu ana Kapik kethet kin thikkoik thothupuththuput.
Anaruk okkwion ithongothe lon lokaken ana ꞌra lon ilaik ïcat akin ommakot lon ilamoloko, Kapik kua ka ken.
Ul iakkot lon ilokithak wakinnikkoik woporot ana anganna ul woIouth cittokït ana ul iakannoka woIouth
anaruk thrïk ana thothiakine cik ana thoporot thaka noul iakkot lon iloporot ana anganna ul woIouth cittokït ana ul iakannoka woIouth.
Akka Kapik kakannïcat nopul pꞌrek amma akakkma.

Okkwion ithokkothe lon ilokithak, akin thellat lon lothonceꞌret lon cik loMucca okin thille akin okorronno onceꞌrettanthet lon cik llon lothonceꞌret lon cik loMucca, okkwion ithillet akin thonat lon lothonceꞌret lon cik loMucca okin thanceꞌrettanthet nthoceꞌret lon cik thoMucca.
Akka okorronno oka okkwion ithaccïkot lon lothonceꞌret lon cik loMucca akkaka thoporot tokït koKapik anaruk okkwion ithathiane lon lothonceꞌret lon cik akkiꞌrettat itti okin thoporot tokït koKapik.
Amma ul iakannoka woIouth iella lon lothonceꞌret lon cik loMucca wikkoik akkot lon iloporot laka ere lon lothonceꞌret lon cik len antoka manna itti okin thathonceꞌret lon thoka ken lon cik loMucca

ittina okin thaik thakene itti lon lothonceꞌret lon cik loMucca laik nomïkït men ana ima men ana mïkït men maik makene itti laik ïcat ana thokwarttikot cik then thaik thakene itti laik ïcat ana manna thrrot nakin ana athourkwet kin.
Elli lakaik nocaꞌri amma oIeccuo oMiccie athakkma ul mpuꞌran poKapik ammakka lon iloporot loIeccuo liꞌret.
Ana onon enthrïk ithamet ka kon itti onon ul woIouth ana onon occot kït nolon lothonceꞌret lon cik loMucca ana othingkako ngkꞌran koKapik itti kon
onon thina lon ila Kapik kongothe itti onon thakkot ana onon thinat nolon lothonceꞌret lon cik itti onon thakkot iloporot nolon ilokithak,
Ana onon thina itti onon akkaik thitte ul iꞌrimathe ana ona ul iaik iꞌrïmak
ana okene ul cik iommaik ana ongkene nyukul inyarran akka onon thina lon lothonceꞌret lon cik loMucca kicce ana lon ilaik ïcat
ittina onon ithangkene opilingon, onon thakannongkene ka koni? Onon ithangkene ul itti thuꞌran thokithak onon thakannomunyei?
Onon ithiꞌre itti ul wakannaꞌro nul iari ittat, onon thakannalle nul iari ittari? Onon ithꞌrat nikkilan ana onon omunye aꞌrupu noppan toKapiki?
Onon ithaik thipot ka thura kothonceꞌret lon cik loMucca, onon thaik thakorronno orakke lon loKapik amma anon orakke lon lothonceꞌret lon ciki?
Ammakka lokurrakot iatham itti, “Kꞌran koKapik kaul iakannoka woIouth wocungkwot nti ilon lon.”
Thokekkot thoporot amma ngkwaccot kït nolon lothonceꞌret lon cik papenang anaruk amma ngkwakannoccot kït nolon lothonceꞌret lon cik len, ngkwikkoik ere pul ipakannokekkot.
Ana amma ul iakannokekkot waccot kït nolon lothonceꞌret lon cik ilathokekkot thongothe itti langwuttat, okin thakannokathako ere ul iokekkothei?

Okkwi ipakannokekkot ana icci kwaik paccot kït nolon lothonceꞌret lon cik, kwakannoceꞌrenthet non lon ciki? Onon thoIouth ithorakket lon lothonceꞌret lon cik, ana manna onon thonu lon ilokurrakot ana onon thokekkothe anaruk onon thorakket.
Pul pakannoka pul poIouth amma pokekkothe tulluk.

Anaruk pul paka poIouth nthoccokot lon nocïkït loIouth ana thokekkot itti cïkït cung coꞌrillir ngKanang ikupupure koKapik, annoka llon lothonceꞌret lon cik loMucca. Katha pul ammakka pen paKapik omereket, annoka pul iponyi akkamereket.
Ngintha akkoporot amma ngkwothakkat pul poIouth? Ana ngintha akkaka pokithak amma ngkwakannokekkot?
Loporot llon loppot itti lon loKapik lerettanet ul woIouth cittokït.
Laka taththa amma opilingon thellat thoccokot lon nomïkït loKapik? Thella lon nomïkït then thakorronno Kapik akokorronno occot kït nolon ila konekketheiki?
Aa, okonnoka menik Kapik kakannere lon ngkarra anaruk pul iponyi pere lon ngkarra. Ammakka lokurrakot iatham itti,
“Othakka itti alon lang oka locoꞌrotheik amma aere
ana alkot lon ila ngkworukwettathe ngngin ilokithak.”
Anaruk amma lon lonnon ilokithak lana thoporot thoKapik papenang oron thame taththa? oron thame itti Kapik engki kakannocoꞌrot lon cik akka kua ka naroni? Mpaik paꞌretto karkko pul iponyi.
Okonnoka menik amma arokat ittina Kapik kakkma capu taththa?
Opilin manna piꞌre itti, “Amma ngre ngin iamoloko nginie lon loKapik ana arttot nothrïk thung, ngintha akka anakkmakine karkko pul iponu lon ilokithak?”

Ana ngintha akka oron okorronnokkinthet lon ilokithak othakka itti alanthan iloporot? Opilingon thocungkwot nïn ana orukwethin itti mpiꞌret lon len. Okin thakkmako ngkathar ikakin thonu itti okin nthakkmako ngngin.
Lon len lacothakot taththa? Oron ul woIouth akkoporot noul iannoka woIouthi? A Aa, okonnoka menik onïn thokenet non ntit akkomencen itti ul woIouth ana iannoka woIouth waik ilon ilokithak appik.
Ammakka lokurrakot itti,
“Pul pella ipoporot manna pulukku.
Pul pella ipina lon
pella ipaik pakwancot Kapik
Okin appik thopaꞌrinet Kapik cik
ana okin appik theot ikathar koka,
Pul pella manna pulukku ipaik pakkot lon loporot.”
“Lon len lakkunako ere utha wonupu noul iillet
ana luꞌre len lere karra kulluk.”
“Lon len likkoik ere ngee ngoinyil.”
“Lon len loppappathe nthattatta ana lokithak.”
“Okin thallot tothietto ka kongo ana onguttetto cokoccokot.
okin thipot thukungkun cik, na akin eo ana okïttoik
Okin thomma thikkoik ngkathar ikoporot aththik.”
“Okin manna thakannothiane Kapik cik aththik.”
Oron thina inenni itti lon ila lon lothonceꞌret lon cik laik lere leret ul iaik wammakot lon len, othakka itti aul angkoik ana capu occokot lon loKapik.
Ittina pul pella piꞌrettat itti poporot tokït koKapik akka kwaik pammakot lon lothonceꞌret lon cik anaruk nthommakot lon lothonceꞌret lon cik, pul pina amma pokkothe lon ilokithak.

Anaruk inenni thothakka thopul poporot thanthan noKapik, okonnoka nothommakot lon lothonceꞌret lon cik. Antoka manna itti ul wothernte lon lothonceꞌret lon cik werethe lon ana thonceꞌret lon ncik thoMucca therethe lon len cakuruk.
Kapik kathikkie ul woporot tokït kung ioccokothe lon nomïkït loIeccuo oMiccie akka okin thulukku tokït kung.
Akka oron appik thokkothe lon lokithak ana oron thokakathe ciththan nothrïk thoKapik
ana Kapik kothikkietton thoporot appik nuthuk nthoporot thung nti ithokke ithaat naIeccuo oMiccie itha kwokkenetton.

Akka Kapik konarok othakka itti akwathio nti ilon ilokithak lokkwion ithoccokothe lon lung nomïkït ana Kapik kokkothe elli othakka itti akokene itti thoccokot cïkït ilon thung thokat thoporot ana kwoccïkanthet ul lon ilokithak
kwokkothe ittina akwokene thocoꞌrot cik tholon thung nomaꞌri emmi othakka itti akwoka pul ipathikkie okkwion ithoccokothe lon loIeccuo oMiccie nomïkït thoporot.

Ngintha akka oron ipinthet ka thoura? Papella ana lon liatha akka oron ipinthet ka thoura? Othakka itti akka oron thaik thammakot lon lothonceꞌret lon ciki? A a, okonnoka menik anaruk nthoccokot lon nomïkït thoIeccuo.
Akka oron thina itti pul iponyi pathikkietta poporot nthoccokot lon loKapik nocïkït okonnoka nthommakot lon lothonceꞌret lon cik loMucca.
Kapik koul woIouth tulluki? Kakannoka Kapik koul iakonnoka woIouth cakuruki? Ïï iken koul iakannoka woIouth cakuruk
Ina akka Kapik kaik kulukku ikathikkie pul poIouth ana ipakannoka poIouth poporot tokït kung nthoccokot lon nomïkït thung.
Oron thonu itti oron thapaꞌrine lon lothonceꞌret lon cik nti ithoccokot lon loKapik nomïkïri? Aa, okonnoka menik anaruk oron thonu itti oron thammakot lon lothonceꞌret lon cik loMucca papenang.
Oron theret Aprein oththan pothiki thonnon taththa? Ngintha akka kwinat nti ilon len?
Amma ïcarïcat Aprein pokat pothikkiettat poporot nti ire ngung, kwonat lon cik ila kwipot ka thoura ngngin anaruk okonnoka tokït koKapik.
Akka lokurrakot iatham itti, “Aprein poccokothe lon loKapik nocïkït ana lothikkiekathok poporot tokït koKapik.”
Inenni amma pul oreko, aꞌrupu iakin ettat nti ire wakannoka nuthuk anaruk nti ire iakin thorekot.
Anaruk pul ipakannoreko anaruk aponekket cïkït noKapik ikathikkie ul iokithak woporot, thoccokot lon nocïkït thopul pen thathikkiek poporot.
OThauth peret menik cakuruk akka kwerethe thethïe thopul ipa Kapik othikkie poporot okonnoka nti ire ngung tulluk,
“Loporot nakkwion
itha Kapik koccïkïnthet thukungkun then
ana lon len ilokithak loꞌrumakothe.
Loporot nopul
ipa Kapik kakannongantene lon ilokithak lung kirrkkir.”
Thethïeko thoul iokekkothe tulluki ana okonnoka thoul iakannokekkori? Onïn thokat cik anïn ere ina itti Aprein pokat pettathe thoporot nti ithoccokot lon nocïkït thung.
Elli lokat cik acintha? Lokat cik akkwokekkothe ntiri? Lokat cik akkwarthuk okekkori? Lakannoka akkwarthuk okekkot anaruk akkwokekkothe ntit.

Ana kwokekkathe othakka itti aloka lon ilakene itti kwokat poporot tokït koKapik, thoporot itha kwoccot nti ithoccokot lon loKapik nocïkït akkwarthuk okekkot. Elli lokat cik othakka itti akwoka oththan poul ioccokothe lon loKapik nomïkït akin thakannokekkot ana othakka itti athoporot oka thokkwion ithakannokekkot cakuruk.
Ana ook oththan poul iokekkothe appik ana iakonnokekkot anaruk oththan poul iaik wammakot kathar kothoccokot lon nocïkït thongappa Aprein itha kwonat akkwarthuk okekkot.

Aprein ana opeon thakannonekkettanthet lon cik itti okin thapakkot nocapu, othakka itti akka okin thokat akin ommakot lon lothonceꞌret lon cik anaruk nthoporot tokït koKapik ithanthan nthoccokot lon loKapik nocïkït.
Akka amma okkwion ithikkoik llon lothonceꞌret lon cik thapakkot nocapu, thoccokot lon loKapik nomïkït thella lon cik ana thonekket lon cik thella lon cik cakuruk,
akka thonceꞌret lon cik thana thua ka thoKapik. Anaruk na thonceꞌret lon cik thaik, ul wakannoccïkot lon cakuruk.

Ittina, thonekket lon cik thao nothccokot lon loKapik nocïkït othakka itti aloka nthoporot thoKapik ana athettat nyukul nyAprein appik, akonnoka okkwion thothonceꞌret lon cik tulluk anaruk cakuruk ul ioccokothe lon loKapik nomïkït ilakin thoccot nAprein. Ook ongappa ponnon appik.
Ana ammakka lokurrakot itti, “Mpothikkierung oththan poul woppot.”
Ook ongappa ponnon tokït koKapik ika kwoccokothe lon len nocïkït, Kapik ken ikethet ul thikkoik iillet ana ikakkot aꞌrupu iellat cik.
Aprein poccokothe lon loKapik nocïkït ana manna kwellat lon cik, ana oꞌrïkot cik itti kwathakka oththan poul appik, ammakka liꞌrettathok itti, “Nyukul nyang nyathakka ittina”
Thoccokot lon nocïkït loKapik thAprein thakannoropat cik antoka manna itti kwinat nan itti kwocokkat pꞌrin ponat luput arrial ukuluk pakannokwono, ana opari oCcara pokat pocoꞌrot cakuruk nti inyukul.
Ana icci kwakannonakat mïkït meꞌra nothonekket lon cik ila Kapik konekkenthok cik, anaruk kwopoꞌrathe than ithoccokot lon loKapik nocïkït ana ethet Kapik thïrïk,
ana kwinat nan kicce itti Kapik kakkot lon ila konekketheik itti kakkot.
Ilen akka “Kapik kothikkiekanthok poporot tokït kung.”
Lon itti, “Kwothikkiettat” lakannokurrakinok pellek,
anaruk lokurrakinet ton cakuruk oron ithoccokothe lon loKapik nomïkït ikurokiet oIeccuo nti ithio, Ili Kapik wonnon.
Kwonekittat akwothio nti ilon ilokithak lonnon ana kurokot akwothikkieron thoporot tokït koKapik.
Ana inakka oron thothakkat thoporot nthoccokot lon loKapik nomïkït thonnon, oron thaik ikuꞌri oron oKapik nti ilon loIli oIeccuo oMiccie,
oron thiothe thoporot enthi itharon thaik ina nthoccokot lon nomïkït. Ana oron thapira noka ithoꞌrïkot cik thothrïk thoKapik.
Okonnoka ittina tulluk, anaruk oron thapira noka ithoreko thiak thonnon akka oron thina itti thoreko thiak cannan thanongkwiet ton ilon,
thonongkwot ilon thathikkie pul ponthomat ana thonthomat thakorronno pul apona thoꞌrïkot cik.
Ana thoꞌrïkot cik thakonnothieron cik akka Kapik konekkethe thongat thung nomïkït monnon ngKanang ikupupure ika kwethet ton.
Akka caꞌri icaron thellat puꞌran cik, oMiccie piinet ton othakka itti akwittarot ton ithella puꞌran cik ana ithakkot lon ilokithak.
Lonthomat itti pul pꞌrek pio nti ilon lopul ipoporot tokït koKapik ana manna loporot itti pul pine pul ipoporot.
Anaruk Kapik kokenet ton thongat thung nthiot thoMiccie nothapak akka oron thokat tharthuk thonat lon ilokithak.
Ana inakka oron thothakkat thoporot ngüccük ngung, oron thaꞌrettat nti ithua ka thoKapik nti iaak,
oron thokat thoꞌrak thoKapik, anaruk kwopakketheron ikuꞌri nthio thokkul wung. Ana icci oron thaꞌrettat nthikkoik thokkul wung.
Anaruk okonnoka ilen lulluk oron thapirane Kapik noka, Ili wonnon oIeccuo oMiccie okkwi ipopakketheron ikuꞌri oron oKapik.
Ittina ammakka lon ilokithak laat nocapu ncik appik mpul pulukku, ana thio nti ilon ilokithak ana ngkathar engki thio thainet ul appik akka ul appik wokkothe lon ilokithak
akka lon ilokithak lokat cik nocapu ncik appik alon lothonceꞌret lon cik larthuk eettat ul. Anaruk lon ilokithak lelakot kït ken amma lon lothonceꞌret cik lella.

Anaruk thille thokat cik nci nocaꞌri cAtham, oingkanthet nocaꞌri coMucca, ul wokat cik aille manna ul iakannokkot lon ilokithak ammakka Atham pokkothe akka kwarrothe lon cik ila Kapik kiꞌrethok. Atham pokat purrut popul ipaik panthan.

Anaruk thethet thakannoka ammakka lon ilokithak. Akka amma ul woppot willet nti ilon ilokithak lopul pulukku anaruk loporot cannan akka nthoporot thoKapik ana thethet nuthuk ithaat nthoporot thopul pulukku oIeccuo oMiccie, athoine ul appik.

Ana attang thethet nuthuk thoKapik thakannoka ammakka thokkot lon ilokithak lopul pulukku. Akka thokkot lon ilokithak lopul pulukku thonakanthet ul appik thakkmako anaruk thethet nuthuk thoKapik thonat lon ilokithak loppot lommakothe ana thothikkiekathe ul woporot.

Ana amma thio thongwot ul appik akka lon ilokithak lopul pulukku, ittina thikkoik thakaik nopul pulukku cakuruk ook oIeccuo oMiccie ana thaka nakkwion ithacco thoporot thoKapik ana thethet nuthuk thung ithoppot.
Ittina ammakka lon ilokithak lopul pulukku lakkmat ul appik, menik lon iloporot lopul pulukku lothikkiet ul appik woporot othakka itti akkoik.
Ana ammakka nti itharrot lon cik lopul pulukku, ul appik wothakkakathe wokithak ana cakuruk nthoccïkot lon thopul pulukku, ul woppot wothakkakathe woporot.
Lon lothonceꞌret lon lokat laat othakka itti alon ilokithak arttakot nan. Anaruk na lon ilokithak larttakothe nan, thoporot thoKapik tharttakot nan cannan,
Ana ammakka lon ilokithak lakkmat capu nthio, cakuruk thoporot thoKapik ithathikkieron thoporot oIeccuo ngngin thakaik ana thethetton thikkoik thupuththuput nti aIeccuo oMiccie, Ili Kapik wonnon.
Ngintha akka oron iꞌre? Oron thaꞌrungkwot nan okkot lon ilokithak othakka itti athoporot thoKapik arttakinthet ton nani?
Okorronno oka menik oron thillethe ilon ilokithak ana tat akka oron appoꞌrungkot nan okkot lon ilokithak?
Onon thomma itti oron appik ithoccot mamuthie ngkꞌran koIeccuo oMiccie oron thoccot itti oron thillet iaak?
Ittina oron thocïkkakot uraththut caꞌri icaron thoccot mamuthie othakka itti ammakka oMiccie pokat purokiettat nti ithio nthrïk thoththan, oron thikkoik thikkoik thie.
Amma oron thothakkat thulukku nthio thung, oron thathakka thulukku ithuroko thung.
Akka oron thina itti ka konnon ikïpe kokkuttathe nothapak oMiccie ngngin othakka itti aka kolon ilokithak opaꞌroik, aron okorronno oka iak wolon ilokithak.
Akka okkwi ipiot kwelikkakot nti ilon ilokithak.
Inenni amma oron thillet oron oMiccie oron thaccokot lon nomïkït itti oron thakkoik cakuruk uraththut.
Oron thina itti oMiccie purokiettat nti ithio ana kwakannappio attang, ittina thio thella puꞌran cik naak.
Akka thio itha kwiot, kwiothe ilon ilokithak caꞌri culukku kirrkkir anaruk thikkoik itha kwokkot cik thakin ikkoik okin oKapik.
Ammakka menik, nokatha ka kon itti onon thillethe ilon ilokithak ana onon thokkot cik othakka itti annikkoik annoMiccie oIeccuo.
Ittina nokorronno okorronno lon ilokithak aliꞌriko ika kon othakka itti annokkot lon ila longothe.

Nokorronno ethet ka kon kꞌrek lon ilokithak itti akothakka papu ipakkattat llon ilokithak anaruk nethet ka kon Kapik ammakka ul iokat willet ana wurokiettat nti ithio, ana ethet Kapik ka kon kꞌrek akothakka papu ipakkattat llon iloporot.
Akka lon ilokithak lakorronno alkot non akka onon thakannoka inyaun nyolon lothonceꞌret lon cik anaruk onon thaik ithoporot thoKapik.
Ngintha pen ittina? Oron thakkot lon ilokithak akka oron thakonnoka inyaun nyolon lothonceꞌret lon ciki anaruk oron thaik inyaun nyothoporot thoKapiki? Lakannoka menik.

Onon thomma itti amma onon thethet ka kon pul pꞌrek itti nthaccïkot lon lung karkko iak, onon thaiak wokkwi ipanon occïkot lon len, antoka manna itti onon thaiak wolon ilokithak ilanekot non ithio antoka manna itti ngkwapiak pothoccïkot lon ilanekothung ithoporot tokït koKapik.
Anaruk nopirane Kapik noka, akka antoka manna itti onon thokat iak wolon ilokithak anaruk onon thoccïkothe thongkene thoKapik ithokat thongkenettat non.
Onon thelikkakot nti ilon ilokithak ana onon thothakkat iak wolon iloporot loKapik.

Mperet lon elli ngkathar ika ul ionyi ere ngngin akka onon thakonnoka thopoꞌrot than. Ana akka onon thothikkiet ka kon kꞌrek iak wolon ilokithak ana arttot nothokkot lon ilokithak, inenni nothikkie ka kon iak wolon iloporot ilathikkienon thoꞌrillir.
Anakka onon thokat iak wolon ilokithak, onon thellat inyaun nyolon iloporot tokït koKapik.
Ngintha akka onon thiothe caꞌri cen nti ilon ilokithak ilanon thothianet cik inenni, lon len lonat thio.
Anaruk inenni onon thei thelikkakot nti ilon ilokithak ana onon thothakkat iak woKapik ana lon ilanniot ntit lathikkienon thupupure ana lon len itti thikkoik thothupuththuput.
Akka lon ilokithak lana thio anaruk thethet nuthuk thoKapik thana thikkoik thothupuththuput iaMiccie oIeccuo Ili wonnon.
Pangkingon, onon thomma itti mpaik perene ul iina lon lothonceꞌret lon cik itti lakkma ul iaik ngkït thapat tulluki?
Ammakka lon laik, pul ipittat ponu itti paccïkot olle akkwaik ngkït thapat anaruk amma olle akkiot ana pelikkako nti ilon elli appik.

Anaruk amma pul ipopari pittat alle parthuk paik pakinnio, pokkothe lon ilokithak. Anaruk amma olle piot, kwella lon cik ilokithak antoka manna itti pipo pul pꞌrek kwella lon ilokithak ana manna kwipo pꞌre pꞌrek.
Pangkingon, onon thillethe ilon loIeccuo lothonceꞌret lon cik othakka itti annoka thopilin, annoka thokkwi ipurokot nti ithio othakka itti aron okkinthet Kapik lon loporot.
Lon lothonceꞌret lon cik lurokiet lon ilokithak ilaik iaron ana lonakathe thio akka oron thokat inyaun nyolon ilokithak.

Anaruk inenni oron thakonnoka inyaun nyolon lothonceꞌret lon cik pꞌrin, oron thelikkakot nti ilon lothonceꞌret lon cik othakka itti aron oreko ngkathar ikie koKanang ikupupure ana okonnoka ngkathar ikïpe ikokurrakotheik.

Oron thiꞌre taththa? Lon lothonceꞌret lon cik lalon ilokithaki? Okonnoka menik, akka mpakannainat lon ilokithak amma lon lothonceꞌret lon cik lellat. Akka mpakannainat thoccot kït naꞌrupu woul amma lon lothonceꞌret lon cik lakinniꞌre itti, “Nokorronno occot kït naꞌrupu woul.”
Anaruk lon ilokithak akkokorronnorin anongat aꞌrupu. Akka amma lon lothonceꞌret lon cik lella ana lon ilokithak lella.
Mpokat cik anikkoik poporot amparthuk ina lon lothonceꞌret lon cik. Anaruk akka lon ilonthomat laat, alon ilokithak iꞌrikat iaun ana mpiathe.
Mpaththiot itti lon lothonceꞌret lon cik ila oMucca ponat ilokat lonu itti lana thikkoik lonat thio.
Akka lon ilokithak likkatheik alamikkothin llon ilonthomat anianthet lon len.
Icci lon lothonceꞌret lon cik ana lon len ilonthomat lupupure ana laik ïcat ana loporot.

Lon ilokat loporot akkokkwothini? Okonnoka menik, anaruk elli lokkattathe othakka itti alon ilokithak inako itti lalon ilokithak, lonat thio iaun llon iloporot, othakka itti alon ilokithak oka lon ilokithak nti ilon ilonthomat.
Oron thina itti lon lothonceꞌret lon cik lupupure anaruk mpakannoka pul polon loKapik mpokettathe lon ilokithak ere piak polon ilokithak.
Mpomma lon ila mpaik pakkot. Akka ila mpongothe itti mpakkot, mpaik pakannokkot anaruk ila mpꞌrat mpaik pakkot.
Ana amma mpakkot ila mpakannongkot itti mpakkot ana mpangat itti lon lothonceꞌret lon cik loporot.
Ittina oun akkaik pakannokkot lon elli ilokithak appik, anaruk lon ilokithak ilaik iaun akkaik lakkot.
Mpina itti lon lella iaun iloporot ana cannan ika kꞌrek ikokithak, akka mpongothe itti mpakkot lon iloporot anaruk mpomma okkot lon len.
Akka lon ila mpaik pakkot lakannoka iloporot ila mpongothe itti mpakkot mpakannangkot itti mpakkot anaruk lon ilokithak akkaik lanemothin nan mpokkot.
Menik amma mpakkot lon ila mpꞌrat itti mpakannokkot ittina oun akkaik pakannokkot lon len anaruk lon ilokithak ilaik iaun akkaik lakkot lon len.
Ittina mpaththiot itti lon lothonceꞌret lon cik laik lareko, amma mpongothe itti mpakkot lon iloporot, alon ilokithak okaik iccik kin.
Akka mpongothe lon lothonceꞌret lon cik nci nocïkït.
Anaruk mpaik pakathacce lon lothonceꞌret lon cik laik ire ika kin kꞌrek, laik lorro ilon lothonceꞌret lon cik loca cin alothikkien piak polon lothonceꞌret lon cik ilokithak ika kin kꞌrek.
Mpella utha woporot noka ana oththa akkaꞌrethin nti ika engki kothio.

Ittina athopira noka oka noKapik nti ia oIeccuo oMiccie Ili wonnon. Ittina oun ngka kin ana ngatheꞌre ngin oka iak wolon lothonceꞌret cik loKapik, anaruk aka kin oka piak pothonceꞌret lon cik lolon ilokithak.
Ittina, inenni thakkmako thella nakkwion ithaik okin oIeccuo oMiccie,
akka nti ilon loMiccie oIeccuo, lon lothonceꞌret lon cik loKanang kothikkoik lelikkorin nti ilon lothonceꞌret lon cik lolon ilokithak ana lothio.

Akka lon ila lon lothonceꞌret lon cik loMucca lokat lommat okkot, lokat lommat akka lon lonnon ilokithak ilaron thokwontat ngngin, anaruk Kapik kokkathe lon len nthothïot ukul wung ntan ngka kungkot kopul iponyi athoka papu pothokiot ngüccük cik nti ilon ilokithak. Ana oIeccuo popaꞌrekathe lon cik ilokithak nti ipul ipokithak.
Othakka itti alon ila lon lothonceꞌret lon cik longothe itti laka iaron aloka iaron oron ithaik thakannikkoik ammakka ka ikonyi ikokithak kongothe anaruk ammakka Kanang koKapik kongothe.

Okkwion ithaik thikkoik ammakka ka ikonyi kongothe, okin thaik thammakot lon ila ka ken kongothe lulluk ilokithak anaruk okkwion ithaik thikkoik ammakka Kanang koKapik kongothe okin thaik thammakot lon ila Kanang koKapik kongothe.
Ngatheꞌre ngopul polon ilokithak ngiot anaruk ngatheꞌre inga Kanang koKapik kaik nan ngaik ngkït thapat ana ngoporot,
ngatheꞌre ngolon ilokithak ngorro ilon loKapik. Ngakannoccïkot lon lothonceꞌret lon cik loKapik ana ngakannoreko llon len.
Okkwion ithaik thammakot lon ila ka ikonyi kongothe, thakannopirie Kapik noka.
Anaruk onon thaik thakannommokot lon ila ka ikonyi kongothe anaruk onon thaik thammakot Kanang koKapik amma kaik ianon. Ana okkwi ipella Kanang koMiccie kwakannoka poMiccie.
Anaruk amma oMiccie paik ianon, ka kon killet nti ilon ilokithak anaruk icci Kanang koKapik kaik ianon akka onon thoporot tokït koKapik.
Ana amma Kanang kokkwi ipurokiet oIeccuo nti ithio kaik ianon, okkwi ipurokiet oMiccie nti ithio pethet ka kon thikkoik ngKanang kokkwi ipaik ianon.
Ittina pangkingon oron thonu itti oron thakannikkoik thikkoik thoka ikokithak.
Akka amma onon thikkoik thikkoik thoka ikokithak ana onon thille anaruk amma onon ikkoik ngKanang koKapik onon thakkwot lon ilokithaki ilaik ika kon ana onon thakkoik.
Ana okkwion itha Kanang koKapik kaik nan, okin thanyukul nyoKapik.
Akka onon thakannocco Kanang ikathakkienon iak annipo nꞌre attang anaruk onon thoccot Kanang ikathikkienon nyukul. Ana ngKanang ken oron thakkaro itti, “Appa, ngappa ponnon.”
Kanang ikupupure koKapik ngkanang konnon thakene itti oron thanyukul nyoKapik.

Ana inakka oron thanyukul nyoKapik, oron ana Kanang thapakkot naꞌrupu woKapik ia kapponekkenthet ton cik ana oMiccie, amma oron akkaik thaccokot thiak oron oMiccie, othakka itti aron oka ithrïk oron aththut.
Mpakatha itti thoccokot thiak thonnon enthi, thakannoka ammakka thrïk ithathittako ncik iaron.
Aꞌrupu wonocapu waik waꞌrïkot nyukul nyoKapik cannan itti wakenetta kin.
Akka aꞌrupu wonocapu appik wonat nꞌre ana nꞌre nen nokat nipiettat kin ngKapik ikokkothe capu aul ona thoꞌrïkot cik.
Othakka itti aꞌrupu ncik appik elikkako nti ithoccokiettat thiak tholon ilokithak akin onakatta ithrïk nuthuk thonyukul nyoKapik.
Oron thina itti aꞌrupu ncik appik wokat accokot thiak manna inenni ere thokꞌrellako thokkul amma akwonta akꞌrello pul ipakwono.
Okorronno oka menik tulluk, anaruk oron ngka konnon ithonu Kanang koKapik, thaik thaccokot thiak aron thaik thaꞌrikot thelikkako thoka konnon cannan ana thoka konyukul nyoKapik.
Akka ithoꞌrïkot cik enthi oron thoꞌrettathe. Anaruk thoꞌrïkot cik ithimmako thakannoka thoꞌrïkot cik. Oththa akkaꞌrïkot lon ila kwimmat ngkït?
Anaruk amma oron oꞌrïkot aꞌrupu iaron thella oron thaꞌrikot nthoccokot mïkït.
Menik, Kanang koKapik kittarot ton ithommaik thonnon. Oron thomma lon ilaron thaik thaꞌrane ngaꞌrama anaruk Kanang ikupupure akkaꞌraneron ngaꞌrama llon ilommakot.
Ana okkwi ipakwancot mïkït monnon pina ngatheꞌre ngoKanang ikupupure akka Kanang ikupupure akkakkinthet ul iupupure woKapik lon ila Kapik kongothe.
Ana oron thina itti ilon appik Kapik kaik karekine ul iongothok, okin ithakkarakothe llon ila kwakkarothekin.
Akka kinat ul ia kakkarot ana kakkarot kin akin oka ere ukul wung wonthon othakka itti aukul wung ina akka aka ukul wonothon ithoꞌrkït thopangon appik.
Ana okkwion itha kinat kakkarot ana okkwion itha kakkarot, kwothikkiet kin thung ana okkwion ithothakkat thung, kwothikkiet kin thrïk.
Oron thathïot lon elli tit taththa? Amma Kapik kaik naron oththa akkalkot ton?
Akka kakannꞌra nukul wung anaruk kwethet ton ngok ana kwakorronno ethet ton aꞌrupu appik okin opei nuthuki?
Oththa akkakkma ul ia Kapik kothikkiet woporot? Kapik kulluk akkakkma kin.
Oththa pen akkappakkma? OMiccie oIeccuo ipiot ana ipurokiettat nti ithio ana kwaik thokkun wothothari woKapik ana ook akkerene Kapik nti iaron.
Oththa akkapettoron nti ithongat thoMiccie? Thïrro mïkït nti ikaraki, thokinyai, thoccokot thiaki, tïï, thikkoik munthuri ana manna thokkuttat ngkꞌrittang ikukwiri?
Ammakka lokurrakot itti,
“Onïn thille nti ilon lang,
Onïn thikkoik ere lungkat ilathongutta.”
Aa, iaꞌrupu enni appik oron thonu puꞌran poIeccuo okkwi ipongotheron naꞌrupu ialkotheik.
Akka mponu noucce itti papu pella ipapettoron nti ilon loKapik, lakonnoka manna thio ana manna thikkoik ana manna uꞌrupa wothothïlettat woKapik ana manna uꞌrupa iokithak ana manna puꞌran pꞌrek.
Ana manna okonnoka papꞌrek iprïk ana pothothïrïn ana papꞌrek nti iaꞌrupu ia Kapik kokuꞌret ncik ana nothongat thoKapik ithaik iaMiccie oIeccuo Ili wonnon.
Mpaik pere lon ilaik ïcat tokït koMiccie ana mpaik pakannammikkot ana cïkït cin cakene itti lon len laik ïcat ngKanang ikupupure.
Mponu thiak nocïkït thoul win cannan ana thiak then thomma ocoꞌro nocïkït.
Akka oun ngka kin mpappongothe itti mpattattako ana opaꞌrettaik nti ilon loMiccie, nti ilon lopangkingon ithanïn thaul woIouth.
Okin thaul woIccereil ia Kapik kakkarot itti waka nyukul nyung inya kwokenet thrïk thung ana thonekket lon cik ana ethet kin tupan toKapik ana ethet kin lon lothonceꞌret lon cik.
Ul ittïttïk wathiki then ana oMiccie ngka kopul iponyi ana Kapik koul appik pokwontat nti iul wen, aKapik ethïethok cik thupuththuput. Amin.
Lakannoka itti Kapik kakorronno occot kït nolon ila konekketheik. Akka thiki thoIccereil appik thakannoka ul woIccereil appik.
Ana okorronno oka itti akka okin thathiki thAprein, okin appik thanyukul nyAprein. Anaruk “Thiki thang thaka thoppot ngkꞌran koIccaak.”
Elli lonu itti nyukul inyokwontat ngkathar koul ionyi akkakannoka thiki thoKapik anaruk nyukul inyonekkettanthet lon cik akkathiki thAprein.
Akka lon ilonekkettatheik lokat liꞌrettat ittina, “Mpakkaprttako ntan thuput thꞌrek nocaꞌri enci ana mpathiot oCcara akkwonu ukul.”
Okorronno oka menik tulluk anaruk oRepekka cakuruk pokwonot nyukul inyonat oththan pulukku ana ook pen ongappa ponnon oIccaak.
Anaruk akka laro larthuk okwonta ana manna okkot lon lokithak ana manna iloporot othakka itti alon loKapik oꞌrungkwot cik
okorronno oka ngngre ngꞌrek iokkattathe ioporot anaruk nti ilon iliꞌrettathe oRepekka itti, “Ukul irïk akkarekine opang ipotte.”
Ammakka lokurrakot iatham itti, “Mpongothe oIakup anaruk mpꞌrat oIcco.”
Oron thiꞌre kaththa? Kapik komma onceꞌret lon ciki? Okorronno oka menik kirrkkir.
Akka Kapik kiꞌrethe oMucca itti,
“Mpipo thiak thokkwi ipa mpongothe itti mpipo thiak then,
ana mpangat okkwi ipa mpongothe itti mpangat.”
Ittina lakannoka itti laka ammakka pul iponyi pongothe ana manna ila akwokwantot anaruk ammakka thiak thoKapik.
Akka atham woKapik wiꞌrethe oPoroun itti, “Mpothikkierung ili othakka itti anokene puꞌran pin iaung ana othakka itti akꞌran kin inako nocapu.”
Ittina Kapik kipo thiak thokkwi ipa kongothe itti kipo thiak then ana kwanthomie opilingon ma itha kwongothe itti kwanthomie ma.
Opilin nti ianon pamethin itti, “Ittina ngintha akka Kapik orukwenthet ton? Oththa akkaceꞌre lon ila Kapik kongothe itti kakkot?”
Anaruk onon oththan akka annipittot Kapik lon ila kongothe itti kakkot? “Papu ipa opït pokkothe pipittot opït itti ngkwokkothin ittina akainthai?”
Pul ipakkot api pakannoka ponu lon ikkun itti pakkot api ammakka kwongothe itti kwakkori? Ikaine nili akwokkot koporot ana ikaine ul nuthuk akwokkot kennangi?
Laka taththa amma Kapik kongothe itti kakene ul thua ka thung ana okene puꞌran pung, kaccokot cïkït kiththik noul ia kuat ka ken ana nothokïttoik itha kokat konu itti kakïttoik,
Kwokkothe elli akwothikkie thaꞌrthan thothrïk thung inako nan cannan noul iakwokene thiak thung okin ithokuccekittanthe thrïk thung cik nci maꞌrot.
Ana manna oron itha kwakkarot, okorronno oka ul wulluk woIouth anaruk ul iakannoka woIouth.
Ana ammakka kwokurrot iatham wopul iperntet lon loKapik oUcca itti,
“Mpakkaro kin itti ‘Ul win’ okin ithakannoka ul win,
ana mpakkaro kin itti, ‘Ul ia mpongothe’ okin itha mpakannoka pongothe,”
ana,
“Elli lakaik nokaꞌran na lokat liꞌrettathekin itti,
‘Onon thakannoka ul win,’
anaruk itti okin thakkaroko itti, ‘nyukul nyoKapik kothikkoik.’”
OIccaia pul ipernte lon loKapik perethe ul woIccereil itti,
“Amma maun moul woIccereil mantoka moppot ere thamur thorirok irapangka
okin ithokwentakot thotteik akkaꞌrettat.
Akka Kapik kakkot lon lung nocapu accokkot ana papenang.”
Ilen elli ammakka pul ipernte lon loKapik oIccaia pappiꞌret maꞌrot itti,
“Amma Kapik kokat kakorronno okwentineron thiki,
oron thakat ere ul wonokaꞌran koCcothum ana koKamura.”
Ittina oron thiꞌre taththa? Akka ul iakannoka woIouth iakannoka woporot tokït koKapik wiothe thoporot tokït koKapik. Okin thiothe thoporot tokït koKapik nthoccokot lon nomïkït.
Anaruk ul woIccereil iokat cik ammakot lon lothonceꞌret lon cik loMucca itti alothikkiekin thoporot tokït koKapik wakinniot thoporot then tokït koKapik.

Nthina itti akainthai? Laik menik akka wellat thoccokot lon loKapik nomïkït men anaruk okin thokat akin ome itti okin thathakka thoporot tokït koKapik nthokkot ngre. Ittina okin thomukkwathe “Noththok ipamukkietto.”
Ammakka lokurrakot itti,
“Katha mpanekket pothok nokaꞌran koCiun ipamukkwie ul
ana kancang ikallekkie ul.
Ana okkwi iponekkethe cïkït nolon lung ana kwakannothiettaik kirrkkir.”
Pangkingon, lon ila mpongothe nci nocïkït cannan ana aꞌrane Kapik ngaꞌrama itti aul woIccereil iot thoꞌrettat.
Mperet kin itti tat akka okin thongothe Kapik ngka ken kirrkkir, anaruk thongat Kapik then thakin thakinnina lon ilaik ïcat.
Ana inakka okin thomma thoka thoporot tokït koKapik ithaat noKapik, ana akin okwancot athen thellek, okin thakannangkot itti okin thathakka thoporot tokït koKapik.
OMiccie poceꞌret lon lothonceꞌret lon cik othakka itti aul appik ioccokothe lon loKapik nomïkït iot thoporot tokït koKapik.
OMucca perethe itti pul pathakka poporot tokït koKapik nthoccot kït nolon lothonceꞌret lon cik ngkathar engki, “Pul ipakkot lon elli kwaccot kït nan akkwaik ngkït thapat.”
Anaruk thikkoik nthoccokot lon nocïkït thiꞌre itti, “Kirrnni omet nocïkït cang itti, ‘Oththa akkakuꞌrot tothiꞌrot?’
” (othakka itti akwathona oMiccie ntan nocapu).
“Ana manna itti, ‘Oththa akkuo thothïrïn?’
” (othakka itti akwothurokie oMiccie nti ithio).
Anaruk lon len liꞌre taththa? “Lon loKapik laik iccik kang ana nothon thang ana nocïkït cang”
ilen lothoccokot lon nomïkït loKapik ilanïn thaik thangkene.
Ana ittina amma oung akkiꞌret nthon thang itti “OIeccuo ook Ili,” ana occokot lon nocïkït itti Kapik kurokierok nti ithio, ngkwaꞌrettat.
Akka ngkwaccokot lon loKapik ncïkït cang ana Kapik kothikkierung poporot ana ngkweret lon len nthon thang ana ngkwaꞌrettat.
Ana ammakka atham wiꞌret itti, “Okkwi iponekkethe cïkït naak kwakorronno othiettaik.”
Akka ul woIouth wakannoka threk noul iakannoka woIouth, okin thulukku ana Ili wulukku woul appik ioccokothe lon lung ana wethie ul appik ipittothok lon.
Akka “Okkwion ithaꞌra ngaꞌrama ngkꞌran kung, thaꞌrettat.”
Anaruk okin thaꞌranok ngaꞌrama taththa amma okin thommak? Ana okin thaccokot lon lung taththa amma okin thakannoccïkot lon ilerethok? Ana okin thaccïkot lon taththa amma lon lakannongkenetta kin?
Ana okin thangkene lon loKapik taththa amma okin thakannothïlat? Ammakka lokurrakot itti, “Ul woporot cannan ithongkene lon iloporot loIeccuo.”
Anaruk ul woIccereil wakannangkat lon iloporot loIeccuo appik. Akka oIccaia pul ipernte lon loKapik piꞌret itti, “Ili, oththa akkoccokothe lon nocïkït ilanïn theret?”
Ittina thoccokot lon nocïkït thanthan nothoccïkot lon, ana thoccïkot then tholon ilongkenettat loMiccie.
Anaruk mpipitto itti okin thakannoccïkori? Okin thoccïkothe, akka atham wiꞌret itti,
“Poꞌre pen peot nocapu naꞌran appik
ana lon len leot nocapu ncik appik.”
Mpappipitto attang itti ul woIccereil wakinnina loni? Cittokït oMucca piꞌre itti,
“Mpakorronnonon annua ka koul iotte wonomothok mꞌrek,
Mpakorronnonon annua ka koul iommaik.”
Ana oIccaia pul ipernte lon loKapik piꞌret lon nci nokkït itti,
“Mpincathe nul iokat cik akorronno okwariccathin,
Mpokenet ul ka kin iakannipitton.”
Anaruk oIccaia perekathe ul woIccereil akwiꞌrekat itti, “Mponthinthet ul nyaun kapik nokkonokki iakannoccïkot lon lin ana ionthomat ma.”
Mpipitto itti, Kapik kꞌrat ul wungi? Annoka menik oun ngka kin poul woIccereil nothiki thAprein ana nopothok poPeniemin.
Kapik kakannꞌra ul wung ia kwakkarot. Onon thomma tat akka atham wiꞌret aeret oIlia akka kwaꞌrettot iKapik akwaꞌrettine ul woIccereili?
Akkwiꞌret itti, “Ili, okin thongwot ul wang wꞌrek wothernte lon lang ana okin thokïttot nuꞌrot naꞌrama nang ana oun akkokwentakot pellek ana okin thongothe itti okin thakkwothin.”
Ana Kapik kothïanthok tit tat? “Mpoꞌrumot noul athar weꞌreꞌrapuruk (7,000) iakannaꞌrane oPaal ngaꞌrama.”
Ana inenni ul waik iokwentakot wotte ia Kapik kakkarot nthoporot thung.
Ittina amma thakkarako thaik nthoporot thoKapik ana thakannoka ngngre ana amma Kapik kokat akkakkaro ul, akokatha ngre ngen menik thoporot thoKapik thakannokat thoporot.
Ngintha akkokakatheik? Akka ul woIccereil wakinniat lon ilakin thokat akin okwancot. Ul iotteik akkiothe anaruk iokwentakot wokat wonthomiettat ma,
ammakka lokurrakot iatham itti,
“Kapik kethet kin ngatheꞌre ngonu ngore
ana kït kakannimmaik
ana unu wokannoccïkot cik manna inenni.”
Ana oThauth piꞌret itti,
“Akuppuꞌrung kothuꞌrit ken oka tupu ana loꞌrak lothiꞌriththa,
ana papu ipammukkietto akin occo lon ilakin thonu itti okin thacco,
Akït ken ïꞌrïmat othakka itti akin okorronno immaik
ana aucul wen uꞌrumako thupuththuput.”

Mpappipitto itti, ul woIouth wommukkot itti wapukko aꞌrungkat nocapu thupuththupuri? Annoka menik anaruk nti ilon len ilokithak thoꞌrettat thakkakanthet ul iakannoka ul woIouth othakka itti aul woIccereil ipo noꞌre noul iakonnoka woIccereil.
Anaruk amma lon ilokithak loul woIouth lonu itti thaꞌrthan nocapu ana thapukko then thonu itti thaꞌrthan thoul iakannoka woIouth, thaꞌrthan thaka taththa amma wokkaprttakot ntan appik.
Mpaik perenenon, onon ul iannoka ul woIouth ana ammakka mpapul pothothïlettat poIeccuo iperene ul iakannoka woIouth, mpopirat noka nore ngin
othakka itti anipie ul win wꞌrek noꞌre othakka itti anoꞌret opilingon nti iakin.
Akka Kapik kopaꞌrinet ul woIouth cik, kokkathe thuruko nul wꞌrek nocapu. Ana akka kopakkethe kuꞌri cik nul woIouth, thaka thikkoik thoul illet.
Amma mïl motte nopangken imettathe Kapik mupupure, amꞌrek maka mupupure appik. Ana amma laka lopira lupupure ana uꞌri wen waka wupupure cakuruk.
Amma uꞌri wopira wꞌrek wokat wongattatheik, ana onon uꞌri wopira ipumothe ncik wurakothe nopira ipettat ittina onon thaik thupokko annolaka ithun nuꞌri wopira ipettat,
nokorronno ipinthet uꞌri wopira ka thoura ipettat amma onon akkokkothe menik annoccot kït nan itti onon thaik thakorronno othïngkariet laka tan anaruk laka akkaik lathïngkariet non tan.
Anaruk ngkwiꞌre itti, “Uꞌri warongattatheik othakka itti anurakot nokaꞌran ken.”
Ïcat. Warongattatheik akka wakannoccokot lon nocïkït anaruk ngkwoccokothe lon nocïkït. Kirrnni ipot ka thoura anaruk ipi nꞌre.
Akka amma Kapik kakkannonekket uꞌri wopira cik ipettat kakannonekkethung cik cakuruk.

Nantokatha tat akka Kapik koporot ana konthomathe nolon, konthomathe nakwion ithapukkot anaruk konu thiak thon amma oung akkoꞌrungkothe ithoporot thung. Anaruk amma ngkwꞌrat ana ngkwamothakot cik cakuruk.
Ana amma okin thakannꞌra oꞌrungkot nothoccokot lon nomïkït, okin thurakot akka Kapik konu puꞌran itti kappurot kin attang.
Ana amma ngkwokeccatheik nopira poCeiththun ipumothe ncik ana ngkurakothe nopira poCeiththun ipettat, laka taththa nouꞌri wopira ipettat amma wongattatheik ana wurakothe nopira pen ipakin thokat nan.
Pangkingon, mpongothe itti onon thina kumitta kolon loKapik othakka itti annokorronno ipot ka thoura. Ul woIccereil wokat wonthomat ma mono aul iokat iakannoka ul woIouth occokat lon loKapik.
Ul woIccereil appik wathoꞌrettat ammakka lokurrakot itti,
“Okkwi ipaꞌret ul panthan nokaꞌran koCiun icarak coman coUruccelim.
Ana kwapaꞌre lon ilokithak cik nothiki thoIakup.
Ana thonekket lon cik thïn enthi ïnaththungon
amma anonekot kin lon ilokithak len.”
Ul woIccereil woppot wꞌrat lon loKapik, ana elli loporot nanon ana nolon loul iakkarakot okin thongakothe nti ilon lothiki.
Akka thakkaro ana thethet nuthuk thoKapik thakannꞌrako.
Onon ul iakannoka woIouth thokat thꞌrat Kapik caꞌri cꞌrek. Anaruk inenni ul woIouth wꞌrat lon loKapik ana onon thokenettat thiak.
Ana ittina okin thꞌrat lon loKapik othakka itti akin ipako thiak then cakuruk ammakka Kapik kipot thiak thon.
Kapik kopaꞌret ul maik appik, ꞌra occïkot lon lung othakka itti akipo thiak then appik.
Kapik akkonu thaꞌrthan ana thinaik nti ica thrïk ana thina lon
ana ook iparon thomma thonceꞌret lon ncik thung
ana omma thokkot lon thung ana athar wung.
“Opilin paik pina ngatheꞌre ngoKapiki?
Ana manna opilin paik piꞌret Kapik itti okkothe ittinai?”
“Opilin paik pethet Kapik papꞌreki itti akwathokketta ntiri?”
Akka nti iaak ana ook ngngin aꞌrupu wapakkinthok appik.
Athrïk oka noKapik thupuththuput. Amin.

Pangkingon, mperenon nthiak itha Kapik kongotheron ngngin itti onon thethet Kapik kakon ammakka aꞌrupu wothokiot ngüccük cik ipupure iapirie Kapik noka, kathar engki ika anon aꞌrane Kapik ngaꞌrama ngngin.

Nokorronno othakka ammakka ul wonocapu enci anaruk noprttakoik nthoportto thokwarttikot cik thon, annina akka annenekke ana ina lon ila Kapik kongothe, ana thoporot thung ithapiriek noka ana thella lon lokithak.

Ana nthoporot thoKapik itha kwethin, mpiꞌret non appik itti nokorronno occot kït nokakon itti nthoporot cannan, anon thakannoka thoporot anaruk nokwarttikot cik papenang anokkat lon ammakka thoccokot tholon nocïkït thoKapik itha Kapik kethet non.
Ana ammakka pul ponu ka kulukku ana ka konu nyaun ana unu ana tacok ana kinyce ana kït ana ca anaruk ka ken konu ngre kurekkurek,
ana ittina iaMiccie oron ithoppot thakkot ka kulukku ana oron thiꞌrikikkarothe tan appik kurekkurek.
Oron thonu lon kurekkurek ammakka Kapik kikketheron nuthuk nthoporot thung. Amma Kapik kethung thuꞌre itti ngkwerene ul lon loKapik aere nthoccokot lon nocïkït ammakka Kapik kethung.
Amma thoreko ngre akworeko ana amma thongkene akwongkene,

ana amma thomereket ul llon iloporot, akwomereket ana amma thaꞌrintinthet ul aꞌrupu iella aꞌrupu cik akwethet nycïkït coporot ana amma thoka ili akwoka okkwi ipakkot lon nthiak ana nthongat nocïkït ana amma okene thiak akwokene nthongarot.
Thongarot thonu itti thaka ïcarïcat. Nꞌra lon ilokithak annoccokot kït nolon iloporot.
Nothiarne cik appik karkko nyukul nyoththan pulukku ana othiarneik.
Nokorronno ipo ngore iire, anaruk norekine Ili ngka kon appik.
Nopira noka nothoꞌrïkot cik thon, ana occokot mïkït ilon ilokithak ana aꞌra ngaꞌrama appinappin nthoccokot lon nocïkït.
Nittarot ul iupupure woKapik naꞌrupu iakin ipitto ana okkinthet lon loporot.
Nipittot Kapik akethïe ul iakkiet non thiak ana okorronno attatta kin.
Nopira noka nnul iaik wapira noka ana oo nnul iaik woo.
Nikkoik tothun thoporot. Nokorronno ipot ka thoura anaruk noccïkarot ana annikkoik nnul appik iaꞌrthan ana iakannoka iaꞌrthan.
Nokorronno okke lon ilokithak llon ilokithak. Noꞌrumoik annokkot lon iloporot tokït koul appik.
Amma kathar kaik ammakka akatha ngka kang annoka ikuꞌri nnul appik.
Pangkingon, nokorronno okketta anaruk nokirrninthet Kapik lon len akka lokurrakot iatham itti, “Kapik kiꞌret itti thokke thaun akka akke ana oun akka akkiet ul thiak iokkiethe pangken thiak.”
Okorronno oka menik,
“Amma pul ipanon thonu thoꞌrak paat, ethet thuꞌrit apoꞌrko
amma pica pokkwothok, aethok ngꞌri akwïkko.
Akka amma akkot ittina ngkwaik pathiek cik.”
kirrnni okorronno lon ilokithak itti lalkothung anaruk alkothe llon iloporot.
Ul appik wonu itti waccïkot nili akka ngili appik nganthan noKapik. Ngili ia nili non nonu inenni ngaKapik akkethet kin.
Ittina okkwi ipꞌra lon lonili, kwꞌrat lon ila Kapik konekketheik ana okkwion ithakkot menik thanane ka kung thakkamako.
Akka nili nakorronno ipie okkwion ithakkot lon loporot nꞌre anaruk nipie okkwion ithakkot lon lokithak nꞌre. Ngkwongothe itti ngkwakannona nꞌre nonili? okkothe lon iloporot ana okin thamerekethung.

Akka okin ul iarekine Kapik iakkinthung lon loporot. Anaruk amma ngkwokkothe lon lokithak, aipo nꞌre akka nili nakorronno onneko iꞌrittang iukwirukwit nuthuk. Akka okin ul iarekine Kapik, okin thothïllathe itti okin thakke thua ka thoKapik noul iakkot lon moloko.
Ittina loporot itti oron thaccïkot lon lonili annoka tulluk itti oron thapellene thakkmako anaruk oron thapellene mïkït monon cakuruk.
Ilen akka anon ikkenthet nili akucci wothaꞌrntot akka nili narekine Kapik amma okin okkot ngre papenang.

Nethet ul kamucu ikakin thonu nanon, amma ngkwonu itti ngkwethet akucci wothaꞌrntot aethet, ana amma aꞌrupu arttot nan aethet ana amma thothia cik aethet ana amma thothiakine cik athiane okkwion ithonu itti okin thathiakine cik.
Apul ella nti ianon iponu kamucu noka. Nongarot appik tulluk naꞌrungkwot ongarot akka okkwi ipongothe opang pꞌrek pomarttot lon lothonceꞌret lon cik appik.
Akka lon ilonthomat ilattul iliꞌret itti, “kirrnni aꞌro nul iari ittat ana kirrnni okkwot pul ana kirrnni omunye ana kirrnni ona thiak thaꞌrupu woul,”
ana lon ilonthomat ilaik laꞌrntakothe ilon lulukku itti, “Ongathe pul pꞌrek ammakka ngkwongothe ka kang.”
Akka thongarot thakinnie pul ponocuruk ka kongo. Ittina thongarot thamartto lon lothonceꞌret lon cik.

Nokkot elli, annina lon locaꞌri icaron thaik nan. Caꞌri caat icanon urutta ngngin nti inthe pꞌrin akka maꞌri mothoꞌret makko napuththut iccik konnon, nnomaꞌri morokït akka oron thoccokothe lon nomïkït loIeccuo.
Cik caik cakatto ana cïngkï caik cappo. Ittina ton opaꞌrine ngre ngorïꞌrïmak cik, aron oreko ngre ngoricïngkï.

Ntrun okkot lon ngkathar ikoporot ilonu itti lakkattat icïngkï, kirrnni okorronno ngapak itti ngakkwothung ana okorronno aꞌro nul nuthuk ana manna llmoꞌre ana illillakorit nnul ana okorronno okkinthet ul lon ilokithak ana noꞌre.
Anaruk nomakot lon loIli oIeccuo oMiccie, nokorronno iꞌrikot occot kït nolon loka kon itti onon thamana lon ilokithak.
Nongat okkwion ithian ithoccokot lon nomïkït, nokorronno akkmat kin nolon loka ken.
Thoccokot lon nocïkït thopul pꞌrek thakorronnok akwoꞌrko thuꞌrit ncik appik anaruk opilin iponu thoccokot lon nocïkït thotteik thakorronnok akwoꞌrko aꞌrupu wulluk iarako.

Okkwi ipaꞌrko aꞌrupu ncik appik ponu itti kwakannokkot ngure nakkwi ipakannoꞌrko aꞌrupu ncik appik ana okkwi ipakannoꞌrko aꞌrupu appik ponu itti kwakannakkma okkwi ipaꞌrko aꞌrupu ncik appik akka Kapik kongothok menik.
Oung oththa akka ame itti ngkwakkma pul ipareko popul pꞌrek? Opït pung akkiꞌre itti pokkothe lon lokithak ana manna loporot. Kwakkoik akka Kapik konu puꞌran itti kakkiek cik.
Pul pꞌrek pame itti caꞌri cꞌrek coporot cannan nocaꞌri cꞌrek, apilingon ome itti maꞌri appik mungkwarot. Laka loporot itti pul ponu itti pana lon lung lulukku ica ila kwongothe.

Okkwi ipaccot kït nocaꞌri culukku, kwaik papirie Ili Kapik noka. Ana okkwi ipaꞌrko kapa kwaik papirie Kapik noka akka okin thapirie Kapik noka akin tharuthuk oꞌrkoik. Ana okkwion ithꞌrat oꞌrko aꞌrupu wꞌrek okin thapirie Kapik noka.
Akka pul pella ipakkine ka kung cik pellek ana pul pella ipine ka kung pellek.
Akka amma oron thakkoik oron thakkine Ili cik ana amma oron thille ana oron thillene Ili. Ittina amma oron thantikkoik ana manna ille oron thoIli.
Akka oMiccie piot nti ilon elli ana kurokathe nti ithio itti akwoka Ili woul illet ana iaik ngkït thapat.
Ittina ngintha akka opilingon nti ianon akkmane opangon? Ana ngintha akka opilingon nti ianon okkot ngure napangon? Oron appik thathocoꞌro tokït koprrok pothakkma poKapik.
Lokurrakot itti,
“Ili wiꞌret itti, Inakka mpaik, ul appik nocapu wonu itti wirrinin cik,
ana luꞌre len appik liꞌre itti Kapik kaKapik.”
Ana ittina ul appik waKapik ipittot lon ilakin thokkettethe.
Ittina ton ocoꞌro nti ithakkmaro anaruk ton okorronno unukkwinthet opang ponongon kathar.
Ana ammakka pul ipaik iIli oIeccuo, mpina kicce itti thuꞌrit thella ithokithak ngka kung. Anaruk amma pul pakatha itti papu pokithak ana paka pokithak naak.
Amma ngkwokkinthet opangkang lon ilokithak naꞌrupu iaꞌrko ngkwaik pakonnokkot lon nthongarot nocïkït. kirrnni okïtto opangkang nthuꞌrit ipa Miccie pinet.
kirrnni okorronno lon ilakatha itti loporot, alere lon ilokithak.
Akka ngili ngoKapik ngakannoka thoꞌrko thuꞌrit ana thïkko alepꞌrek tulluk anaruk ngolon ilocoꞌrotheik ana ngothomicco ana ngothopira noka iKanang ikupupure.
Akka amma pul iporekinet oMiccie ngre ammakka engi, Kapik kapira noka naak ana ul wangathok cakuruk akka Kapik kongothok.
Ittina tun okkot lon ilana thomicco ana ilïꞌrïkarottan tothun.
Nokorronno okïtto ngre ngoKapik nti ilon lothuꞌrit. Akka thuꞌrit appik thoporot anaruk lokithak itti pul paꞌrko thuꞌrit ithakkinthet opangon thꞌrek lon ilokithak.
Loporot itti ngkwakorronno oꞌrko kapa ana okorronno ngapak ana okorronno inot papꞌrek ipapaꞌre opangkang cik nti ilon loIli Kapik.
Ittina lon ila ngkwoccokothe nocïkït nolon elli angwothe nocïkït cang ana Kapik. Loporot cannan nakkwion ithakorronno okïthakie ka ken nolon ila kwangkothe.
Anaruk Kapik kakkma pul iponu mïkït meꞌrarit akka kwaik pakannoꞌrkoik nthoccokot lon Kapik nocïkït. Akka lon appik ilakkot nthella thoccokot lon loKapik nocïkït lalon ilokithak.
Oron ithopollothe ithoccokot tholon loKapik nocïkït thonu itti oron thittarot ul iarthuk opollot ithoccokot lon loKapik nomïkït ana okoronnopirie ka konnon noka.
Anaruk ton okkot lon ilapirie opang ponnongon noka othakka itti aron upotho kin ithoccokot lon nomïkït then.
Akka manna oMiccie pakannopirie ka kung noka anaruk ammakka lokurrakot iatham itti, “Kꞌret ikakin thocungkwot non kapothe naun.”
Akka lon appik ilokat lokurrakot iatham maꞌrot itti alongkeneron cik othakka itti nthoccokot mïkït ilon ana nthittararot thaatham woKapik aron ona thoꞌrïkot cik.
AKapik ikethettot thoccokot mïkït ilon ana thittararot ethet non Kanang ikakorronnonon annoka tothun ammakka ul iammakot oMiccie oIeccuo,
othakka itti aron ethet Kapik ana oththan poIli oIeccuo oMiccie thrïk ncïkït culukku ana mpoꞌre pulukku.
Ittina noccïkararot ammakka oMiccie poccïkothenon othakka itti annethet Kapik thrïk.
Akka mpiꞌret non itti oMiccie pothakkat pul ipareko poul woIouth nti ilon loKapik ilaik ïcat akwokene itti Kapik koꞌrumot nolon ila konekketheik itti kakkinthet thiki then
othakka itti aul iakannoka woIouth ethet Kapik thrïk nti ithiak itha kwipinetton ammakka lokurrakot iatham itti,
“Ittina mpapiranung noka nti iul iakonnoka woIouth,
Mpamereket kꞌran kang ngkunye.”
Liꞌret attang itti,
“Nopira noka nnul wung onon ithakonnoka woIouth.”
Ana attang,
“Nopirane Ili noka, onon ithakonnoka woIouth appik,
Nongwinok unye wothomereket onon appik.”
Ana pul pothernte lon loKapik oIccaia piꞌret attang itti,
“Pul pꞌrek panthan nti ithiki thoIecce,
okkwi ipanthan akwathakkma ul nomothok appik,
ul iakonnoka woIouth appik wana thoꞌrïkot cik iaak.”
AKapik kothoꞌrïkot, ethet non thopira noka ana thomicco ammakka onon thonekkethe cïkït naak, othakka itti anon ona thoꞌrïkot cik thoppot, mpuꞌran poKanang ikupupure.
Pangkingon, oun ngka kin pina itti onon thonu lon loppot loporot ana onon thina lon ncik appik ana onon thina ittararot llon appik.
Anaruk mpokurrinet non lon lꞌrek ncinokkït othakka itti anokwarikiet non lon len attang nti ilon lothoporot itha Kapik kethin

othakka itti anoka pul iparekine oIeccuo iul ikannoka woIouth. Mpaik pareko karkko pul ponoppan toKapik, ipangkene lon iloporot loIeccuo othakka itti aul iakannoka ul woIouth oka ere aꞌrupu iettat Kapik nuthuk ia kongothe iopiriettat ngKanang ikupupure.
Ittina mponu lon itti mpipot ka thoura oMiccie oIeccuo ngngin ngngre ia mpaik pakkinthet Kapik.
Mpakanneret lon lꞌrek aththik anaruk mperet lon ila Miccie oIeccuo pokkiethin itti akwokene ul iakannoka ul woIouth itti athiane Kapik cik ngngre ia mpokkothe ana llon ila mperet
mpuꞌran polon ilommaththik ana mpuꞌran poKanang ikupupure. Ittina nci nokaꞌran koUruccelim okkette nocik coLirikkun mpomarttot thongkene tholon iloporot loMiccie.
Ana ittina mpokat anoccot kït nan itti mpangkene lon iloporot loIeccuo nokaꞌran ika ul wakannoccïkot lon loMiccie othakka itti anokorronno uno nomillang mopilin.
Mpokkothe lon omakot lon ammakka lokurrakot itti,
“Okkwion ithapilin pakannerenekin lon lung aththik thimma,
ana okkwion ithakannoccïkot lon lung aththik thina.”
Katha elli akkocottittorin maꞌri moppot itti mpakannainenon.
Anaruk inenni mpella ngre cik tentre pꞌrin nomoꞌrong men anaruk mpongothe nci maꞌrot itti mpainenon anathomïrïkot non.
Ana mpaik paꞌrïkot cik itti mpakatha non amma aneo noththok poIcppania anon ittarothin amma aneo than aron thikkot cik ntit papotte.
Anaruk inenni mpaik paeo nokaꞌran koUruccelim anothorekine ul iupupure woKapik.
Akka ul woKapik nocik coMakthonia ana coKrik wongothe itti waꞌrntinthet ul iella aꞌrupu nti iul woKapik nokaꞌran koUruccelim.

Okin thokat thongothe itti okin thakkot, ana ïcarïcat okin thonu itti okin thakkot. Akka amma ul iakannoka woIouth woccot thethïetta ithun okin oul woIouth, ittina ul iannoka woIouth wonu itti wittarot ul woIouth iella aꞌrupu cik.
Ana amma mpomarttot lon elli mono anethet kin aꞌrupu wen iamponanet kin mpakko nanon amma aneo noththok poIcppania.
Mpina itti amma anainenon mpanthan nthethïe thoMiccie appik.
Pangkingon mpipittot non ngkꞌran koIeccuo oMiccie ana nthongarot thoKanang ikupupure itti onon thacoꞌrothin ithokinya thin nthaꞌrane Kapik ngaꞌrama nti ilon lin.
Naꞌra ngaꞌrama itti aKapik oꞌrethin nti inyaun nyoul ikonnoccokot lon loKapik noththok poIouthia ana itti opangkingon ithupupure thoKapik tentre ongat ngre ngin nokaꞌran koUruccelim.
Othakka itti anainenon popirat noka ana athomirikot non thin oka thoporot nanon.
AKapik kothomicco oka nanon appik, Amin.
Mpongothe itti mpiꞌret non lon lopang ponnon ipopari oPpipa iparekine ul ioccokothe lon loIeccuo nokaꞌran koKangkkaria.

Mpiꞌret non itti nikkiek cik ngkꞌran koIli ammakka oron ikikkie opang ponnongon cik ithupupure thoKapik ana annittarothok naꞌrupu ia kwongothe itti onon thittarothok ngngin akka kwittarothe ul woppot ana ittarothin cakuruk.
Nomicco oPricikkila ana oKkila, onïn thaik thareko ïnaththut ire ngoMiccie oIeccuo.
Okin thokat cik thille nti ilon lin. Mpopirat noka nti ilon len ana ul cakuruk appik ioccokothe lon loIeccuo iannoka ul woIouth.
Nomicco ul ioccokothe lon loIeccuo ianon thaik thaꞌrntattakot tuan thanen.
Nomicco opuruko pin Apiniththoc ook ipoccokothe lon loMiccie cittokït nocik cAccia.
Nomicco oMeriom iporekinet non cannan.
Nomicco Anthroinikkoc ana oIuniac, kuꞌri kin ana okin ithokat ikorrkkor okin ul wothothïlettat woIeccuo iinako cannan okin thoccokothe lon loMiccie tokït naun.
Nomicco Ampilioththoc okkwi ipa mpongothe ilon loIli.
Nomicco Aropanoc okkwi ipanïn thokat ïnoreko ilon loMiccie ana opuruko pin cannan oIciththakic.
Nomicco Apellec okkwi ipennekkettat ana kwinako itti kwaik ithoccokot lon loMiccie.
Nomicco Ariciththoploc ana ul woruan thanung.
Nomicco oIrothion kuꞌri kin.
Nomicco ul iaron thaik unnaththut ilon loIli woruan toNirikkiccuc.
Nomicco oThthirippina ana oThthirippocca, ul iari enni worekot cannan ilon loIli.
Nomicco opuruko pin cannan oPirccic, ook pul ipopari pꞌrek iporekot cannan ilon loIli.
Nomicco oRuppuc ipa Ili wakkarot, ana onnan ipokat ere oIaia pin cakuruk.
Nomicco Aiccinikkriththoc ana oPpilion ana Armac ana oPeththropac ana Armic ana opang ponnongon ithakin thaik aththut.
Nomicco oPpilolokoc ana oCulia ana oNirioc ana opang ipopari, ana Alumpac ana opang ponnongon ithupupure thoKapik ithakin thaik aththut.
Nomiccaro nthomiccaro ithupupure. Ul ioccokothe lon loIeccuo wonaꞌran appik waik womicco non.
Pangkingon, mperenenon itti onon thaꞌrumoik nakkwion ithillillo iul ana ongkene lon ilapaꞌre thongkeneik ithanon thongkenettat. Nopaꞌroik nti iccik ken.
Akka ul iammakka enni waik wakanno orekine Ili oMiccie wonnon anaruk okin thaik tharekine karak ken. Okin thammikkot ul ana erene lon liththiot.
Ul appik woccïkothe lon lothoccïkot lon thon, ana ittina mpopirat noka cannan nanon anaruk mpongothe itti onon thinaik papenang, annina ngimpen akkoporot ana ella lon cik ilokithak.
Kapik kothomicco kakakꞌrot pul pothopulut cik iracok ton nomaꞌri motte.
Athoporot thoIli wonnon oIeccuo oka nanon.
OThimiththaoc okkwi ipanïn thaik thareko paik pamicco non, ana oLukkiuoc ana oIaccun ana oCcuccipiaththarac kuꞌri kin.
Oun oThtharththioc ipokurrot kaꞌramacak engki, mpamicco non ngkꞌran koIli.
OKaioc okkwi ipikkierin cik ana ul ioccokothe lon loIeccuo appik paik pamicco non. Aracththoc okkwi ipaccokot akucci wonokaꞌran ana opang ponnon oKkuarththoc thaik thamicco non.
Athoporot thoIli wonnon oIeccuo oMiccie oka nanon appik.
Athrïk thoKapik ikakkot lon ncik appik onemot non cik ilon iloporot loIeccuo oMiccie peret ngngin ammakka kumitta ikakkwokenet ikamuꞌruttakot ncik ncimaꞌrot thupuththuput.
Anaruk lummothe ncik inenni ila ul wothernte lon loKapik wokurrot ana ul wina nan appik ammakka Kapik kothupuththuput kiꞌret itti aul appik othianeik ana occokot lon lung.
Thrïk thaka thoKapik pellek ikina cik oIeccuo oMiccie ngngin thupuththuput. Amin.
I Corinthians: Oun oPoluc ipa Kapik kakkarot itti mpathakka pul pothothïlettat poMiccie oIeccuo ammakka Kapik kongothe ana opang ponnon oCocaththanic.

Lon elli laine ul ioccokothe lon loIeccuo nokaꞌran koKurunthuc ana okkwion ithaik iaMiccie oIeccuo ana ithakkarakot naꞌran appik akin oka thupupure ana okkwion ithaꞌrane Ili wonnon oIeccuo ngaꞌrama, Ili wen ana wonnon.
Athoporot ana thomicco nnAngappa ponnon ana Ili oIeccuo oMiccie oka nanon.
Mpapirane Kapik noka appin appin nti ithoporot thung ithakkwethet non nti ilon loMiccie oIeccuo ilanon thaik tit.
Akka onon thothakkat aꞌrthan iaak llon ammakka itti nthere ithannere ngngin appik ana ithinaik ithanon thinaik ngngin appik.
Akka thimma lon ngkït thïn ana therene non lon loMiccie thaik ïcat.
Ittina onon thakorronno oka thella thethettat nuthuk thoKanang ikupupure koKapik anon thaik thaꞌrikot Ili wonnon oIeccuo oMiccie akwokkaprttako ntan.
Kwaꞌrumo nanon thonthomat puccuk anon othakkakat thella thorukwettat cik nocaꞌri ica Ili wonnon oIeccuo oMiccie okkaprttako ntan.
Kapik ikakkarot non annoka tothun nukul wung oIeccuo oMiccie Ili wonnon kaccot kït nolon ila kwiꞌret.
Pangkingon, mperenenon ngkꞌran koIli wonnon oIeccuo oMiccie itti onon thïꞌrïkarot lon tothun othakka itti anon okorronno illillakorit ana annona lon lulukku ana ona thokwarttikot cik thulukku.
Pangkingon, opilingon nti iul woKalua thiꞌrethin itti onon thaik thaꞌrettutto.

Ila mpongothe itti mpiꞌre itti opilingon nti ianon thiꞌre itti, “Mpamakot oPoluc” ana opilingon iꞌre itti, “Mpamakot Apolloc” ana opilingon thꞌrek iꞌre itti, “Mpamakot oPuththuruc,” ana opilingon iꞌre itti, “Mpamakot oMiccie.”
OMiccie pillillakot tiri? OPoluc akkokkuttathe nothapak nti ilon loni? Onon thoccot mamuthie ngkꞌran koPoluci?
Mpopirat noka akka mpakarrnnethet opilin mamuthie nti ianon, mpethet oKkricppoc pulluk ana oKaioc,
Ittina pul pella ipiꞌre itti kwoccot mamuthie ngkꞌran kin.
Ana cakuruk mpethet ul woruan toIciththipanac mamuthie ana mpomma amma mpethet opilin pꞌrek cakuruk.

Akka oMiccie pokat pakorronno othïothin itti mpathethet ul mamuthie anaruk itti mpathongkene lon iloporot loIeccuo, okorronno oka nthinaik nti ica thopul iponyi anaruk anina nan itti thiot thoMiccie nothapak thakarrnno urat puꞌran cik ntit.
Akka lon loMiccie lothiot nothapak laul wella kït ken iaik wurat cik, anaruk oron ithoꞌrettathe thakatha itti puꞌran poKapik.
Akka lokurrakot itti,
“Mpakïtto thinaik nti ica thoul iꞌre itti winaik nti ica
ana okïtto nyatheꞌre nyokkwion ithiꞌre itti okin thinaik cannan.”
Pul paik kartha ipinaik nti ica? Pul paik kartha ipangkene lon lothonceꞌret lon cik? Kapik kothikkiet thinaik nti ica thonocapu ncik appik thommaik.
Ana Kapik nthinaik nti ica thung kimmat itti capu ncik appik cakarrnninak nthinaik thopul iponyi, koꞌrekathe ul appik ioccokothe lon nthongkene thïn ithakorronno oka thonthomat.
Ul woIouth wongothe itti okin thimma lon ilommaththik loKapik ana ul iannoka woIouth wakwariccat lon lothinaik ntica
anaruk onïn thangkene lon lothiot thoIeccuo nothapak, thongkene then thonthomat noul woIouth ana ul iakorronno oka woIouth wokatha itti thongkene then thellat lon cik.
Anaruk okkwion ithaKapik kakkarot ammakka ul woIouth ana ul iakorronno oka woIouth thina itti oMiccie puꞌran poKapik ana thinaik nti ica thoKapik.
Akka thommaik thoKapik thathinaik nothinaik thopul, ana thomma lon thung thonthomat nathopul iponyi.

Pangkingon nokwarttikot itti onon thokat tat caꞌri ica Kapik kakkarot non. Oplingon thotteik nti ianon thokat thinaik nti ima nocapu ncik appik, ana okin thotteik nti ianon thonat puꞌran ana okin thotteik nti ianon thokwontat thaaꞌrthan.
Anaruk Kapik kummot aꞌrupu iommaik wonocapu ncik appik akothie ul cik ngngin inaik nti ima ana kummot aꞌrupu wonocapu ncik appik iakannoka wonthomat akothie ul cik ngngin ionthomat.
Kapik kummot lon ilaul wella lon len ana wopaꞌrinet cik nocapu ncik appik, ana aꞌrupu iellaik, othakka itti akokïtto aꞌrupu iaul okatha itti ien akkoporot.
Kapik kokkothe lon elli apul ella ipipot ka thoura tokït kung.
Ana elli akka onon thokanet iaMiccie oIeccuo ook ipothakkanet ton thinaik ntica thoKapik ana thoporot tokït koKapik ana thupupure ana thelikkako thonnon.
Ilen akka lokurrakinet iatham woKapik itti, “okkwi ipongothe itti kwipot ka thoura akwokkot, akwipot ka thoura Ili oIeccuo ngngin.”
Pangkingon, akka mpainet non mpakarrnnaine non othakka itti anokenenon itti mpinaik nti ica, mpaththerenenon lon loKapik.
Akka mpappongothe itti mpammat lon lꞌrek akka mpokat ithoꞌrkït thon aneret lon loIeccuo oMiccie pulluk ipiothe nothapak.
Mpainet non ampothiat cik ana amponu nꞌre ana anokkwe ka.
Lon lin ana thongkene thin thokat thakannoka thothinaik nti ica ana mpellat lon lopeththere anaruk mpokat pittarakothe mpuꞌran poKanang ikupupure koKapik,
othakka itti athoccokot lon loKapik nomïkït thon okorronno oka nolon lothinaik nti ica thopul iponyi anaruk nopuꞌran poKapik.
Onïn theret lon lothinaik nti ica iul ina lon loKapik kicce anaruk okorronno oka thinaik nti ica tholuput elli ana manna okorronno oka thonili enni inamattat.
Anaruk onïn theret thinaik nti ica thoKapik ithamuꞌruttakot ncik itha Kapik konekkenthet thrïk thonnon cik acaꞌri carthuk okuꞌrtta ncik.
Pul pella nti inili noluput elli pinat, akka amma okin thaththina okin thakorrnno okkwothe Ili wothrïk thonnon nothapak.
Anaruk ammakka lokurrakot itti,
“Pul pella ipimmat
ana kunu kella ikaccïkothe,
ana ngathꞌre ngella iokat nginat
ilaKapik konekkinthet okkwion cik ithongothe lon lung.”
Anaruk Kapik kokenet ton nan ngKanang kung.
Kanang ikupupure kakwariccat cik iaꞌrupu appik ana manna ciki icarak caꞌrupu woKapik.
Oththa nti iul akkina thokwarttikot cik thopul pꞌrek? kanang kung kulluk akkina ikaik iaak. Ana menik cakuruk pul pella ipina thokwarttikot cik thoKapik, Kanang koKapik kulluk akkina.
Oron thakorronno occo Kanang konocapu ncik appik anaruk oron thoccot Kanang noKapik othakka itti aron ina lon ilaKapik kethet ton nuthuk.
Ilen elli akka onïn ere, okorronno oka lon ilongkenettat nïn nthinaik nti ica thopul iponyi anaruk llon ilongkenettat nïn ngKanang koKapik. Onïn theret lon ilaik ïcat llon loKanang koKapik.
Pul ipella Kanang koKapik pakarrnnangkot lon loKanang koKapik ilao noKapik akka lon len localang naak ana kwakarrnnina akka lon len linako itti loKanang koKapik.
Pul iponu Kanang koKapik pakkma lon ncik appik anaruk pakorronno akkmako nul ook akkwonu lon lothakkma ikkun.
“Oththa akkina thokwarttikot cik thoIli
othakka itti akwocimittok?”
Anaruk oron thonu ngathꞌre ngoMiccie.
Pangkingon, mpakorronno erenenon ammakka ul ionu Kanang koKapik anaruk ammakka ul wonocapu akka onon tharthuk thanyukul nyarran ilon loMiccie.
Mpethet non ngui, okorronno oka thuꞌrit ithonthomat akka onon thakorronno okuccekot cik itti onon thaꞌrko thuꞌrit ithonthomat,
onon tharthuk thaik ilon lonocapu. Ana inakka onon thanyirane ana aꞌrettakot, elli lakene itti onon thaik ilon lonocapu ana okkot lon loul ionyi wonocapui?
Akka amma opilin iꞌre itti “Mpamakot oPoluc, ana opilin itti mpamakot Apolloc,” Onon thakorronno oka ul nuthuki?

Nantokorronno elli appik, Apolloc oththa? Ana oPoluc oththa? Okin thakorronno oka ul iarekine Kapiki, ana okin ithokorronnot non anoccokot lon loKapik ammakka Ili wikkethekin ngre ngen kurekkurek itti okin thakkot.
Mpocïkkarot pira ana Apolloc pïkïkkiet ngꞌri anaruk Kapik akkocokkiet.
Ittina lakorronno oka itti okkwen akkocïkkarot ana manna itti okkwen akkïkïkkiet ngꞌri, anaruk Kapik kulluk akkacokkie aꞌrupu ncik appik.
Pul ipacïkkaro pira ana pul ipikïkkie ngꞌri, okin thonu lon lulukku ana okin thiot lon iloporot kurekkurek nti ilon ilakin thokkothe.
Akka onïn ul iarekine Kapik ana onon kopon koKapik ana kman koKapik.
Nthoporot ithaKapik kethin, mpokkothe millang ammakka pul ipina uno ana opilin paik puno nan. Anaruk okkwi ipuno nan ponu itti kwaꞌrumoik papenang itti kuno tat.
Pul pella ipanekket millang mꞌrek prek noꞌra womillang imonekkettatheik. Kapik konekkethe oIeccuo oMiccie cillang culluk cen ana pul pella papponekket cillang cꞌrek cik.
Ana amma pul pꞌrek punothe nomillang emmi puno mmallong imallio ana nthaap ana mothok imonu cekerek coppot ana oꞌren ana ucce,

ngre ngung nginako nan itti ngarat akka nocaꞌri ica aMiccie anthan nan ngimmako attattar. Ngre nginako nan nthik ere amma thaap thokꞌrettat nthik athantinako ana ngre ngoul ngakathaccetta tit kurekkurek kicce.
Amma man ima akkwi punot moꞌrungkotheik, kwakketta ntit.
Amma man mokꞌrot ana kuret aꞌrupu cik appik anaruk kwaꞌret ka kung ammakka pul ipokkot cik nti ithik.
Onon appik thomma itti onon tupan toKapiki ana Kanang koKapik kaik ianoni?
Amma opilin pokïttot tupan toKapik ana Kapik kakïttok akka tupan toKapik tupupure ana onon tharupan toKapik ten.
Nokorronno ammikkot ka kon. Amma opilin nti ianon paik pame itti kwinaik nti ica naꞌrupu wonocapu enci, kwonu itti kwaka pommaik othakka itti akwinaik nti ica.
Akka thinaik nti ica thonocapu thaththommaik tokït kung. Ammakka lokurrakot itti, “Kapik kina thinaik nti ica then amma okin okkot ngre ngen.”
ana attang “Ili wina itti thokwarttikot cik thopul ipinaik thella lon cik.”
Ittina nokorronno ipot ka thoura kopul iponyi. Lon appik lon,
oPoluc ana Apolloc ana oPoththuruc ana capu ncik appik ana thikkoik ana thio ana manna inenni ana ngorrot, lon appik lon
ana onon ul woMiccie ana oMiccie poKapik.
Ittina onon nthonu itti nthakatha nïn ammakka ul iarekine oMiccie ana ul iangkene lon loKapik ila amuꞌruttakot ncik.
