Elli lakorronno oprttakiettot tit akka pul pothopulut cakuruk pinnikot itti paꞌrupa wothothïlettat wokꞌran ikaccieik.
Lakorronno oprttakiettot tit amma ul iarekinok winnikot itti woporot tokït koKapik. Caꞌri canthan icakin ocothakot ngkathar ikakin thonu itti okin thacothakot ngngin.
Mpappopakkenthet non tit itti, nokorronno ome itti mpommaik nti ica. Anaruk amma onon thakathan ere mpommaik nongathin ammakka pul ipommaik othakka itti aniot lon lotte ilanipot ka thoura ngngin.
Nthipot ka thoura, mpaik pakerrnnere ammakka Ili ere anaruk mpaik pere ere pul ipommaik.
Inakka ul woppot waik wipot ka thoura ngkathar ika capu ncik appik okkot, mpipot ka thoura cakuruk.
Onon thakatha ka kon itti onon thinaik anaruk onon thaik thaccïkot lon loul iommaik.
Ilaik ïcat itti onon thaik thaccïkot lon loul iakkiet non thiak ana iammikkot non ana iarekienon llon appik ana iakkwenon thounu nattal.
Mpothiat cik iꞌre itti onïn thokat thommangka llon elli.
Mpaik pere ere pul ipommaik, lon ila apilingon thongothe itti okin thipot ka thoura ngngin, mpongothe itti mpipot ka thoura ngngin cakuruk.
Okin thaul woIpranini? mpapul poIpranin cakuruk. Okin thaul woIccereili? mpapul poIccereil cakuruk. Okin thathiki thApreini? mpapiki pAprein cakuruk.

Okin thaul iarekine oMicciei? (mpaik pere ere pul iponu purrut) Anaruk mpapul iparekine oMiccie cannan nakin. Mpokat ikorrkkor maꞌri moppot ana mpopokot cannan ana mpokat ere mpakkuttat attang ana attang.
Ul woIouth wokkwerin maꞌri ukuluk kurekkurek ua arrial ana attul ana ikken ukulacoꞌrin.

Ul woRumanin wokkwerin maꞌri mꞌrapuruk nurrong ittïttïk ana uꞌruncakot cik caꞌri culukku mmothok ana kuppuꞌrung konoiꞌri kocottathin ngngin irok maꞌri mꞌrapuruk ana mpikkatheik irok irapngka nokkonokki ana nokkꞌrokkꞌra

mponyarot nokurtti koppot ana kukkwit kukkwit. Nok inapangka nokkothin lon lokithak ana ul woluꞌran ialikine ul cik ikathar wokkothin lon lokithak ana ul win wonoththok pin wokkothin lon lokithak ana ul iakonnoka woIouth wokkothin lon lokithak ana mpokkattathe lon lokithak nan nokaꞌran kin ana mpokkattathe lon lokithak nan noththok pin ana mpiothe lon lokithak nonue ana mpokkattathe lon lokithak nan opangkingon ngngin ithonu karra.
Mporttekot ana okinya anganna ana mpakannoincicce inthe ana tï tokkuttethin ana pica ana kanang cannan ana mpokkat cunthut.
Ana nolon elli appik, lon lꞌrek iloꞌrothin cik lokat loul ioccokothe lon loIeccuo naꞌran appik.
Oththa akkapot ka ntit ampakannapo ka ntit? Oththa akkopaꞌrettat cik nti ilon iloporot ampakanua ka ci noucce?
Amma mponu itti mpipot ka thoura ana mpipot ka thoura llon ila mpommangka ngngin.
Kapik oththan poIli oIeccuo, ipapirakine noka thuput thuput pina itti mpaik pakannammikkot.
Nokaꞌran koThimacakka ili iotte iokat ikkun woili irïk Arththac ponekkethe ul iangwot cik itti wangwot othakka itti accokothin
Anaruk opangkinngon ilon loKapik thonekkethin ialnthung, akin orrepekathin okkien norttu anokkat cik nti inyaun nyen.
Mponu itti mpaꞌrungkwot nothipot ka thoura antoka manna itti papella ipincat nan, mpaꞌrungkwot nan ere lon lothathantako ana thittako ncik itha iIli wittinin ncik.

Mpina pul pꞌrek ipoccokothe lon loMiccie iponekittathe tothiꞌrot iraꞌrapuruk noluput ileot ncik attul ana ikken kocoꞌrin, mpomma amma kwonekittat ngka kung ana manna okorronno oka ngka kung mpomma, Kapik kulluk akkina.
Ana mpina itti pul pen ponekittathe tothiꞌrot antoka ngka kung ana manna okorronno oka ngka kung mpomma, anaruk Kapik kina.
Ponekittathe tothiꞌrot ana poccïkothe lon ila pul iponyi ponu itti pakorronno ere lon len.
Mpipot ka thoura nopul ammakka pen anaruk mpakarrnnipot ka thoura noka kin, anaruk mpipot ka thoura nolon ila mpommangka ngngin.
Ana amma oun akkongothe itti mpipot ka thoura, mpakorronno oka pommaik akka mpaik pere lon ilaik ïcat. Anaruk mpakorronno ipot ka thoura akka opilin iꞌre itti mprïk nolon ila mpaik pakkot ana ere.
Antoka manna itti mpoccot thittako ncik tholon noKapik, mio mokꞌrellorin nti ikkwa, pul pothïlathe nopul pothopulut apathoccokiethin thiak othakka itti anokorronno ipot ka thoura.
Mpipittothe Kapik maꞌri mꞌrapuruk itti kanekothin pul pothopulut pen.

Anaruk kiꞌrekathin itti, “Thoporot thin thekkot naung, akka puꞌran pin pareko anganna iul iommangka.” Ittina mpopirat noka itti mpipot ka thoura nothommangka thin othakka itti apuꞌran poMiccie oꞌro naun.
Ilen akka mpopiranet noka nothommangka thin ana amma ul ocungkwon ana occokiethin thiak ana attan ana ilon ilonthomat nti ilon loMiccie. Akka amma mpommangka, ampopoꞌrot than.

Mpothikkiet ka kin pommaik anaruk onon akkokorronnorin anothakka ittina. Onon akkira aththerenin llon loporot, akka mpakorronno oka potteik llon noul wothothïlettat innikot itti woporot cannan, antoka manna itti mpapul nuthuk.

Mpina pul pꞌrek ipoccokothe lon loMiccie iponekittathe tothiꞌrot iraꞌrapuruk noluput ileot ncik attul ana ikken kocoꞌrin, mpomma amma kwonekittat ngka kung ana manna okorronno oka ngka kung mpomma, Kapik kulluk akkina.
Lon ila mpakorronno okkot ana ilanokkot naꞌran woul ioccokothe lon loIeccuo wokat itti mpammienon nakucci. Noccikinthin lon elli ila mpokkothe nanon moloko.

Mpongothe itti mpappainenon othikkie maꞌri mꞌrapuruk, mpakorronno appommienon. Mpakarrnnangkot aꞌrupu ianon thonu anaruk mpangothenon. Nyukul inyarran nyakorrnno ethet oththangon aꞌrupu anaruk oththangon akkethet nyukul inyarran aꞌrupu.
Mpopirat noka itti mpakkinthet non lon appik iloporot ana likkoik ere amma mpongothenon cannan anon okorronno ongathin cannani?
Opilingon nti ianon thiꞌre itti mpokat anokorronno ommienon. Anaruk opilingon thokat akin opri mpokat anokkot ngre nthuꞌran ana ammikkot non.
Mpokkiethenon lon lokithak nul iapmpothïlenthet noni?
Mpattakiet oThiththoc cik itti akwainenon ana mpothïothok okin opang ponnon. oThiththoc ponekothe non alapꞌreki? Onïn thakorronno ommakot katharken llon lulukkui?
Onon thikko thame itti onïn thokat anïn orrot noka kini? Annoka ittina onïn thokat anïn eret tokït koKapik ammakka ul woMiccie ana lon ilanïn thokkothe appik othakka itti alopoꞌrienon than.

Akka mpapelle akka anathiot non ngkathar ika mpꞌrat itti onon thikkoik ngngin ana mpapelle akka annathiohtin ngkathar ikanon thꞌrat itti nthiothin ngngin. Mpapelle akka athaꞌretto okaik ana thonyira ana thocungkaro ana therettot ana thipot ka thoura ana okorronno occïkarot.

Mpapelle akka amma mpapprainenon attang, ana Kapik karpethin cik tokït kon. Ana mpipo thiak akka opilingon thoppot thakorrnno opaꞌrine lon len cik ilokithak. Onon tharthuk opaꞌrine lon ilokithak cik, thaꞌro nul nuthuk ana thopoꞌra than ana opaꞌrine thothia cik.
Caꞌri cin enci icꞌrapuruk inenni ampaththomirikot nanon. Ana lokurrakot iatham itti, “Othakka itti alon oka ïcat lonu itti limmako nul weꞌra ana manna wꞌrapuruk ngkït.”

Mpiꞌrethe okkwion ithakkot lon ilokithak lon lonthomat caꞌri ica mpaththomirikot nanon nomaꞌri imeꞌra imeot. Ana inenni mpappiꞌret kin lon lonthomat attang ampella ana opilingon ammakka mpiꞌret nomaꞌri imeot, itti nomaꞌri imanthan mpakorronno okorronno okkwion ithokkothe lon ilokithak nomaꞌri imeot ana inenni
inakka onon thaik thipitto lon ilakene itti oMiccie paik pere nthuꞌre thin. Kwakannoka pommangka itti kwakkot ngre ianon anaruk kwopoꞌrot than ianon.

Othakka itti aron ina itti kwokat pokkuttathe ere kwommangka anaruk inenni kwokkot cik mpuꞌran poKapik. Ammakka menik onïn cakuruk thommangka ilon lung anaruk mpuꞌran poKapik onïn thakkoik ïnaththut anïn orekinenon.
Nenekke ka kon annokathaccekat tit kicce, annokatha itti amma nthaik ithoccokot lon nomïkït. Onon thomma amma oIeccuo oMiccie paik ianoni anaruk amma onon thommat lon lothennekke?
Ana onon thina itti onïn thakorronno omma lon lothennekketta.

Ana inenni onïn thaꞌrane Kapik ngaꞌrama itti anon okorronnokkot lon ilokithak aththik. Okorronno oka itti aul imma itti thennekketta thokat thoprot, anaruk othakka itti annokkot lon iloprot antoka manna itti onïn thommat lon lothennekketta.
Akka onïn thakorronno okkot lon lꞌrek aththik ilakïtto lon ilaik ïcat, anaruk onïn thakkot lon ilacoꞌrot lon ilaik ïcat.
Antoka manna itti onïn thommangka anaruk anon oka thopoꞌrot than ana onïn thaꞌranenon ngaꞌrama othakka itti annopoꞌrothan cannan.

Ilen akka anokurrine non lon elli ampella othakka itti amma mpaat anokorronno aꞌretto nanon mpuꞌran ipaIeccuo pethin. Akka ngili iaoIeccuo pethin itti mpupothonon ngngin ana okorronno oka itti mpapettot non cik ngngin.
Pangkingon, ittina pꞌrin mpaik paththe nanon. Nopira noka ana okkot lon iloporot ana opoꞌrathan ana erekettot. Nikkoik llon loporot. Ana Kapik kothongarot ana kothomicco kaka nanon.
Nomiccaro nthongarot thoKapik.
Ul woKapik iupupure appik waik wamicconon.
Athoporot thoIli wonnon oIeccuo oMiccie ana thongat thoKapik ana thoka tothun ngKanang ikupupure oka nanon appik.
Galatians: Oun oPoluc, pul pothothïlettat poIeccuo oMiccie iponekkettatheik mpuꞌran poIeccuo ana pongappa Kapik ikurokwiet oIeccuo nti ithio. Mpannonekkettat pul pothothïlettat poIeccuo llon lopuꞌrek annoka manna mpuꞌran poul anaruk nthakkaro thoIeccuo oMiccie.
Mpothinthet non thon oun ana opangkingon ithanïn thaik ïnaththungon appik, onon ithaik thoccokothe lon loIeccuo noththok poKalaththia.
Mpipittot Kapik ongappa ana Ili oIeccuo oMiccie itti athoporot ana thomicco oka nanon.
Ook ipethet ton ka kung akwokkieron cik nti ilon ilokithak lonnon ana oꞌret ton nti ilon ilokithak lonocapu loul iaron thaik tit ammakka Kapik ongappa kongothe itti laka.
Ook ipa thïrïk okane thupuththuput. Amin.
Mpannopira noka akka lirrierin cïkït nti icarak itti inthopaꞌrinet lon cik accokkot loKapik ikakkarot non itti nthikkoik ithoporot thoMiccie anoine thongkene thꞌrek.
Annoka itti lon iloporot loIeccuo lꞌrek laik. Anaruk ul wꞌrek wiꞌrikiet non ilon ilacikittaro ma ilakannoka loMiccie itti okin thennekke itti okin thakïtto lon loMiccie.
Anaruk amma onïn akkongkenet non lon iloporot loIeccuo lꞌrek antoka manna uꞌrupa wothothïlettat woKapik wangkenet non alꞌrek prek na ilanïn thongkenet non tokït, kirrinni anïn attattako.
Mpappopakket lon tit itti amma opilin pappro ongkenenon lon iloporot lꞌrek nolon iloporot loIeccuo ilanon thoccokothe, akwattattako thupuththuput.
Mpaik pannenekke itti aul ongat lon lin, anaruk itti aKapik opira noka naun. Ana amma mpokat anennekke itti aul ongat lon lin, mpannokat pul iparekine oMiccie.
Pangkingon, mpongothe itti nthina itti lon iloporot loIeccuo ila mpongkenet non annoka pul iponyi akkokkothe.
Mpannocco nti ikkun wopul pꞌrek ana manna mpannongkenetta anaruk oIeccuo oMiccie akkokenerin.

Onon thoccïkothe lon lothikkoik thin lomaꞌrot akka mpokat ilon lothathuma tholon loul woIouth ana tat akka mpokkikkiethe ul ioccokothe lon loIeccuo thiak ella thiak nocïkït ana anenekke itti mpakïtto kin.
Mpokat pinangkat lon nti iul woIouth iarokat cat cin iommaththik lon ïnaththungon ana mpapponat thiak thothathuma thothiki thin cannan.
Anaruk akka Kapik kakkarrorin amparthuk manna okwonta nthoporot thung, itti anorekinok,
akwakenen lon lokkul wung anina akka anongkene ul iannoka woIouth lon lung mpannipittot puꞌrek aththik.
Mpannokuꞌrot manna nocoꞌrong coUruccelim itti anothipittot ul wothothïlettat woIeccuo iokat tokït naun anaruk mpoththet cik eo nocoꞌrong coMuththu manna antopakkot nokaꞌran koThimacakka.
Anakka mpikkot cik luput lꞌrapuruk (3) anokuꞌrat nokaꞌran koUruccelim anothoccïkot lon na oPoththuruc poul pothothïlettat poIeccuo ana inthikkatheik maꞌri attul ana ikken ukuluk (15).
Mpanniot ul wothothïlettat woIeccuo wꞌrek anaruk mpiothe oIakup opang poIli oIeccuo.
Mpiꞌret lon ïcat tokït koKapik ila mpaik piꞌret non lakannoka lokarra.
Ana mpoingkathe noththok poCuria ana poKilikkia.
Anaruk ul woIouthia iokat woccokothe lon loIeccuo wokat wanninan ngka kin.
Okin thokat akin occiccikot lon turuk itti, “Pul ipappokat apoccokiet ul thiat paik pangkene lon loIeccuo inenni ook ipappennekket itti kwakïtto.”
Ana okin thopirakathe noka noKapik nti ilon lin.
Anakka mpikkot cik luput attul ana ikken kocoꞌrin (14) mpappropakkat nocoꞌrong coUruccelim ana nocaꞌri cen ïntheot ïnoParanapa anipat oThiththoc cakuruk.

Mpeot Uruccelim akka Kapik kiꞌrethin itti mponu itti mpaeo ana mpokenekathe ul ittïttïk thellek lon lothoccokot tholon iloporot loIeccuo ila mpokat cik anongkene ul iannoka woIouth, othakka itti athongkene itha mpongkenet okorronno oka lon nuthuk.
Anaruk manna oThiththoc pul ipannoka poul woIouth ipanïn thokat cik akwittarothin pannokekkot kwanniꞌrettat nnul ittïttïk wonokaꞌran itti kwakekkot mpuꞌran.

Lon elli lokuꞌrot ncik akka opangkingon ithonu karra thinikothe itti okin thoccokothe lon loIeccuo ïnaththungon, anaruk akin okwantot lon ilakïtto thikkoik thïn ella nꞌre ithanïn thonu llon loMiccie oIeccuo ana ennekke itti okin thapakket nïn iak wolon ilocoꞌrotheik loMucca.
Onïn thannoccikat lon len aththik othakka itti alon ïcat iloporot loIeccuo inakka alikkoik ianon.

Ana okkwion ithokat cik thinako itti ul ittïttïk thannokkot lon lꞌrek nolon ila mpokat anere, akka Kapik kaik kakathacce ul nomïkït kannokathacce toma toul wen wannarottot lon lꞌrek nolon ila mpongkenet.
Anaruk okin thonu nomïkït men itti Kapik kothïothin itti mpathongkene ul lon iloporot loIeccuo iannoka woIouth ammakka kakkothïothe oPoththuruc noul woIouth.
Mpothilathe mpuꞌran poKapik noul iannoka woIouth ammakka oPoththuruc ipa pul pothothïlettat mpuꞌran poKapik cakuruk noul woIouth.

Ana ittina oIakup ana oPoththuruc ana oIuanna itha thinakot nan itti okin millang moul ioccokothe lon loKapik thinat nothoporot thoKapik ithettathin, okin thongakanthet nïn oun ana oParanapa ïnittarot kin iire ithun ïnongkene ul iannoka woIouth akin ongkene ul woIouth.
Anaruk okin thomekathenïn itti onïn thittarot ul ia iak iella thuꞌrit cik ana ilen akka oun mpappongothe thiak thiak itti mpakkot.
Anaruk akka oPoththuruc paat nokaꞌran kAnththakkia mpaꞌrettot nak akka kwokat akwokkot lon ilokithak ïcat.

Kwokat cik akwoꞌrko thuꞌrit akin oul iannoka woIouth, anaruk akka opilingon thaat naIakup, akwopettat ka kung nti iakin akwꞌrakat oꞌrko thuꞌrit akin aththungon akka kwonat nꞌre noul woIouth iongothe itti okin thakekkiet ul iannoka woIouth.
Aul woIouth wꞌrek opettakat akin omakot lon loPoththuruc, aParanapa omakat kin cakuruk.

Anaruk mpimmat kin itti okin thaik thakannomakot kathar kolon ilaik ïcat lolon iloporot loIeccuo mpiꞌrethe oPoththuruc tokït ken appik itti, “Oung poul woIouth ana ngkwaik pamakot thathuma itha ul iannoka woIouth omakot ana tat akka anentet ul iannoka woIouth than itti womakot thathuma thoul woIouth?”
Laik ïcat itti oron thoul woIouth nthokwonta anaruk annoka ammakka ul iannoka woIouth iannomakot lon loKapik.

Anaruk oron thina itti pul pathikkietta poporot tokït koKapik nthoccokot lon nocikkit loMiccie oIeccuo annoka nthomakot lon ilocoꞌrotheik loMucca. Oron cakuruk thoccokothe lon loMiccie nomïkït unothakka thoporot tokït koKapik nthoccokot lon loMiccie nomïkït ana annoka nthokkot lon ilocoꞌrotheik loMucca. Akka pul pella ipaka poporot tokït koKapik nthomakot lon ilocoꞌrotheik loMucca.

Anaruk amma oron akkaik thenekke itti oron thaka thoporot ngKapik oMiccie ngngin, ana oron thaththiot itti oron thaik thakkot lon ilokithak tokït koul woIouth? Elli lonu itti oMiccie akkarrotheron ilon ilokithaki? Annokka menik.
Amma oun akkopri itti mpapakket lon cik ila mpokat pokïttot, ana mpaka pul ipakannoccïkot lon ilocoꞌrotheik loMucca.
Anaruk mpiot nti ilon ilocoꞌrothe cik loMucca othakka itti anoine Kapik.

Mpokkuttathe nothapak innoMiccie ana ittina oun akkannokat cik ngka kin anaruk oMiccie akkaik iaun. Ana thikkoik itha mpaik pikkoik inenni mpaik pikkoik nti ithoccokot lon lokkul woKapik nocïkït iongothin ana iiothe nothapak nti iaun.
Mpannoka nti iul iakatha thoporot thoKapik itti thella lon cik tit. Akka amma oron thoꞌrettathe llon ilocoꞌrotheik loMucca, ittina thio thoIeccuo thella lon cik.
Ul woKalaththia, nthontha akka nthommaik ntima? Oththa akkolikinet non cik itti nthannimmaik? Onon thuret nan akka mperenet non itti oIeccuo pinthet non nothapaki?
Mpongothe itti mpina papulukku nanon. Onon thoccot Kanang ikupupure koKapik noKapik akka nthokat anoccokot lon ilocoꞌrotheik loul woIouthi? Ana manna akka onon thoccokothe lon loIeccuo iloporot?
Ngintha akka nthommanet cik ntima ittina? Onon thokuꞌret lon ncik mpuꞌran poKanang koKapik ikupupure ana nthongothe itti nthamartto mpuꞌran popul iponyi?
Nthokkiettathe thiak cannan nuthuki? Mpoo itti lakannoka nuthuk.

Kapik kethet non Kanang kung ikupupure ana okkot lon ilommaththik iloporot ithoꞌrkït thon othakka itti akka nthommakothe lon ilocoꞌrotheik loMuccai? Annoka menik. Kapik kokkothe lon len akka onon thoccokothe lon lung nomïkït mon.
Nantoccot kït nAprein ammakka Atham wiꞌret itti, “Kwoccokothe lon loKapik nocïkït ana Kapik kothikkiekathok pellek ipocoꞌrothe lon cik.”
Ittina nina nan itti okkwion ithoccokothe lon loKapik nomïkït, oththan pen Aprein.

Atham woKapik wiꞌret nci maꞌrot alarthuk othakka itti Kapik kathikkie ul iannoka woIouth woporot nthoccokot lon loKapik nomïkït then ana ongkene lon iloporot loIeccuo iliꞌrettathe Aprein itti, “Ul appik waKapik ethïet cik nti ilon lang.”
Menik okkwion ithoccokothe lon loKapik nomïkït thethïekot cik okin Aprein pul ipoccokothe lon nocïkït.

Anaruk okkwion ithonekkethe lon nomïkït itti okin thareko llon iAtham wolon ilocoꞌrotheik loMucca okin thattattako appik, akka lokurrakot itti, “Athattattako oka nakkwion ithaik thannoreko llon appik ilokurrakot iAtham woKapik wolon ilocoꞌrotheik.”
Laik papenang itti pul pella paka tokït koKapik poporot llon ilocoꞌrotheik, akka “Pul paka tokït koKapik poporot ana ikkoik nthoccokot lon loKapik nocïkït.”
Lon ilocoꞌrotheik loMucca lakannoka ammakka lon lothoccokot lon nomïkït, anaruk “Pul ipaccïkot lon ilalon ilocoꞌrotheik liꞌret kwakkoik.”
OMiccie pelikkot ton nti ithattattako tholon ilocoꞌrotheik loMucca ammakka lokurrakot itti, “Kwattattako okkwi ipiothe nothapak.”
Kwelikkot ton itti athethieko itha Aprein poccot aine ul iannoka woIouth nti ikkun woMiccie oIeccuo. Ana nthoccokot lon nomïkït oron thacco Kanang ikupupure ikonekkettanthet ton cik.
Pangkingon, nantokorronnon anokenenon loꞌrek nolon ilaik ilaul okkot appinappin tokït konon. Pul pꞌrek pella ipapaꞌre lon cik lorothun ilonekkettatheik ana manna arottot nan pellek.
Kapik konekkenthet Aprein lon cik ana opiki pung.
Ana Atham woKapik wanniꞌre itti thiki ithonu itti nyukul nyoppot anaruk wiꞌret itti piki iponu ukul wulukku ana ook oMiccie.

Ila mpongothe itti mpiꞌre itti, Kapik konekkethe lon cik maꞌrot okin Aprein ana konekkethe lon cik itti kakorronno arrot cik. Akka okin thonekkethe lon okin Aprein, Kapik kikkiekathok cik luput arrial ukuluk maꞌri mocoꞌrin ana arrial ana attul (430) akekat oMucca lon lothonceꞌret lon cik anaruk lon lothonceꞌret lon cik elli lokorronno opaꞌre thonekket lon then okin Aprein ana manna okïtto lon ila Kapik konekketheik.
Amma lon ilocoꞌrotheik loMucca lethet ton thethieko thAprein, ittina thonekket lon cik thellako lon len. Anaruk lakannoka menik akka Kapik kethet Aprein thethieko nthonekket lon cik ilakkonekketheik.

Ittina lon ilocoꞌrotheik loMucca lokat cik akaintha? Lon ilocoꞌrotheik lokat cik itti alokene lon liatha ilokithak ilokkattathe. Anaruk lon elli lokat itti laik lathomattat amma ukul waat iaKapik konekkenthet lon cik itti waik wanthan. Kapik kethet uꞌrupa wothothïlettat woKapik lon lung ilocoꞌrotheik itti wethet oMucca okkwi ipokat pul ipannekine ul lon nnoKapik.
Amma ul weꞌra waik wathiꞌriko lon pul pꞌrek ponu itti pakaik, anaruk Kapik kokkinthet Aprein thonekket lon cik thung pellek.

Lon lothonceꞌret lon cik laik lakïtto thonekket lon cik thoKapiki? Annoka ittina kirrkkir! Amma lon lothonceꞌret lon cik lokat lethet ton thikkoik thie, oron thaakat ikuꞌri ngKapik nthommakot lon ilocoꞌrotheik.
Anaruk Atham woKapik wiꞌret itti ul nocapu ncik appik waik ikkun wopuꞌran paꞌruna iokithak, othakka itti aKapik ethet okkwion ithoccokothe lon loIeccuo oMiccie nomïkït ilakin thonekkettanthet cik.
Anaruk akka thoccokot lon nocïkït tharthuk ao, lon ilocoꞌrotheik lalunukkwotheron ikorrkkor puccuk athanthan thothoccokot tholon loIeccuo nomïkït ummot ncik ithokat athoꞌrïkakot.
Nantokorronnon aniꞌre ngkathar engki, lon ilocoꞌrotheik langwotheron puccuk aMiccie anthan. Ittina inenni nthoccokot lon nomïkït iaMiccie oron thaik ikuꞌri thoporot ngKapik.
Inenni caꞌri cothoccokot lon loIeccuo nomïkït caat ana lon ilocoꞌrotheik lakannoka itti langwot ton pꞌrin.
Onon thanyukul nyoKapik appik nthoccokot lon loIeccuo oMiccie.
Akka onon ithoccot mamuthie ngkꞌran koMiccie, thiꞌrikot ilon lung thupuththuput.

Ittina thopettako thella itti okkwempi poul poIouth ana okkwempi poul iannoka woIouth, ana itti okkwempi ipa piak ana okkwempi ipannoka papiak, ana okkwempi pocura ana okkwempi popari. Onon thulukku appik ilon loMiccie oIeccuo.
Ana amma onon akkulukku ilon loMiccie menik onon more mAprein ana onon akkapakkot nothethiekot cik itha Kapik konekkenthet Aprein cik.
Anaruk itti anomaket lon lin, ukul iapakkot naꞌrupu woththan kwammakka piak akka kwarthuk potte ana kwaik inyaun nyopilingon.
Anaruk wikkoik inyaun nyoul iaththan poththenet lon lung nakin puccuk acaꞌri akkakat ica oththan ponekkethe cik itti kwapakkot naꞌrupu.
Ilen elli ilakene ton cakuruk itti oron thokat caꞌri ceꞌrek tharran ana iak wolon ilocoꞌrothe cik lonocapu ncik appik.
Anaruk akka caꞌri caat icekkot nan papennang Kapik kothïathe ukul wung iokwontat nti pul ipopari ana wikkathe cik inyaun nyolon ilocoꞌrothe cik loul woIouth
itti akwelikko okkwion ithokat inyaun nyolon ilocoꞌrothe cik aron athakka nyukul nyoKapik inyaKapik kupothot.
Ana akka oron thanyukul nyung, Kapik kothinthet ton Kanang kokkul wung ikupupure nomïkït monon, kiꞌrethe ton itti, Appa, ngappa ponnon.
Ittina onon thannoka iak pꞌrin anaruk onon thanyukul inyomura ana inyari nyoKapik ana menik Kapik kapakket non naꞌrupu wung iakonu appik.
Menik tokït akka onon thommat Kapik nthokat iak woaꞌrupu iannoka Kapik.
Anaruk inenni onon thina Kapik ana icci Kapik akkina non nanon. Nthontha akka anopaꞌrine Kapik cik anothakka iak woaꞌrupu wonocapu iannoka ïcat?
Onon thaik thaccot kït nomaꞌri pellek ana anok ana cik cothuput ana luput lokamuthe koIouth ikaIouth occot kït nan.
Mpella cïkït icarak ntianon, ngre iamporekinet non ngurathe cik nuthuk.

Pangkingon, mpongothe itti nthikko cik ammakka mpaik okorronno opellene lon ilocoꞌrothe cik akka mpothakkat ammakka onon thokat ella nꞌre nolon ilocoꞌrothe cik loIouth. Onon thannokkothin lon lokithak caꞌri ica ampokat anerentenenon lon loKapik.
Akka nthina itti mpokat pongo akka mpongkenet non lon iloporot loIeccuo cittokït.

Ana manna thonga thin thokat ere thennekke thothongathin thon nthannoththothin cik ana ꞌra lon lin anaruk onon thikkierin cik ere oun uꞌrupa wothothïlettat woKapik ana manna ere oMiccie oIeccuo ngka kung.

Onon thathopirat noka cannan mencen ana thopira noka thon then thaik kartha? Ngintha akkokïttot thopira noka then, akka mpina itti amma kathar kokat cik ika anethin kït kon ko tomma ngngin ana mpaaccot.
Mpothakkat pul po thoꞌrak pon akka mpiꞌrethe non lon ilaik ïcari?
Ul ennrik wongothe itti onon thamakot kin anaruk thongat non then thannoka thoporot nanon. Anaruk lon ila kin thongothe appik itti okin thapaꞌre non cik naun anongat kin anomakat kin.
Amma onon akkongothe itti nthangat lon, nongat lon ilaik ïcat appinappin annoka tulluk amma ampaik.
Nyukul nyin, mpaik paccokot thiak ere pul ipaik pakwono nti ilon lon, ana thiak then thakannomttat animmakat lon loMiccie loppathe nomïkït mon.
Mpongothe itti mpaakat ianon othakka itti anerene non mpoꞌre pellek ana cïkït coporot. Mpaik paccokot thiak thon anganna.
Niꞌrethin onon ithongothe itti nthamakot lon ilocoꞌrothe cik? Onon thannoccïkot lon ila lon ilocoꞌrothe cik erei?
Liꞌrettat itti Aprein pokwonot nyukul nyeꞌra wꞌrek wokwontat nti iapari ipa piak ana aꞌrek nti iapari ipittat.
Iokwontat nti iapari pung ipittat wokwontat nti ilon ila Kapik konekkenthok cik ana iokwontat nti ipiak wokwontat ammakka nyukul okwonta.
Lon loul iari enni ieꞌra lakene thonekket lon cik thoKapik itheꞌra. Acar pari ipa piak pakene thonekket lon cik thoKapik thonocoꞌrong coCina naul wokat iak wolon ilocoꞌrothe cik cinomun.
Ana inenni Acar ook Uruccelim iaik ammakka coꞌrong coCcina noththok poMuththu, akka Uruccelim ana opeon thikikkot cik akin okkikkiettat thiak llon ilocoꞌrothe cik loul woIouth.
Anaruk oCcara ipittat paik ammakka Uruccelim iaik tothiꞌrot iannoka piak ana ook onnan ponnon
akka Atham woAccaia wiꞌret itti,
“Opira noka oung ipocoꞌrot pucung,
okinti kuri cittan oung ipa ukul wannokꞌrello
akka nyukul nyopul ipopari ipa pucung nyirik
nonyukul nyopul ipopari iponu olle.”
Pangkingon, onon thathakka nyukul nyoKapik nti ilon illo onekkettathe cik ammakka oIccaak.
Ana ammakka ukul iokwonta nti ipul ipopari nuthuk ipakannitta wakkiet ukul thiak iokwontat mpuꞌran poKanang koKapik ikupupure ana ilen akkaik menik inenni.
Atham wiꞌret itti kaththa? “Othiothe ukul wopiak thapat okin onnan akka ukul wopiak wannocco papꞌrek naꞌrupu woththan pokkul popul ipopari ipittat ipannoka papiak.”
Menik pangkingon, oron thannoka nyukul nyopul ipopari ipa piak anaruk oron thonyukul nyopul ipopari ipittat ipannoka papiak.
OMiccie pelikkot ton nti ithothakka iak wolon ilocoꞌrothe cik. Noꞌrumoik, nokorronno opakkinthet thothakka iak wolon ilocoꞌrotheik attang.
Nokkwine lon lin kunu ncik, oun oPoluc mpiꞌret non itti amma onon thapparo okorno kakon itti nthapakkot ilon lothokekkot, lon loMiccie lella loncik aththik nanon.
Mpappiꞌret non ithomura itti okkwi ipapporo okekkot kwonu itti kwamakot lon ilocoꞌrotheik loMucca appik.

Ana okkwion ithaik thennekke itti okin thathikkie ka ken thoporot nthommakot lon lothonceꞌret lon cik loMucca anokatha okin thopettothe ka ken cik naMiccie ana okin thaik thannappiot thoporot thoKapik.
Anaruk oron ntrun oꞌrïkot lon itti Kapik kathikkie ton thoporot nthoccokot tholon thonon ana mpuꞌran poKanang koKapik ikupupure.
Anaruk ilon loMiccie oIeccuo thokekkot ana ul iannokekkot thella lon cik naMiccie anaruk thoccokot lon loKapik ithakorronnong angat ul wꞌrek akkaik.
Onon thokat anoccïkot lon loMiccie, oththa akkoceꞌret non itti nthannoccïkot lon ilaik ïcat?
Lon lokkwi ipoceꞌret non lon lung lakannoka loKapik ikakkarot non.
Ammakka lanako itti, “Müꞌrükül motte minyie meꞌre ncik appik.”
Amparthuk ponu lon noucce itti oron thaik tothun ilon loIli unaththungon ana nthanneo nocipit ceꞌrek. Ana okkwi ipaik pacikittinthet non lon ima pakkamako antoka manna ook okkwen.
Pangkingon, amma oun akkaik peret lon lothokekkot, ngintha akka onon appoccokienthattet thiak? Ittina thokkwet ana thokkwot nothapak thella lon cik.
Mpongothe itti ul iaik wacikittot non lon ima itti onon thakekkot akin oꞌrungkot nothokekkot puccuk akin othakkakat lomoꞌre.
Pangkingon, Kapik kakkarot non itti onon thikko cik ella nꞌre nolon ilocoꞌrotheik. Okoronnoka itti onon thikkoik ella nꞌre anokkot lon ilaka kon kongothe ilokithak anaruk orekarane nthongarot.
Lon ilocoꞌrotheik loMucca liꞌrettat ilon lulukku itti, “Ongathe ul wꞌrek ammakka ngkwongothe ka kang.”
Amma onon thaik thathittettarene cik ana ikkoik tothun ella thongarot cik, noꞌrumoik akka onon okittaro.
Ittina mpiꞌret non itti nikkoik thikkoik ithaKanang ikupupure koKapik kongothe ana nthannomakot ila ka kon kongothe.

Akka lon ilaka konon kongothe Kanang ikupupure koKapik kannangkot ana ila Kanang ikupupure kongothe ka konon kannangkot, elli aluleꞌra laꞌrarot ana lakannoka tothun. Ana ittina ngkwannokkot ila ngkwongothe itti ngkwakkot.
Anaruk amma Kanang ikupupure koKapik akkaik kitteng ittina ngkwakannoka inyaun nyolon ilocoꞌrotheik.
Lon ilaka kangothe lakoronno kin akin okkot lon lokithak ammakka itti, thaꞌro nul nuthuk ana thongat lon ilokithak ana namat,
thaꞌrane aꞌrupu wothurukut ngaꞌrama ana thaꞌruthuththaro ana thꞌraro ana thaꞌretto ana thonyira ana thua ka ana thipot ka thoura ana thopettako ngkuthuk perek
ana ul ianyira ana ikko ngapak cannan ana aꞌraro ngngin kurekkurek. Mperene non ammakka mperenet non mencen ana mpei papperenenon itti okkwion ithakkot lon elli thaKapik kannethet thaꞌrthan thung.
Anaruk Kanang koKapik ikupupure kethettot thongarot ana thopira noka ana thomicco ana thoccokot cïkït ana thoporot ana thoccokot lon loKapik nocïkït cannan,
ella thipot ka thoura ana thoꞌrumo noka. Ana lon ammakka elli lella lon ilocoꞌrotheik.
Ana okkwion ithoccokothe lon loMiccie oIeccuo thoththet lon ila ka ken kongothe ammakka laik.
Inakka oron thaik thikkoik ngKanang koKapik, ittina oron thonu itti oron thakkot lon ila Kanang koKapik ikupupure kongothe.
Oron thonu itti oron thannipot ka thoura ana urttet ka cik ana onyirarane.
Pangkingon, amma pul pꞌrek poccokittathe lon ilokithak, onon ithonu Kannang ikupupure thonu itti onon thakenek kathar ikoporot kiccekicce. Anaruk noꞌrumo noka kon cakuruk akka anokkot ammakka ook.
Nittararot llon ilïmïn ana ittina onon thaꞌrumo nolon lomiccie.
Anaruk okkwi ipeꞌret itti ook poporot ana kwannoka poporot, kwaik pammikkot ka kung.
Apul okathacce ingre ngung kicce ana lon lung kappak akwopirakat noka nan akwantipot ka thoura, okorronno opri ook akkoporot noul wꞌrek.
Akka pul ponu itti pacco lon longre ngung inga kwokkothe ngka kung.
Ana okkwion ithaik thangkenetta lon loKapik thonu itti okin thikket ul iangkenekin aꞌrupu ioporot appik iakin thonu.
Kirnni ammikkot ka kang Kapik kannokkattat ngure nan pul pakio aꞌrupu iakkworat.
Okkwi ipeet akwopirie lon ila ka kung kongothe kwiot thio nan, ana okkwi ipeet akwopirie Kanang koKapik noka, kwiot thikkoik thothupuththuput noKanang koKapik.
Kirnni ipongore nothokkot lon iloporot akka ngkwiot lon loporot caꞌri ceꞌrek amma ngkwannocoꞌro ntit.
Ittina inenni akka oron thonu caꞌri tun okkinthet ul lon iloporot appik ana anganna ul ioccokothe lon loKapik nomïkït men.
Mpakurrinenon kaꞌramacak engki meꞌripil mittïttïk nukun win.
Ul iangkene ngkarra wongothe itti waruket non anokekkot, aul woIouth ongat kin. Okin thakkot elli othakka itti akin okorronno occokiettat thiak nti ilon loMiccie.
Akka okkwion ithokekkothe thaik thannomakot manna lon lothonceꞌret lon cik loMucca. Anaruk okin thongothe itti nthakekkot akin antipot ka thoura akka onon thoccïkothe lon len.

Naun mpella lon ilanipot ka thoura ngngin anaruk thio thoIli oIeccuo oMiccie nothapak tulluk akka ithen akkoronnorin anokorronno ikkoik ngkathar ika ul ikkoik ngngin ana okin thomma lon ila ampaik pikkine cik ittina.
Lakannoka tulluk ithokekkot manna annoka thokekkot thoporot anaruk inopul iponyi iloporot itti pul paka pokwontat pie.
Athomicco ana thiak oka nokkwion ithaik thamakot lon elli manna noul woIccereil ul woKapik.
Nciki inenni apul ella ipamien cik akka mponu uꞌret woIeccuo noka kin.
Pangkingon, athoporot thoIli wonnon oIeccuo oMiccie oka nanon appik. Amin.
Ephesians: Lon elli naun oPoluc pul pothothïlettat poMiccie oIeccuo ammakka Kapik kongothe, mpaik pakurrine ul iupupure woKapik iaik nokaꞌran kApuccuc ioccokothe lon loMiccie oIeccuo.
Athoporot ana thomicco noKapik oNgappa ponnon ana naIli oIeccuo oMiccie oka nanon.
Athopira noka oka noKapik ana oNgappa poIli oIeccuo oMiccie, okkwi ipethiet ton nthethieko appik thoKanang ikupupure korothiꞌrot iaMiccie,
akka nthongarot thung kwocumot ton nti iul ngkꞌran kung acapu ncik appik carthuk okuꞌretta cik itti aron oka thupupure ana thella thorukettat cik tokït kung
Akka Kapik kopirat noka ana kongothe, conat lon itti kathikkieron nyukul nyung oIeccuo oMiccie ngngin.
Ittina oron thapirane Kapik noka nti ithrïk thung ana thoporot itha kwethet ton nuthuk ikkul wung ia kwongothe.
Kapik kapaꞌrthan pothoporot ilen akka oMiccie pokerinet ton ngüccük ngung ana occïkïnthet ton lon lonnon ilokithak.
Kwethet ton thoporot thung thoppot ana thinaik nti ica appik ana thina lon.
Kapik kittinet ton lon lung ilamuꞌruttakot ncik loMiccie, lon ilonu itti lathothakka ammakka thongat thung itha kwongothe iaMiccie.
Lon ila kwonekketheik laik itti kwamartto itti amma maꞌri mocothakothe kwaꞌrntot aꞌrupu wonocapu appik ana worothiꞌrot ikkun woMiccie.
Oron thummuntat appik ngkꞌran kung, ammakka kwonat lon ica loMiccie itti kwakkot lon appik ammakka kwongothe.
Ittina ton opirane Kapik noka ana ethok thrïk akka oron thocittokït ithonekkethe mïkït naMiccie.

Onon cakuruk thothakkat ul woMiccie nci ammakka onon thoccïkothe lon ilaik ïcat iloporot loIeccuo lothoꞌrettat thang. Kapik kokkothe kurret nanon ngKanang ikupupure ikonekkettanthet ton cik onon ithoccokothe lon loMiccie.

Kanang ikupupure kakene itti Kapik kapakket ton naꞌrupu ia kwonekkenthet ton lon cik ngngin puccuk aKapik okerat ton aron othakka ul wung. Kwokkothe elli othakka itti aron opiranok noka ana ethok thrïk.
Manakka mpoccïkothe lon lothoccokot tholon loIli oIeccuo nomïkït mon ana thongat ithanon thongothe ul appik iupupure woKapik,
mpakorronno ocoꞌrat nti ithopirane Kapik noka ana okwarttikot non iaꞌrama ngin.
Mpicca pipitto itti aKapik koIli oIeccuo oMiccie oththan ponnon iprïk ethet non Kanang kothina cik nti ica ana thittako tholon ncik othakka itti anon inak kicce.

Mpaꞌra ngaꞌrama cakuruk itti angatheꞌre ngon anyo animma kꞌran ikacco othakka itti annina itti thoꞌrïkot cik thiatha itha kwakkarothenon ana thaꞌrthan ithrïk itha kwonekkenthet non cik itti nthapakkot nan anoul ipupupure wung,
ana puꞌran iprïk ipella pangken cik ipa kwethet ton ithoccokothe lon loIeccuo. Puꞌran pen pikkoik ere ipa kwaik pareko ngngin,
ipurokiet oMiccie nti ithio apikkiekathok cik noprrok pothrïk thokkun wothothari tothiꞌrot.
Kapik konu lon ikkun appik antoka manna nili ana puꞌran ana ul wꞌrek ana okorronno oka noluput elli tulluk ana manna noluput ilanthan cakuruk.
Ana Kapik konekkekathe aꞌrupu iracok toMiccie appik ana kothikkiekathok ca caꞌrupu appik conupan noKapik ikkoik noporot.
Ana tupan toKapik takakung, ana iren lon ncik appik loMiccie ana kwakkot lon ncik appik ook iponu lon ikkun appik.
Ana nanon, onon thokat thillethe ithokkot lon lon ila moloko ana nti ilon lon ilokithak,
ilanon thokat tit akka nthommakothe lon lonocapu ncik appik ana lopul pothopulut ili wocik corithiꞌrot ana kanang iakorronno ul aꞌra lon loKapik.

Oron appik cakuruk thikkot cik iakin aron ommakot lon ilokithak ana lon ila ka konnon kongothe. Ammakka ul wꞌrek, ana ammakka lon laik, oron thonu itti oron thuako ka ken ngKapik ammakka kuat ka kopilingon.
Anaruk nti ithongat cannan itha kwongotheron, Kapik okkwi ipapaꞌrthan pothiak,
pokkiet ton cik oMiccie ngngin ana manna akka oron thokat thillethe ithokkot lon ilamoloko, onon thoꞌrettathe nthoporot thung.
Ana Kapik kurokiet ton oron oMiccie ana kwikkiet ton cik aththut naꞌran tothiꞌrot iaMiccie oIeccuo,
othakka itti noluput ilanthan kwakeneron thaꞌrthan thothoporot thung ithella pangken cik itha kwokkinthet ton ithongat thoMiccie oIeccuo.
Akka onon thoꞌrettathe nti ithoporot nthoccokot lon nocïkït. Ana lon len lakannoka nanon, Kapik kethet non nuthuk,
ana okorronno oka ngngre othakka itti akka apilin manna appipot ka thoura.
Akka oron ithokkattathe nyaun nyoKapik ithokuꞌrettat ncik iaMiccie oIeccuo aron okkot lon iloporot ila Kapik konekkenthet ton cik nci maꞌrot.
Ittina nokwarttikot itti onon ithokat thakorronno okwonta ul woIouth ana nthokat annomettat itti “okin thakannokekkot” okkwion ngngin ithamet ka ken itti “okin ithokekkothe”

nokwarttikot itti caꞌri cen onon thokat ciththan nti iccik koMiccie, ana nthokat thakorronnoka ul woIccereil ana nthokat thellat ithonekket lon cik thoKapik, nthellat thoꞌrikot cik ana nthellat Kapik cik nocapu ncik appik.
Anaruk inenni iaMiccie oIeccuo, onon ithokat ciththan nti iccik koMiccie thonakattat napuththut ngngüccük ngoMiccie.
Akka oMiccie ngka kung pathomicco thonnon, kwothikkiet ul iannoka woIouth ana ul woIouth thulukku ana kwopaꞌret lon cik ilapetto iul,

kwopaꞌret lon lothonceꞌret lon cik loMucca ana lon ilonthomat ilattul nthio thung. Lon ila kwonat ica itti akwothikkiene ka kung ul wulukku iie nti iul enni aureꞌra nthopakket kin ikuꞌri aththuththeꞌra akin othakka ul ionyi iie,
ana thopakkot ikuꞌri then itti aul ionyi opakkot ikuꞌri okin oKapik nthapak na lon ilalikine thopakkot ikuꞌri lokkuttathe.
Kwaat ana kwongkenekathenon lon iloporot loKapik onon ithaththokat ciththan nti iccik kung ana ongkene okkwion lon lothomicco ithokat iccik kung.
Akka nti iaak oron appik thiot kathar ikaron oine oThthan ngngin ngKanang kulukku.
Ittina, onon thakannoka ana ul wokwat, anaruk ul wonoththok nul woKapik iupupure appik ana ul woruan thanung.
Nuno nomillang moul wothothïlettat woIeccuo ana ul wothernte lon loKapik, aIeccuo oka cillang coman ana mothok imunta ngngin.
Man moccokarothe appik iaak ana makuꞌrot amothakkakat tupan toKapik irupupure iIli.
Ana iaak onon cakuruk thuntathe ithun anon othakka kaꞌran na Kapik ikkoik ngKanang kung.
Nti ilon elli, oun oPoluc ipapul porikorrkkor poMiccie oIeccuo othakka itti anongkenenon ithakonnoka ul woIouth.
Ïcat, onon thoccïkothe itti Kapik kethin thoporot thung anongkenenon,
ana ilen lon ilamuꞌruttakot ncik ana littakinin ncik ithathantako thothitto lon loKapik ammakka mpokurrinet non nan lotte.
Ana amma onon akkakkaro lon elli ila mpaik pathïnthet non, onon thina thinaik thin tholon ilamuꞌruttakot ncik loMiccie,
ilokat lakinnittakine ul wꞌrek ncik nci maꞌrot ammakka littakinet thiki enthi ncik inenni thothothïlettat woKapik ithupupure ana ul wothernte lon loKapik ngKanang koKapik.

Lon ilamuꞌruttakot ncik lonu itti llon, iloporot loKapik, ul iakannoka woIouth wapakkot naꞌrupu nul woIccereil ana okin thaka ithun ika kulukku ana okin thonu itti okin thacco lon ilonekkettatheik ilanthan iaMiccie oIeccuo.
Mpothakkat pul iparekine lon iloporot loKapik nthoporot thoKapik itha kwethin nuthuk nthoreko thopuꞌran pung.

Antoka manna itti mpokat potteik cannan ithoccokot lon loKapik nocïkït nti iul appik ioccokothe lon loKapik anaruk Kapik kethin thoporot enthi itti anongkene ul iakannoka woIouth thaꞌrthan ithaik iaMiccie ithakorronno omattat,
ana itti anokene ul appik lon ilamuꞌruttakot ncik thupuththuput iKapik ikokuꞌret aꞌrupu ncik appik.
Ila konat ica itti aul ioccokothe lon loIeccuo inie nili nan ana ul ionu lon ikkun naꞌran tothiꞌrot thinaik nti ica thoKapik appik,
ammakka ila Kapik konu ica lothupuththuput ana ila kwocothothe iaMiccie oIeccuo Ili wonnon.
Ana iaak ana nthoccokot tholon lung nomïkït, oron thaine Kapik ella nꞌre.
Ana ittina mpipittot non itti nokorronno apo ka ntit nti ithiak itha mpaik paccokot nti ianon akka thanane non thrïk.
Nti ilon elli mpee ungku ncik tokït koNgappa,
na kuꞌri kung appik korothiꞌrot ana nocapu occietta kꞌran ngngin.
Ana mpaꞌra ngaꞌrama itti nothaꞌrthan thothrïk thung akwopoꞌrie mïkït mon than mpuꞌran poKanang kung,
othakka itti aMiccie ikkoik nomïkït mon nthoccokot tholon loKapik nomïkït mon. Ana mpaꞌra ngaꞌrama itti athongarot thon occokot cik nomïkït mon ana opoꞌrathan,
athona puꞌran tothun mpuꞌran poul iupupure woKapik annina thongarot thoMiccie thape tat ana thukwit tat ana tharat ciki icarak than.
Othakka itti annina thongarot thoMiccie itharrothe thinaik cik appik, othakka itti athikkoik thon othakka ammakka Kapik kongothe itti onon thaka.
Laine Kapik appik ikokkothe lon loppot ilakannekkietta nolon ilaron ipitto ana ilaron thellat ima itti lakaik mpuꞌran pung ipaik pareko iaron.
Athrïk oka naak iul ioccokothe lon loIeccuo ana iaMiccie oIeccuo ana ithiki ithanthan appik thupuththuput. Amin.
Ammakka pul porikorrkkor poIli, mpiꞌret non itti onon thikkoik thikkoik ithakene itti Kapik kakkarot non.
Nokorronno ipot ka thoura, noka thoporot ana occokot mïkït ilon ana ocoꞌrarot nthongarot.
Nopoꞌrathan Nothoꞌrumo thothoka thoKanang tothun nthikkoik thoporot.
Ka kaik kulukku ana Kanang kulukku ammakka onon thakkarakothe thoꞌrïkot oMiccie thulukku caꞌri ica onon thakkarakot.
Ili waik wulukku ana thoccokot lon nocïkït thulukku ana mamuthie mulukku,
Kapik kulukku ana oththan poul appik iprïk naron appik ana kareko iaron appik ana kaik iaron appik.
Anaruk oron thoccot thoporot kurekkurek ammakka oMiccie pillillinet ton tit.
Ilen akka liꞌrenet itti,
“Akka kwokuꞌrothe kapik,
kwonekot ul woppot ia kwocciccokothe
ana kwikkekathe ul aꞌrupu wothethet nuthuk.”
(Ngintha akkonu itti “kwokuꞌrothe tokapik” lonu itti kuot ciththothïrïn kappak akwantokuꞌrot tokapik?
ana ook ipuot thothïrïn ook pen ipokuꞌrothe ci toꞌra worothiꞌrot appik akwoppat cik appik.)

Ook ipethet ul lon itti opilingon thathakka ul iangkene woIeccuo oMiccie ana opilingon othakka ul wothernte lon loKapik ana opilingon ithangkene ul lon ioloprot loKapik ana ul wonoppan toKapik ana opilingon ul iangkene,
othakka itti aul okuccekot cik woKapik iareko ngre ngung, othakka itti aul ioccokothe lon loMiccie ina lon lung kicce ana oka woppot.
Ittina aron appik okakat tothun thulukku ithoccokot lon lung nomïkït ana ina ukul woKapik ana oron ocokka iaak llon aron arppithakat oron oMiccie ana othakka ammakka ook kirrkkir.
Ittina oron thakannoka ammakka nyukul inyarran, inyalon oprtto ere thopangka thoiꞌre ana lon lothongkene thoul ngkarra aukkukkot ere kanang amma akokkurarot cik akin urttakat cik.
Anaruk, ntrun ere lon ilaik ïcat nthongarot aron ocokkat iaak llon appik ook oMiccie ipaca coka.
Kwocurttariethe ka ncik appik tothun, ana amma ka ikocurttariettathe orekot tothun, ittina kaik kittarot ka akocokka ithongarot.
Ittina mpiꞌret non elli ngkꞌran koIli, itti nokorronno ikkoik karkko ul iakannoka woIouth akka thokwarattikot cik then thella lon cik.
Nyatheꞌre nyen nyaik iꞌrïmak ana nyomma ina lon ana okin thaik ciththan nti ithikkoik thoKapik nti ithommaik ithaik iakin ana thonthoma ma then.
Anakka okin thellat mïkït ikarak, okin thikkatheik akin okkot lon lulluk lonamat ila ka ken kongothe akin okorronno omana.
Anaruk onon thammat oMiccie ngkathar engki
onon thoccïkothe lon loMiccie ana onon thongkenettat lon lung ilulukku llon ilaik ïcat ilaik iaIeccuo
nokorronno kathar kothikkoik thon ithanon thokat tit tokït ana opaꞌrine lon cik ilïpe ilokat lokïttakot llon lothongat aꞌrupu ilokat ngkarra.
Anyathꞌre nyon ana Kanang othakka thie
nikkoik thikkoik ithie, itha Kapik kokkothe ithaik ïcat annothakka ere Kapik nthikkoik thoporot ana thupupure.
Ittina nopaꞌrine karra cik annerene ul wonocuruk cang lon ilaik ïcat akka oron thoka kulukku.
“Ana amma onon thuarot ka ken nokorronno okkot lon ilokithak” nokorronno okorronno itti cïngkï carungkwo anon tharthuk thuaro ka ken
nokorronno ethet pul pothopulut kaꞌran.
Okkwi ipokat cik akwomunye akwokorronno thuꞌran, anaruk, kwonu itti kwareko nynyaun nyung akwina akka akwittarot okkwion ithella aꞌrupu cik.
Nokorronno oppiet lon thapat ilokithak nti ithon thon, anaruk lon lulluk iloporot ilittarot ul aupokko llon ilakin thonu itti okin thupokko ngngin ana alinakiet okkwion ithaik thaccïkot.
Nokorronno uet Kanang ikupupure koKapik ka cik, ikanon thonemittathe ngngin annoꞌrïkot caꞌri cothopakkettat.
Nopaꞌrine lon lothꞌraro nomïkït ana theꞌretto mpoꞌre cittan ana thua ka ana thocungkaro ana lon appik ilokithak.
Nongarot ana iparo thiak then appik, ana occïkarnthet lon ammakka Kapik koccïkïnthet non lon nti ilon loMiccie.
Ninikot Kapik ammakka nyukul nyung inyongakothe.
Nikkoik thikkoik ithonu thongarot ammakka oMiccie pongatheron ana kwangkathe itti kwio nti ilon lonnon ere amutha ana papu pothokiot ngüccük poKapik.
Anaruk nthonu itti nthakorronno aꞌraro ngngin nuthuk ana thrïk nan ana namat, akka lonu itti lakorronno oka ianon akka lakorronnoka loporot noul iupupure woKapik.
Nokorronno ere lon ilokithak ana lon ilella lon cik ana ngure iokithak iakannoka ngoporot anaruk nopirane Kapik noka.
Akka onon thina kicce itti pul ipaꞌro nul nuthuk ana aꞌro mpangken alla pul ionu thrïk nan, pul ammakka empi ponekkethe cïkït naꞌrupu woka noKapik ana pakorronno opakkot noIli ngoMiccie ana ngoKapik.
Nokorronno okorronno itti opilin pammikkot non llon lella lon cik, akka thua ka thoKapik thaine ul wen iakorronno occïkot lon loKapik.
Ittina nokorronno oka ithun naththungon.
Akka onon thaththokat iꞌrïmak caꞌri cꞌrek, ana inenni onon thothakkat kꞌran iIli. Ittina nikkoik ammakka nyukul nyokꞌran.
(akka lon ilanthan nokꞌran lathoprot appik ncik ammakka itti thikkoik thoporot tokït koKapik ana lon ilaik ïcat)
ana thakwancot lon ilapirie Ili noka.
Nokorronno oka ithun llon lorïꞌrïmak ilella lon cik, anaruk okene itti lokithak tat.
Akka lon ila ul iakorronno occïkot lon okkot nthuꞌran lothiettot cik itti langanta.
Anaruk aꞌrupu appik iakꞌran occo nan wimmako attattar
akka kꞌran akkakorronno lon alimmako attattar. Ilen akka liꞌrettanet itti,
“Uroki nti inthe okkwi ipaik inthe,
uroki nti ithio,
ana kꞌran koMiccie kacco naung.”
Noꞌrumo nothikkoik thon papenang nokorronno ikkoik ammakka ul iommaik nti ima anaruk nikkoik ammakka ul inaik nti ima,
nokorronno ikkoik nuthuk, nokkot lon lꞌrek nocaꞌri icanon thaik nan akka maꞌri emmi mokithak.
Ittina nokorronno oka thommaik nti ima anaruk nina lon ila Ili wongothe itti onon thakkot.
Nokorronno okorronno itti ngapak ngakkwot non akka ngakorronno non annokkot lon lokithak cannan, anaruk nokorronno Kanang akoppappat ianon.
Nerettarne llon nti iatham woMocumur, ana unye wothopirie Kapik noka ana unye iaKanang ikupupure ethettot. Nongwina Ili ana opirane noka nci nocïkït.
Nopirane Kapik noka oNgappa nti ilon appik appinappin ngkꞌran koIli wonnon oIeccuo oMiccie.
Noccïkarot nthothiak thoMiccie.
Ul iari nothiane olle pangon cik ammakka anothiane Ili cik.
Akka pul ipocura paca copari pung ammakka oMiccie paca coul ioccokothe loIeccuo ia ka kung ana ook ipa Thoꞌret then.
Ana ammakka ul ioccokothe lon loIeccuo wathiane oMiccie cik ul cakuruk iari ittat wonu itti wathiane ollen cik llon appik.
ꞌRe, nongat ari won ammakka oMiccie pongathe ul ioccokothe lon loIeccuo mono akwiat nti ilon len
othakka itti akwothikkie tupupure, ana ime ngngꞌri ialon,
kwokkothe ittina akwothikkiene ka kung ul ioccokothe lon loIeccuo wollio wella nguꞌru nan ana orthin nan ana lon ilokithak ana kupupure ilaa thurikettacik thorukwettat llon.
Ana cakuruk ul iomura wonu itti wangat ari wen ammakka wongothe ka ken. Okkwi ipongothe opari pung, kwongothe ka kung.
Ittina pul pella ipꞌra ka kung anaruk kwaꞌrumo nan kicce ana oꞌrikie thuꞌrit ammakka oMiccie okkinthet ul ioccokothe lon loIeccuo
akka oron thono ka kung.
Ammakka atham wiꞌret itti, “Ittina ilen akka pul ipocura oththene naththan ana onnan apokattakot okin opari akin othakka aththuththeꞌra ka kulukku.”
Lon elli ilamuꞌruttakot ncik ilrïk anganna, anaruk mpaik peret oMiccie ana ul ioccokothe lon loIeccuo.
Ittina, ngkwonu itti ngkwangat pari pang ammakka ngkwongothe ka kang ana pul ipopari ponu itti pathiane olle cik.
Nyukul, noccïkot oththen akka Ili akkiꞌret, akka locoꞌrotheik menik.
“Nothiane oththe cik ana onne” Akka lon len akkaik prek nolon ilattul ilonu thonekket lon cik tit,
“itti alon okanung loporot ana itti aikkoik nocapu luput loppot.”
Ana mpiꞌret oththangon itti, nokorronno uet nyukul ka cik, anaruk nupotho kin nthongkenekin ana ocimitto kin llon ila Ili wongothe.
Iak, noccïkot opït pangon thonocapu nthothiaik ana nꞌre, ana ncïkït cella karra ammakka annoccïkot oMiccie.
Noccïkot kin okorronno oka tulluk itti annopiriekin noka akka okin thaik thakathaccenon, anaruk noreko ammakka iak woMiccie iaik wakkot lon ila Kapik kongothe nomïkït mon.
Nokkot ngre ncïkït culukku ere ngkwaik parekine Ili ana okorronno oka ul ionyi,
akka onon thina itti Ili wakke ul kurekkurek nore ioporot ia kwokkothe antoka manna itti kwapiak ana manna itti kwannoka papiak.

Ana opïngon, nokkinthet kin lon ammakka okin okkinthet non, nokorronno ipiekin nꞌre, akka onon thina itti onon appik thonu opït pon pulukku paik tothiꞌrot ana ittina lella itti pul pella ipoporot napang tokït kung.
Ittina pꞌrin, mpiꞌret non itti nopoꞌra than ilon loIli ana ipuꞌran pung iprïk ipakannalkakot.
Nako amarang woKapik appik othakka itti annina akka annorro ilon lopul pothopulut appik.
Akka thoꞌrak thonnon thakannoka iul ionyi anaruk inili ana ingili ana ipuꞌran pocapu enci icaik iꞌrïmak ana iul irro iauꞌrupa iokithak iaik naꞌran worokapik.
Ittina nako amarang woKapik appik, othakka itti amma caꞌri icokithak caat, aina akka arro ithoꞌrak thang ana amma ngkwakot aꞌrupu appik ngkwaꞌrungkwot cik ponthomat.
Ittina nothïpoik kiththik, ngkuꞌrat ikïn kolon ilaik ïcat, ana ngkamarang koropere kolon iloporot tokït koKapik,
ana ako wok akuccekot cik atherene ul lon iloporot lothomicco.
Ana llon elli appik, nako kamarang koropere ikonu itti thoccokot lon nomïkït angwo mopok molik mopul pothopulut.
Nako nyumurra nyorima inyonu itti thoꞌrettat anekat kꞌrittang ikukwit koKanang ikonu itti lon loKapik.
Ana naꞌra ngaꞌrama appinappin ngKanang nolon appik ilannipitto kurekkurek. Ilon elli ima nokorronno ikkoik ithuman noꞌrungkot nan aꞌrane ul ipupupre woKapik ngaꞌrama appik.
Naꞌranin ngaꞌrama cakuruk othakka itti amma ananyo thon itti anere alon ettathin anokene lon ilamuꞌruttakot ncik iloporot loKapik ella nꞌre
ittina mpaik inyol ana icci mpaik pangkene lon loKapik ammakka pul ipothïlathe poKapik. Ittina naꞌranin ngaꞌrama othakka itti anoꞌrungkwot nan ere lon lung ella nꞌre ammakka mponu itti mpaka.
Opangkin oThikikkoc ipa mpongothe ana ipoꞌrumot nore ngoIli perenenon lon appik, othakka itti anon ina cakuruk itti mparat ana ngimpen akka mpaik pakkot.
Mpaik pathïnthet non ngok nti ilon len othakka itti annina itti onïn tharat ana othakka itti akwittarot non.
Athomicco oka napangkingon, ana thongarot nthoccokot lon nomïkït noKapik oNgappa ana Ili oIeccuo oMiccie.
Athoporot oka nakkwion ithongothe Ili wonnon oIeccuo oMiccie thongat ithakannomattat aththik.
Philippians: Naun oun oPoluc ana oThimiththaoc itharekine oMiccie oIeccuo. Lon elli lainenon appik ul iupupure woKapik woMiccie oIeccuo nokaꞌran koPilippi ana ul ionu lon ikkun loul ioccokothe lon loIeccuo ana ul iittarot ul ioccokothe lon loIeccuo.
Athoporot ana thomicco thoKapik oNgappa ponnon ana Ili oIeccuo oMiccie oka nanon.
Mpapirane Kapik kin noka amma anokwarttikot non.
Nothaꞌra ngaꞌrama thin appik itha anaꞌranenon appik appinappin. Mpaꞌra nthopira noka
akka oron thokat ithun ithere lon iloporot loIeccuo nci nocaꞌri icanon thoccïkothe lon loIeccuo nan manna inenni.
Mpina kicce itti Kapik ikokuꞌret ngre ncik ioporot ianon, kaꞌrungkot nore ngung puccuk acaꞌri akkakat amma oMiccie oIeccuo okkaprttako ntan.

Laik ïcat naun itti mpana thiak thon appik akka mpongothe non cannan, antoka manna itti mpaik ikorrkkor ana orrot noꞌron iloporot loIeccuo ana okene itti lon len laik ïcat onon appik thaik ithoporot thoKapik uraththut.
Kapik kina tat akka mpongothe itti mpimma non appik ana tat akka anokatha lon ammakka oIeccuo oMiccie pokat cik akwokatha lon lon.
Ana mpaꞌra ngaꞌrama itti thongat thon ithanon thongarothe tharttakot nan, ana anon oꞌrungkot nan ocokka ithinaik thon
othakka itti annina lon nti ipangken iloporot ana anon oka thupupure, ella thorukettat cik acaꞌri akkakat coMiccie.
Mpaꞌra ngaꞌrama itti athikkoik thon oka thokkot lon iloporot loIeccuo nthittarot thoIeccuo oMiccie, akka elli lanane Kapik thïrïk ana thopira noka.
Pangkingon, mpongothe itti onon thina itti ilokkattathe naun cene ilokithak appik, littarot thopettot ngre ngolon iloporot loIeccuo cik.
Ul enni appik ana manna ul irro woRoma iangwot cik wina itti mpïꞌrïkïkkakot nynyol nti ilon loMiccie.
Thïꞌrïkïkkako thin nynyol thothikkiet opangkingon thoppot ithanïn thaik ilon loIli akin ere lon loKapik arttot nan ella nꞌre.
Laik ïcat itti opilingon thangkene lon loMiccie nthella mïkït nan. Anaruk opilingon thangkene akin thongothe.
Okin ithangkene akin thongothe, okin then thangkene nthongarot ana okin thina kicce itti Kapik konekkethin cik cene othakka itti anaꞌrettine ngre ngolon iloporot loIeccuo.

Okin ithangkene thella mïkït nolon, okin thangkene anaruk okin thakannongkene papenang amma akin ongkene ul lon loMiccie. Okin there akin thonu lon lꞌrek nomïkït ana okorronno oka mmïkït moporot, akin thongothe itti ntharttot nothoccokot thiak thin ikorrkkor.

Anaruk mpopirat noka itti lon loMiccie laik langkenetta, antoka manna itti laik langkenetta nthella mïkït nolon ana ngkathar ikocoꞌrotheik ilen akka mpopiranet noka cannan ana mpaꞌrungkot popirat noka.
Akka mpina itti ngngaꞌrama ngon ana nthittarot thoKanang ikupupure koIeccuo oMiccie, lon ila mpaik tit lakorronnon anelikkako nti ikorrkkor.

Mpongothe ana mpaik paꞌrïkot cik itti mpakannapiet ngre ngꞌrek cik ana mpakannokkot ngre iathien cik. Amma mpantikkoik ana manna io, mpongothe itti mpaka pinangka ammakka mpaik inenni anothikkie oMiccie pothiakinet cik nnul appik.
Lon iloporot naun cannan itti amma mpakkoik ana mpakkoik anomereket oMiccie ana thio nti ilon lung thathikkie thikkoik thin thoporot cannan.
Anaruk amma ilen akkonu itti mpakkoik ana mponu itti mpakkot lon iloporot anaruk mpomma ila anummo ntit itti mpio ana manna mpakkoiki.?
Mponu mïkït meꞌrarit mpongothe itti mpio anïn oka ïnnoMiccie ana ilen akkoporot naun.
Anaruk loporot cannan nanon itti mpaꞌrungkot cik okorronno io.
Mpina elli kicce, ana mpina itti mpaꞌrungkot ithoꞌrkït thon appik othakka itti anittarot non ithoccokot lon nomïkït thon annopirakat noka
othakka itti amma anappanthan attang athopira noka thon apparttakot nan iaMiccie oIeccuo nti ilon lin.

Iloporot cannan inenni itti onon thakkoik, thikkoik itha lon iloporot loIeccuo oMiccie longothe itti onon thakkoik, othakka itti amma mpaik ianon ana manna mpella, mpaccïkot itti onon thoꞌrumot nolon ilanon thonu ithun ana ilen itti onon thaik thaꞌrettine thoccokot tholon nomïkït tholon iloporot loIeccuo.
Nokorronno opellene thoꞌrak thon, akka lon len lakene itti okin thalkakot ana Kapik kaꞌret non.
Akka onon thonu itti ntharekine oMiccie okorronno oka nthoccokot lon nomïkït tulluk anaruk nthoccokot thiak nti ilon lung.
Onon thimmarin akka anoccokot thiak ana onon tharthuk thaik thaccïccïkot lon lothoccokot thiak thin. Inenni nthonu itti onon thaccokot thiak ammakka menik cakuruk.
Thikkoik thon ilon annoMiccie thaik thittarot non, thongat thung, itha kwongothe non thaik thathikkienon thoporot, onon thaik tothun ngKanang koKapik ana onarot thiak then.
Ittina nomartto thopira noka thin nthona lon lulukku ana thongarot thulukku ana ona cïkït culukku ana lon ilanon thongothe itti onon thakkot aloka lulukku.
Nokorronno okkot ngre nthipot ka thoura anaruk noccïkarot ana okatha ul itti okin akkoporot nanon.
Nokorronno occot kït noka kon tulluk anaruk nokatha ul wꞌrek cakuruk.
Kathar ikanon okwarttikot cik ngngin konu itti kaka ammakka oIeccuo oMiccie pokat cik akwokwarttikot cik ngngin,
OIeccuo pokat Kapik ïcat
anaruk kwakannaꞌrakat cik nan itti okin tharppithat okin oKapik.
Anaruk kwopaꞌrinet lon elli cik appik
ana kwangkathe itti kwaka pul iparekine ul
ana kwokwontakathe ammakka pul iponyi.
Ana akka kwokat ammakka pul iponyi,
kwoccikathe lon loKapik mono akwiat nothapak.
Ittina Kapik konekathok nokaꞌran ikothiakinet cik
ana kekathok kꞌran ikirik noꞌran appik.
Ittina ul appik weene kꞌran koIeccuo toma ncik
iaik tothiꞌrot ana iaik nocapu ana iaik thothïrïn.
Ana ul appik weret tokït koul itti oIeccuo oMiccie ook Ili,
nthokkot ittina okin thaik thanane Kapik oNgappa thïrïk.

Ittina pangkingon, onon thokat annoccïkot lon lin appinappin caꞌri icaron thokat ithun, ana amma mpantella annokorronno ocoꞌro nti ilon len, noꞌrungkot nore okkot nnꞌre ana okkwe ka othakka itti anniot thoꞌrettat noKapik.
Akka Kapik akkaik kareko ianon annongat ana okkot ngre ammakka kwongothe ncïkït coporot.
Nokkot lon appik ella thaꞌretto ana manna thopllarot.
Othakka itti apul ella iparukwet non llon ilokithak onon itha nyukul nyoKapik ithoꞌrkït thothiki enthi thurat cik ana ithakannoccïkot lon ana wolon ilokithak, onon ithaccieik ere mothot morothiꞌrot.
Noꞌrumo nolon lothikkoik ila Kapik konat, othakka itti amma oMiccie okkaprttako ntan mpipot ka thoura ana oka popirat noka itti mpakannokinyat cik nuthuk ana ngre ngin ngakannurat cik nuthuk.
Thoccokot lon loIli nomïkït thon ana ngre ngon ngaik ere papu pothokinthok ngüccük cik. Ana ngüccük ngin ngonu itti nguntat cik mpapu pothokiot ngüccük cik.
Ana amma mpiot menik ana mpapira noka ana oron thapira noka unnaththut.
Ittina onon thaka thongothe lon len ana oron opira noka cakuruk unnaththut.
Mpongothe amma Ili oIeccuo wiꞌret itti ïï ana mpathïnthet non oThimiththaoc aththman othakka itti anoccïkot lon lon naak anapot cïkït cik.
Mpella pul pꞌrek cik ammakka ook ipakatha lon lon papenang.
Akka ul appik waik wakwariccat lon loka ken tulluk okonnoka lon loIeccuo oMiccie.
Anaruk onon thina oThimiththaoc papenang, akka kwokenet itti kwarekot ncïkït coporot ook iporekot ïnaththeꞌra ammakka ukul akin oththan, ïnopettot lon cik iloporot loIeccuo.
Mpongothe itti mpathïnthet non ngok accokkot amma oun akkina itti ngimpen akkaik painin.
Ana mpina itti amma Ili wiꞌret itti ïï ana mpaik panthan anathokatha non ngka kin.

Anaruk mpakatha itti loporot cannan itti mpathïnthet non opangkin Approthiththoc ipanïn thaik thareko ïnaththeꞌra iiere ngoKapik ipanïn thrrothe nolon loKapik, ipanon thothïothe ntan itti kwathittarothin.
Inenni mpaik pathïnthet non Approthiththoc akka kwonu thiak cannan itti kwimma non ana kwakannoka poporot noka akka onon thoccïkothe itti kwongo.
Kwokat pongo cannan ere kwio. Anaruk Kapik kipot thiak thung ana okonnoka naak pellek anaruk naun cakuruk othakka itti anïn okorronno occokot thiak nothiak ithaik.
Ilen akka anattakine cik itti mpathïnthet non ngok akka mpina itti amma onon thimmarok attang, onon thapira noka ana menik mpapot cïkït cik.
Nikkiek cik nthopira noka ammakka opang pon ilon loIli. Nothiane ul cik appik iarekine Kapik karkkung.
Akka kwokat cik ere kwiot iire ngoMiccie ana kwoccokothe thiak othakka itti akwomartto ngre inganon thakannokkinthin akka onon thaik ciththan.
Pangkingon ittina pꞌrin, nopira noka akka onon thoIli. Mpakannokinya itti mpappokurrinenon lon len. Othakka itti annikkoik thoporot nti ithongkenetta thokarra.
Noꞌrumoik noluk ellꞌre, ul enirik iakkot lon ilokithak ana okin ithongothe itti okin thakekkiet ul athakka ul woKapik.

Oron akkokekkothe thokekkot ithaik ïcat, akka oron thaꞌrane Kapik ngaꞌrama ngKanang koKapik ana opira noka nothikkoik thonnon ithun unoMiccie oIeccuo. Oron thakannonekket cïkït nolon lokamuthe koka kopul iponyi

antoka manna itti mponu lon locoꞌrotheik itti mpanekket cïkït nolon lokamuthe koka koul ionyi. Ana amma opilingon thonu ilakin onekkenthet cïkït nolon ilakin thaik thakkot ngka ken ana mponu manna loppot cannan nakin.
Mpokwontat nti ikuthuk koIccereil ana popothok poPeniemin ana mpokekkothe ampokwontat amponu maꞌri mormor. Oun poul woIpranin ana pothiki thoIpranin, ana mpaccïkot lon ilocoꞌrotheik loPriccin.
Ana akka mpokat pongothe itti mpapirie Kapik noka, mpikkatheik anoccokiet ul ioccokothe lon loIeccuo thiak.
Ana mpokat cik anoccot kït nolon ilocoꞌrotheik othakka itti anella lon cik ilamoloko.
Mpokat cik aniꞌre itti lon elli appik lokat loporot anaruk inenni mpakatha itti lella lon cik nti ilon lothina oMiccie.
Papu pella ipoporot cannan nothina oMiccie oIeccuo Ili win. Mpopaꞌrinet aꞌrupu cik appik ana mpokatha ere ngarang. OMiccie akka mpongothe itti mpina nolon ncik appik

ana onïn oka thulukku ïnaththeꞌra. Mpakannothikkie ka kin poporot tokït koKapik nthomakot lon ilocoꞌrotheik loMucca anaruk mponekkethe cïkït naMiccie itti kwathikkien poporot. Thothakka poporot tokït koKapik thathakka nthoccokot lon nocïkït.
Ila mpongothe appik itti mpina oMiccie ana puꞌran ipurukierok nti ithio. Mpongothe itti onïn thaccokot thiak ïnaththeꞌra aniat ïnaththeꞌra ammakka kwokkothe.
Othakka itti oun ngka kin anuroko nti ithio.
Mpakanniꞌre itti mpiothe lon elli pꞌrin ana mpakanniꞌre itti mpaik ammakka oMiccie pongothe itti mpaka anaruk mpaik paꞌrungkot nominya othakka itti aniot lon ila aMiccie oIeccuo pakkarothin.
Pangkingon, mpongothe itti mpiꞌret non itti mpakannoccokot papen aththik. Anaruk mpaik paꞌrumot kït nolon itti mpure nolon ilipe anokatha lon ilie ilaik tokït kin,
mpallot topapu ipa ul waik wallot tan othakka itti aniot papu pen ana papu pen pathakkarako thoKapik itha kakkarot ton oMiccie oIeccuo ngngin itti oron thathikkoik tothiꞌrot.
Oron appik thonu itti oron thaꞌrungkwot nolon loMiccie, thakwarttikot cik ana okkot ngre ngkathar engki. Ana amma opilingon thꞌrek nti ianon thaik thakannokkot ittina ana Kapik kakenenon.
Anaruk oron thonu itti oron thamakot lon ilaik ïcat ilaron thoccïkothe nci nan.
Pangkingon, mpongothe itti onon thinnikothin llon ana okatha okkwion ithaik thamakot lon lonnon ilaron thonekketheik itti lamakittat.
Mperentenet non ana mpaik papperene non inenni ngngeme ikït itti onon thaꞌrumoik akka ul woppot wꞌrat lon lothiot thoMiccie nothapak.
Okin thakittako, ana okin thakkot lon ila ka ken kongothe. Okin thipot ka thoura naꞌrupu iathiekin cik, ana okin thakwarttikot aꞌrupu wonocapu tulluk.
Anaruk oron thaul worothiꞌrot ana oron thaik thaꞌrikot pul pothoꞌret ponnon, Ili oIeccuo oMiccie akwanthan ntothiꞌrot,
ook iponu lon ikkun appik ana kwaprtto ka konnon cik konocapu akwothikkie ka konnon ammakka ka kung korothiꞌrot.
Pangkingon, onon itha mpongothe ana itha mpaik pakwancot itti mpimma, onon thonu itti onon thapira noka. Menik pangkingon, nikkoik ilon loKapik.
Mpipittot Apputhia ana oCcanththika akin ona lon lulukku ilon loIli oIeccuo.

Puruko pin iparekinin ncïkït coporot, mpipittothung itti, ngkwittarot ul iari enni wanïn thorekot ithun, oKklementhoc ana opilingon thꞌrek ïnopettot lon iloporot loIeccuo cik. ꞌRan wen wokurrakot iatham woKapik wothikkoik thupuththuput.
Nopira noka noIli appinappin. Ana mpappiꞌre attang itti nopira noka.
Nokorronno lon lon aloka loporot noul appik. Ili wakko napuththut waik wanthan.
Nokorronno opelle anaruk amma onon aꞌra ngaꞌrama nipittot Kapik aꞌrupu appik ianon thongothe ngngaꞌrama ana ipitto nci nocïkït. Nopirane Kapik nolon ila kokkothe appik.
Ana thomicco thoKapik itha pul iponyi pakinnina thangwot mïkït mon ana nyatheꞌre nyon nyoporot iaMiccie oIeccuo.

Ana inenni pꞌrin pangkingon, nokwarttikot lon ilaik ïcat ana ilonu itti lathiakineik ana ilocoꞌrotheik. Nokwarattikot lon ilupupure ana ilongakothe. Nokwarattikot lon iloporot cannan ana ilonu itti lapirakine noka.
Lon ilanon thinat naun ana ilanon thonekot naun ana ilanon thoccïkothe naun ana ilanon thimmathe naun, noreko ngngin. Ana Kapik ikonu thomicco kaka nanon.
Mpopirat noka cannan nolon loIli akka onon thantokenen itti onon thakannure naun. Onon thokat thoꞌrumot naun anaruk onon thokat thakinniot kathar ikanon okenen ngngin itti onon thoꞌrumot naun.
Mpaik pakannaꞌrettakot itti mponu aꞌrupu wotteik anaruk mpina akka anikkoik naꞌrupu wotteik ia mponu.

Mpina akka anikkoik amma mpella aꞌrupu ana mpina akka anikkoik amma mponu aꞌrupu woppot. Mpina akka anikkoik ilon appik, mpantoka piamat ana manna mpothakathe, amma mponu aꞌrupu woppot ana manna mponu aꞌrupu wotte.
Mpakkot lon appik nthittarot thoMiccie okkwi ipethin puꞌran.
Lokat loporot nanon akka onon thittarothin ilon elli appik ilokat lalkothin.

Pangkingon nokaꞌran koPilippi, nokwarikot caꞌri conomun akka mpokat cik anongkenenon lon iloporot loIeccuo cïnang. Ana nocaꞌri ica mpoththet nanon noththok poMakthonia, ul wellat nti iul ioccokothe lon loIeccuo wittarothin, onon thulluk ul ioccokothe lon loIeccuo wonokaꞌran koPilippi akkittarothin.
Anakka manna mpokat cik nokaꞌran koThocculunukkia onon thothïlenthin aꞌrupu maꞌri moppot cakuruk.
Mpaik pakonnokwariccat kathar ikaniot aꞌrupu wꞌrek ngngin nanon, anaruk mpongothe itti onon thiot thethïetta ithao akka onon thittarothin.

Mpoccot aꞌrupu ianon thothïothe ntan ana manna arttot nan. Ana cannan aꞌrupu wothethet nuthuk ianon thothïothe Approthiththoc ngngin itti kwananin. Aꞌrupu wothethet nuthuk wen wikkoik ere utha iakkunako ikkua waꞌrupu wothethet nuthuk iokꞌrettat wothokinthet Kapik ngüccük cik ia Kapik kongothe ana kopiranet noka.
Ana Kapik kin kethet non ila nthongothe appik nothaꞌrthan thothïrïk thung ithettatheron iaMiccie oIeccuo.
Athïrïk oka noKapik ana oNgappa thupuththuput. Amin.
Nomicco ul iupupure woMiccie oIeccuo appik. Opangkingon ithanïn thaik cene thamicco non.
Ul iupupure woMiccie appik iaik cene wamicco non, ana anganna okkwion ithaik thareko tuan toKkaiccer ili woRoma.
Athoporot thoIli oIeccuo oMiccie oka nanon.
Colossians: Naun oPoluc, pul pothothïlettat poMiccie oIeccuo ammakka Kapik kongothe akkaik pakurrinenon lon elli, onïn thaik ïnopang ponnon oThimiththaoc.
Lon elli laine opang ponnongon ithupupure ana ithoꞌrumot nolon loMiccie nokaꞌran koKulucci. Athoporot thoKapik oNgappa ponnon ana thomicco thung oka nanon.
Onïn thapirane Kapik noka appinappin, oNgappa poIli oIeccuo oMiccie amma ïnaꞌranenon ngaꞌrama
akka onïn thoccïkothe lon lothoccokot lon loIeccuo oMiccie nomïkït thon ana lothongat ithanon thongothe ul appik iupupure woKapik.
Thoccokot lon nomïkït ana thongarot ithaik thanthan nothoꞌrïkot cik ithonekkettanthet ton cik tothiꞌrot ithanon thoccïkothe ngngin llon ilaik ïcat lolon iloporot loIeccuo ilainet non.
Lon elli laik larttakot nan nocapu appik ana opettakot cik ammakka lokat alokkot ianon nci nocaꞌri icanon thoccïkothe anninakat thoporot thoKapik ilon lung ilaik ïcat tit appik.
Onon thinat lon loKapik nApapprac, opurko pïn iire okkwi ipoꞌrumot nore ngonnon ngoMiccie nti ianon
ana okkwi iperenet nïn lon lothongarot thon Kanang koKapik kethet non.

Nti ilon elli ana nci nocaꞌri icanïn thoccïkothe lon lon, onïn thakorronno ocoꞌro nti ithaꞌranenon ngaꞌrama ana ipittot Kapik itti akethet non lon lung ila kwongothe itti onon thina ngKanang kung ikupupure ana ethet non thinaik nti ica.
Ana onïn thaꞌra ngaꞌrama othakka itti annikkoik thikkoik ammakka Ili wongothe ana annokkat ilapiriek noka llon appik, othakka itti athikkoik thon ona lon loporot ana ocokka ithina lon loKapik,
ana onïn cakuruk thaꞌranenon ngaꞌrama itti onon thathakka thonthomat mpuꞌran pothïrïk thung, othakka itti annoꞌrungkot ithoccokot mïkït llon ncik appik nthopira noka.
Ana annopirane Kapik noka oNgappa okkwi ipokorronnot non annoka iul iupupure woKapik ia kwonekkenthet lon cik iloporot nokaꞌran kung korothiꞌrot.
Akka kwoꞌretheron nti ipuꞌran poriꞌrïmak ana kwonat ton ingili ngokkul wung ia kwongothe,
iaron thelikkakot ngngin nti iauꞌruna ngonnon iokithak ana ngoccïkakothe.
Ook purrut poKapik ikakirrnnimako ana ook iponu lon ikkun appik
ana ook akkaik toꞌra waꞌrupu appik iokuꞌrettat ncik.

Akka aꞌrupu appik wokuꞌrettat ncik ook ngngin, iaik ithiꞌrot ana nocapu ana ia ul okathacce ana iaul wakirrnnimma antoka manna ngili ana nili inïttïttïk ana inarran ana ul ionu lon ikkun, aꞌrupu appik wokuꞌrettat ncik ook ngngin ana wokuꞌrettanok ncik.
Kwokat cik nci nomun, aꞌrupu warthuk okuꞌretta ncik ana ook akkonu aꞌrupu ikkun appik.
Ana ook ca coka ilonu itti ca coul ioccokothe lon loIeccuo ana ook ipakkie ka cik. Ook ipurokot nti ithio cittokït nti iul illet othakka itti akwoka pocittokït naꞌrupu appik.
Akka Kapik kokat kopirat noka itti kaka okin oIeccuo
ana nti ikkul wung Kapik kopakkethe kuꞌri cik ook ana aꞌrupu wonocapu appik ana manna worithiꞌrot nthopakkot ikuꞌri nocaꞌri ica ngüccük ngoIeccuo nguntakatheik nothapak.
Onon thokat thakorrnnoka ikuꞌri annoKapik ana nthokat thꞌrarot onnaththut nthokwarttikot cik thon ithokithak ithanon thokat cik annokkettet.
Anaruk inenni Kapik kopakkethenon ikuꞌri annaththut nnukul wung iothakkat pul iponyi mono aiat karkko pul ionyi itti akwothikkinenon thoporot ana thoꞌrillir ana ella thorukettat cik tokït kung.

Ittina onon thaꞌrungkwot cik ithoccokot lon nomïkït ana othïpoik kiththik ana okorronno opaꞌroik nothoꞌrïkot cik ithiꞌrettat ilon iloporot loIeccuo. Lon iloporot loIeccuo ilen akka onon thoccïkothe ilerettenet ul ncik appik nocapu ana oun oPoluc ipakkarakot anathoreko ammakka pul iparekine Kapik anere lon len.
Mpopirat noka amma anoccokot thiak nti ilon lon. Akka mpaik pamartto thoccokot thiak itha Miccie paik paccokinthet ul ioccokothe lon loIeccuo.
Kapik kothikkierin pul iparekine ul ioccokothe lon loIeccuo ana iken icci akkothïothin anatherenenon lon lung ncik appik,
kumitta ikamuꞌruttakot noul appik nci maꞌrot thupuththuput ana thiki enthi anaruk inenni kokenettat ul iupupure woKapik.

Kapik kokkothe ittina othakka itti aul iakorronno oka woIouth ina thïrïk tholon lokumitta ilamuꞌruttakot ncik. Ana lon lokumitta ilamuꞌruttakot ncik itti oMiccie paik ianon ana ook thoꞌrïkot cik thon ithïrïk thoKapik.

Onïn there lon ileret oMiccie ana onïn thakwancot kathar ikanïn ocimitto ul ngngin nti ilon ilokithak ana ongkene ul appik nthinaik nti ica itha Kapik kethet ul iammakot oMiccie acokka ithina lon loMiccie.
Ilen akka anorekine cannan ana okkot thiak mpuꞌran poMiccie ipaik iaun.
Mpongothe itti onon thina itti tat akka mpaik paccokot thiak nti ilon lon ana thoul ioccokothe lon loKapik iaik nokaꞌran koLathukkia ana opilingon appik ithakarrnniman ngkït ken.
Mpaik pakkot elli othakka itti alittarot mïkït men ana oka tothun ithongarot, othakka itti akin ina lon lokumitta koKapik ilaik itti oMiccie ka kung.
Akka ook akkonu thaꞌrthan ikkun thothinaik nti ica ana thothina lon ilamuꞌruttakot ncik.
Mpaik pakene non elli othakka itti apul ella ammikkot non nthere lon lopreththere.

Ana antoka manna itti mpaik ciththan nti iccik kon ngka kin anaruk nthaik nocïkït cin. Ana mpopirat noka akka mpoccïkothe itti onon thaik tothun ana nthaik thoꞌrungkwothe ithoccokot lon nomïkït loMiccie.
Ammakka onon thangkothe oMiccie oIeccuo itti ook Ili won, naꞌrungkot ilon lung,
nocokkat tit, nopilliet thoccokot lon nomïkït thon iaak ammakka onon thongkenettat ana opirane lon noka ila kwokkinthet non appik.
Nokorronno okorronno itti opilin papaꞌrenon ma cik nti ilon loMiccie, nthinaik nti ica thopul iponyi, llon ilella lon cik ilanthan nopul iponyi ana nolon lonocapu ncik appik ana okonnoka naMiccie.
Akka Kapik ngka kung appik kaik ika koMiccie ika pul iponyi,
ana nthocokkat kicce akka onon thaik iaMiccie ana ook poca colon appik ana kwonu lon ikkun lonili appik.
Akka onon thainet oMiccie, onon thokat thokekkothe, anaruk okorronno oka ngkathar ika ul okekkot ngngin anaruk thokekkot thon itti oMiccie ponekothenon lon ilokithak.
Onon thocïkkakot onnoMiccie nocaꞌri icanon thoccot mamuthie nan ana onon thurokiettat onnaththut nthoccokot lon nomïkït ipuꞌran poKapik okkwi ipurokiet oMiccie nti ithio.
Onon thokat thillet caꞌri icanon thokat ilon ilokithak ana akka onon thokat thakorrnnokekkot anaruk Kapik kokkiet non cik annoMiccie. Kwoccïkïnthet ton appik lon ilokithak,
ana opaꞌre lon cik ilokat lokurrakinthet ton cik itti oron thakkamako ngngin akka oron thakorrnnoccïkot lon loKapik. Kopaꞌret cik nthiot thoMiccie nothapak.
Ana nthapak then oMiccie palkathe nili ana ul ionat puꞌran ikkun pꞌrek ipokat cik. Kwothiekathekin cik tokït koul ana alkot kin nthiot thung nothapak.
Ittina nokorronno okorronno pul pꞌrek apakkma non itti nthaꞌrko ngimpen ana nthakorrnno oꞌrko ngimpen ana itti nokkot kamuthe kokwanok ikie ana kocaꞌri caCcepith ana manna kamuthe kꞌrek.
Aꞌrupu enni appik waurrut waꞌrupu iathokaik. Anaruk aꞌrupu iaik ïcat ien iaik iaMiccie.

Nokorronno okorronno pul ipinnikot itti poporot ana aꞌrane uꞌrupa wothothïlettat woKapik ngaꞌrama itti pakkma non. Akka pul ammakka pen perenthet non lon ila kwimmat ngkït kung ana kwipot ka thoura nolon ilella lon cik.
Ana okin thakorronno oka ithun okin oMiccie ipa ca coka appik. OMiccie akkethet ka puꞌran ana kwacuruttariet mamurut amꞌrïkïkkarot ka tan akocokka mpuꞌran poKapik.
Onon thillethe iaMiccie ana kwopaꞌret puꞌran cik ipokithak nanon ponocapu ncik appik enci. Ittina ngintha akka onon appommakinthet lon ilocoꞌrotheik lonocapu enci ere onon tholon len, iliꞌre itti,
“Kirrnni occokot papu empi” ana “Kirrnni inot” ana “Kirrnni othonto papu empeꞌre”?
Lon elli appik lintat cik amma oron thorekot ngngin. Akka lon len lopul iponyi ana thongkene thopul iponyi ana lon ilocoꞌrotheik lopul iponyi

lon elli lakathako ere lonu thinaik nti ica. Lon lakathako ere lakorronnonon annongat Kapik cannan ana okorronno ipot ka thoura ana annoccokiet ka kon thiak. Anaruk lon len lella puꞌran itti lalkot lon ilokithak ilaka konnon kongothe.
Inakka onon thurokiettat annoMiccie, onon thonu itti onon thaccot kït naꞌrupu iaik tothiꞌrot na aMiccie pikkot cik thokkun wothothari woKapik.
Nokwarttikot aꞌrupu worithiꞌrot annokorronno aꞌrupu wonocapu.
Akka onon thokat thillet annoMiccie ana thikkoik thon thaik inenni thanguttat naMiccie na Kapik kaik.
Amma oMiccie ipethet non thikkoik ummot ncik, onon thummot ncik cakuruk onon aththungon ithïrïk.

Ittina nopaꞌrine lon lonocapu cik ilaik lareko ianon ammakka laik itti thaꞌro nnul nuthuk ana namat ana thongat lon ilokithak ana thïrïk nan akka thapaꞌrenon cik noKapik ana thakorronnonon annaꞌrane aꞌrupu wꞌrek ngaꞌrama.
Nti ilon elli ana aꞌrupu enni appik thua ka thoKapik thaka noul iakkot lon len.
Onon thokakkat cik annokkettet lon len akka onon tharthuk occokot lon loKapik.
Anaruk inenni onon thonu itti onon thacoꞌro nti ithua ka ana okkiet ul thiak ana ocungko ꞌran wen ana eret ul wꞌrek llon lokithak.
Nokorronno ammikkararot akka onon thopaꞌrinet kathar cik kothikkoik thon ikïpe ana lon len,
ana onon thommakothe kathar ikie. Ana onon thothikkiettat thie nthina Kapik ana ammakka okkwi ipokuꞌret lon ncik appik.

Ittina ul wella iiꞌre itti okin enthi thoul woIouth ana enthi thakorronno oka thoIouth ana enthi thakorronno okekkot ana enthi thokekkothe ana enthi thoul iomaik ana enthi thoul wokwat ana enthi thoul ia iak ana ithakorronno oka iak anaruk oMiccie akka lon ncik appik ana kwaik iaron appik.
Ittina onon enthi itha Kapik kocumot ana kothikkiet non thupupure ana itha kongothe. Ana ittina onon thonu itti thana thiak ana oka thoporot ana okorronno ipot ka thoura ana occokot cïkït ilon.
Nocoꞌrarot ana occïkarnthet lon amma opilin pokkinthet opang lon ilokithak. Noccïkarnthet ammakka Ili woccïkïnthet non lon ilokithak.
Ana nolon elli appik narttot nothongarot cannan akka thongarot akkïꞌrïkarot lon len tan annokakat tothun appik.

Nokorronno athomicco ithanthan naMiccie oka nomïkït athittarot non annïꞌrïko lon ilanon okkot akka thomicco enthi akka kwakkarothenon itti onon thikkoik tit ika kulukku koMiccie. Ana nthapira noka appinappin.

Alon loMiccie oka ianon ana nomïkït mon ana cannan amma anon ongkene ana ocimittaro llon iloporot nthinaik nti ica. Nongwo unye waꞌrama ana unye womocumur iapirie Kapik noka ana mmïkït mopiranet Kapik noka.
Ana manna ngre iannokkot ana manna lon ilanon eret, nokkot appik ngkꞌran koIli oIeccuo ana opirane Kapik noka oNgappa ponnon oMiccie ngngin.
Ul iari iittat, noccïkot olle pangon akka ilen akka onon thonu itti onon thakkot ammakka ul ioccokothe lon loIli.
Ul iomura ipot, nongat ari won ana okorronno othirriet kin cik cannan.
Nyukul, noccïkot lon loththen okin onnen llon appik, akka ilen akkapirie Kapik noka.
Oththangon thonyukul, nokorronno othirriet nyukul cik cannan akka okin thella kït kolon ana ella thiak tholon iloporot.

Iak, noccïkot lon lopït pangon thonocapu appik norekinekin, okorronno oreko ngkucul koka, nokorronno oreko tulluk akka okin thaik thakathaccenon othakka itti annopiriekin noka anaruk noreko mmïkït moporot ana othiane Ili cik.
Amma annokkot ngre ngꞌrek, nokkot ncïkït culukku ere onon thaik thakkinthet Ili okorronno oka ul ionyi.
Akka onon thina itti Ili Kapik akkakkenenon thokinya thon. Akka onon thaik tharekine Ili oMiccie.
Ana okkwi ipokkothe lon lokithak kwakkattanthet ilokithak ntit akka Kapik kakkama ul appik llon ilakin thokkothe.
Opingon thoul iareko, nokkinthet ul iarekinenon lon locoꞌrotheik ana lekkot nan, nokorronno ure nan itti onon thonu opït pon tothiꞌrot.
Naꞌra ngaꞌrama appin appin ana oꞌrumoik ana opirane Kapik noka.

Ana nokorronno ure nan aꞌranenïn ngaꞌrama cakuruk othakka itti aKapik anyinenïn kathar, alon lïn occïkakot othakka itti ïnnongkene kumitta ikamuꞌruttakot ncik koMiccie ika mpaik ikorrkkor nti ilon len.
Naꞌranin ngaꞌrama othakka itti anere lon kicce ammakka mponu itti mpere.
Nikkoik ngkathar ikoporot amma onon thaik iul iakorronno oka iammakot oMiccie ana okkot lon iloporot amma nthiothe kathar ikanon okkot ngngin.
Nokorronno alon lon ona thoporot thoKapik amma annere anaththungon othakka itti annina akka annothïnthet kin lon tit ilakin ipittot non kurekkurek.
Mpaik pathïot oThikikkoc akwatherenenon lon lin appik. Ook opangkin ipampongothe cannan ana okkwi ipoꞌrumot nolon lore ana okkwi ipanïn thaik iire ngoIli oIeccuo.
Mpaik pathïnthet non ngok othakka itti akwokenenon ngre ianïn thaik thareko, othakka itti annina lon lïn ana akwopoꞌrienenon mïkït than.
Kwaik panthan okin Oneccimoc ook ponnon ipoꞌrumot nore ana iparon thongothe cannan ana opang ponnon ipaat ntianon. Okin aththuththeꞌra thakenenon ngre appik iaik ngakkattat cene.

Arcciththrikkoc ipanïn thaik ikorrkkor paik pamicconon ana oMarkkoc cakuruk ukul woththan woParanapa paik pamicconon ana onon thoccïkothe lon lung itti kwaik panthan. Amma kwainet non annikkiek cik llon loporot.
OCoccua iponu kꞌran cakuruk itti oIucththoc paik pamicconon cakuruk. Ul enni nti iul woIouth tulluk ianïn thaik tharekine ngili ngoKapik tothun, ana okin thittarothin llon loporot cannan.

Apapprac porianon ana okkwi ipaik parekine oMiccie oIeccuo paik pamicconon. Kwaik paꞌranenon ngaꞌrama cannan othakka itti annothakka thomꞌrintittat ilon loKapik ila Kapik kongothe itti oron thakkot, ana ona mïkït nolon loKapik.
Mpimmat thiak ngkït kin itha kworekot ntire iakkwokat akworekinenon ana ul wonokaꞌran koLathukkia ana ul wonokaꞌran ikoccot kꞌran itti Eroppolic.
Opangkin ipa mpongothe cannan oLukka ipokat pul ipittiet ul paik pamicconon ana oThimac cakuruk.
Nomiccinin opangkingon nokaꞌran koLathukkia ana opangkin ipopari oNimippa ana ul ioccokothe lon loIeccuo ithinciccettot tuan thanung.
Amma kaꞌramacak engki kiꞌrettathenon, anon okatha itti kiꞌrettathe ul ioccokothe lon loIeccuo nokaꞌran koLathukkia cakuruk, ana onon thonu cakuruk itti onon theret lon ila mpothïnthet kin.
Niꞌret Arkkippic itti, “Ina nan itti ngkwamartto ngre ia ngkwoccot ngkꞌran koIli oIeccuo.”
Oun oPoluc akkaik pakurro thomicco enthi nukun win. Nokwarattikot itti onon thaꞌranin ngaꞌrama ampaik ikorrkkor.
Athoporot thoKapik oka nanon.
I Thessalonians: Oun oPoluc ana oCcila ana oThimiththaoc thamicco non ithoccokothe lon loIeccuo thonokaꞌran koThocculunukkia, itha ul woKapik oNgappa ana woIli oIeccuo oMiccie itti athoporot ana thomicco thoKapik oka nanon.
Onïn thopiranet Kapik noka nanon appik appinappin amma ïnaꞌranok ngaꞌrama nti ilon lon.

Onïn tharthuk thaik thakwarttikot non tokït koKapik oNgappa ponnon, nothoccokot lon loKapik nomïkït mon ana oreko ngngin ana tat akka thopoꞌrathan ithongarot thokorronnot non annoreko cannan ana thoccokot cïkït ilon nthoꞌrïkot cik thoIli oIeccuo oMiccie.
Pangkingon, onïn thina itti Kapik kongothenon ana kakkarot non annoka ul wung.

Akka thongkene thïn ithanïn thongkenet non tholon iloporot loIeccuo thakannoka lon nuthuk, anaruk thokat mpuꞌran poKapik ana Kanang ikupupure ana ilanïn thina papenang itti laik ïcat. Onon thina tat akka oron thikikkot cik unaththungon ana akka onïn nthokkinthet non lon loporot anïn ittarot non nolon loka kon.
Onon thinnikothenïn ana Ili oIeccuo, ana manna nthoccokot thiak, onon thaꞌrungkothe ithopira noka nthoccot lon loKapik nthopira noka itha Kanang ikupupure kethet non.
Ittina onon thothakkanet ul ioccokothe lon loIeccuo nomïkït appik, ul ia ul oneko lon nnan noththok poMakthonia ana poKrik.

Lon loIli oIeccuo lopettakatheik nti ianon annoka tulluk noththok poMakthonia ana poKrik, thoccokot lon loKapik nomïkït thon thothakkat thinakot nan naꞌran appik, ilen akka onïn thaik thakannapperenthet lon len.
Akka okin thellek theret thikkoik ithanon thikkiet nïn cik. Ana okin eret itti tat akka onon thopaꞌrinet nikkillan cik annoine Kapik, annorekanthet Kapik ikaik ïcat ana lon lung laik ïcat.
Ana oꞌrïkot ukul wung oIeccuo ianthan ntothiꞌrot, oIeccuo ipa Kapik kurokwiet nti ithio. Ook ipakkieron cik nti ithuaka thoKapik nocaꞌri ica akathokïtto capu.
Pangkingon, onon thina itti thao thïn nanon thakannoka nuthuk anaruk thokat thoporot.

Onon thina tat akka onïn thoccokothe thiak ana ocungkako ana manna aꞌrumakinthet lon than ana olikinenïn cik nokaꞌran koPilippi, anïn tharthuk ainenon nokaꞌran koThocculunukkia anaruk nthittarot thoKapik konnon, onïn thopoꞌrathe than ul wokat cik alikine lon iloporot lung cik ana ïntherekanthet non lon iloporot loKapik.
Thongkene lon loKapik thïn thokat cik athakannao nolon lothurttettot cik annoka manna thouꞌru ana karra.
